T06bsa034_u:2: om namo buddhāya // daśeme dharmāḥ saphalasya bodhisattvamārgasya mahāyānasya saṃgrahāya saṃvartante
T06bsa034_u:5: 'dhyāśayo vihāra upapattiḥ parigraho bhūmiścaryā pratiṣṭhā ca /
T06bsa034_u:10: iha bodhisattvasya svagotraṃ prathamaścittotpādaḥ sarve ca bodhipakṣyā dharmā ādhāra ityucyate
T06bsa034_u:12: iha bodhisattvo gotraṃ niśritya pratiṣṭhāpayitavyo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:16: iha bodhisattvaḥ prathamacittotpādaṃ niśritya pratiṣṭhāya dāne
T06bsa034_u:17: 'pi prayujyate śīle kṣāntau vīryeṃ dhyāne prajñāyāmapi prayujyate iti /
T06bsa034_u:18: yadvā pāramitāsu puṇyasaṃbhāre jñānasaṃbhāre sarveṣu ca bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu prayujyate
T06bsa034_u:20: iha bodhisattvastameva bodhisattvacaryāprayogaṃ niśritya pratiṣṭhāyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ paripūrayati /
T06bsa034_u:25: tadanena paryāyeṇa veditavyamanutpāditacittasyāpi bodhisattvasya akṛte 'pi bodhisattvacaryāprayoge gotramādhāra iti /
T06bsa034_u:26: sa cet punargotrasthaścittaṃ notpādayati bodhicaryāsu na prayujyate na kṣipraṃ bodhimārāgayati tāsvapi (Dutt 2) viparyayāt kṣipramārāgayatīti veditavyam
T06bsa034_u:42: tena khalu gotreṇa samanvāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānatikramya prāgevānyān sattvānniruttaro viśeṣo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:46: tatra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ tadgotraṃ kleśāvaraṇaviśuddhyā viśudhyati na tu jñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhyā
T06bsa034_u:47: bodhisattvagotraṃ punarapi kleśāvaraṇaviśuddhyā api jñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhyā viśudhyati /
T06bsa034_u:49: api ca caturbhirākārairbodhisattvasya śrāvakapratyekabuddhebhyo viśeṣo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:57: bodhisattvaḥ apyātma hitāya api parahitāya bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇām /
T06bsa034_u:59: śrāvakaḥ pratyekabuddhaśca skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpāda-sthānāsthānasatyakauśalyaṃ karoti bodhisattvastatra cānyeṣu ca sarvavidyāsthāneṣu /
T06bsa034_u:71: satsu ca saṃvidyamāneṣu deyadharmeṣu satatasamitaṃ pareṣāṃ saṃvibhāgaśīlo bhavati pramuditacittaśca dadāti na vimanaskaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:85: ṛṇaṃ gṛhītvā parebhyo na visaṃvādayati nābhidruhyati /
T06bsa034_u:92: udāreṣu ca karmānteṣvadhimukto bhavati na parīttāyadvāreṣu /
T06bsa034_u:99: hrīvyapatrāpyaṃ prāviṣkaroti vipule 'pi ca bhogapratilambhe nādhimātralolupo bhavati prāgevālpe
T06bsa034_u:100: itimānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni bodhisattvasya dānapāramitāyā gotraliṅgāni veditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:103: iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā mṛdunā kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇā samanvāgato bhavatyakuśalena nātyartharaudreṇa nātyarthasattvopaghātakena /
T06bsa034_u:104: kṛtvāpi ca pāpakaṃ karma laghu ladhveva vipratisāraṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:112: upakāriṣu ca sattveṣu kṛtajño bhavati kṛtavedī /
T06bsa034_u:118: parabādhayā cāttyartha bādhyate yaduta pareṣāṃ vadhabandhanacchedanatāḍanakutsanatarjanādikayā dṛṣṭvā vā śrutvā vā /
T06bsa034_u:122: parakṛtyeṣu ca parakaraṇīyeṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati yaduta kṛṣivaṇijyāgorakṣyarājapauruṣyalipigaṇananyasanasaṃkhyāmudrāyāṃ bhartṛprasādane kulaprasādane rājakulaprasādane mitrāmitraprasādane bhogānāmarjane rakṣaṇe sannidhau prayoge visarge āvāhavivāhābhakṣaṇasaṃbhakṣaṇeṣvevaṃbhāgīyeṣu sattvakṛtyeṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ
T06bsa034_u:124: na kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādeṣu ca paraviheṭhanakaraṇīyeṣu ye ātmanaḥ pareṣāñcānarthāyāhitāya duḥkhāya saṃvartante /
T06bsa034_u:128: samānakṣāntiśīlatayā apahāya svakāryaṃ parairātmakārye yathākāmaṃ niyojyate /
T06bsa034_u:129: ārdracittaśca bhavati peśalacitto na ca ciramāghātacittatāṃ pratighacittatāmudvahati nānyatra tatkṣaṇa evāsya taccittaṃ bhadratāyāṃ parivartate /
T06bsa034_u:131: na ca pareṣāṃ mitrabhedaṃ rocayati na karoti /
T06bsa034_u:133: priyaṃvadaśca bhavatyaparakaṭukaḥ api svakasya dāsādiparijanasya prāgeva pareṣām guṇapriyaśca bhavati pareṣāṃ bhūtasya varṇasyāhartā /
T06bsa034_u:136: iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā pareṣāmantikādapakāraṃ labdhvā nāghātacittatāṃ prāviṣkaroti nāpyapakārāya prapadyate /
T06bsa034_u:138: na ca khilaṃ dhārayati na cirakālikaṃ vairāśayaṃ vahati /
T06bsa034_u:142: kālyotthāyī sāyaṃ nipātī na nidrāsukhaṃ śayanasukhaṃ pārśvasukhamatyarthaṃ svīkaroti /
T06bsa034_u:143: pratyupasthite ca kṛtye abhibhūyākartukāmatāmālasyaṃ pratisaṃkhyāya prayujyate tasya kṛtyasyābhiniṣpattaye
T06bsa034_u:144: sarvakṛtyasamārambheṣu ca dṛḍhaniścayo bhavati nākṛtvā nāpariprāpya sarveṇa sarvaṃ vīryasraṃsayati antarā vā viṣādamāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:145: udāreṣu ca parameṣvartheṣu na cetasā saṃkocamāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:148: / vīraśca bhavati mahāsabhāpraveśe vā paraiḥ sahābhiprayoga pratyabhiyoge vā tadanyatra vā duṣkarakarmaṇi mahāvyavasāyeṣvapi cārthopasaṃhiteṣu nātyarthaṃ khedamāpadyate prāgeva parītteṣu itīmānyevaṃbhāgīyāni bodhisattvasya vīryapāramitāyā gotraliṅgāni veditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:150: iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā dharmārthopanidhyāne avikṣepabahulo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:152: ca prāntāni śayanāsanāni manuṣyarahaḥsevitāni vigatapāpakāni pratisaṃlayanasārūpyakāṇi dṛṣṭvā śrutvā sukhaṃ tannaiṣkramyaṃ prāvivekyamiti (Dutt 6) naiṣkramyaprāvivekye tīvramautsukyamutpādayati prakṛtyā ca mandakleśo bhavati mandanivaraṇo mandadauṣṭhulyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:153: pravivekagatasya cāsya svārthaṃ paritulayataḥ pāpakāḥ asadvitarkā nātyarthaṃ cittaṃ kṣobhayanti na paryādāya tiṣṭhanti /
T06bsa034_u:155: amitrapakṣe 'pi tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ maitracittatāmupasthāpayati prāgeva mitrodāsīnapakṣe /
T06bsa034_u:156: vicitraiśca duḥkhairduḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ śrutvā vā dṛṣṭvā vā mahatkāruṇyacittamutpādayati
T06bsa034_u:157: duḥkhāpanayāya ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ vyāpāraṃ gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:158: prakṛtyā ca sattveṣu hitakāmo bhavati sukhakāmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:159: dhṛtimāṃśca bhavatyāpatsu jñātivyasane vā bhogavyasane vā vadhe vā bandhane vā pravāse vā ityevaṃbhāgīyāsvāpatsu /
T06bsa034_u:160: medhāvī ca dharmāṇāṃ grahaṇadhāraṇohanasamarthaḥ smṛtibalena ca samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:164: iha bodhisattvaḥ sarvavidyāsthānajñeyapraveśāya sahajayā prajñayā samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:166: tāsu tāsu ca pramādasthānaviratiṣu pratisaṃkhyānabaliko bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:169: bhūtārthaniścaye tu buddhā eva bhagavantaḥ pratyakṣadarśinaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:170: yasmācca tadgotraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ prakṛtyaiva guṇayuktaṃ bhadraṃ kalyāṇaṃ śukladharmasamanvāgataṃ tasmāttāvad durabhisaṃbhavasya śreṣṭhasyācintyasyācalasyānuttarasya tathāgatasya padasyāvāptaye hetubhāvena yujyate 'nyathā na yujyate /
T06bsa034_u:171: tāvacca bodhisattva ebhiḥ śukladharmaiḥ prakṛtyaiva yukto bhavati yāvanna śukladharmavairodhikaiścaturbhirupakleśaiḥ sakalavikalairupakliṣṭo bhavati
T06bsa034_u:172: / yadā copakliṣṭo bhavati sa tadā eṣu ca śukleṣu dharmeṣu na saṃdṛśyate /
T06bsa034_u:174: apāyopapattāvapi bodhisattvasya tadanyebhyaḥ apāyopapannebhyaḥ sattvebhyo (Dutt 7) gotrakṛto mahān viśeṣo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:175: iha bodhisattvo dīrgheṇa kālena kadācit karhicidapāyeṣūpapadyate /
T06bsa034_u:177: na ca tathā tīvrāmāpāyikīṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadyathā 'nye 'pāyopapannāḥ sattvāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:178: tayā ca tanvyā duḥkhayā vedanayā spṛṣṭo 'dhimātraṃ saṃvegamutpādayati /
T06bsa034_u:179: teṣu ca sattveṣu tatropapanneṣu duḥkhiteṣu kāruṇyacittaṃ pratilabhate yaduta tenaiva gotreṇa ca sattveṣu tatropapanneṣu duḥkhiteṣu kārūṇyacittaṃ pratilabhate yaduta tenaiva gotreṇa buddhamahākaruṇāhetunā codyamānaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:180: ityevaṃbhāgīyaḥ apāyopapattau bodhisattvasya tadanyebhyaḥ apāyopapannebhyaḥ sattvebhyo viśeṣo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:181: tatra katame te bodhisattvasya catvāraḥ śukladharmavairodhikā upakleśāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:182: pūrvaṃ pramattasya kleśābhyāsāttīvrakleśatā āyatakleśatā cāyaṃ prathama upakleśaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:186: caturbhiḥ kāraṇairevaṃ gotrasaṃpanno 'pi bodhisattvo na śaknotyanuttara
T06bsa034_u:189: iha bodhisattvaḥ ādita eva kalyāṇamitraṃ na labhate aviparītabodhimārgadaiśikaṃ buddhaṃ vā bodhisattvaṃ vā /
T06bsa034_u:191: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo labdhvāpi kalyāṇamitraṃ viparītagrāhī viparītaṃ śikṣate bodhisattvaśikṣāsu
T06bsa034_u:193: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo labdhvāpi kalyāṇamitramaviparītaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaśikṣāsu tasmin prayoga śithilaprayogo bhavati kusīdo nodagrapratatavīryasamanvāgataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:195: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo labdhvā kalyāṇamitramaviparītaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaśikṣāsu tasmiṃśca prayoge ārabdhavīryaḥ aparipakvendriyo bhavatyaparipūrṇabodhisaṃbhāraḥ dīrghakālāparijayādvodhipakṣya dharmāṇām /
T06bsa034_u:199: asati tu gotre sarveṇa sarva sarvathā bodharaprāptireva veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:200: bodhisattvabhūmau ādhāre yogasthāne prathamaṃ gotrapaṭalaṃ samāptam //
T06bsa034_u:203: iha bodhisattvasya prathamaścittotpādaḥ sarvabodhisattvasamyakpraṇidhānānāmādyaṃ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ tadanyasamyakpraṇidhānasaṃgrāhakam /
T06bsa034_u:205: sa khalu bodhisattvo bodhāya cittaṃ praṇidadhadevaṃ cittamabhisaṃskaroti vācañca bhāṣate /
T06bsa034_u:206: aho batāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ sarvasattvānāñcārthakaraḥ syāmatyantaniṣṭhe nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ tathāgatajñāne ca /
T06bsa034_u:209: tāṃ khalu bodhiṃ sattvārthañcālamvya sa cittotpādaḥ prārthayate nānālambya /
T06bsa034_u:211: sa ca cittotpādaḥ sarvabodhipakṣyakuśalamūlasaṃgrahāya pūrvaṅgamatvātkuśalaḥ paramakauśalyaguṇayuktaḥ bhadraḥ paramabhadraḥ kalyāṇaḥ paramakalyāṇaḥ sarvasattvādhiṣṭhānakāyavāṅmanoduścaritavairodhikaḥ yāni ca kānicittadanyāni laukikalokottareṣvartheṣu kuśalāni samyakpraṇidhānāni teṣāṃ sarveṣāmagrya metatsamyakpraṇidhānaṃ niruttaraṃ yaduta bodhisattvasya prathamaścittotpādaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:215: tasya ca bodhicittasya sahotpādādevāvatīrṇe bhavati bodhisattvo 'nuttare
T06bsa034_u:217: bodhisattvo bodhisattva iti ca saṃkhyāṃ gacchati yaduta saṃketavyavahāranayena /
T06bsa034_u:219: utpādya ca bodhisattvastaccittaṃ krameṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimadhigacchati nānutpādya /
T06bsa034_u:221: duḥkhiteṣu ca sattveṣu sa kāruṇiko bodhisattvaḥ paritrāṇābhiprāyastaccittamutpādayati /
T06bsa034_u:223: (Dutt 9) tañca cittotpādaṃ niśritya pratiṣṭhāya bodhisattvo bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu sattvārtha
T06bsa034_u:228: sa ca bodhisattvasya prathamacittotpādaḥ samāsena dvividhaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:232: anairyāṇikaḥ punarya utpanno nātyantamanuvartate punareva vyāvartate /
T06bsa034_u:235: tatrātyantikī yatsakṛdvyāvṛttaṃ cittaṃ na punarutpadyate bodhāya /
T06bsa034_u:236: anātyantikī punaḥ yadvyāvṛttaṃ cittaṃ punaḥ punarutpadyate bodhāya /
T06bsa034_u:239: iha kulaputro vā kuladruhitā vā tathāgatasya vā bodhisattvasya vā acintyamatyadbhutaṃ prātihāryaṃ prabhāvaṃ paśyati saṃpratyayitasya vā
T06bsa034_u:241: tasya dṛṣṭvā vā śrutvā vā evaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:242: mahānubhāvā bateyaṃ bodhiryasyāṃ sthitasya vā pratipannasya vā 'yamevarūpaḥ
T06bsa034_u:243: prabhā[vaḥ] idamevaṃrūpaṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛśyate ca śrūyate ca sa tadeva prabhāvadarśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ vādhipatiṃ kṛtvā mahābodhyadhimukto mahābodhau
T06bsa034_u:246: sa na haiva prabhāvaṃ paśyati vā śṛṇoti vā aparitvanuttarāṃ bodhimārabhya saddharmaṃ śṛṇoti bodhisattvapiṭakaṃ deśyamānaṃ śrutvā ca punarabhiprasīdati /
T06bsa034_u:247: abhiprasannaśca saddharmaśravaṇamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā tathāgatajñānādhimuktaḥ tathāgatajñānapratilambhāya cittamutpādayati /
T06bsa034_u:249: sa na haiva dharma śṛṇotyapi tu bodhisattvaḥ saddharmāntardhānimāmukhāmupagatāṃ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:250: dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaivaṃ bhavati aprameyāṇāṃ bata sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpagamāya bodhisattvasaddharmasthitiḥ saṃvartate /
T06bsa034_u:257: sa na haiva saddharmāntardhāniṃ pratyupasthitāṃ paśyati apitvantayuge 'ntakāle
T06bsa034_u:259: tadyathā mohabahulānāhrīkyānapatrāpyabahulānīrṣyāmātsaryabahulān duḥkhabahulān dauṣṭhulyabahulān kleśabahulān duścaritabahulān pramādabahulān kausīdyabahulān āśraddhyabahulāṃśca /
T06bsa034_u:262: asminnevamupakliṣṭe kāle na sulabho nihīnaḥ śrāvakapratyekabodhāvapi tāvaccittotpādaḥ prāgevānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T06bsa034_u:274: iha bodhisattvasya mitramādita evājaḍaṃ bhavatyadhandhajātīyaṃ paṇḍitaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ na ca kudṛṣṭipatitam
T06bsa034_u:279: / na cainaṃ duścirite viniyojayati na duścaritasthānamasyopasaṃharati /
T06bsa034_u:281: na cainamutkṛṣṭatarebhyaḥ śraddhācchandasamādānavīryopāyaguṇebhyo vicchandayitvā nihīnatareṣu śraddhācchandasamādānavīryopāyaguṇeṣu samādāpayati /
T06bsa034_u:282: tadyathā mahāyānādvicchandayitvā śrāvakayāne vā pratyekabuddhayāne vā bhāvanāmayād vicchandayitvā cintāmaye cintāmayādvicchandayitvā śrutamaye śrutamayādvicchandayitvā vaiyāvṛttyakarmaṇi śīlamayād vicchandayitvā dānamaye ityevaṃbhāgīyebhya utkṛṣṭatarebhyo guṇebhyo na vicchandayitvā evaṃbhāgīyeṣu nihīnatareṣu guṇeṣu samādāpayati /
T06bsa034_u:286: santi te lokadhātavo yeṣu duḥkhaṃ nopalabhyate daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu /
T06bsa034_u:287: sa ca bodhisattvaḥ saduḥkhe loka dhātau pratyājāto bhavati yatra duḥkhamupalabhyate nāduḥkhe
T06bsa034_u:290: punaśca paramātmānaṃ vā tadubhayaṃ vā dīrghakālikena vicitreṇa tīvreṇa nirantareṇa duḥkhena spṛṣṭamupadrutamabhibhūtaṃ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:291: iti tasya bodhisattvasya svagotrasanniśrayeṇa prakṛtibhadratayā ebhiścaturbhirālambanairadhiṣṭhānaiḥ karuṇāmṛdumadhyādhimātrā pravarvate anyatrābhyāsataḥ //
T06bsa034_u:292: caturbhiḥ kāraṇairbodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu karuṇāṃ saṃpuraskṛtya saṃsāraduḥkhāddīrghakālikādvicitrāttīvrānnirantarādapi na bibheti nottrasyati prāgeva nihīnāt /
T06bsa034_u:299: sattveṣu cādhimātrayā karuṇayā samanvāgato bhavati idaṃ caturtha kāraṇam /
T06bsa034_u:302: / tatra svaśaktipatitā yā ruciranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau idamucyate
T06bsa034_u:304: paraśaktisamutpāditā tu ruciranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bodhisattvasya parabalam ityucyate cittasyotpattaye /
T06bsa034_u:305: pūrvako bodhisattvasya mahāyānapratisaṃyuktakuśaladharmābhyāsa etarhi buddhabodhisattvasandarśana mātrakeṇa tadvarṇaśravaṇamātrakeṇa vā āśu cittasyottpattaye prāgeva saddharmaśravaṇena vā prabhāvadarśanena vā hetubalam ityucyate cittasyottpattaye /
T06bsa034_u:306: dṛṣṭadhārmiko bodhisattvasya satpuruṣasaṃsevā-saddharmaśravaṇacintādiko dirghakālikaḥ kuśaladharmābhyāsaḥ prayogabalam ityucyate cittasyotpattaye /
T06bsa034_u:307: tatra bodhisattvasya samastavyastāṃścaturaḥ pratyayāṃścaturo hetūnāgamya sacedadhyātmabalena hetubalena ca samastābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ balābhyāṃ taccittamutpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:315: saṃsāraduḥkhācca dīrghakālikādvicitrāttīvrānnirantarād bhīrurbhavati atyartha bibhetyuttasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:316: caturṇāṃ cittotpattihetūnāṃ viparyayeṇa catvāryetāni cittavyāvṛttikāraṇāni vistareṇa pūrvavadveditavyāni
T06bsa034_u:324: dvāvimau dṛḍhaprathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya sattveṣu kalyāṇādhyāśayau pravartete
T06bsa034_u:326: tatra hitādhyāśayo yā akuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanakāmatā sukhādhyāśayo yā vighātināmanāthānāmapratiśaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ kliṣṭavarjitānugrāhakavastūṣasaṃharaṇakāmatā dvāvimau dṛḍhaprathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya prayogau /
T06bsa034_u:329: pratipattiprayogaḥ pratidivasamātmanaśca buddhadharmaparipākaprayogaḥ sattvānāñca yathāśakti yathāvalamadhyāśayaprayogameva niśritya hitasukhopasaṃhāraprayogaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:330: dve ime dṛḍhaprathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahatī kuśaladharmāyadvāre /
T06bsa034_u:333: yathā dve āyadvāre evaṃ dvau mahāntau kuśaladharmasannicayau dvāvaprameyau kuśaladharmaskandhau
T06bsa034_u:335: dve ime prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya prathamaṃ cittotpādamupādāya (Dutt 13) bodhāya kuśalaparigrahavaiśeṣye tadanyaṃ
T06bsa034_u:338: sa khalu bodhisattvasya kuśalaparigraho 'nuttanurāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherhetuḥ sā ca
T06bsa034_u:343: sahacittotpādācca sarvasattvānāṃ dakṣiṇīyabhūto bhavati gurubhūtaḥ puṇyakṣetraṃ pitṛkalpaḥ prajānāmavyābādhyasya ca puṇyasya parigrahaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:346: yasminnārakṣe sadā pratyupasthite na śaknuvanti suptamattapramattasyāpi vyāḍā vā yakṣā vā amanuṣyā vā naivāsikā vā viheṭhāṃ kartum /
T06bsa034_u:348: na ca dīrgheṇa khareṇa vā ābādhena spṛśyate /
T06bsa034_u:349: sattvārtheṣu ca sattvakaraṇīyeṣvasya vyāyacchamānasya kāyena vācā dharmañca deśayataḥ nātyarthaṃ kāyaḥ krāmyati na smṛtiḥ pramuṣyate na cittamupahanyate /
T06bsa034_u:351: utpādita cittastu bhūyasyā mātrayā mandatara dauṣṭhulyo bhavati yaduta kāyadauṣṭhulyena cittadauṣṭhulyena ca /
T06bsa034_u:352: asiddhānyapi ca tadanya hastagatāni sattvānāmītyupadravopasargasaṃśamakāni mantrapadāni vidyāpadāni taddhastagatāni sidhyanti /
T06bsa034_u:358: yatra ca grāmakṣetre prativasati tasmin bhayabhairavadurbhikṣadoṣā amanuṣyakṛtāścopadravā anutpannāśca notpadyante utpannāśca vyupaśāmyanti /
T06bsa034_u:359: sa cetpunaḥ sa prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvaḥ ekadā (Dutt 14) narakeṣvapāyabhūmāvupapadyate sa bhūyasyā
T06bsa034_u:361: tanutarāñca duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate bhṛśatarañca saṃvegamutpādayati teṣāñca sattvānāmantike karuṇācittatāmavyābādhya puṇyaparigrahahetoḥ /
T06bsa034_u:367: samāsato bodhisattvā yatra śikṣante yathā ca śikṣante yacca śikṣante tat sarvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya bodhisattvacaryetyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:371: svārthaḥ parārthaḥ tattvārthaḥ prabhāvaḥ sattvaparipākaḥ ātmano buddhadharmaparipākaḥ anuttarā ca samyaksaṃbodhiḥ saptamaṃ sthānam /
T06bsa034_u:375: svaparārthaḥ katamaḥ samāsato daśavidhaḥ svaparārtho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:376: kevalaṃ parasambaddhaḥ hitānvayaḥ sukhānvayaḥ hetusaṃgṛhītaḥ phalasaṃgṛhītaḥ ehikaḥ āmutrikaḥ ātyantikaḥ anātyantikaśca /
T06bsa034_u:377: tatra kevalaḥ svārthaḥ parārthaśca bodhisattvena parijñāya prahātavyaḥ bodhisattvavidheḥ samatikrāntatvādananurūpatvācca
T06bsa034_u:379: tatrāyaṃ kevalaḥ svārtho bodhisattvasya yo 'nena parijñāya prahātavyo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:381: dharmamatsariṇo vā punaḥ sato dharmāṇāṃ buddhabodhisattvabhāṣitānāṃ paryeṃṣaṇā dhāraṇā ca
T06bsa034_u:382: svargakāmasya svargārtha śīlaṃ vīryārambhaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñāṃ samādāya vartanā /
T06bsa034_u:384: lābhakāmasya vā lābhanimittaṃ lābhanirvartakaṃ mamārthaṃ pareṣāmutplāvakaṃ vicitrābhūtaguṇākhyānam
T06bsa034_u:385: ātmanaḥ paricaryāsvīkaraṇakāmasya paricaryāsvīkaraṇārthamadharmeṇa gaṇasaṃgraho na dharmeṇa
T06bsa034_u:386: parato dāsabhūtān sattvān dāsabhāvāddhi pramokṣayati yāvadevātmano dāsabhāvāya /
T06bsa034_u:387: (Dutt 16) bandhanabaddhān sattvān bandhanādvimokṣya svayameva badhnāti yāvadevātmanaḥ kṛtyaniṣpattaye
T06bsa034_u:388: daṇḍādibhayabhītāṃśca sattvān parato daṇḍādibhayādvipramokṣayati yāvadeva svayameva bhayagrahaṇārtham
T06bsa034_u:389: dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāraśca bodhisattvasya sattvārthanidhyānavirahitaḥ kevalaḥ svārtho veditavyaḥ
T06bsa034_u:390: ityevaṃbhāgīyo bodhisattvasya kevalaḥ svārtho vedivtayo yo bodhisattvena parijñāya prahātavyaḥ
T06bsa034_u:391: dānaṃ punaḥ bodhisattvasya kṣāntiśca kāruṇyapūrvakaṃ vā bodhipariṇataṃ vā svarganimittaṃ vā nityakālaṃ parasambaddha eva svārtho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:392: ityetān yathānirdiṣṭānākārān sthāpayitvā tadanya etadviparyayātsvārtho bodhisattvānāṃ sarva eva parārthasambaddho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:393: tatrāyaṃ bodhisattvasya kevalaḥ parārtho bodhisattvena parijñāya prahātavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:394: vipanna dṛṣṭerdānam anāgamadṛṣṭeraphaladarśinaḥ bhraṣṭaśīlasya pratipattivirahitasya pareṣāṃ dharmadeśanā /
T06bsa034_u:396: tathāhi sa dhyānairvihṛtya dhyānaṃ vyāvarttya praṇidhāya yatra kāmaṃ tatra kāmadhātāvupapadyate
T06bsa034_u:397: vaśitāprāptasya ca bodhisattvasya daśasu nikṣu vicitrairnirmāṇaiḥ vicitrāṇāṃ sattvānāmarthakriyā
T06bsa034_u:400: tatra pūrvako dvividhaḥ parārthaḥ kevalo yathā nirdiṣṭo bodhisattvena parijñāya prahātavyaḥ
T06bsa034_u:401: tadanyatra ca kevale parārthe bhūyasyā mātrayā śikṣitavyam /
T06bsa034_u:402: ityetānākārān sthāpayitvā etadviparyayācca bodhisattvānāṃ sarvaḥ parārthaḥ svārthaḥ sambaddhaḥ
T06bsa034_u:407: tatra yatkiṃcid bodhisattvaḥ ātmanā vā parīttaṃ prabhūtaṃ vā kuśalaparigrahaṃ kuśalopacayaṃ karoti paraṃ vā parītte prabhūte vā kuśalaparigrahe kuśalopacaye samādāpayati vinayati (Dutt 17) niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati /
T06bsa034_u:409: yatkiṃcidvodhisattvaḥ ātmano vā parasya vā kliṣṭa varjitaṃ sukhamupasaṃharati upakaraṇasukhaṃ vā dhyānasukhaṃ vā ayaṃ bodhisattvasyānugrāhakalakṣaṇo hitānvayaḥ svaparārtho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:414: sa punareṣa caturvidhaḥ svaparārthaḥ caturṣu dharmasamādaneṣvanupūrva yathāyogaṃ dṛṣṭavyaḥ
T06bsa034_u:421: tatra nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃsaṃprāpakaśca nirvāṇapakṣyā laukikalokottarā dharmā ityeṣa samāsato bodhisattvasya hitānvaya aupaśamikaḥ svaparārthaḥ sarvaprativiśiṣṭo niruttaro veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:425: hetusukhaṃ veditasukhaṃ duḥkhaprātipakṣikaṃ sukhaṃ veditopacchedasukhamavyabādhyañca pañcam sukham /
T06bsa034_u:427: taddhetukaśca yaḥ sparśaḥ sukhavedanīyaḥ yacca kiñcidiṣṭaphalaṃ karma dṛṣṭe dharme abhisaṃparāye vā tatsarvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya hetusukhamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:429: duḥkhapraśamanāpekṣaḥ ebhireva hetusukhasaṃgṛhītaistribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ saṃbhūtaḥ kāyacittānugrahakaro
T06bsa034_u:434: tatpunaḥ sarva traidhātukaṃ yathāyogaṃ ṣaḍvidhamāyatanabhedena cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajaṃ yāvanmanaḥsaṃsparśajam
T06bsa034_u:439: śītoṣṇakṣutpipāsādiduḥkhapratikāreṇa praśamāt tasminneva duḥkhopaśamamātrake yā sukhabuddhirutpadyate idamucyate duḥkhaprātipakṣikaṃ sukham /
T06bsa034_u:447: tatra hetusukhaṃ sukhahetutvāt sukhaṃ na svabhāvataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:448: veditasukhaṃ na hetubhāvādapi tu svabhāvata eva /
T06bsa034_u:450: hetubhāvānnāpi svabhāvataḥ api tu duḥkhopaśama-mātrad duḥkhāpakarṣaṇāt sukham /
T06bsa034_u:451: veditopacchedasukhaṃ na hetubhāvānna svābhāvyānna duḥkhāpakarṣaṇādapi tu yatkiṃcidveditam
T06bsa034_u:452: idamatra duḥkhasyeti kṛtvā pāramārthikasya duḥkhasya tāvatkālikvavihāra-vyupaśamāt sukham
T06bsa034_u:453: avyābādhya-sukha-saṃgṛhītaṃ paścimaṃ saṃbodhisukhamāyatyāṃ ca tasyaiva pāramārthikasya duḥkhasyātyanta-vyupaśamād dṛṣṭe ca dharme
T06bsa034_u:457: tatra bodhisattvo yadeva hitapakṣyaṃ sukhaṃ tadeva sattvānāmupasaṃharet natu ahitapakṣyam
T06bsa034_u:458: ahitapakṣyaṃ punaḥ sukhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā parijñāya tasmāt sattvān vicchandayecchaktitaśca tasyāpakarṣāpahārāya vyāyaccheta /
T06bsa034_u:459: duḥkhānugatamapi yaddhitaṃ syāt tadvodhisattvena sahaiva duḥkhena sahaiva daurmanasyenākāmakānāṃ
T06bsa034_u:461: sukhānugatañcāpi yadahitaṃ syāttadapi sahaiva sukhena saha saumanasyena kāmakānāṃ sattvānāmapahartavyamapakarṣitavya mupāyakauśalya-saṃniśrayeṇa /
T06bsa034_u:463: sukhāyaiva sa (Dutt 19) āyatyāṃ sattvānāṃ niyato veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:465: 'sau duḥkhena saha hitopasaṃhāraḥ sukhena ca sahāhitāpakarṣaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:466: ataeva bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu yo hitakāmaḥ arthataḥ sukhakāmo 'pi sa jñeyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:468: tathā hi hitaṃ hetusthānīyaṃ sukhaṃ phalasthānīyam /
T06bsa034_u:470: yaḥ kaściddhitānugataḥ tatra yacceṣṭaphalaṃ karma dṛṣṭe dharme abhisaṃparāye ca hetusukhasaṃgṛhītaṃ yacca duḥkhaprātipakṣikaṃ yacca vedito pacchedasukhaṃ yaccāvyābādhyasukham etadekāntena nirvimarṣo bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣūpasaṃharet /
T06bsa034_u:472: vedita sukhamindriyaviṣayasparśasaṃgṛhītañca hetusukhaṃ yatsaṃkleśāya vā kliṣṭaṃ vā sāvadyamahitamapathyaṃ tannopasaṃharet /
T06bsa034_u:473: yatpunarasaṃkleśāyāsaṃkliṣṭaṃ vā 'navadyaṃ hitaṃ pathyaṃ ca tadvodhisattvaḥ sattveṣūpasaṃhared yathāśakti yathābalam /
T06bsa034_u:474: api cātmanā tathaiva samācarecchikṣeta pratyanubhavedityayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ hitasukhānvayaḥ svaparārtho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:478: vipākahetuḥ vipākaphalaṃ puṇyahetuḥ puṇyaphalaṃ jñānahetuḥ jñānaphalam /
T06bsa034_u:481: āyuḥsaṃpat varṇasaṃpat kulasaṃpat aiśvaryasaṃpat ādeyavākyatā maheśākhyatā manuṣyatvaṃ balameva cāṣṭamam /
T06bsa034_u:486: yatpunaḥ śraddheyo bhavati pratyayitaḥ sattvānāmutpannotpanneṣvadhikaraṇeṣu prāmāṇikatvena ratheyaḥ kāṃsakūṭatūlākūṭādibhinirmāyāśāṭhyena /
T06bsa034_u:490: mahadyaśaḥ khyātiścāsya loke prathitā bhavati yaduta śauryaṃ vā vīrya vā dhairyaṃ vā vaicakṣaṇyaṃ vā naipuṇyaṃ vā sauśīlyaṃ vā vicitraśilpakarmasthānātirekataratama-kauśalyaṃ vā ārabhya (Dutt 20)
T06bsa034_u:491: tannidānañca gururbhavati mahājanakāyasya satkaraṇīyo gurukaraṇīyo mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:494: alpābādhatā arogajātīyatā mahotsāhatā ca prakṛtyā balasaṃpat /
T06bsa034_u:501: āyatyāmātmani vicitraguṇādhānapraṇidhānavato ratnatrayapūjā gurupūjā maheśākhyatāyā hetuḥ
T06bsa034_u:506: vinirmokṣaṇatayā ca dharmeṇa puruṣendriyavipralopāyopāttānāmupanītānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ manuṣyatvasya hetuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:507: kāyena sattvānāṃ vaiyāvṛtya kriyā sahāyakriyā utpannotpanneṣu kṛtyeṣu yathāśakti yathābalaṃ dharmeṇāsāhasena bhakta-tarpaṇa-yavāgupānānāṃ ca vṛṣyāṇāmutsāhakarāṇāmannapānānāṃ sattveṣūpasaṃhāro balasampado hetuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:509: sa punarayaṃ hetuḥ samāsatastribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ puṣṭo bhavati paripūrṇasya puṣṭasyodārasya vipākasyābhinirvṛttaye
T06bsa034_u:512: tatra yā ca śuddhāśayatā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau teṣāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ pariṇamanād yā ca tīvrāśayatā ghanarasenodāreṇa prasādenādhyācaraṇād yā ca sahadhārmikasya darśanenābhipramodanā yā ca pratidivasaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ tadanudharmameva bahulamanuvitarkaṇānuvicāraṇā /
T06bsa034_u:514: tatra yo dīrghakālābhyāso nirantarakāritā [ca] nipuṇakāritā ca pareṣāñcāsamātte
T06bsa034_u:515: tasmin kuśale samādāpanāya varṇavāditā samātte vā punaḥ saṃharṣaṇāya varṇavāditā teṣāmeva ca tasmin kuśalamūle sanniveśanā pratiṣṭhāpanā /
T06bsa034_u:517: tatra samāsataḥ prayogasya samyaksampādanāttasyaiva ca samyakprayogasya phale 'vasthāpanā
T06bsa034_u:520: āyuḥsaṃpanno bodhisattvo dīrghakālaṃ kuśalapakṣe prayujyate prabhūtañca kuśalamūlopacayaṃ karoti svārtha parārthañcārabhya /
T06bsa034_u:524: tayā ca manojñarūpatayā sammukhībhāvopagamanāccāsya mahājanakāyo vacanaṃ śrotavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyate /
T06bsa034_u:526: kulasaṃpanno bodhisattvaḥ sammato bhavati mahājanakāyasya pūjyaśca praśasyaśca /
T06bsa034_u:527: sammatatvācca pūjyatvātpraśasyatvād yatra yatra vastuni sattvān samādāpayati te tejograstāstatra tatrāśu pratipadyante na vivadante na viceṣṭante 'kriyāyai /
T06bsa034_u:529: aiśvaryasaṃpanno bodhisattvo dānena sattvān saṃgṛhṇāti paripācayati /
T06bsa034_u:531: ādeyavacano bodhisattvaḥ priyavāditayā arthacaryayā samānārthatayā ca sattvān gṛhṇāti paripācayati
T06bsa034_u:533: maheśākhyo bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ vicitraiḥ kṛtyakaraṇīyaiḥ sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchannupakārī bhavati
T06bsa034_u:534: yenopakāre ṇāvabaddhacittāḥ sattvā asya gauravāt kṛtajñatayā ca laghuladhvevājñāmanuvartante satkṛtyādareṇa /
T06bsa034_u:536: manuṣyabhūto bodhisattvaḥ purūṣendriyeṇa samanvāgato bhājanabhūto bhavati sarvaguṇānāṃ sarvavyavasāyānāṃ sarvajñeyapravicayānām /
T06bsa034_u:537: viśāradaśca bhavatyanāvṛtagatiḥ sarvasattvasarvakālopasaṃkramaṇasaṃbhāṣaṇasaṃvāsasaṃbhogaraho vihārāṇam idaṃ puruṣatva phalaṃ bodhisattvasya veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:538: balasaṃpanno bodhisattvaḥ akhinno bhavati kuśaladharmārjanaprayogeṇa sattvānugrahaprayogeṇa ca /
T06bsa034_u:541: itīdaṃ bodhisattvānāmaṣṭavidhasya vipākasyāṣṭavidhaṃ phalaṃ yadbhavati sattvānāṃ (Dutt 22) copakārāya buddhadharmāṇāścodayāyānukūlamanuguṇam /
T06bsa034_u:542: asmin khalu bodhisattvo vipākaphale vyavasthitaḥ svayañca śakto bhavati pratibalaḥ sattvānāṃ vicitraprabhūtārthakaraṇe /
T06bsa034_u:543: te 'pi cāsya vineyā niyojyā bhavanti yathākāmakaraṇīyāya yaduta svārthakriyāmārabhya /
T06bsa034_u:544: svayañcedayaṃ bodhisattvaḥ pratibalaḥ syādvineyāścāsya na niyojyā bhaveyuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:545: evamasya na pracurā syānna pradakṣiṇā parārthakriyā yenāyaṃ na śaknuyāt parārthaṃ kartum
T06bsa034_u:546: svayañcedayaṃ bodhisattvaḥ aśaktaḥ syādapratibalo vineyāścāsya niyojyāḥ syuḥ svārthakriyāmārabhyaivamapi bodhisattvasya parārthakriyā na pracurā na pradakṣiṇā syād yenāyaṃ na śaknuyāt parārtha kartum tasmādubhayasānnidhye ubhayasaṃpadiṃ satyāṃ bodhisattvasya sattvārthakriyā pracurā bhavati pradakṣiṇā yena śaknoti parārthaṃ kartum /
T06bsa034_u:547: tathābhūtaścāsau bodhisattvaḥ ātmanaśca buddhadharmān sattvāṃśca triṣu yāneṣu kṣiprameva paripācayati
T06bsa034_u:550: tadanena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvānāṃ yasmādaṣṭavidhaṃ vipākaphalaṃ hitasukhāya sattvānāṃ saṃvartate
T06bsa034_u:551: tasmād yaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ bandhyo nirarthaḥ saṃsāraḥ sa teṣāmavandhyaśca mahārthaśca bhavati
T06bsa034_u:557: vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā ca puṇyapakṣyā jñānapakṣyā ca veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:558: yadvīrya niśritya dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ vā samādatte rakṣati maitryādīni cāpramāṇāni bhāvayati
T06bsa034_u:560: yatpunarvīryaṃ niśritya śrutacintābhāvanāmayyāṃ prajñāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti skandhakauśalyaṃ vā karoti dhātukauśalyamāyatanakauśalyaṃ pratītyasamutpādakuśalyaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalyaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhataḥ samudayaṃ vā samudayato nirodhaṃ vā nirodhato mārgaṃ vā mārgataḥ pratyavekṣate kuśalākuśalāndharmān sāvadyānanavadyān hīnapraṇītān kṛṣṇaśuklasapravibhāgapratītyasamutpannān dharmān yathābhūtaṃ pravicinoti pratyavekṣate /
T06bsa034_u:562: yaddhyānaṃ niśrityaṃ dānaṃ vā dadāti śīlaṃ vā samādatte rakṣati maitryādīni cāpramāṇāni bhāvayati
T06bsa034_u:565: yatpunardhyānaṃ niśritya śrutacintābhāvanāyyāṃ prajñāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti skandhakauśalyaṃ vā pūrvavat sarvaṃ vaktavyaṃ tadyathā vīrye /
T06bsa034_u:571: puṇyajñānapratilambhasthānopacayāya yacchandaḥ anukūlo 'vidhuraḥ pratyayaḥ pūrvakaśca puṇyajñānābhyāsaḥ
T06bsa034_u:572: tatrāyamavidhuraḥ pratyayaḥ yā viparītasya ca pratyayasyāpratyupasthānamasannihitatā /
T06bsa034_u:574: tatra yā pāpamitramāgamya viparītā puṇyajñānadeśanā viparītena vā manaskāreṇa viparītagrāhitā
T06bsa034_u:578: teṣāñca vivarjanamanutpādaḥ pratyayo 'vidhura ityucyate bodhisattvasya puṇyajñānayoḥ /
T06bsa034_u:579: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ hetūnāmanyatamavaikalyānnāpi puṇyasya nāpi jñānasya prasūtirveditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:581: puṇyamāśritya bodhisattvo 'kṣataḥ saṃsāre saṃsarati nātyarthaṃ duḥkhairbādhyamānaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:583: jñānamāśritya bodhisattvaḥ samyak puṇyaparigrahaṃ karoti na mithyā vicitrāprameyakauśalyakriyayā ca yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
T06bsa034_u:584: itīdaṃ samāsena puṇyajñānaphalaṃ yathāyogaṃ caturvidhaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:586: tatra yaśca vipāko yaśca vipākaheturyacca vipākaphalaṃ sarvametatpuṇyāśritaṃ puṇyaprabhavam
T06bsa034_u:588: puṇyaṃ pradhānaṃ jñānaṃ punarnirūttaram puṇyajñānaṃ tadanyataravaikalyādayaṃ bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ nādhigacchet /
T06bsa034_u:594: pūrvakasya ceṣṭaphalasya karmaṇo vipakvavipākasya (Dutt 24) yo dṛṣṭe dharme phalopabhogaḥ
T06bsa034_u:595: dhyānavyāvartanakuśalasya ca bodhisattvasya dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārthaṃ dṛṣṭa eva ca dharme tatsanniśrayo na parārthaprasādhanārthaṃ dhyānasanniśrayaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:596: yacca dṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇaṃ tathāgatabhūtasya ye ca laukikalokottarā dṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇasaṃprāpakāḥ saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:600: tatra yā ca kāmadhātau bhogasaṃpatparatra yā cātmabhāvasaṃpat paratra /
T06bsa034_u:601: yā ca paratra dhyānārūpyopapattiḥ tasyāśca paratra bhogātmabhāvasaṃpado dhyānārūpyopapatteśca yā dṛṣṭe dharme sahaiva duḥkhena sahaiva daurmanasyena pratisaṃkhyāya pratisaṃkhyāya hetvāsevanā ayaṃ sāṃparāyika eva bodhisattvasya svaparārtho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:602: yā punardṛṣṭe dharme sahaiva sukhena sahaiva saumanasyena bhogātmabhāvasaṃpado hetvāsevanā
T06bsa034_u:607: kāmadhātau bhogātmabhāvasaṃpattiḥ sahetuphalā laukikī ca pṛthagjanānāṃ śuddhiḥ sahetuphalā anātyantikaḥ svaparārthaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:608: sarvātyantakleśaprahāṇamāryāṣṭāṅgaśca mārgaḥ tadāśrayeṇa ca ye laukikāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ pratilabdhāḥ
T06bsa034_u:610: tatra tribhiḥ kāraṇairātyantikatā anātyantikatā ca veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:616: ityayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ daśavidhaḥ svaparārthaḥ samāsavistarataḥ yatra bodhisattvairyathāśakti yathābalaṃ śikṣitavyam nāta ūttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:617: atīte 'pyadhvanyanāgate 'pi ye svaparārthe śikṣitavantaḥ śikṣiṣyante sarve te 'sminneva daśavidhe svaparārthe /
T06bsa034_u:624: yathāvadbhāvikatāñca dharmāṇāmārabhya yā dharmāṇāṃ bhūtatā yāvadbhāvikatāñcārabhya yā dharmāṇāṃ sarvatā /
T06bsa034_u:625: iti bhūtatā sarvatā ca dharmāṇāṃ samastastattvārtho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:628: tatra laukikānāṃ sarveṣāṃ yasmin vastuni saṃketasaṃvṛtisaṃstavanāgamapraviṣṭayā buddhyā darśanatulyatā bhavati tadyathā pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivyaiveyaṃ nāgniriti /
T06bsa034_u:629: yathā pṛthivyāmevamagnāvapsu vāyau rūpeṣu śabdeṣu gandheṣu raseṣu spraṣṭavyeṣu bhojane pāne yāne vastre alaṅkāropavicāre bhāṇḍopaskare gandhamālyavilepane nṛtyagītavāditre āloke strīpuruṣaparicaryāyāṃ kṣetrāpaṇagṛhavastuni sukhaduḥkhe duḥkhamidaṃ na sukhaṃ sukhamidaṃ na duḥkhamiti /
T06bsa034_u:631: evamidaṃ nānyatheti niścitādhimuktigocaro yadvastu sarveṣāmeva laukikānāṃ paraṃparāgatayā saṃjñayā svavikalpa-prasidvaṃ na cintayitvā tulayitvopaparīkṣyodgṛhītam /
T06bsa034_u:634: satāṃ yuktārthapaṇḍitānāṃ vicakṣaṇānāṃ tārkikāṇāṃ mīmāṃsakānāṃ tarkaparyāpannāyāṃ bhūmau sthitānāṃ svayaṃ prātibhānikyāṃ pārthagjanikyāṃ mīmāṃsānucaritāyāṃ pratyakṣamanumānamāptāgamaṃ pramāṇaṃ niśritya
T06bsa034_u:638: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmanāsraveṇānāsravāvāhakena cānāsravapṛṣṭalabdhena ca laukikena jñānena yo gocaraviṣayaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:648: sa punaḥ satyābhisamayaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ skandhamātramupalabhamānānāṃ skandhebhyaścānyamarthāntaramātmānamanupalabhamānānāṃ pratītyasamutpannasaṃskārodayavyayapratisaṃyuktayā prajñayā skandhavinirmuktapudgalābhāvadarśanābhyāsādutpadyate jñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhijñānagocarastattvaṃ katamat /
T06bsa034_u:650: tena jñeyāvaraṇena vimuktasya jñānasya yo gocaraviṣayastajjñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhijñānagocarastattvaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:652: bodhisattvānāṃ buddhānāñca bhagavatāṃ dharmanairātmyapraveśāya praviṣṭena suviśuddhena ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ nirabhilāpyasvabhāvatāmārabhya prajñaptivāda svabhāvanirvikalpajñeyasamena jñānena yo gocaraviṣayaḥ sāsau paramā tathatā niruttarā jñeyaparyantagatā yasyāḥ sarva samyagdharmapravicayā nivartante nābhivartante /
T06bsa034_u:658: tadyathā rūpamiti vā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānamiti vā /
T06bsa034_u:659: cakṣuriti vā srotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mana iti vā /
T06bsa034_u:661: rūpamiti vā śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyamiti vā /
T06bsa034_u:662: kuśalamiti vā akuśalamiti vā avyākṛtamiti vā /
T06bsa034_u:663: utpāda iti vā vyaya iti vā pratītyasamutpanna iti vā /
T06bsa034_u:664: atītamiti vā anātagamiti vā pratyutpannamiti vā /
T06bsa034_u:665: saṃskṛtamiti vā [asaṃskṛtamiti vā /] ayaṃ lokaḥ paro lokaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:667: yadapi dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātaṃ prāptaṃ paryeṣitaṃ manasā 'nuvitarkitamanuvicāritamiti vā
T06bsa034_u:669: ityevaṃbhāgīyaḥ prajñaptivādanirūḍhaḥ svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ lokasya bhāva ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:671: tatrābhāvo yā asyaiva rūpamiti prajñaptivādasya yāvadantato nirvāṇamiti prajñaptivādasya nirvastukatā nirnimittatā prajñaptivādāśrayasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ nāstikatā asaṃvidyamānatā yāmāśritya prajñaptivādaḥ pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:673: yatpunaḥ pūrvakeṇa ca bhāvenānena cābhāvena ubhābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ vinirmuktaṃ dharmalakṣaṇasaṃgṛhītaṃ vastu /
T06bsa034_u:676: tasmiṃśca tattve buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ suviśuddhaṃ jñānaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:677: bodhisattvānāṃ punaḥ śikṣāmārgaprabhāvitaṃ tatra jñānaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:678: sā ca prajñā mahānupāyo bodhisattvasyānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ prāptaye
T06bsa034_u:680: tathā hi bodhisattvastena śūnyatādhimokṣeṇa tāsu tāsu jātiṣu prayujyamānaḥ sattveṣu buddhadharmaparipākāya saṃsāre saṃsaran tañca saṃsāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijānāti /
T06bsa034_u:682: sa cetsaṃsāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ na parijānīyānnaśaknuyādrāgadveṣamohādikāt sarvasaṃkleśāccittamadhyupekṣitum
T06bsa034_u:683: anadhyupekṣamāṇaścasaṃkliṣṭacittaḥ saṃsāre saṃsaret saṃkliṣṭacittaḥ saṃsarannaiva buddhadharmān paripācayennāpi sattvān /
T06bsa034_u:684: sa cet punaranityādibhirākāraiḥ saṃsārānmānasamudvejayedevaṃ sati bodhisattvo laghu ladhveva
T06bsa034_u:685: / laghu ladhveva ca parinirvāyan bodhisattva evamapi naiva buddhadharmānnaiva sattvān paripācayet
T06bsa034_u:687: tenaiva ca śūnyatādhimokṣeṇa bodhisattvaḥ prayujyamānaḥ na nirvāṇāduttrasyati nāpi nirvāṇaṃ
T06bsa034_u:688: / sa cedvodhisattvo nirvāṇāduttrasyet paratra nirvāṇasaṃbhāro 'sya na paripūryeta yathāpi ca taduttrastamānasatvānnirvāṇe 'nanuśaṃsadarśinastadgataguṇadarśanaprasādādhimuktivivarjitasya
T06bsa034_u:690: sa cetpunarbodhisattvo nirvāṇo prārthanābahulavihārī bhavedāśveva parinirvāyāt /
T06bsa034_u:691: āśu parinirvāyam naiva buddhadharmānna sattvān paripācayet /
T06bsa034_u:692: tatra yā ca saṃsāraṃ yathābhūtamaparijānataḥ saṃkliṣṭacittasya saṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:695: yā ca nirvāṇaprārthanābahulavihāriṇa (Dutt 28) āśu parinirvṛtiḥ ayamanupāyo bodhisattvasya veditavyo 'nuttarāyāḥ
T06bsa034_u:697: yā punaḥ saṃsāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijānato 'saṃkliṣṭacittasya saṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:699: yā ca nirvāṇādanuttrastamānasasya tatsaṃbhāraparipūriryā ca nirvāṇe guṇānuśaṃsadarśino na cātyarthamutkaṇṭhāprāptasyāśu nirvṛtiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:702: tasmātsā paramanśūyatādhimokṣabhāvanā bodhisattvasya śikṣāmārgasaṃgṛhīto mahānupāya ityucyate yaduta tathāgatajñānādhigamāya /
T06bsa034_u:703: sa khalu bodhisattvastena dūrānupraviṣṭe na dharmanairātmyajñānena nirabhilāpyasvabhāvatāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtaṃ viditvā na kiñcidvikalpayati nānyatra vastumātraṃ gṛhṇāti tathatāmātram na cāsyaivaṃ bhavati vastumātraṃ vā etattathatāmātraṃ caiti /
T06bsa034_u:705: arthe parame caran sarvadharmāṃstayā tathatayā samasamān yathābhūtaṃ prajñayā paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:706: sarvatra ca samadarśī samacittaḥ san paramāmupekṣāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:707: yāmāśritya sarvavidyāsthānakauśaleṣu prayujyamāno bodhisattvaḥ sarvapariśramaiḥ sarvaduḥkhopanipātaiḥ na nivartate /
T06bsa034_u:714: dṛḍhasannāhaprayogaḥ yathā yathā saṃsāre saṃsaran duḥkhaviśeṣaṃ labhate tathā tathotsāhaṃ bardhayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T06bsa034_u:715: yathā yathā samucchrayaviśeṣamadhigacchati tathā tathānirmānataro bhavati sattvānāmantike
T06bsa034_u:716: yathā yathā jñānaviśeṣamadhigacchati tathā tathā bhūyasyā mātrayā paropārambhavivādaprakīrṇalapitākleśopakleśebhyaśca vṛttaskha litasamudācārebhyaḥ parijñāya parijñāya cittamadhyupekṣate /
T06bsa034_u:717: yathā yathā guṇairvi[va]rdhate tathā tathā praticchannakalyāṇo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:718: na parato jñātuṃ samanveṣate na lābha satkāram /
T06bsa034_u:719: imā (Dutt 29) evaṃbhāgīyā bahavo 'nuśaṃsā bhavanti bodhisattvasya bodhipakṣyā
T06bsa034_u:721: tasmād ye kecidbodhimanuprāptavanto ye ca kecitprāpsyanti ye ca prāpnuvanti sarve ta etadeva jñānaṃ niśritya nānyannyūnaṃ prativiśiṣṭaṃ vā /
T06bsa034_u:722: evaṃ niṣprapañcanayārūḍho bodhisattva evaṃ caṃ bahvanuśaṃsa ātmanaśca buddhadharmaparipākāya pareṣāñca yānatrayadharmaparipākāya samyak pratipanno bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:727: kāyena vācā sambareṇa ca śikṣate prakṛtyā pāpārucitāyai prakṛtibhadrakalyāṇatāyai ca /
T06bsa034_u:729: kṣamitvaṃ ca śikṣate mandakrodhatāyai ca a-paropatāpanatāyai ca /
T06bsa034_u:730: sarvavidyāsthāneṣu cābhiyukto bhavati kuśalaśca sattvānāṃ vicikitsāprahāṇāyānugrahopasaṃhārāya ca ātmanaśca sarvajñatvahetuparigrahāya /
T06bsa034_u:732: cittasthitaye ca śikṣate caturbrāhmavihārapariśodhanatāyai pañcābhijñāvikrīḍanatāyai ca sattvakṛtyānuṣṭhānatāyai sarvakauśalyābhiyogajakleśa-vinodanatāyai ca /
T06bsa034_u:734: paramatattvajñatāyai ca śikṣate mahāyāne cāyatyāmātmanaḥ parinirvāṇāya /
T06bsa034_u:735: sa khalu bodhisattva evaṃ samyakprayukto guṇavatsu sattveṣu pūjālābhasatkāreṇa pratyupasthito bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:736: doṣavatsu sattveṣu parameṇa kāruṇyacittenānukampācittena pratyupasthito bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:739: yathāśaktyā ca yathābalam aśaṭho bhūtvā amāyāvī teṣāṃ hitasukhamupasaṃharati /
T06bsa034_u:740: teṣāmapakāriṇāṃ svenāśayaprayogadoṣeṇa vairacittatāyāḥ prahāṇārthamupakāriṣu sattveṣu kṛtajñatayā tulyādhikena pratyupakāreṇa pratyupasthito bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:742: apratibalo 'pi ca yācitaḥ san teṣu teṣu kṛtyakaraṇīyeṣvādaraṃ vyāyāmamupadarśayati na sakṛdeva nirākaroti /
T06bsa034_u:747: tatra kayā yuktyā nirabhilāpyasvabhāvatā sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratyavagantavyā /
T06bsa034_u:748: yeyaṃ svalakṣaṇaprajñaptirdharmāṇāṃ yaduta rūpamiti vā vedaneti vā pūrvavadantato yāvannirvāṇamiti vā prajñaptimātrameva tadveditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:749: na svabhāvo nāpi ca tadvinirmuktastadanyo vāggocaro vāgaviṣayaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:750: evaṃ sati na svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ tathā vidyate yathābhilapyate /
T06bsa034_u:751: na ca punaḥ sarveṃṇa sarvaṃ na vidyate /
T06bsa034_u:752: sa punarevamavidyamāno na ca sarveṇa sarvamavidyamānaḥ
T06bsa034_u:755: sa punaḥ pāramārthikaḥ svabhāvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ nirvikalpasyaiva jñānasya gocaro veditavyaḥ
T06bsa034_u:756: sa cetpunaryathaivābhilāpo yeṣu dharmeṣu yasminvastuni pravartate tadātmakāste dharmā vā tadvastu syāt /
T06bsa034_u:757: evaṃ sati bahuvidhā bahavaḥ svabhāvā ekasya dharmasyaikasya vastuno bhaveyuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:759: tathā hyekasmindharme ekasminvastuni bahuvidhā bahavo bahubhirabhilāpaiḥ prajñaptaya upacārāḥ kriyante /
T06bsa034_u:760: na ca bahuvidhānāñca bahūnāṃ prajñaptivādānāṃ niyamaḥ kaścidupalabhyate /
T06bsa034_u:761: yadanyatamena prajñaptivādenaikena tasya dharmasya tasya vastunaḥ tādātmyaṃ tanmayatā tatsvabhāvatā syānnānyairavaśiṣṭaiḥ prajñaptivādaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:762: tasmātsakalavikalaiḥ sarvaprajñaptivādaiḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvavastūnāṃ nāsti tādātmyaṃ nāsti tanmayatā nāsti tatsvabhāvatā /
T06bsa034_u:763: api ca sa cedrūpādayo dharmā yathāpūrvanirdiṣṭāḥ prajñaptivādasvabhāvā bhaveyuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:764: evaṃ sati pūrva tāvadvastu paścāttatra chandataḥ prajñaptivādopacāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:765: prākprajñaptivādopacārādakṛte prajñaptivādopacāre sa dharmastadvastu niḥsvabhāva eva syāt
T06bsa034_u:766: sati niḥsvabhāvatve nirvastukaḥ prajñaptivādo na yujyate /
T06bsa034_u:767: prajñaptivādopacāre cāsati prajñaptivādasvabhāvatā dharmasya vastuno na yujyeta /
T06bsa034_u:768: sa cetpunaḥ pūrvameva prajñaptivādopacārādakṛte prajñaptivādopacāre sa dharmastadvastu tadātmakaṃ syāt /
T06bsa034_u:769: evaṃ sati vinā tena rūpamiti prajñaptivādopacāreṇa rūpasaṃjñake dharme rūpasaṃjñake vastuni rūpabuddhiḥ pravarteta /
T06bsa034_u:771: tadanena kāraṇonānayā yuktyā nirabhilāpyaḥ svabhāvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratyavagantavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:772: yathārūpamevaṃ vedanādayo yathānirdiṣṭā dharmā antato yāvannirvāṇaparyantā veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:774: yaśca rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ rūpādikasya vastunaḥ prajñaptivādasvabhāvaṃ svalakṣaṇamasadbhūtasamāropato
T06bsa034_u:776: yaścāpi prajñaptivādanimittādhiṣṭhānaṃ prajñaptivādanimittasanniśrayaṃ (Dutt 31) nirabhilāpyātmakatayā paramārthasadbhūtaṃ vastvapadamāno nāśayati sarveṇa sarvaṃ nāstīti /
T06bsa034_u:777: asadbhūtasamārope tāvadye doṣāste pūrvameva nirūpitā uttānā viśaditāḥ prakāśitāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:779: yathā punā rūpādikeṣu dharmeṣuvastumātramapyapavadamānaḥ sarvavaināśikaḥ pranaṣṭo bhavatyasmāddharmavinayāt tathā vakṣyāmi rūpādīnāṃ dharmānāṃ vastumātramapavadato naiva tattvaṃ nāpi prajñaptistadubhayametanna yujyate
T06bsa034_u:783: evaṃ sati rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vastumātre [sa] rūpādidharmaprajñaptivādopacāro yujyate /
T06bsa034_u:786: tatra prajñaptervastu nāstīti niradhiṣṭhānā prajñaptirapi nāsti /
T06bsa034_u:787: ato ya ekatyā durvijñeyān sūtrāntānmahāyānapratisaṃyuktān gambhīrān śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktānābhiprāyikārthanirūpitān śrutvā yathābhūtaṃ bhāṣitasyārthamavijñāyāyoniśo vikalpyāyogavihitena tarkamātrakeṇaivaṃ dṛṣṭayo bhavantyevaṃvādinaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:790: teṣāṃ prajñaptyadhiṣṭhānasya vastumātrasyābhāvātsaiva prajñaptiḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhavati
T06bsa034_u:792: tadanena paryāyeṇa taistattvamapi prajñaptirapi tadubhayamapyapavāditaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:794: sa evaṃ nāṣṭikaḥ sannakathyo bhavatyasaṃvāsyo bhavati vijñānāṃ sabrahmacāriṇām /
T06bsa034_u:797: idañca sandhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā- varamihaikatyasya pudgaladṛṣṭirna tvevaikatyasya
T06bsa034_u:800: pudgaladṛṣṭiko janturjñeye kevalaṃ muhyennatu sarva jñeyamapavadeta /
T06bsa034_u:802: nāpi dharmārthikaṃ duḥkhavimokṣārthikañca paraṃ visaṃvādayenna vipralambhayet /
T06bsa034_u:805: durgṛhītayā punaḥ śūnyatayā jñeye vastuni muhyet /
T06bsa034_u:810: evaṃbhūtaṃ vastu apavadamānaḥ praṇaṣṭo bhavatyasmād dharmavinayāt /
T06bsa034_u:819: sarvābhāvācca kutra kiṃ kena śūnyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T06bsa034_u:820: na ca tena tasyaiva śūnyatā yujyate /
T06bsa034_u:823: yataśca yad yatra na bhavati tat tena śūnyamiti samanupaśyati /
T06bsa034_u:826: tadyathā rūpādisaṃjñake yathā nirdiṣṭe vastuni rūpamityevamādiprajñaptivādātmako dharmo nāsti
T06bsa034_u:830: taccobhayaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yaduta vastamātrañca vidyamānaṃ vastamātre ca prajñaptimātraṃ ca cāsadbhūtaṃ samāropayati /
T06bsa034_u:831: na bhūtamapavadate nādhikaṃ karoti na nyūnīkaroti notkṣipati na pratikṣipati /
T06bsa034_u:833: iyamucyate sugṛhītā śūnyatā samyak prajñayā supratividdheti /
T06bsa034_u:834: iyaṃ tāvadupapattisādhanayuktirānulomikī yayā nirabhilāpyasvabhāvatā sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratyavagantavyā
T06bsa034_u:836: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā evamevārthaṃ gāthābhigītena paridīpayatā bhavasaṃkrāntisūtre /
T06bsa034_u:838: yena yena hi nāmnā vai yo yo dharmo 'bhilapyate /
T06bsa034_u:839: na sa saṃvidyate tatra dharmāṇāṃ sā hi dharmatā // iti /
T06bsa034_u:842: yena rūpamityevamādinā nāmnā te rūpādisaṃjñakā dharmā abhilapyante 'nuvyavahriyante rūpamiti vā vedaneti
T06bsa034_u:844: tatra na ca rūpādisaṃjñakā dharmāḥ svayaṃ rūpādyātmakāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:845: na ca teṣu tadanyo rūpādyātmako dharmo vidyate /
T06bsa034_u:846: yā punasteṣāṃ rūpādisaṃjñakānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirabhilāpyenārthena vidyamānatā saiṣā paramārthataḥ svabhāvadharmatā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:848: yāḥ kāñcana saṃvṛtayo hi loke sarvā hi tā munirno upaiti /
T06bsa034_u:849: anupago hyasau kena upādadīta dṛṣṭaśrute kāntimasaṃprakurvan /
T06bsa034_u:853: tābhiḥ prajñaptibhistasya vastunastādātmyamityevaṃ nopaiti tāḥ saṃvṛtīḥ /
T06bsa034_u:858: tayā dṛṣṭyā vinā tadvastusamāropato vāpavādato vā anupādadānaḥ samyagdarśī bhavati jñeye tadasya dṛṣṭam /
T06bsa034_u:860: tasmin dṛṣṭaśrute tṛṣṇāṃ notpādayati na vivardhayati /
T06bsa034_u:863: panaścoktaṃ bhagavatā saṃthakātyāyanamārabhya-iha saṃtha bhikṣurna pṛthivīṃ niśritya dhyāyati
T06bsa034_u:868: nākāśavijñānākiñcanyanaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ nemaṃ lokaṃ na paraṃ lokaṃ nobhau sūryācandramasau na dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātaṃ prāptaṃ paryeṣitaṃ manasānuvitarkitamanuvicāritam /
T06bsa034_u:871: pṛthivīṃ na niśritya dhyāyati vistareṇa yāvat sarvaṃ na niśritya dhyāyati /
T06bsa034_u:872: iha saṃtha bhikṣoryā pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīsaṃjñā sā vibhūtā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:873: apsu apsaṃjñā vistareṇa yāvat sarvatra yā saṃjñā sā vibhūtā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:874: evaṃdhyāyī bhikṣurna pṛthivīṃ niśritya dhyāyati vistareṇa yāvanna sarvaṃ sarvamiti niśritya dhyāyati /
T06bsa034_u:875: evaṃ dhyāyinaṃ bhikṣuṃ sendrā devāḥ seśānāḥ saprajāpataya ārānnamaṣyanti /
T06bsa034_u:877: yasya te nābhijānīmaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ niśritya dhyāyasi // iti /
T06bsa034_u:878: kathañca punaretatsūtrapadametamevārthaṃ paridīpayati pṛthivyādisaṃjñake vastuni yā pṛthivītyevamādikā nāmasaṃketaprajñaptiḥ sā pṛthivyādisaṃjñetyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:879: sā punaḥ saṃjñā pṛthivyādisaṃjñake vastuni samāropikā cāpavādikā ca /
T06bsa034_u:886: evaṃ nirabhilāpyasvabhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu kasmādabhilāpaḥ prayujyate tathā hi vinābhilāpena sā nirabhilāpyadharmatā pareṣāṃ vakta mapi na śakyate śrotumapi /
T06bsa034_u:887: vacane śravaṇe cāsati sā nirabhilāpyasvabhāvatā jñātumapi na śakyate /
T06bsa034_u:889: tasyā eva tathatāyā evamaparijñātatvādvālānāṃ tannidāno 'ṣṭavidho vikalpaḥ pravartate trivastujanakaḥ
T06bsa034_u:891: tadyathā svabhāva vikalpo viśeṣavikalpaḥ piṇḍagrāhavikalpaḥ ahamiti vikalpaḥ mameti vikalpaḥ priyavikalpaḥ apriyavikalpaḥ tadubhayaviparītaśca vikalpaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:892: sa punarayamaṣṭavidho vikalpaḥ katameṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vastūnāṃ janako bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:893: yaśca (Dutt 35) svabhāvavikalpo yaśca viśeṣavikalpo yaśca piṇḍagrāhavikalpa itīme trayo vikalpā
T06bsa034_u:895: yadvastvadhiṣṭhāya sa nāmasaṃjñābhilāpaparigṛhīto nāmasaṃjñābhilāpaparibhāvito vikalpaḥ prapañcayan tasminneva vastuni vicaratyanekavidho bahunānāprakāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:896: tatra yañcāhamiti vikalpo yaśca mameti vikalpaḥ itīmau dvau vikalpau satkāyadṛṣṭiśca
T06bsa034_u:898: tatra priyavikalpo 'priyavikalpastadubhayaviparītaśca vikalpo yathāyogaṃ rāgadveṣamohān janayanti
T06bsa034_u:899: evamayamaṣṭavidho vikalpaḥ asya trividhasya vastunaḥ prādurbhāvāya saṃvartate yaduta vikalpādhiṣṭhānasya prapañcavastunaḥ dṛṣṭyasmimānasya rāgadveṣamohānāñca /
T06bsa034_u:902: ebhiśca tribhirvastubhiḥ sarvalokānāṃ pravṛttipakṣo niravaśeṣaḥ paridīpito bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:907: tasminneva rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni ayaṃ rūpī ayamarūpī ayaṃ sanidarśano 'yamanidarśana evaṃ sapratigho 'pratighaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:909: atīto 'nāgataḥ pratyutpanna ityevaṃbhāgīyenāpramāṇena prabhedanayena yā svabhāvavikalpādhiṣṭhānā tadviśiṣṭārthavikalpanā /
T06bsa034_u:912: yastasminneva rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni ātmasattva jīvajantusaṃjñāsaṃketopasaṃhitaḥ piṇḍiteṣu bahuṣu dharmeṣu piṇḍagrāhahetukaḥ pravartate gṛhasenāvanādiṣu bhojanapānayānavastrādiṣu ca tatsaṃjñāsaṃketopasaṃhitaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:915: yadvastu sāsravaṃ sopādānīyaṃ dīrghakālamātmato vā ātmīyato vā saṃstutamabhiniviṣṭaṃ paricitaṃ
T06bsa034_u:916: tasmādasaṃgrāha-saṃstavāt svaṃ dṛṣṭisthānīyaṃ vastu pratītyotpadyate vitatho viakalpaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:926: taccaitad dvayaṃ bhavati samāsataḥ vikalpaśca vikalpādhiṣṭhānaṃ vikalpālambanañca vastu /
T06bsa034_u:928: pūrvako vikalpaḥ pratyutpannasya vikalpālambanasya vastunaḥ prādurbhāvāya pratyutpannaṃ punarvikalpālambanaṃ vastu prādurbhūtaṃ pratyutpannasya tadālambanasya [vikalpasya] prādurbhāvāya hetuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:930: tatsaṃbhāvācca punarniyataṃ tadadhiṣṭhānasyāpi tadāśritasya vikalpasya prādurbhāvo bhavati
T06bsa034_u:938: tatra nāmaparyeṣaṇā yadvodhisattvo nāmni nāmamātraṃ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:946: nāmaiṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastveṣaṇāgataṃ svabhāvaprajñaptyeṣaṇāgataṃ viśeṣaprajñaptyeṣaṇāgatañca yathābhūtaparijñānam /
T06bsa034_u:948: sa khalu bodhisattvo nāmni nāmamātratāṃ paryeṣya tannāmaivaṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijānāti itīdaṃ nāma ityarthaṃ vastuni vyavasthāpyate yāvadeva saṃjñārtha dṛṣṭyarthamupacārārtham /
T06bsa034_u:949: yadi rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni rūpamiti nāma na vyavasthāpyeta na kañcittadvastu rūpamitmevaṃ saṃjānīyāt /
T06bsa034_u:956: yataśca bodhisattvo [vastuni] vastumātratāṃ paryeṣya sarvābhilāpaviśliṣṭaṃ nirabhilāpyaṃ tadrūpādisaṃjñakaṃ vastu paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:958: svabhāvaprajñaptyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ katamat yataśca bodhisattvaḥ rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni svabhāvaprajñaptau prajñaptimātratāṃ paryeṣya tathā svabhāvaprajñaptyā atatsvabhāvasya vastunaḥ tatsvabhāvābhāsatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ pratividhyati prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:961: tatsvabhāvaṃ paśyataḥ tadābhāsamatanmayam idṃ tṛtīyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijñānaṃ sugambhīrārthagocaram
T06bsa034_u:963: yataśca bodhisattvo viśeṣaprajñaptau prajñaptimātratāṃ paryeṣya tasmin rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni viśeṣaprajñaptimadvayārthena paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:970: tathā sanidarśanānidarśanādayo viśeṣaprajñaptiparyāyāḥ sarve 'nena nayenaivaṃ veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:976: saṃkleśātsaṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ saṃsārasaṃsṛteḥ saṃsārānugataṃ jātijarāvyādhimaraṇādikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:977: yadā ca bodhisattvena caturvidhaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ niśritya so 'ṣṭavidho vikalpaḥ parijñāto bhavati dṛṣṭe dharme tasya samyak parijñānādāyatyāṃ tadadhiṣṭhānasya tadālambanasya prapañcapatitasya (Dutt 38) vastunaḥ prādurbhāvo na bhavati
T06bsa034_u:980: evaṃ tasya savastukasya vikalpasya nirodho yaḥ sa sarvaprapañcanirodho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:982: dṛṣṭe ca dharme tasya śreṣṭhatattvārtha gocarajñānasya viśuddhatvāt sarvatra vaśitāprāpti labhate sa bodhisattvaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:987: sa evaṃ vaśitāprāptaḥ sarvasattvaśreṣṭho bhavati niruttaraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:988: evañca sarvatra vaśinastasya bodhisattvasya uttamāḥ pañcānuśaṃsā veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:989: paramāṃ cittaśāntimanuprāpto bhavati vihārapraśāntatayā na kleśapraśāntatayā /
T06bsa034_u:990: sarvavidyāsthāneṣu cāsyāvyāhataṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:994: asya khalu pañcavidhasyānuśaṃsasya pañcavidhameva karma veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:995: paramo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāro bodhisattvasya bodhāya prayoganiryātasya kāyikacaitasikasya vyāyāmaklamasya nāśāya cittaśānteranuśaṃsasyaitatkarma veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:996: sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ paripāko bodhisattvasya sarvavidyāsthāneṣvavyāhatajñānatāyā anuśaṃsasyai tatkarma veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:998: vineyānāmut pannotpannānāṃ saṃśayānāṃ prativinodanaṃ dharmanetryāśca dīrghakālaṃ parikarṣaṇaṃ sandhāraṇaṃ saddharmapratirūpakāṇāṃ śāsanāntardhāyakānāṃ parijñānaprakāśanāpakarṣaṇatayā sarvasandhāyavacanapraveśānuśaṃsasyaitatkarma veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:999: sarvaparapravādinigraho dṛḍhavīryatā ca prāṇidhānāccācyutiḥ asaṃhāryatā 'parapratyayatvānuśaṃsasyaitatkarma veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:1000: evaṃ hi bodhisattvasya yāvat kiñcidbodhisattvakaraṇīyaṃ tatsarvamebhiḥ pañcabhiranuśaṃsakarmabhiḥ parigṛhītaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1002: asaṃkliṣṭañca ātmasukhaṃ buddhadharmaparipākaḥ sattvaparipākaḥ saddharmasya dhāraṇam acalapraṇidhānasyottaptavīryasya paravādavinigrahaśca /
T06bsa034_u:1004: tatra caturṇā tattvārthānāṃ prathamau dvau hīnau /
T06bsa034_u:1011: samāsataḥ samādhivaśitāprāptasya samādhivaśitāsanniśrayeṇocchāmātrāt sarvārthasamṛddhiḥ karmaṇyacittasya suparibhāvitacittasyāryaḥ prabhāva ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1012: dharmāṇāñca yā mahāphalatā mahānuśaṃsatā sā teṣāṃ prabhāva ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1013: pūrvaṃ mahāpuṇyasaṃbhāropacayād buddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca sahajā āścaryādbhutadharmatā /
T06bsa034_u:1015: sa khalveṣa prakārabhedena buddhabodhisattvānāṃ pañcavidho bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1016: abhijñāprabhāvo dharmaprabhāvaḥ sahajaśca prabhāvaḥ sādhāraṇaśca śrāvaka pratyekabudvairasādhāraṇaśca taiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1017: tatra ṣaḍbhijñāḥ - ṛddhiviṣayo divyaṃ śrotraṃcetasaḥ paryāyaḥ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtiścyutyupapādadarśanamāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyā
T06bsa034_u:1019: tatra ṣaṭpāramitāḥ-dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntirvīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā ca dharmā ityucyante /
T06bsa034_u:1020: teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yo 'nubhāvaḥ sa dharmaprabhāva ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1026: tadyathā kampanaṃ jvalanaṃ spharaṇaṃ vidarśanamanyathībhāvakaraṇaṃ gamanāgamanaṃ saṃkṣepaḥ prathanaṃ sarvarūpakāyapraveśanaṃ sabhāgatopasaṃkrāntirāvirbhāvastirobhāvaḥ vaśitvakaraṇaṃ pararddhayabhibhavanaṃ pratibhānadānaṃ (Dutt 41) smṛtidānaṃ sukhadānaṃ raśmipramokṣaśca ityevaṃbhāgīyā ṛddhi pāriṇāmikītyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1028: iha tathāgataḥ samādhivaśitāprāpto vā karmaṇyacitto vā bodhisattvo vihāramapi kampayati /
T06bsa034_u:1029: gṛhamapi grāmanagarakṣetramapi narakalokamapi tiryaglokamapi pretalokamapi manuṣyalokamapi devalokamapi cāturdvīpakamapi sāhasrikamapi lokadhātuṃ dvisāhasrikamapi trisāhasramahāsāhasramapi lokadhātuṃ trisāhasraśatamapi sahasramapi śatasahasramapi yāvadaprameyānasaṃkhyeyān trisāhasramahāsāhasrān
T06bsa034_u:1038: sarvakāyena prajvalitasya vividhā arciṣaḥ kāyānnirgacchanti nīlapītalohitāvadātamāñjiṣṭhāḥ sphaṭikavarṇāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1040: yathāpi tadgṛhamapyābhayā spharati vihāramapi pūrvavadyāvadaprameyānasaṃkhyām lokadhātūnābhayā spharati pūrvavattadyathā kampane /
T06bsa034_u:1042: yathā sukhopaniṣaṇṇādyāgatāyāḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇaśrāvakabodhisattvadevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāyāḥ pariṣadaḥ tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā apāyānapi vidarśayatyadhaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1045: teṣu ca buddhabodhisattvān yāvadgaṅgānadībālukāsamānyapi buddhakṣetrāṇyatikramya yena nāmnā saṃśabditaṃ bhavati buddhakṣetraṃ tatra ca buddhakṣetre yannāmako bhavati tathāgataḥ tacca buddhakṣetraṃ darśayati tañca tathāgatam /
T06bsa034_u:1046: tacca nāma vyapadiśati tasya buddhakṣetrasya tathāgatasya ca /
T06bsa034_u:1047: tato 'pyarvāgvidarśaṃyati vyapadiśati tato 'pi pareṇa yatkāmaṃ yāvatkāmam /
T06bsa034_u:1050: sa cet pṛthivīmapo 'dhimucyate tattathaiva bhavati nānyathā /
T06bsa034_u:1051: tejo vāyumadhimucyate tadapi tathaiva bhavati nānyathā
T06bsa034_u:1058: yathā mahābhūteṣvanyonyapariṇāme nānyathībhāvakriyā evaṃ rūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyeṣu veditavyam
T06bsa034_u:1061: / himavantaṃ vā parvatarājamādiṃ kṛtvā sarvaparvatān suvarṇaṃmadhimucyate
T06bsa034_u:1065: tadubhayavivarjitānāṃ suvarṇatāṃ vā durvarṇatāṃ vā tadubhayaṃ vā /
T06bsa034_u:1066: yathā suvarṇadurvarṇatāmevaṃ vyaṅgāvyaṅgatāṃ kṛśa sthūlatāmityevamādi yatkiñcidanyathā satsvalakṣaṇataḥ śakyarūpañcā [nyathā] 'dhimucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1070: tiraḥ kuḍyaṃ tiraḥ śailaṃ tiraḥ prākāramasajyamānena kāyena gacchati vistareṇa yāvadbrahmalokamupasaṃkrāmati pratyāgacchati ca yāvadakaniṣṭhādūrdhvaṃ tiryagvā punaryāvadaprameyānasaṃkhyeyāṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasrān lokadhātūn gacchati
T06bsa034_u:1071: āgacchati ca kāyena vā audārikeṇa cāturmahābhautikena /
T06bsa034_u:1072: dūraṃ cāsannamadhimucya manaḥsadṛśena vā javena gacchati cāgacchati ca /
T06bsa034_u:1078: mahatyā vicitrāyāḥ pariṣadaḥ purastāt sa grāmanigamatṛṇavana[-bhūmi-]parvataṃ rūpakāyamātmakāye praveśayati /
T06bsa034_u:1079: sā ca sarvā pariṣattasminneva kāye praviṣṭamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte /
T06bsa034_u:1082: upasaṃkrāntasya yādṛśī teṣāṃ varṇapuṣkalatā bhavati tādṛśī tasya /
T06bsa034_u:1086: yamapi te 'rthaṃ na mantrayante tamapi so 'rthaṃ na mantrayate /
T06bsa034_u:1087: uttaraṃ caitānānudhārmyā kathayā saṃdarśayitvā samādāpayitvā samuttejayitvā saṃpraharṣayitvā 'ntarddhīyate /
T06bsa034_u:1090: yathā kṣatriyapariṣadamevaṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatiśramaṇapariṣadaṃ cāturmahārājakāyikān devān trayastriṃśān yāmāṃstuṣitānnirmāṇaratīnparanirmitavaśavartino devānevaṃ brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitānmahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhānapramāṇābhānābhāsvarān parīttaśubhānapramāṇaśubhān śubhakṛssnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalānasaṃjñisattvān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanānakaniṣṭhān /
T06bsa034_u:1092: mahatyā pariṣadaḥ purastācchatakṛtvaḥ sahasrakṛtvaḥ ato vā pareṇāntardhīyate /
T06bsa034_u:1095: yāvān kaścit sattvadhātuḥ taṃ sarva gamanāgamanasthānādyāsu kriyāsu saṃvartayati /
T06bsa034_u:1096: sa cedasyai vaṃ bhavati gacchatu gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:1102: niṣṭhāgato bodhisattva ekajātipratibaddhaśca caramabhaviko vā tathāgataṃ sthāpayitvā tulyajātīyañca bodhisattvaṃ tadanyeṣāṃ (Dutt 44)
T06bsa034_u:1104: tadanye bodhisattvā utkṛṣṭatarabhūmipraviṣṭāṃstulyajātīyāṃśca bodhisattvān sthāpayitvā tadanyeṣāṃ sarvarddhimatāmṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhibhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:1110: ye 'sya bhāṣamāṇasya dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti teṣāṃ tādṛśaṃ kāyikaṃ caitasikamanugrahamupasaṃharati pratiprasrabdhi sukham /
T06bsa034_u:1113: tatra raśmipramokṣaḥ bodhisattvo vā tathāgato vā ṛddhyātadrūpān raśmīn kāyatpramuñcati ya ekatyā daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā nārakāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ nārakāṇi duḥkhāni pratiprasrambhayati /
T06bsa034_u:1114: ekatyā devalokasthānudārān devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragān svabhavanasthān gatvā ihāgamanāya saṃcodayati /
T06bsa034_u:1115: tathā tadanyalokadhātusthitān bodhisattvānihāgamanāya saṃcodayati daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu /
T06bsa034_u:1116: samāsatasthāgataḥ aprameyairasaṃkhyeyairnānāprakārai raśmibhirapramāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ vicitramaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamarthaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:1117: te punarete sarve pāriṇāmikyā ṛddhyāḥ prakārā ekaikaśaḥ prabhidyamānā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1118: anyathā prakṛtyā vidyamānasya vastunastadanyathāvikārāpādanatā pariṇāma ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1125: tatpunaḥ kāyanirmāṇamātmano vā sadṛśaṃ visadṛśaṃ vā parasya vā sadṛśaṃ visadṛśaṃ vā nirmimīte
T06bsa034_u:1129: tadyathā bhojanapānādi maṇimuktāvaidūryādi ca yatkiñcidrūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyasaṃgṛhītaṃ bāhyamupakaraṇaṃ tatsadṛśaṃ tadvinirmuktaṃ sarvaṃ yathākāmaṃ nirmimīte /
T06bsa034_u:1131: devanāga[yakṣā]suragaruḍakinnaramahoragavarṇa manuṣyavarṇa tiryakpretanārakavarṇaṃ śrāvakavarṇaṃ pratyekabuddhavarṇaṃ bodhisattvavarṇaṃ tathāgatavarṇam /
T06bsa034_u:1132: sa yadi tādṛśa eva bodhisattvo bhavati tādṛśameva nirmimīte /
T06bsa034_u:1135: sa cetparaṃ devabhūtaṃ tatsādṛśyena nirmimīte parasadṛśamasya tannirmāṇaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1139: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sakṛdaprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām arthaṃ karoti tairvicitravarṇanirmitaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1140: kiñcicca nirmāṇamadhitiṣṭhati yaduparate 'pi bodhisattve tathāgete vā 'nuvartata
T06bsa034_u:1142: kiñcinnirmāṇaṃ buddhabodhisattvānāṃ kevalaṃ sattvānāṃ vidarśanāya māyopamaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1151: buddhabodhisattvānāṃ nirmito vāgvyāhāro gambhīro bhavati megharavaḥ kalaviṅkamanojñasvarasadṛśo hṛdayaṃgamaḥ gremaṇīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1152: paurī ca sā vāṅnirmitā bhavati valguvispaṣṭā vijñeyā śravaṇīyā apratikūlā aniśritā aparyantā
T06bsa034_u:1154: ākāṃkṣamāṇaḥ tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā vicitrāṃ devanāgayakṣāsura garuḍakinnaramahoragaśrāvakabodhisattvapariṣadaṃ
T06bsa034_u:1155: 46) sanniṣaṇṇāṃ sannipatitāṃ yāvadyojanaśatapariṣanmaṇḍalaparyantāṃ sarvāṃ svareṇa suparipūrṇena vijñāpayati ye 'pi dūre ya 'pyantike niṣaṇṇāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1157: dvisāhasraṃ vā trisāhasraṃ vā yāvaddaśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān lokadhātūn svareṇa vijñāpayati
T06bsa034_u:1160: tatra svasambaddhaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ yatsvayameva nirmitayā vācā dharmaṃ vā deśayati pramattaṃ vā saṃcodayati /
T06bsa034_u:1161: parasaṃbaddhaṃ punaryat paranirmitayā vācā dharmaṃ vā deśayati pramattaṃ vā saṃcodayati /
T06bsa034_u:1162: tatrāsambaddhaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ yadākāśāt vāṅniścarati nirmitādvā na sattvasantānāt /
T06bsa034_u:1163: tatra dharmadeśanānirmāṇaṃ yat tatra tatra sammūḍhānāṃ yuktisaṃdarśanārtham /
T06bsa034_u:1164: tatra codanānirmāṇaṃ yadasammūḍhānāṃ pratilabdhaprasādānāṃ pramattānāṃ pramāde hrīsaṃjananāya apramāde ca samādāpanāya /
T06bsa034_u:1166: samāsataḥ kāyanirmāṇaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ viṣaya nirmāṇañca veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:1169: sā punareṣā dvividhāpi ṛddhirbuddhabodhisattvānāṃ samāsato dve kārye niṣpādayati /
T06bsa034_u:1170: āvarjayitvā vā ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa sattvān buddhaśāsane 'vatārayati anugrahaṃ vā anekavidhaṃ bahu nānāprakāraṃ duḥkhitānāṃ
T06bsa034_u:1173: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā ātmanaivātmanastāvatpūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmarati amukā nāma te sattvā yatrāhamabhūvamevannāmeti vistareṇa yathāsūtraṃ sattvakāyadikaṃ sarvamanusmarati yathā cātmanātmanaḥ samanusmarati tathā pareṣāmapi anusmārayati /
T06bsa034_u:1175: ye 'pi te sattvakāyāḥ pūrvānte yannivāsāstānapyātmanā (Dutt 47) smarati pareṣāṃ smārayati amukā nāma te sattvā yatrāhamabhūvamevaṃnāmeti vistareṇa /
T06bsa034_u:1176: teṣāmapi sattvānāṃ tathaiva sarvaṃ pūrvenivāsamanusmarati yathaivātmano dṛṣṭadharme /
T06bsa034_u:1177: sūkṣmamapi samanusmarati yatkiñcidalpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā pūrvaceṣṭitaṃ pūrvameva cetayitvā apramuṣitam /
T06bsa034_u:1180: yasya kalpagaṇanāyogena śakyā saṃkhyāṃ kartum aprameyāsaṃkhyeyamapyanusmarati /
T06bsa034_u:1181: yasya kalpagaṇanāyogenāśakyā saṃkhyāṃ kartum avyāhatamasya samāsataḥ pūrvenivāsajñānaṃ pravartate yatreṣṭaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ yāvadiṣṭam /
T06bsa034_u:1182: evaṃrūpo bodhisattvasya tathāgatasya ca pūrvenivāsasaṃgṛhītaḥ prabhāvaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1183: sa tena pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānena jātakān pūrvān bodhisattvacaryāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhe bhagavati prasādajananārthaṃ gauravotpādanārthaṃ ca vicitrānanekaprakārān prakāśayati itivṛttakāṃśca pūrvayogapratisaṃyuktān sattvānāṃ karmaphalavipākamārabhya /
T06bsa034_u:1184: śāśvatadṛṣṭikānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ śāśvatadṛṣṭiṃ nāśayati tadyathā pūrvāntakalpakānāṃ
T06bsa034_u:1187: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā divyena śrotreṇa divyān mānuṣyakān śabdānāryānapyanāryānapi ghanānapyaṇukānapi vyaktānapyavktānapi nirmitānapyanirmitānapi dūrāntikasthān śṛṇoti /
T06bsa034_u:1188: tatra divyāḥ śabdāḥ ūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanopapannānāṃ sattvānām /
T06bsa034_u:1189: sa cetpareṇābhogaṃ na karoti atha karoti tato 'pi pareṇānyeṣūrdhvaṃ lokadhātuṣu śṛṇoti /
T06bsa034_u:1193: ye buddhānāṃ buddhaśrāvakānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāñca /
T06bsa034_u:1195: tadyathā saṃdarśayatāṃ samādāpayatāṃ vā samuttejayatāṃ saṃpraharṣayatāṃ kuśalasamādānamārabhyākuśalatyāgañca
T06bsa034_u:1197: 'saṃkliṣṭacittānāmuddeśaḥ svādhyāyo viniścayaḥ samyak codanā smāraṇāvavādānuśāsanī iti yadvā punaranyadapi kiñcit subhāṣitaṃ sulapitamarthopasaṃhitam /
T06bsa034_u:1203: ye mahāsattvasaṃghaśabdā vā vividhairvā kāraṇaiḥ kāryamāṇānāmārttasvaraṃ kandamānānāṃ vikrośatāṃ vā meghastanitaśabdā vā śaṃkhabherīpaṭahaśabdā vā /
T06bsa034_u:1214: yatra grāme kṣetre vihāre vā tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā viharati tatra ye śabdā niścaranti tān sthāpayitvā tadanyatra yāvadaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu /
T06bsa034_u:1216: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyutikāle 'pi cyutānapi suvarṇadurvarṇān hīnapraṇītānaparānte ca jātān /
T06bsa034_u:1219: yadrūpaṃ nirmitaṃ yacca divyamacchaṃ rūpamadho yāvadavīcimūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanam /
T06bsa034_u:1220: sa cedadha ūrdhvaṃ vānyeṣu lokadhātuṣu rūpadarśanamārabhyābhogaṃ karoti tiryagyāvadaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvaṃ rūpagataṃ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:1221: antatasteṣu teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu (Dutt 49) tāṃstāṃstathāgatān vicitreṣu mahatsu parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu niṣaṇṇān dharma deśayataḥ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:1222: tatra divyena cakṣuṣā tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā daśasu dikṣu kāyaceṣṭitaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ dṛṣṭvā yathāyogaṃ yathārha teṣu sattveṣu pratipadyate /
T06bsa034_u:1223: divyena ca śrotreṇa vākceṣṭitaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ śrutvā teṣu sattveṣu yathāyogaṃ yathārhaṃ pratipadyate
T06bsa034_u:1224: evaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā divyena śrotreṇa bodhisattvastathāgato vā samāsena karma karoti /
T06bsa034_u:1226: iha bodhisattvo vā tathāgato vā pareṣāṃ daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ kleśaparyavasthitamapi cittaṃ jānāti /
T06bsa034_u:1227: vigatakleśaparyavasthānamapi kleśasānubandhaṃ sānuśayamapi kleśaniranubandhaṃ niranuśayamapi mithyāpraṇihitamapi cittaṃ jānāti /
T06bsa034_u:1228: tadyathā tīrthikacittaṃ sāmiṣābhiprāyasya kliṣṭamapi cittaṃ samyak praṇihitamapi cittaṃ jānāti
T06bsa034_u:1231: madhyamacittaṃ jānāti tadyathā sarveṣāṃ rūpadhātūpapannānāṃ sattvānām /
T06bsa034_u:1232: praṇītamapi cittaṃ jānāti tadyathā sarveṣāmārūpyopapannāṃ sattvānām /
T06bsa034_u:1234: ekena paracittajñānenaikasya sattvasya yasya yadyathā yādṛśaṃ yāvaccitaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati tatsakṛdyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:1235: ekenaiva paracittajñānena prabhūtānāmapi sattvānāṃ yeṣāṃ yadyathā yādṛśaṃ yāvaccittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati tadapi sakṛdyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:1236: sā punariyamabhijñā buddhasya bodhisattvānāmindriyaparāparajñānāya sattvānāṃ nānādhimuktijñānāya nānādhātucaritajñānāya yathāyogañca pratipatsu citrāsu nirvāṇapuraḥsarīṣu samyaksanniyogāya idamasyāḥ karma veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:1238: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā kleśānāṃ kṣayaprāptiṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:1239: prāpto mayā parairvā āsravakṣayo na veti /
T06bsa034_u:1245: bodhisattvaḥ punaḥ sarvaṃ caitat prajānātyāsravakṣayañca svayaṃ na sākṣātkaroti /
T06bsa034_u:1247: ataḥ sāsravāñca vastu bodhisattvaḥ sahasravairna vijahāti /
T06bsa034_u:1251: tena khalvāsravakṣayajñānena buddhabodhisattvāḥ svayaṃ na kliśyante /
T06bsa034_u:1256: sa punareṣa dānādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prabhāvaḥ samāsataścaturbhirākārairveditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1258: dānaṃ dadad bodhisattvo dānavipakṣaṃ mātsaryaṃ prajahāti /
T06bsa034_u:1266: paratra ca yatra yatra pratyājāyate āḍhyo bhavati mahābhogo mahāpakṣo mahāparivāra ityeṣa caturākāro dānasya prabhāvo nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1267: kāyavāksaṃvaraśīlaṃ samādadāno bodhisattvaḥ śīlavipakṣaṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ prajahāti /
T06bsa034_u:1270: dauḥśīlyapratyayaṃ bhayamavadyaṃ vairaṃ prajahadātmānamanugṛhaṇāti sukhaṃ svapan sukhaṃ pratibudhyamānaḥ
T06bsa034_u:1282: ātmānañca parañca mahato bhayātparitrāyamāṇastayā kṣyāntyā ātmānañca paraṃścānugṛhṇāti /
T06bsa034_u:1286: ityayañcaturākāraḥ kṣānteḥ prabhāvo nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1287: ārabdhavīryo bodhisattvo viharan vīryavipakṣaṃ kausīdyaṃ prajahāti /
T06bsa034_u:1290: ārabdhavīryaśca sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharannavyavakīrṇaḥ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaḥ pūrveṇāparaṃ viśeṣādhigamaṃ paśyan prītiprāmodyenātmānamanugṛhṇāti /
T06bsa034_u:1291: kuśalapakṣābhiyuktaśca paraṃ na kāyena vācā vā viheṭhayati /
T06bsa034_u:1297: dhyānaṃ samāpadyamāno bodhisattvo dhyānavipakṣaṃ kleśaṃ kāma vitarkaprītisukharūpasaṃjñādīṃścopakleśān prajahāti /
T06bsa034_u:1298: bodheśca saṃbhārabhūtaṃ sanniśrayabhūtaṃ bhavati tadasya dhyānam /
T06bsa034_u:1303: ityeṣa caturākāro dhyānaprabhāvo nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1306: dānenāpi priyavāditayāpyarthacaryayāpi samānārthatayāpi (Dutt 52) ca sattvān paripācayati
T06bsa034_u:1309: sarvatra nyāyopadeśena dṛṣṭe dharme saṃparāye ca hitasukhābhyāṃ sattvānapyanugṛhṇāti /
T06bsa034_u:1320: tribhiśca sthānaistuṣitopapannānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ deva putrāṇāmabhibhavaḥ divyenāyuṣā divyena varṇena divyena yaśasā /
T06bsa034_u:1321: upapadyamānasya ca mātuḥ kukṣāvudāreṇāvabhāsena lokadhātuspharaṇaṃ saṃprajānataśca mātuḥ kukṣipraveśaḥ sthānaṃ nirgamo janma ca /
T06bsa034_u:1327: / carame ca bhave paścime janmani sarvapratyarthikairmārānīkairapi
T06bsa034_u:1333: svayañcānācārya kamekākina eva ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre mahābodherabhisaṃbodhaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1334: brahmaṇā ca sahāṃpatinā svayamupasaṃkramya loke saddharmadeśanāyai adhyeṣaṇā /
T06bsa034_u:1337: bodhisattve ca mṛgapakṣiṇāmapyantataḥ kṣudramṛgāṇāmapi paramā viśvāsyatā /
T06bsa034_u:1340: tiraścāmantikāttathāgatasya pūjā tadyathā markaṭo madhvaneḍakaṃ tathāgatāyānupradattavān /
T06bsa034_u:1341: pratigṛhīte ca tasmin bhagavatā sa markaṭo hṛṣṭamānasaḥ pratyavasṛṣṭaḥ sa nṛtyamānaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1342: bhagavantamevoddiśya tathāgataḥ snāsyati taṃ snāpayiṣyāmīti meghapratīkṣaṇā /
T06bsa034_u:1343: vṛkṣamūle ca bodhisattvasya tathāgatasya vā santiṣṭhatastasya sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ prācīnanimnāsu chāyāsu tasya vṛkṣasya chāyayā kāyāvijahanatā /
T06bsa034_u:1347: smṛtasya ca pratisaṃviditānāṃ vedanānāṃ saṃjñānāṃ vitarkāṇāmutpādaḥ sthānaṃ nirodhaśca /
T06bsa034_u:1350: tadyathā unmattāḥ kṣiptacittāḥ tathāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā svacittaṃ pratilabhante /
T06bsa034_u:1353: raktānāṃ rāgaparyavasthānāṃ vigacchati dviṣṭānāṃ dveṣaparyavasthānaṃ mūḍhānāṃ mohaparyavasthānam
T06bsa034_u:1371: na cāvaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati yāvad dvitīyamālopaṃ (Dutt 54) prakṣipati /
T06bsa034_u:1373: parinirvāṇasamaye ca mahāpṛthivīcāla ulkāpātā diśo dāhā antarikṣe devadundubhīnāmabhinadanam
T06bsa034_u:1374: so 'pi sahaja eva tathāgatānāṃ prabhāvo nābhijñāsaṃskṛtaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1380: iha tathāgato bodhisattvo vā 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmaprameyāsaṃkhyena prabhāvopāyena yathā 'rthakriyā bhavati tadyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:1382: sarvaprakāreṇa cābhijñāprabhāveṇa dharmaprabhāveṇa sahajena prabhāveṇa samanvāgato bhavati
T06bsa034_u:1386: śrāvakasya tu saha sattvadhātunā dvisāhasro lokadhāturabhijñāviṣayaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1389: tathā hi te ekasyaivātmano damāya pratipannāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1392: etānākārān sthāpayitvā buddhabodhisattvānāṃ tadanyaḥ prabhāvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ sādhāraṇo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1393: tadevaṃ sati śrāvakapratyekabuddhā eva tāvadbuddhabodhisattvaiḥ saha na tulyābhijñā bhavanti
T06bsa034_u:1396: eva yathāyogaṃ praviṣṭo veditavyaḥ ṛddhiviṣayacetasaḥ paryāyāsravakṣayajñānābhijñāprabhāveṣu
T06bsa034_u:1406: kuśaladharmavīje sati kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmāsevanānvayād yā kleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇaviśuddhyanukūlā kāyacittakarmaṇyatā kalyatā samyak prayoganiṣṭhā yatra sthitāḥ śāstāraṃ vā āgamyānāgamya vā śāstāraṃ bhavyo bhavati pratibalo 'nantaraṃ
T06bsa034_u:1408: tadyathā vraṇo yadā paripāṭanāya niṣṭhāgato bhavatyanantaraṃ pāṭanārhaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1410: ghaṭaghaṭīśarāvādi ca mṛnmayaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ yadā paribhogāya niṣṭhāgataṃ bhavati anantaraṃ paribhogārha tadā parikvamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1411: phalāni vā āmrapanasādīni yadā paribhogāya niṣṭhāgatāni bhavantyanantaraṃ paribhogārhāṇi tadā paripakvānītyucyante /
T06bsa034_u:1412: evameva kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmāsevanānvayād asau samyak prayoganiṣṭhā anantaraṃ viśuddhye saṃvartate
T06bsa034_u:1420: bodhisattvānāṃ buddhānāñca bhagavatām ityete catvāraḥ pudgalāḥ eṣu caturṣu vastuṣu paripācayitavyāḥ
T06bsa034_u:1426: yā āryurvarṇakulaiśvaryasampadādeyavacanatā maheśākhyatāmanuṣyatvaṃ (Dutt 56) mahotsāhatā yāmāśrayaparipākaphalasaṃpadamāgamya bhavyo
T06bsa034_u:1429: yā prakṛtyā mandarajaskatāyāmāgamya prakṛtyaivāsya pāpakeṣvakuśaleṣu dharmeṣu /
T06bsa034_u:1430: cittaṃ na krāmati mandanivaraṇaśca bhavati mandavitarka ṛjupradakṣiṇagrāhī /
T06bsa034_u:1432: smṛtimān bhavati meghāvī pratibalaśca bhavati subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāṃ dharmāṇāmarthasya ājñānāyodgrahaṇāya dhāraṇāya prativedhāya /
T06bsa034_u:1433: sahajayā prajñayā samanvāgato bhavati yāṃ prajñāmāgamya bhavyo bhavati pratibalaḥ sarvato 'tyantaṃ sarvakleśāccittaṃ vimocayitum /
T06bsa034_u:1444: dhātupuṣṭayā vartaṃmānapratyayopasaṃhārataḥ avatārato ratigrahaṇataḥ ādiprasthānataḥ anādiprasthānataḥ śuddhidūrataḥ śuddhyāsannataḥ prayogataḥ āśayataḥ āmiṣopasaṃhārataḥ dharmopasaṃhārataḥ ṛddhyāvarjanatayā dharmadeśanayā guhyadharmākhyānataḥ vivṛtadharmākhyānataḥ mṛduprayogato madhyaprayogataḥ adhimātraprayogataḥ śravaṇataḥ cintanato bhāvanataḥ saṃgrahaṇato nigrahaṇataḥ svayaṃkṛtataḥ parādhyeṣaṇataḥ tadubhayataśca /
T06bsa034_u:1446: yā prakṛtyā kuśaladharmabījasaṃpadaṃ niśritya pūrvakuśaladharmābhyāsāduttarottarāṇāṃ kuśaladharmabījānāṃ paripuṣṭatarā paripuṣṭatamā utpattiḥ sthitiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1453: tatra dhātupuṣṭeḥ pūrvakeṇa hetunā vartamānaḥ paripāko nivartate /
T06bsa034_u:1454: vartamānapratyayopasaṃhārato vartamāna evaṃ heturvartamānaḥ paripāko veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1462: ya eva tatprathamataḥ saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu saṃvegamāgamya nyāyārthapratipādane cānuśaṃsāṃ viditvā 'vatāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1465: yā avatīrṇasya pudgalasya paripācyamānatāyāṃ vartamānasya bodhisattvebhyo buddhebhyaścānadhyupekṣāmāgamya vivṛtānāñca sthānānāṃ bhūyo bhūyaḥ uttānakriyāmāgamya uttarottaraparipākagamanatā /
T06bsa034_u:1467: yat kausīdyaṃ vā āgamya pratyayavaidhuryaṃ vā mahatā dīrgheṇa kālena prabhūtairjanmāntarāparivartaiḥ kalpaparivartairvā bhavyo bhavati viśuddhaye /
T06bsa034_u:1470: yā svārthaprāptau tīvracchandatāmāgamya vinipātabhayaṃ vā 'mutra dṛṣṭe vā dharme parato 'yaśobhayamāgamya
T06bsa034_u:1475: 'bhisaṃpratyaya guṇasaṃbhāvanāmāgamya yā triṣu ratneṣu svārthaprāptau cāvicalā śraddhadhānatā
T06bsa034_u:1478: yaḥ sarveṇa ca sarvaṃ bhojanapānādivikalānāṃ bhojanapānādyupasaṃhāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1483: yā ṛddhimata ṛddhiprātihāryavidarśanā sattvānukampayā sattvānāmāśayaviśuddhiṃ vādhipatiṃ kṛtvā prayogaviśuddhiṃ vā ete sattvāḥ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā vā āśayaśuddhiṃ vā śāsane pratilapsyante prayokṣyante samyagiti /
T06bsa034_u:1484: te ca tena prātihāryeṇāvarjitamānasā āśayaśuddhiṃ vā pratilabhante prayujyante vā samyak /
T06bsa034_u:1509: pṛthagvidhā ca paricaryā tadyathā glānopasthānaparicaryā dharmyacīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyaparicaryā śokakaukṛtyaprativinodanaparicaryā kleśaprativinodanaparicaryā /
T06bsa034_u:1512: ātmagatāṃ saṃkleśārakṣāṃ saṃvidhāya skhalitacodanā mṛdau vyatikrame /
T06bsa034_u:1515: tatra yā ca codanā yā cāvasādanā sā teṣāmeva hitasukhārthaṃ tadanyeṣāñca /
T06bsa034_u:1516: yā punaḥ pravāsanā punaḥ pratisaṃharaṇāya sāpi teṣāṃ cānyeṣāṃ ca hitasukhāya /
T06bsa034_u:1517: yā punarapratisaṃhāryā pravāsanā sā pareṣāmeva hitasukhāya /
T06bsa034_u:1521: ānulomikañca dharmaṃ deśayati akuśalāt sthānādyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya /
T06bsa034_u:1525: tvameva tāvat svayaṃ nākuśalātsthānādyutthitaḥ kuśale ca sthāne pratiṣṭhitaḥ kasmāttvaṃ tatra paraṃ samādāpayitavyaṃ codayitavyaṃ smārayitavyaṃ manyase /
T06bsa034_u:1532: ityanena saptaviṃśatividhena paripākopāyena sā ṣaḍvidhā paripākaprabheda saṃpadveditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:1533: indriyaparipākasya kuśalamūlaparipākasya jñānaparipākasya mṛdumadhyādhimātrasya ca paripākasya
T06bsa034_u:1535: samāsataḥ ṣaṭ bodhisattvāḥ ṣaṭasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu vyavasthitāḥ sattvān paripācayanti /
T06bsa034_u:1543: tatrāgotrasthānāṃ pudgalānāṃ sugatigamanāya paripākaḥ punaḥ punaḥ pratyāvartyo bhavati punaḥ punaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1544: gotrasthānāṃ punaḥ paripāko na pratyāvartyo bhavati na punaḥ punaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1546: śrāvakaḥ pūrvakuśalābhyāsād yadāmṛdupākavyavasthito bhavati sa mṛducchando bhavati mṛduprayogaścāpāyānapi gacchati na ca dṛṣṭe dharme
T06bsa034_u:1547: śrāmaṇyaphalamadhigacchati na ca dṛṣṭe dharme parinirvāti /
T06bsa034_u:1548: yadā tu madhyapākavyavasthito bhavati sa madhyacchandaśca bhavati madhyaprayogo na cāpāyān gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:1551: adhimātre paripāke sthitaḥ adhimātracchando bhavati adhimātraprayogaśca na cāpāyān gacchati
T06bsa034_u:1559: pūrvābhyāsavaśāt saptatriṃśadvodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayitvā sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkaroti
T06bsa034_u:1564: tatra mṛdupākavyavasthito bodhisattvo mṛducchando bhavati mṛduprayogaḥ apāyāṃśca gacchati
T06bsa034_u:1566: uttaptairacalaiḥ suviśuddhaiśca bodhipakṣyaiḥ kuśalaidharmaiḥ sarvaireva visaṃyukto bhavati
T06bsa034_u:1578: tatra yaścāmiṣakṛtaḥ paripāko yaśca ṛddhyāvarjanajo yaśca guhyadharmākhyānajo yaśca mṛduprāyogiko yaśca śrutamātrakṛtaḥ paripāka ityeṣa pañcavidhaḥ paripākaḥ dīrghakālābhyāsādapyeṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ mṛduka eva bhavati prāgevettakakālābhyāsāt /
T06bsa034_u:1579: tadanyaistu sarvaiḥ paripākasya kāraṇaiḥ paripākasya triprakāranayo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1580: mṛdukenābhyāsena mṛduko madhyena madhyaḥ adhimātreṇādhimātraḥ paripāko veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1581: tasya ca mṛdumadhyādhimātrasya paripākasyaikaikasya triprakāranayo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1585: ityevaṃ bhāgīyottarottaraprabhedanayenāpramāṇaḥ paripākaprabhedaḥ sattvānāṃ buddhabodhisattvakṛto veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1586: tatra bodhisattvaḥ ebhiḥ paripākakāraṇairyathānirdiṣṭairātmanaśca buddhadharmaparipākāyendriyaparipākaṃ kuśalamūlaparipākaṃ jñānaparipākañca mṛdumadhyādhimātrañca samudānayati parasattvānāñca parapudgalānāṃ yānatrayaniryāṇāya /
T06bsa034_u:1591: samāsato dvividhañca prahāṇaṃ dvividhañca jñānaṃ bodhirityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1593: dvividhaṃ punarjñānaṃ yat kleśāvaraṇaprahāṇācca nirmalaṃ sarvakleśaniranubandhajñānam /
T06bsa034_u:1599: tatra savāsanānāṃ sarvakleśānāṃ sarvataścātyantañca prahāṇādyad jñānaṃ tacchuddhamityucyate
T06bsa034_u:1600: sarvadhātuṣu sarvavastuṣu sarvaprakāreṣu sarvakāleṣu yadjñānamavyāhataṃ pravartate tatsarvajñānamityucyate
T06bsa034_u:1605: tasyaiva ca saṃkṛtāsaṃskṛtasya vastuno 'pramāṇaḥ prakārabhedaḥ svalakṣaṇottarajātiprabhedena sāmānyalakṣaṇaprabhedena hetuphalaprabhedena dhātugatikuśalākuśalāvyākṛtādiprabhedena /
T06bsa034_u:1609: ityetatsarvadhātukaṃ sarvavastukaṃ sarvaprakāraṃ sarvakālaṃ jñānaṃ sarvajñānamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1610: tatrāsaṅgajñānaṃ yadābhogamātrādeva sarvatrādhiṣṭhitaṃ tvaritamasaktaṃ jñānaṃ pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:1611: na punaḥ punarābhogaṃ kurvato nānyatraikābhogapratibaddhameva tajjñānaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1613: catvāriṃśaduttaramāveṇikaṃ buddhadharmaśataṃ yā ca tathāgatasyāraṇā praṇidhijñānaṃ pratisaṃvidaśca
T06bsa034_u:1616: dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānyaśītyanuvyañjanāni catasraḥ sarvākārāḥ pariśuddhayaḥ daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni trīṃṇi smṛtyupasthānāni trīṇyarakṣyāṇi mahākaruṇā 'sammoṣadharmatā (Dutt 63) vāsanāsamudghātaḥ sarvākāravarajñānañca /
T06bsa034_u:1618: tatreyaṃ paramā bodhiḥ saptabhiḥ paramatābhiryuktā yeneyaṃ sarvabodhīnāṃ parametyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1619: sapta paramatāḥ katamāḥ āśrayaparamatā pratipattiparamatā sampattiparamatā jñānaparamatā prabhāvaparamatā prahāṇaparamatā vihāraparamatā ca /
T06bsa034_u:1622: yattathāgata ātmahitāya parahitāya bahujanahitāya [bahujanasukhāya] lokānukampāyai arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ pratipannaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1624: yattathāgato niruttarābhirapratisamābhiścatasṛbhiḥ saṃpattibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ śīlasaṃpattyā dṛṣṭisaṃpattyā ācārasaṃpattyā ājīvasaṃpattyā [pratipannaḥ] /
T06bsa034_u:1629: yattathāgato niruttarābhirapratisamābhiḥ ṣaḍbhirabhijñābhiḥ samanvāgataḥ yathā pūrvanirdiṣṭābhiḥ
T06bsa034_u:1631: yattathāgataḥ savāsanasarvakleśaprahāṇena niruttareṇāpratisamena jñeyāvaraṇa prahāṇena ca samanvāgataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1641: brāhmādvihārātkaruṇāvihāro yena tathāgatastriskṛto rātrau triskṛtvo divase ṣaṭkṛtvo rātriṃdivena buddhacakṣaṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati ko hīyate (Dutt
T06bsa034_u:1642: 64) ko vardhate kasyānutpannāni kuśalamūlānyavaropayāmi kvaṃ yāvadvistareṇāgraphale 'rhattve pratiṣṭhāpayāmīti /
T06bsa034_u:1650: teṣāñca punastathāgatānāṃ daśabhirākārairguṇābhidhānañca bhavati guṇānusmaraṇatā ca /
T06bsa034_u:1661: paramacittadamopāyajñatayā ekasyaiva loke puruṣabhūtasya ca prādurbhāvāt anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
T06bsa034_u:1662: cakṣurbhūtatvājjñānārthadharmatattva bhūtatvād vyaktasyārthasya nirṇetṛtvāt sarvārthapratisaraṇatvādavyutpannasyārthasya vyutpādakatvā dutpannasya saṃśayasyocchedakatvāt gambhīrāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ vivaraṇāt paryavadāpakatvāttanmūlatvāt sarvadharmāṇāṃ tannetṛkatvāttatpratisaraṇatvāt sarvaduḥkhasya niḥsaraṇaṃ śāsti vyapadiśati samyagdevamanuṣyāṇām /
T06bsa034_u:1664: arthopasaṃhitasya dharmarāśeranarthopasaṃhitasya dharmarāśernnaivārthopasaṃhitasya nānārthopasaṃhitasya dharmarāśeḥ sakalasarvākārābhisaṃbodhād buddha ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1667: tatra prabhūtairapi kalpairekasyāpi buddhasya prādurbhāvo na bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1668: ekasminneva ca kalpe prabhūtānāṃ buddhānāmutpādo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1669: teṣu teṣu ca daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣvaprameyāṇāmeva buddhānāmutpādo veditavyaḥ
