T06bsa034_u:1672: yasminneva divase pakṣe māse saṃvatsare ekena bodhisattvena bodhau cittaṃ praṇihitaṃ tasminneva divase pakṣe māse saṃvatsare sarvaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1673: yathā caika utsahito ghaṭito vyāyacchitaśca tathā sarve /
T06bsa034_u:1675: lokadhātāvanekāni bodhisattvaśatāni yāni tulyakālapraṇidhānāni tulyatyāgāni tulyakṣāntikāni tulyavīryāṇi tulyadhyānāni tulyaprajñānāni /
T06bsa034_u:1678: na ca tulyasaṃbhārasamudāgatayordvayostāvadbodhisattvayorekasmin lokadhātau buddhakṣetre yugapadutpattyavakāśo 'sti prāgevāprameyāsaṃkhyeyānām /
T06bsa034_u:1681: tasmāddaśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu yathā pariśodhiteṣu tathāgataśūnyeṣu te tulyasaṃbhārā bodhisattvā anyonyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣūtpadyanta iti veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:1682: tadanena paryāyeṇa bahuṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhabāhulyameva yujyate /
T06bsa034_u:1686: yathāhameko 'pariṇāyake loke pariṇāyakaḥ syāṃ sattvānāṃ vinetā sarvaduḥkhebhyo vimocayitā parinirvāpayiteti /
T06bsa034_u:1687: yasyaivaṃ dīrgharātraṃ praṇidhānamanubṛṃhayataḥ samyak pratipattiparigṛhītamṛdhyatyeva tat
T06bsa034_u:1688: punaśca śakta ekastathāgatastrisāhasramahāsāhasre ekasmin buddhakṣetre sarvabuddhakārya kartum
T06bsa034_u:1689: ato dvitīyasya tathāgatasya vyartha evotpādaḥ syāt /
T06bsa034_u:1690: bhūyaścaikasya tathāgatasya loke utpādātsattvānām evārthakaraṇaprasiddhiḥ pracuratarā bhavati pradakṣiṇatarā /
T06bsa034_u:1692: teṣāmevaṃ bhavatyayameva kṛtsne jagatyekastathāgato na dvitīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1693: asmiñjanapadacārikāṃ vā viprakānte parinirvṛte vā nāsti sa kaścid dvitīyaḥ
T06bsa034_u:1694: / (Dutt 66) yasyāsmābhirantike brahmacaryaṃ caritavyaṃ syāt dharmo vā
T06bsa034_u:1695: śrotavya iti viditvā 'titvarante ghanatareṇa chandavyāyāmena brahmacaryavāsāya saddharmaśravaṇāya ca /
T06bsa034_u:1697: evameṣāmekasya buddhasyotpādātsvārthe karaṇaprasiddhiḥ pracuratarā ca bhavati pradakṣiṇatarā ca /
T06bsa034_u:1698: tatra sarvabuddhānāṃ sarvaṃ samasamaṃ bhavati nirviśiṣṭaṃ sthāpayitvā catvāri sthānāni-āyurnāma kulaṃ kāyañca /
T06bsa034_u:1706: prakṛtyā ca bahukleśo duṣprajñaśca bhavati sarvo mātṛgrāmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1707: na ca prakṛtyā bahukleśasantānena duṣprajñasantānena ca śakyamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum
T06bsa034_u:1708: evamiyamanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ svabhāvato 'pi yathānirdiṣṭā yathābhūtaṃ veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:1711: api tvacintyaiva sarvatarkamārgasamatikrāntatvādaprameyāsaṃkhyeyaguṇasamuditatvādanuttaraiva ca samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvaśrāvaka-pratyekabuddhatathāgatānābhi nirvṛttaye bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1722: ihādita eva bodhisattvena bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣitukāmenādhimuktibahulena bhavitavyaṃ dharmeparyeṣakeṇa dharmadeśakena dharmānudharmapratipannena samyagavavādānuśāsakena samyagavavādānuśāsanyāñca sthitena upāyaparigṛhītakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmaṇā ca bhavitavyam /
T06bsa034_u:1726: triṣu ratneṣu buddhadharmaṃsaṃghaguṇeṣu buddhabodhisattvaprabhāve ca yathānirdiṣṭe tattvārthe ca yathānirdiṣṭe hetau ca phale ca vicitre yathāyogapatite aviparīte prāptavye cārthe samartho 'haṃ prāptumiti /
T06bsa034_u:1727: yathā prāptavye arthe evaṃ prāptyupāye astyayaṃ prāptyupāyaḥ prāptavyasyārthasyeti /
T06bsa034_u:1730: tathā subhāṣite sulapite supravyāhṛte 'dhimuktistadyathā sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇādiṣu
T06bsa034_u:1734: tatra dharmaṃ bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣamāṇaḥ kiṃ paryeṣate /
T06bsa034_u:1738: vāhyakāni ca śāstrāṇi laukikāni ca śilpakarmapasthānāni paryeṣate /
T06bsa034_u:1746: adhyātmavidyā hetuvidyā śabdavidyā vyādhicikitsāvidyā śilpakarmasthānavidyā ca /
T06bsa034_u:1747: itīmāni pañca vidyāsthānāni yāni bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate /
T06bsa034_u:1765: daśeme hetavaḥ aviparītaṃ hetuvyavasthānaṃ sarvahetusaṃgrahe veditavyāḥ saṃkleśāya vā vyavadānāya vā laukināmapi ca teṣāṃ sasyādīnāmavyākṛtānāṃ pravṛttaye /
T06bsa034_u:1775: tatra sarvadharmāṇāṃ yannāma nāmapūrvikā ca saṃjñā saṃjñāpūrvakaścābhilāpaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1777: tatra yadapekṣaṃ yaddhetukaṃ yasmin vastunyarthitvamupādānañca bhavatyayamasyocyate 'pekṣāhetuḥ
T06bsa034_u:1789: yaścāpekṣāhetuḥ yaścākṣepahetuḥ yaśca parigrahaheturyaśca nirvṛttiheturyaścāvāhakaheturyaśca pratiniyamaheturityetān sarvān hetūn ekadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya sahakāriheturityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1794: tadyathā śāsrāṇi pūrvāparaviruddhāni bhavanti tadekatyānāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānām yuktivirodhaḥ sādhyasya jñeyasyārthasya sādhanāyopapattisādhanayuktirayujyamānā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1803: maitrībhāvanā-vyāpādayoḥ karuṇābhāvanāvihiṃsayoḥ bodhyaṅgāryāṣṭāṅgamārgabhāvanāyāḥ sarvakleśānāñca traidhātukāvacarāṇām asmiṃstvarthe utpattivirodha evābhipretaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1804: punaḥ sarveṣāmeṣāṃ hetūnāṃ dvābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ saṃgrahaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1808: catvāraḥ pratyayāḥ hetupratyayaḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ ālambanapratyayaḥ adhipatipratyayaśca
T06bsa034_u:1809: tatra yo janako hetuḥ saḥ hetupratyayaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1812: tathā hi cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ prāgutpannāvakāśadānaparigṛhītā ālambanaparigṛhītāśca prādurbhavanti pravartante ca /
T06bsa034_u:1817: yānīmāni vividhāni sasyāni dhānyasaṃkhyātāni loke yairayaṃ loko jīvikāṃ kalpayati teṣāṃ tāvadyadidaṃ nāma saṃjñā vyāgvyāhāro vividhastad yathā
T06bsa034_u:1819: ayameṣāmanuvyavahārahetuḥ yavā ānīyantāṃ dīyantāṃ piṣyantāṃ sthāpyantāmityevamādikasya vyavahārasya yathā yavā evamavaśiṣṭheṣvapi veditavyam jighatsāpipāsādaurbalyaṃ kāyasthityapekṣaṃ kavaḍīkārāhārāsvādāpekṣañca teṣvarthitvaṃ paryeṣaṇā upanādānamupabhogaśca bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1821: yato yataḥ svabījād yasya [yasya] sasyasya prādurbhāvo bhavati tadbījaṃ tasyākṣepahetuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1824: yavabījācca yavāṅkurasya yavasasyasya ca prādurbhāvo bhavati nānyasya /
T06bsa034_u:1827: sarve caite apekṣāhetumupādāya pratiniyamahetvantāheta vaḥ sasyasyābhiniṣpattaye sahakārihetuḥ
T06bsa034_u:1833: evamete daśa hetavastadanyeṣvapi laukikeṣu bhāveṣu yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1839: avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamityevamādikasya anuvyavahārasya viṣayāsvādāpekṣā caiṣu bhavāṅgeṣu pravṛtiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1841: avidyādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭe dharme yāni bījāni jātasya bhūtasyeha tānyanyajānmikasya jātijarāmaraṇasyākṣepahetuḥ
T06bsa034_u:1845: te punaravidyādayo bhavaparyavasānā uttarottarāvāhanapāraṃparyeṇa tasyānyajānmikasya jātijarāmaraṇasyāvāhakahetuḥ
T06bsa034_u:1846: anye saha svavīryairavidyādayo bhavaparyavasānā narakopapattaye saṃvartante /
T06bsa034_u:1849: apekṣāhetumādiṃ kṛtvā sarva ete hetavaḥ pratiniyamahetuparyavasānāḥ sahakāriheturityucyate
T06bsa034_u:1850: tasya punaḥ saṃkleśasya virodhahetuḥ gotrasaṃpad buddhānāmutpādaḥ saddharmasya deśanā satpuruṣasaṃsevā saddharmaśravaṇaṃ yoniśo manaskāro dharmānudharmapratipattiḥ sarve ca bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ avirodhahetureṣāmeva yathoddiṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vaikalyaṃ virahitatvam /
T06bsa034_u:1852: tatra yaḥ sarveṣu vyavadānapakṣyeṣu dharmeṃṣu nirodhe ca nirvāṇe nāmasaṃjñāvāgvyāhāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1854: itīmāni smṛtyupasthānāni samyak prahāṇāni yāvadāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaṃḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1856: tatra yā saṃskārādīnavāpekṣā vyavadānaparyeṣaṇā vyavadānaparigraho vyavadānapariniṣpattiḥ ayamasyāpekṣāhetuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1857: yā gotrasthasya pudgalasya gotrasaṃpat sopadhiśeṣa [nirūpadhiśeṣa] nirvāṇādhigamāya pūrvaṅgamāya
T06bsa034_u:1860: tāni gotrasaṃgṛhītānyanāsravabodhipakṣyadharmabījāni teṣāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāmabhinirvṛttihetuḥ te punaḥ svabījānnirvṛttā bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ
T06bsa034_u:1863: tatra yacchrāvakagotraṃ śrāvakayānena parinirvāṇāya saṃvartate pratyekabuddhagotraṃ pratyekabuddhayānena parinirvāṇāya saṃvartate mahāyānagotraṃ mahāyānena parinirvāṇāya saṃvartate ayaṃ vyavadānasya pratiniyamahetuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1868: tatra yaḥ saṃkleśapakṣyo virodhahetuḥ sa vyavadānaheturdraṣṭavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1870: evaṃ ebhirdaśabhirhetubhiḥ saṃkleśo daśabhireva vyavadānaṃ bhavatyatīte
T06bsa034_u:1871: 'pyadhvanyabhūdanāgate 'pyadhvani bhaviṣyati saṃkleśāya vā vyavadānāya vā na ebhya uttari na ebhyo bhūyānanyo heturvidyate /
T06bsa034_u:1878: yatpunarakuśalābhyāsādakuśalārāmatā saṃtiṣṭhate akuśalabahulatā kuśalābhyāsātkuśalārāmatā kuśalabahulatā pūrvakarmasādṛśyena vā paścātphalānuvartanatā tanniṣyandaphalam /

T06bsa034_u:1883: śilpakarmasthānasanniśritena puruṣakāreṇa yadi vā kṛṣyā yadi vā vaṇijyayā yadi vā rājapauruṣṭeṇa lipi-gaṇana-nyasana-saṃkhyā-mudrayā sasyādikaṃ lābhādikañca phalamabhinirvartayati idamucyate puruṣakāraphalam /
T06bsa034_u:1888: iti sarveṣāmindriyāṇāṃ dvāviṃśatīnāṃ svena svenādhipatyena yatphalaṃ nirvartate tadadhipatiphalaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:1891: (Dutt 73) evaṃ hi bodhisattvo buddhavacanaṃ samyaghetuphalaparidīpanākāraṃ viditvā
T06bsa034_u:1894: na ca svayaṃ kṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ kalpaśatairapi praṇāśo bhavati phaladānaṃ prati /
T06bsa034_u:1895: evamakṛtānabhyāgamakṛtāvipraṇāśaṃ buddhavacanaṃ paridīpitaṃ bodhisattvo yathābhūtaṃ jñātvā karma-svakatā-jñānabalagotraṃ krameṇa viśodhayati vivardhayati ca /
T06bsa034_u:1897: iha bodhisattvastīvraṃ gauravamupasthāpya subhāṣite sulapite dharma paryeṣate /

T06bsa034_u:1901: yacca bodhisattvasya sve ātmabhāve samucchraye premagauravaṃ prāgevānyeṣu sarvakāyapariṣkāreṣu bhojanapānādiṣu /
T06bsa034_u:1902: yacca subhāṣitaśravaṇe pūrvakaṃ premagauravaṃ paścimaṃ premagauravamupanidhāya śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīmapi saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapyupaniṣadamapi nopaiti sa tathā subhāṣite gauravajātaḥ subhāṣitaṃ śṛṇvannakhinnaśca bhavattyatṛptaśca /
T06bsa034_u:1904: saguṇa kāmatayā dharmakāmatayā dharmabhāṇakamupasaṃkrāmati nopārambhābhiprāyeṇa sagauravatayā na mānastambhena kiṃkuśalagaveṣaṇatayā na ātmodbhāvanārtham ātmānañca parāṃśca kuśalamūle saṃniyojayiṣyāmīti na lābhasatkārahetoḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1915: dharme gauravamupasthāpya dharmabhāṇake pudgale gauravamupasthāpya dharmamaparibhavan dharmabhāṇakaṃ pudgalamaparibhavan ebhiścaturbhirākārairavamanyanāsaṃkleśavigataḥ śṛṇoti /
T06bsa034_u:1918: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ asaṃkliṣṭo dharma śṛṇoti /
T06bsa034_u:1919: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvaḥ avikṣipto dharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
T06bsa034_u:1921: ājñācitta ekāgracittaḥ avihitaśrotraḥ samāvarjitamānasaḥ sarvacetasā samanvāhṛtya dharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
T06bsa034_u:1926: hetuvidyāṃ bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate tasyaiva śāstrasya durbhāṣitadurlapitatāyā yathābhūta parijñānārthaṃ paravādanigrahārthaṃ cāprasannānāmasmiṃcchāsane prasādāya prasannānāñca bhūyobhāvāya /
T06bsa034_u:1929: cikitsāśāstraṃ bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate sattvānāṃ nānāprakāravyādhivyupaśamanārthaṃ mahājanakāyasyānugrahārtham
T06bsa034_u:1930: laukikāni śilpakarmasthānāni bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate 'lpakṛcchreṇa bhogasaṃharaṇārthaṃ sattvānāmarthāya
T06bsa034_u:1932: sarvāṇi ca etāni pañcavidyāsthānāni bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate 'nuttarāyāḥ

T06bsa034_u:1942: anulomāṃ ca kathāṃ kathayati pariśuddhāṃ ca /

T06bsa034_u:1957: saṃdarśayitavyāṃ saṃdarśayati samādāpayitavyāṃ samādāpayati samuttejayitavyāṃ samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayitavyāṃ saṃpraharṣayati /

T06bsa034_u:1963: sukhitaduḥkhiteṣu sattveṣu pramatteṣu dīneṣu hitasukhānukampācittatāmupasthāpya kathāṃ karoti
T06bsa034_u:1966: nirāmiṣeṇa ca cittenāpratikāṃkṣamāṇo lābhasatkāraślokaṃ pareṣāṃ dharmān deśayati /
T06bsa034_u:1969: kālena satkṛtyānupūrvamanusandhyanusahitaṃ harṣayatā roca[yatā] toṣayatā utsāhayatā anavasādayatā yuktā sahitā 'vyavakīrṇānudhārmikī yathā pariṣat maitracittena hitacittenānukampācittenāniśritena lābhasatkāraśloke
T06bsa034_u:1975: teṣāmeva [yathā] paryeṣitānāṃ yathodgṛhītānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kāyena vācā manasā cānuvartanā samyak cintanā bhāvanā ca /
T06bsa034_u:1976: yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhagavatā kāyena vācā manasā kriyā niṣiddhā yeṣāñcābhyanujñātā kāyena vācā manasā kriyā tasya kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇastathaiva parivarjanaṃ pratiniṣevaṇā samudānayatā ca kāyena vācā manasā cānuvartanā dharmānudharmapratipattirityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1978: iha bodhisattva ekākī rahogato yathāśrutāṃ dharmāṃścintayitukāmastulayitukāma upaparīkṣitukāma ādita evācintyāni sthānāni vivarjayitvā dharmāṃścintayitumārabhate pratatañca cintayati /
T06bsa034_u:1986: aciṃntyaṃ varjayan bodhisattvaḥ sammohaṃ ciṃttāvikṣepaṃ nādhigacchati /
T06bsa034_u:1990: yuktyā punaḥ kiñcit pravi[cinvan] praviśayan vicārayan na parapratyayo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1992: dharmeṣu gambhīreṣu buddhirnāvagāhate tathāgatagocarā ete dharmā nāsmadbuddhigocarā ityevamapratikṣipaṃstān dharmānātmānamakṣatañcānupahatañca pariharatyanavadyam /
T06bsa034_u:1993: arthaṃ pratisaran bodhisattvo na vyañjanaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvasandhyāya-vacanānyanupraviśati
T06bsa034_u:1994: kālāpadeśamahāpadeśakuśalo bodhisattvaḥ tattvārthānna vicalayituṃ na vikampayituṃ kenacit kathaṃcicchakyate /
T06bsa034_u:2003: yathāpi tadvodhisattvaḥ aṣṭākārāyāśvintāyāḥ susamāptatvānnirabhilāpye vastumātre 'rthamātre ālambane cittamupanibadhya sarvaprapañcāpagatena sarvacittapariplavāpagatena saṃjñā-manasikāreṇa
T06bsa034_u:2004: sarvālambanānyadhimucyamānaḥ adhyātmasamādhinirmitteṣu cittaṃ saṃsthāpayati avasthāpayati vistareṇa yāvadekotīkaroti samādhatte /
T06bsa034_u:2006: vipaśyanā katamā tenaiva punaḥ śamathaparibhāvitena manaskāreṇa yathā cintitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nimittamanasikriyā vicayaḥ pravicayo dharmapravicayaḥ vistareṇa yāvatpāṇḍityaṃ prajñācāraḥ iyamucyate vipaśyanā /
T06bsa034_u:2013: tatra bodhisattvo yathā yathā śamathavipaśyanābhyāsaṃ karoti tathā tathā śamathavipaśyanābhiratiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate /
T06bsa034_u:2014: yathā yathā śamathavipaśyanābhiratiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate tathā tathā śamatho vipaśyanā ca pariśudhyataḥ
T06bsa034_u:2015: yathā yathā śamatho viśudhyati tathā tathā kāyaprasrabdhiścittaprasrabdhiḥ pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāṃ gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2016: yathā yathā vipaśyanā viśudhyati tathā tathā jñānadarśanaṃ pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāṃ gacchati
T06bsa034_u:2018: yadutāśrayagatañca dauṣṭhulyamanapanetavyaṃ sarvatra ca jñeye jñānadarśanaṃ viśodhayitavyaṃ ca /
T06bsa034_u:2019: caitatsarvaṃ bhāvanākarmānayā caturākārayā bhāvanayā bodhisattvasya saṃpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:2023: yathāpi tadvodhisattvaḥ samādhisanniśrayeṇa vā saṃvāsānvayādvā yeṣāmavavaditukāmo bhavati yo vā punaranyo bodhisattvo 'smai avavadati tathāgato vā sa ādita eva cittaṃ paryeṣate jānāti cittaṃ paryeṣya indriya paryeṣate jānāti /
T06bsa034_u:2027: yadi vā 'śubhayā yadi vā maitryā yadi vā idaṃpratyayatā-pratītyasamutpādena yadi vā dhātubhedena yadi vā ānāpānasmṛtyā yathāyogaṃ yathārhamavaratāramukheṣvavatārya
T06bsa034_u:2032: so 'yamaṣṭavidho 'vavādaḥ punaḥ samāsatastribhiḥ sthānaiḥ saṃgṛhīto veditavyaḥ /

T06bsa034_u:2042: eva mevāvavādaṃ parato vā labhamāno bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ vānuprayacchannaṣṭānāṃ balānāṃ gotraṃ krameṇa viśodhayati vivardhayati dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalasyendriyaparāparajñānabalasya nānādhimuktijñānabalasya nānādhātujñānabalasya sarvatra gāminī pratipaj jñānabalasya pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānabalasya cyutyupapattijñānabalasya ca /
T06bsa034_u:2046: sāvadyasamudācārapratiṣedhaḥ anavadyasamudācārābhyanujñā pratiṣiddhābhyanujñāteṣu dharmeṣu skhalitasamācāra-saṃcodanā punaḥ punaranādarajātasya skhalataḥ avasādanayā smṛtikaraṇānupradānamakaluṣeṇāvipariṇatena snigdhenāśayena /
T06bsa034_u:2047: samyak pratipannasya ca pratiṣiddhābhyanujñāteṣu dharmeṣu bhūtaguṇapriyākhyānatayā saṃpraharṣaṇā
T06bsa034_u:2053: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā catuḥsaṃgrahavastusaṃgṛhītenopāyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo bodhisattva ityucyata iti /
T06bsa034_u:2054: kena punaḥ kāraṇena catvāri saṃgrahavastūnyupāya ityucyante /
T06bsa034_u:2060: tathā hi vicitreṇāmiṣadānenānugṛhyamāṇāḥ sattvāḥ śrotavyaṃ kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ manyate /
T06bsa034_u:2061: tadanantaraṃ bodhisattvaḥ priyavāditayā tatra tatra sammūḍhānāṃ tatsammohāśeṣāpanayāya yuktiṃ grāhayati sandarśayati /
T06bsa034_u:2063: tathā ca yuktyā grāhitān sandarśitānsattvān akuśalātsthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati /
T06bsa034_u:2065: evañca bodhisattvaḥ tānsarvānavatārya tatsabhāgavṛttasamācāreṇānuvartate yenāsya na bhavanti vineyā vaktāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2066: tvaṃ tāvadātmanā na śraddhāsampannaḥ śīlasampannastyāgasampannaḥ prajñāsampannaḥ kasmādbhavān parānatra samādāpayati /
T06bsa034_u:2067: tena ca codayati smārayatīti tasmātsamānarthatā bodhisattvasya caturtho 'nuvartaka upāyo veditavyaḥ
T06bsa034_u:2068: ityebhiścaturbhirupāyaryatparigṛhītaṃ samastairvyastairvā bodhisattvasya kāyakarma vākkarma manaskarma /
T06bsa034_u:2078: iha bodhisattvaḥ krameṇa ṣaṭpāramitāṃ paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
T06bsa034_u:2082: svabhāvadānaṃ sarvadānaṃ duṣkaradānaṃ sarvatomukhaṃ dānaṃ satpuruṣadānaṃ sarvākāradānaṃ vighātārthikadānamihāmutrasukhaṃ dānaṃ viśuddhadānaṃ ca /
T06bsa034_u:2086: saṃvarasthāyinaḥ āgamadṛṣṭeḥ phaladarśino yo yenārthī tasya ca tadvastupratipādanā bodhisattvasya dānasvabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2090: tatra ā majjñaḥ svadehaparityāgo bodhisattvasya kevalādhyātmikavastuparityāga ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:2091: yatpunarbodhisattvo vāntāśināṃ sattvānāmarthe bhuktvā bhuktvā 'nnapānaṃ vamati /
T06bsa034_u:2094: tatra bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ dehārthināṃ samāsato dvābhyāmākārābhyāṃ svadehamanuprayacchati
T06bsa034_u:2097: evameva nirāmiṣacitto bodhisattvaḥ paramabodhikāmaḥ parahitasukhakāmo dānapāramittāṃ paripūrayitukāmo yathākaraṇīyaṃ pareṣāṃ vaśyaṃ paravidheyamātmānaṃ pareṣāmanuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2100: dvābhyāmeva kāraṇābhyāṃ bodhisattvo bāhyaṃ vastu sattvebhyaḥ parityajati /
T06bsa034_u:2102: tadvaśitvāya vā sarveṇa sarva nirmuktena cittenānuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2103: na ca punarbodhisattvaḥ sarvamādhyātmikabāhyaṃ vastvaviśeṣeṇaiva sarvathā ca sattvānāṃ dadāti
T06bsa034_u:2106: / yadasmādādhyātmikabāhyādvastunaḥ sattvānāṃ dānaṃ sukhāyaiva syānna tu
T06bsa034_u:2107: hitāya naiva vāsukhāya nāpi hitāya tadbodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ na dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2108: yatpunarhitāya syānnāvaśyaṃ sukhāyā-sukhāya vā punarhitāya ca
T06bsa034_u:2115: apyeva nāma bodhisattvaḥ śatakṛtvaḥ sahasrakṛtvaḥ svajīvitaparityāgamapi pareṣāmantikādabhyupagacchet
T06bsa034_u:2116: natveva rājñayā parārādhanārthaṃ parotpīḍanāṃ paravadhaṃ paravañcanāṃ vā kuryāt /
T06bsa034_u:2117: yadi ca bodhisattvaḥ śuddhāśayo bhavati dānamārabhya so 'pi
T06bsa034_u:2118: sattvakārye prabhūte karaṇīye pratyupasthite svadehāṅgapratyaṅgayācanake ca pratyupasthite na svadehāṅgapratyaṅgānyanuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2120: na hyasya bodhisattvasya dānamārabhya śuddhāśayasya punaḥ kenacitparyāyeṇedaṃ dātavyamasmai dātanyamiti bhavati cetasaḥ saṃkocaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2121: tasmādasau bodhisattvo yadāśayaśuddhyarthaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ sattvakāryamadhyupekṣya dadyāt so 'syāśayaḥ śuddha iti na (Dutt 82)
T06bsa034_u:2123: na ca mārakāyikeṣu deveṣu yācanakeṣu viheṭhābhiprāyeṣu pratyupasthiteṣu svadehamaṅgavibhāgaśo
T06bsa034_u:2124: / mā haiva teṣāmadhimātrā kṣatiścopahatiśca bhaviṣyatīti yathā
T06bsa034_u:2132: etānākārān sthāpayitvā etadviparyayāt svadehaṃ tāvadbodhisattvaḥ paravidheyatayā vā 'ṅgapratyaṅgavibhāgaśo vārthibhyaḥ parityajati /
T06bsa034_u:2134: bāhyātpunarvastuno bodhisattvo yāni viṣāgniśastramadyāni sattvānāmupaghātāya tāni nānuprayacchatyarthibhyaḥ ātmopaghātāya vā yācitānyarthināṃ paropaghātāya [vā] /
T06bsa034_u:2135: yāni punarviṣāgniśasramadyānyanugrahāya sattvānāṃ tāni bodhisattvo dadātyarthibhya ātmano vā 'nugrahāya yācitānyarthināṃ parānugrahāya vā /
T06bsa034_u:2136: punarna ca bodhisattvaḥ parakīyaṃ draviṇamaviśvāsyaṃ parebhyo
T06bsa034_u:2138: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sāñcaritreṇa paradāramupasaṃhṛtya pareṣāmanuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2140: yadapi [rati]krīḍopasaṃhitamanarthopasaṃhitaṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvasya deyaṃ vastu tadapi bodhisattvo 'rthibhyo na dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2143: apitu vipulataramasya taddānamanarthaṃ kuryādyaddhetorasau madaṃ pramādaṃ duścaritamadhyāpadyamānaḥ kāyasya bhedādapāyeṣūpapadyate /
T06bsa034_u:2144: sa cetpunastadratikrīḍādikaṃ va tu nāpāyagamanāya bhavennāpi cākuśalamūlopacayāya kāmaṃ tadbodhisattvastādṛśaṃ ratikrīḍādikaṃ vasta cittaprasādahetoranupracchedarthibhyastenāpi vastunā saṃgrahāya paripākāya
T06bsa034_u:2145: / kīdṛśaṃ punā ratikrīḍāvastu bodhisattvo na dadātyarthibhyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2148: kṣudrayajñeṣu ca mahārambheṣu yeṣu bahavaḥ prāṇinaḥ saṃghātamāpadya jīvitādvyaparopyante /
T06bsa034_u:2149: tadrūpān yajñānna svayaṃ yajati na parairyājayati /
T06bsa034_u:2153: (Dutt 83) na jālāni na yantrāṇi na jālayantraśikṣāṃ prāṇināmuparodhāya yācito 'nuprayacchati
T06bsa034_u:2154: nāpyākrośāya vadhāya bandhāya daṇḍanāya kāraṇāya śatrūṇāṃ śatrumanuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2155: samāsato bodhisattvo yatkiñcit parasattvotpīḍayā parasattvabādhāya sattvānāṃ ratikrīḍāvastu tatsarvaṃbodhisattvo na dadātyarthibhyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2156: yāni punarimāni vicitrāṇi hastyaśvarathayānavāhanāni vastrālaṅkārāṇi praṇītāni ca pānabhojanāni nṛttagītavāditaśikṣā nṛttagītavāditabhājanāni ca gandhamālyavilepanaṃ vicitraśca bhāṇḍopaskara udyānāni ca gṛhāṇi striyaśca paricaryāyai vividheṣu ca śilpakarmasthāneṣu śikṣā ityevaṃrūpaṃ ratikrīḍāvastu bodhisattvaścittaprasādahetorarthibhyo
T06bsa034_u:2158: na ca bodhisattvaḥ amātrayā 'pathyaṃ vā glānāyārthine 'pi
T06bsa034_u:2160: na tṛpteṣu lolupajātīyeṣu sattveṣu praṇītaṃ pānabhojanamanuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2161: nāpi ca śokārtānāṃ sattvānāmātmodbandhanāya vā tāḍnāya vā viṣabhakṣaṇāya vā prapātapatanāya vā kāmakāraṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2162: na ca bodhisattvo mātāpitaraṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃmarthibhyo 'nuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2163: tathāhi bodhisattvasya mātāpitaraṃ paramaguru-sthānīyamāpāyakaṃ poṣakaṃ saṃvardhakaṃ tadbodhisattvena dīrgharātraṃ śirasodvahatā na
T06bsa034_u:2165: tayoścādhamanabandhaka sthāpanavikraye ātmā vaśyo vidheyo dātavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2168: nāpi bodhisattvo rājā mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ prabhuḥ sve pṛthivīmaṇḍale sattvānāṃ saparigrahāṇāṃ parakīyaṃ putradāraṃ pareṣāmantikādācchidya pareṣāmanuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2169: nānyatra kṛtsnaṃ grāmaṃ vā grāmapradeśaṃ vā janapadapradeśaṃ vā bhogamanuprayacchet /
T06bsa034_u:2171: na ca bodhisattvaḥ svaṃ putradāraṃ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaparigrahaṃ samyagasaṃjñaptamakāmakaṃ vimanaskaṃ pareṣāmarthināmanuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2172: samyak saṃjñaptamapi ca sumanaskaṃ chandajātaṃ nāmitreṣu na yakṣarākṣaseṣu na raudrakarmasu pratipādayati /
T06bsa034_u:2173: nāpi ca dāsabhāvāya pratipādayati putradāraṃ sukumāraṃ kulaputraṃ janam /
T06bsa034_u:2174: na ca bodhisattvo 'dhimātraparapīḍāpravṛtteṣu raudrakarmasu yācanakeṣu rājyapradānaṃ dadāti
T06bsa034_u:2175: rājyādapi ca tāṃstathāvidhān pudgalāṃścyāvayati sa cet pratibalo bhavati cyāvayitum /
T06bsa034_u:2176: na ca bodhisattvo mātāpitrorantikādbhogānācchidya yācanakebhyaḥ prayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2179: 84) mātāpitaraṃ bādhitvā vistareṇa yāvatkarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ bādhitvā parebhyo yācanakebhyo deyavastu parityajati /
T06bsa034_u:2180: dharmaṇa cāsāhasena bodhisattvo bhogān saṃhṛtya dānaṃ dadāti nādharmeṇa sāhasena /
T06bsa034_u:2181: na paramutpīḍyopahatya na ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsane bodhisattvo vyavasthitaḥ śikṣāṃ vyatikramya kathañcit dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2182: dānañca dadad bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu samacitto dadāti dakṣiṇīyabuddhimupasthāpya mitrāmitrodāsīneṣu guṇavatsu doṣasatsu hīneṣu tulyeṣu viśiṣṭeṣu sukhiteṣu duḥkhiteṣu ca /
T06bsa034_u:2183: na ca bodhisattvo yathoktādyathāpratijñātādyācanakāya nyūnaṃ dāna dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2185: na ca bodhisattvaḥ praṇītaṃ vastu pratijñāya lūhaṃ pratyavaraṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2186: nānyatralūhaṃ pratyavaraṃ pratijñāya praṇītaṃ dadāti saṃvidyamāne praṇīte /
T06bsa034_u:2187: na ca bodhisattvo vimanasko na kruddhaḥ kṣubhitamānaso dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2188: nāpi ca dānaṃ dattvā nindayati punaḥ punaḥ parikīrtanatayā evaṃ caivañca tvaṃ mayā dānenānugṛhītaḥ savardhito 'bhyuddhṛto veti /
T06bsa034_u:2189: na ca bodhisattvo nihīnapuruṣasyāpi dānaṃ dadadapaviddhamasatkṛtyānuprayacchati prāgeva guṇavataḥ
T06bsa034_u:2190: na ca bodhisattvo vividhavipratipattisthitānāmuddhatānāmasaṃvṛtātmanāṃ yācanakānāmākrośakānāṃ roṣakāṇāṃ paribhāṣakāṇāṃ vipratipattyā khinnamānaso dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2191: nānyatra teṣāmevāntike bodhisattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā kleśāveśaprakṛtitāmavagamyānukampācittamupasthāpya dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2193: tadyathā mahāraudrayajñeṣu na hiṃsādānena dharmaṃ pratyeti /
T06bsa034_u:2195: nāpi suviśuddhenāpi sarvākāreṇa dānamātrakeṇa laukikalokottarāṃ vairāgyaviśuddhiṃ pratyeti nānyatra /
T06bsa034_u:2199: sarvaprakārasya dānasya sarvaṃ prakāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ phalaṃ vipāke 'bhisaṃpratyayajāto bodhisattvo
T06bsa034_u:2201: vastrado varṇavān yānadaḥ sukhitaḥ cakṣuṣmān pradīpada ityevamādi vistareṇa veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2202: na ca bodhisattvo dāridryabhayabhīto dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2204: na ca bodhisattvo yācanakānāmapratirūpaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2212: tathā 'pratirūpe karmaṇi viniyojya bodhisattvo na pareṣāṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2214: na ca punarbodhisattvo yācanakaṃ punaḥ punaryācanatayā gatapratyāgatikatayā sevāvṛttasaṃvidhānena parikliśya dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2216: na ca bodhisattvaḥ kīrtiśabdaślokamiśritaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2219: na ca pareṣāṃ kuhanārthaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2220: kaccinmāṃ pare rājāno vā rājamahāmātyā vā naigamajanapadā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhinaḥ sārthavāhā dātāraṃ dānapatiṃ viditvā satkuryurgurūkuryurmānayeyuḥ pūjayeyuriti /
T06bsa034_u:2223: na ca pareṣāṃ vipralambhāya dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2224: anena dānena vilobhya viśrambhayitvā paścādenaṃ vipravādayiṣyāmīti /
T06bsa034_u:2225: na ca vibhedāya parataḥ pareṣāṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2226: tadyathā dānena grāmaṃ vā grāmapradeśaṃ vā janapadaṃ vā janapadapradeśaṃ vā vibhedya svāmināmantikādācchetsyāmyākramiṣyāmīti
T06bsa034_u:2227: dakṣaśca bodhisattvo bhavatyanalasaśca utthānasampannaḥ svayaṃ ca sannaddhaḥ parikare pūrvaṅgamo deyavastu parityāge svayañca dadāti paraiśca dāpayati na svayaṃ kausīdyaṃ prāviṣkṛtya parānājñāpayati dānāya /
T06bsa034_u:2228: mahāntamapi gaṇasannipātamarthināṃ śīlavadduḥśīlānāṃ sanniṣaṇṇaṃ saṃnipatitaṃ viditvā vṛddhāntamupādāya yāvannavakāntaṃ tatsarvaṃ deyavastu gatapratyāgatikatayā punaḥ punaranukrameṇa pratipādayati na ca bodhisattvaḥ prabhūteṣu vipuleṣu vistīrṇeṣu bhogeṣu saṃvidyamāneṣu mitaṃ dānaṃ dadāti na ca paraviheṭhanāya pareṣāṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2230: pūrvameva ca dānād bodhisattvaḥ sumanā bhavati dadaccittaṃ prasādayati /
T06bsa034_u:2232: na ca śāṭhyāddānaṃ dadāti maṇimuktāśaṅkhaśilāvaidūryapravāḍādipratirūpakāṇi tadāśāvatāṃ sattvānām
T06bsa034_u:2233: na ca bodhisattvena kiñcidalpaṃ [vā prabhūtaṃ vā] deyavastu yanna prāgeva
T06bsa034_u:2236: kālena ca bodhisattvo dānaṃ dadāti nākālena /
T06bsa034_u:2244: na ca vilambitaṃ tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2245: ayācito 'pi bodhisattvaḥ svayaṃ pravārayitvā parān yo yenārthī bhavati tasya taddadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2250: iha bodhisattvaḥ satsu saṃvidyamāneṣu deyadharmeṣu pūrvameva yācanakābhyāgamanādevaṃ cittamabhisaṃskaroti
T06bsa034_u:2251: sa cenme dvau yācanakāvāgacchetāṃ sukhitaścākṛpaṇo 'varākaḥ sanāthaḥ sapratisaraṇaḥ duḥkhitaśca kṛpaṇo varākaḥ anāthaḥ apratisaraṇaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2252: tena mayā sacenme bhogānāṃ dvayorapi santarpaṇāyecchāparipūraye tadā saṃbhavo 'sti ubhau santarpayitavyau /
T06bsa034_u:2254: sa cenna tāvadbhogasaṃbhavaḥ syādahaṃ dvayoḥ santarpayeyaṃ yadicchāparipūriñca kuryāṃ sukhitamapahāya duḥkhitāya dānaṃ deyam /
T06bsa034_u:2255: akṛpaṇamavarākaṃ sanāthaṃ sapratisaraṇamapahāya kṛpaṇāya varākāya anāthāyāpratisaraṇāya dānaṃ deyamiti /
T06bsa034_u:2256: sa evaṃ cittamabhisaṃskṛtya yathābhisaṃskārameva karmaṇā saṃpādayati /
T06bsa034_u:2257: sa cetpunaḥ sukhitasya yācanakasyecchāṃ na śaknoti paripūrayituṃ sa tameva pūrvakaṃ svacittābhisaṃskārakalpamupādāya taṃ yācakamevaṃ saṃjñapya preṣayati /
T06bsa034_u:2258: asya mayā duḥkhitasya pūrvanisṛṣṭaṃ pūrvapratijñātametaddeyavastu ato mayā 'syaiva pratipāditam
T06bsa034_u:2261: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ satsu saṃvidyamāneṣu deyadharmeṣu yāni tāni matsarikulāni bhavanti paramamatsarikulānyāgṛhītapariṣkārāṇi kuṭakuñcakāni yeṣu na jātu śramaṇabrāhmaṇeṣu deyadharme prajāyate tāni bodhisattvaḥ kulānyupasaṃkramya pratisaṃmodya praṇayañca saṃvidhāyaivamāha aṅga tāvatte bhavantaḥ akośakṣayeṇa mahatā upakāreṇa pratyavasthitā bhavantu /
T06bsa034_u:2262: mama gṛhe vipulā bhogā vipulā deyadharmāḥ (Dutt 87) saṃvidyante /
T06bsa034_u:2265: sa cedyūyaṃ yācanakamārāgayatha mā nirākṛtya visarjayiṣyatha madīyaṃ dhanaṃ deyadharmamādāya tebhyo vā visṛjata yathāsukhameva /
T06bsa034_u:2266: athavā taṃ yācanakamasmākamupasaṃharatha dīyamānañca mayā dānamanumodatha /
T06bsa034_u:2267: te ca tasya pratiśrutyākośakṣayeṇa priyeṇāyaṃ kulaputro 'smākamārādhitacitto bhavatīti tathā kurvanti /
T06bsa034_u:2268: evaṃ hi tena bodhisattvena yeṣāmāyatyāṃ mātsaryamalavinayāya bījamavaropitaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2269: krameṇa ca tenābhyāsena tena prajñāpūrvakeṇopāyakauśalyena svakamapi parīttaṃ parebhyo dhanamanuprayacchanti
T06bsa034_u:2272: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo ye 'sya bhavantyācāryopādhyāyāḥ sārdhavihāryantevāsinaḥ sabrahmacāriṇaśca lobhaprakṛtayo lubdhajātīyā ye
T06bsa034_u:2273: ca na lubdhajātīyā api tu deyadharmavaikalyādicchāvighātavantastatra bodhisattvo buddhāvaropitaṃ vā dharmā[varopitaṃ vā] saṃghāvaropitaṃ vā dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu kartukāmasteṣāmevotsṛjati tān deya dharmāṃstaiḥ kārayati na svayaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:2274: evaṃ tena bodhisattvena svayañca bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasūtaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2278: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ satsu saṃvidyamāneṣu deyadharmeṣu yācanakamākūṭananimittamātrakeṇaiva jñātvā yathākāmaṃ deyadharmaiḥ pratipādayati /
T06bsa034_u:2281: tasyāpi bhāvamājñāya tadduścaritamanyeṣāmapi tāvacchādayati prāgeva tasyaiva /
T06bsa034_u:2282: icchāñcāsya paripūrayati yenāsāvamaṅkurudagro viśāradaḥ saumanasyajāto viprakrāmati /
T06bsa034_u:2283: yenāpi ca bodhisattvaḥ kūṭa-kapaṭena vañcito bhavati na cānena sā vañcanā pūrvaṃ pratividdhā bhavati paścācca pratividhyati /
T06bsa034_u:2284: pratividhya na ca tena vastunā punastaṃ vyaṃsakaṃ pudgalañcodayati smārayati /
T06bsa034_u:2286: ityevaṃbhāgīyaṃ tāvadbodhisattvasya satsu saṃvidyamāneṣu prājñadānaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2287: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ asatsu asaṃvidyamāneṣu deyadharmeṣu kṛtāvī bodhisattvasteṣu teṣu śilpakarmasthāneṣu sa tadrūpaṃ śilpakarmasthānamāmukhīkaroti /
T06bsa034_u:2289: pareṣāñcitrakatho madhurakathaḥ kalyāṇapratibhāno bodhisattvāstathā dharmadeśanāṃ pravartayati yathā daridrāṇāmapi sattvānāṃ dātukāmatā santiṣṭhate prāgevāḍhyānām /
T06bsa034_u:2291: yāni vā punastāni śrāddhakulāni yeṣvaharahaḥ pravṛtā eva deyadharmā vistīrṇabhogatayā teṣu kuleṣu āgatāgatān yācanakānupasaṃharati /
T06bsa034_u:2292: svayameva vā gatvā dāneṣu dīyamāneṣu puṇyeṣu kriyamāṇeṣu dakṣo 'nalasa utthānasampannaścittamabhiprasādya kāyena vācā yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ vyāpāraṃ gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2296: duṣpratipāditaṃ syāt pakṣapatitaṃ vā anādarato vā smṛtisaṃpramoṣato vā tanna bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2297: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ asatsvasaṃvidyamāneṣu bhogeṣu prājñadānasya dātā bhavati yāvadāśayaśuddhi nādhigacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2298: śuddhāśayastu bodhisattvo yathaivāpāsamatikramaṃ pratilabhate tathaivākṣayabhogatāṃ janmani pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:2299: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo na tīrthikāya randhraprekṣiṇe dharmaṃ mukhoddeśato vā pustakagataṃ vā dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2300: nāpi lobhaprakṛtaye pustakaṃ vikretukāmāya sannidhiṃ vā kartukāmāya /
T06bsa034_u:2302: punaḥ sa cetkṛtārthaḥ pustakena bhavati svayaṃ dadātyasmai yathāsukhameva /
T06bsa034_u:2303: sa cedakṛtārtho bhavati yasyārthe tena tatpustakamanvāvartitam /
T06bsa034_u:2304: evamasau bodhisattvaḥ ādarśamanyaṃ dṛṣṭvā lekhayitvā vānyaddadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2305: sa cennaivādarśaṃ paśyati nāpi lekhayituṃ śaknoti tenādita evaṃ svacittaṃ pratyavekṣitavyam
T06bsa034_u:2307: mā haivāhamāśayata eva na dātukāmo 'bhilikhitaṃ dharmam /
T06bsa034_u:2308: sa cetsa evaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo jānīyādasti me dharmamātsaryamalasamudācāro 'pi tena bodhisattvenaivaṃ cittamabhisaṃskṛtya dātavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2310: yadyahamanena dharmadānena mūka evaṃ syāṃ dṛṣṭe dharme tathāpi mayā 'nadhivāsya kleśaṃ dātavyameva syāddharmadānam /
T06bsa034_u:2312: sa cetpunaḥ pratyavekṣamāṇo jānīyānnāsti me [dharma] mātsaryamalasamudācāro 'pi tena bodhisattvenaivaṃ pratisaṃśikṣitavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2314: kleśanirghātanārthaṃ vā etaddharmadānaṃ dadyāṃ jñānasaṃbhāraparipūraṇārthaṃ vā sattva (Dutt 89) priyatāyaiva vā /
T06bsa034_u:2320: ananuprayacchaṃścāhaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ hitasukhāya jñānaṃ samudānaya tasya ca sattvasya tadanyeṣāñca sarvasattvānāṃ priyakārī bhavāmi /
T06bsa034_u:2321: anupracchannasyaivaikasya sattvasya priyakārī iti viditvā yathābhūtaṃ sa cedbodhisattvo na dadātyanavadyo bhavatyavipratisārī /
T06bsa034_u:2324: na khalu punarbodhisattvaḥ utsahate yācanakaṃ niṣṭhurayā vācā pratikṣeptum /
T06bsa034_u:2327: prāgeva bodhisattvena sarvapariṣkārāḥ sarvadeyadharmā daśasu dikṣu viśaddhenāśayena buddhabodhisattvānāṃ visṛṣṭā bhavanti vikalpitāstadyathāpi nāma bhikṣurācāryāya vā upādhyāyāya vā cīvaraṃ vikalpayet sa evaṃ vikalpahetoḥ sarvavicitrodārapariṣkāradeyadharmasannidhiprāpto 'pyāryavaṃśavihārī bodhisattva ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:2331: yadi yācanakaṃ paśyati yuktarūpaścāsmin yathepsitaṃ deyadharmapratipādanaṃ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:2332: sa nāsti tat kiñcid buddhabodhisattvānāṃ yatsattveṣu aparityaktamiti viditvā yācanakasyecchāṃ paripūrayati /
T06bsa034_u:2333: no cedyuktarūpaṃ samanupaśyati sa tameva kalpamupādāya parakīyametad bhadramukha na caitadyuṣmākamanujñātaṃ dātumiti ślakṣnena vacasā saṃjñapyainaṃ preṣayati /
T06bsa034_u:2334: anyadvā tad dviguṇaṃ triguṇaṃ dānamānasatkāraṃ kṛtvānupreṣayati /
T06bsa034_u:2335: yenāsau jānīte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo lobhātmakatayā 'smākaṃ na dātukāmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2336: api tu nūnamasvatantra evaṃ tasmin pustakadharmadāne yena na dadātīti /
T06bsa034_u:2338: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ sarvadānāni dharmāmiṣābhaya[dānā]ni praryāyato 'pi lakṣaṇato 'pi
T06bsa034_u:2341: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu maitryāśayo dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2346: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo dānavibandhanamapi dānavibandhapratipakṣamapi yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
T06bsa034_u:2350: agre manorame ca vastuni gṛddhiḥ āyatyāñca bhogasampatti phaladarśanābhinandanatā /
T06bsa034_u:2351: yataśca bodhisattvasya deyadharmeṣu saṃvidyamāneṣu yācanake ca samyagupasthite dāne cittaṃ na krāmati /
T06bsa034_u:2352: so 'nabhyāsakṛto me 'yaṃ doṣa iti laghu ladhveva prajñayā pratisidhyati /
T06bsa034_u:2354: nūnaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ dānaṃ na dattaṃ yena me etarhi samyak saṃvidyamāneṣu bhogeṣu samyak pratyupasthite ca yācanake dāne cittaṃ na krāmati /
T06bsa034_u:2355: sa cedetarhina pratisaṃkhyāya dāsyāmi punarapi me āyatyāṃ dānavidveṣo bhaviṣyati /
T06bsa034_u:2356: sa eva pratibidhya dānapratibandhapratipakṣa niśṛtya pratisaṃkhyāya dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2358: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvasya sa cedyad yācanake samyak pratyupasthite parīttabhogatayā dāne cittaṃ na krāmati sa ta vighātakṛta dānavipratibandhahetuṃ laghu-laghveva prajñayā pratividhya tadvighātakṛtaṃ duḥkhamadhivāsayan pratisaṃkhyāya kāruṇyāddānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2360: pūrvakarmadoṣeṇa vā paravineyatayā vā mayā bahūni pragāḍhāni kṣut pipāsādikāni duḥkhānyanubhūtāni bhave vinā parānugraham /
T06bsa034_u:2361: yadi ca me maraṇāya kālakriyāyai savarteta etaddānakṛta parānugrahahetuka dṛṣṭe dharme duḥkha tathāpi me dānameva śreyo na tu yācanakanirākaraṇam /
T06bsa034_u:2362: prāgeva yaḥ kaścidyena kenacicchākapatreṇa jīvati ityevaṃ bodhisattvastadvighātakṛtaṃ dukhamadhivāsya dāna dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2363: panarapara bodhisattvasya samyag yācake pratyupasthite sa cedadhimātramanāpatvādagryatvāddeyavastuno dāne citta na krāmati ta bodhisattvo gardhakṛt doṣa laghu-laghveva pratijñayā pratividhya duḥkhe me eṣa sukhasaṃjñāviparyāsaḥ āyatyāṃ duḥkhajanaka iti
T06bsa034_u:2364: viparyāsaparijñānāttañca prahāya prati saṃkhyāya tadvastu dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2365: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvasya sa ceddānaṃ dattvā dānaphale (Dutt 91)
T06bsa034_u:2366: mahābhogatāyāmanuśaṃsadarśanamutpadyate nānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau taṃ bodhisattvo mithyāphaladṛṣṭikṛtaṃ doṣaṃ laghu-laghveva prajñayā pratividhya sarvasaṃskārāṇāmasāratāṃ yathābhūtaṃ pratyavekṣate sarvasaṃskārāḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgurāḥ phalopabhogaparikṣayabhaṅgurā viprayogabhaṅgurāśca /
T06bsa034_u:2367: sa evaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ phaladarśanaṃ prahāya yatkiñciddānaṃ dadāti sarvaṃ tanmahābodhi-pariṇāmitameva dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2368: tadidaṃ bodhisattvasya caturvidhasya dānavibandhasya caturvidhaṃ dānaprativandhapratipakṣajñānaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2370: tatra trividhena bodhisattvaḥ pratipakṣajñānena pūrvakeṇa niyataṃ samyak ca dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2371: ekena paścimena pratipakṣajñānena samyak puṇyaphalaparigrahaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:2373: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ adhyātmyaṃ rahogataḥ śuddhenāśayena ghanarasena prasādena saṃkalpairvicitrānudārānaprameyān deyadharmānadhimucya sattveṣu dānāya pratipāditāyābhilaṣati yena bodhisattvaḥ alpakṛcchreṇāprameyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasūyate /
T06bsa034_u:2376: evaṃ samāsataḥ saṃvidyamāneṣvasaṃvimādeṣu cāmiṣadānasaṃgṛhīteṣu deyadharmeṣu tathā dharmadānamupādāya pratisaṃvidamupādāyādhyāśayadānamupādāya dānavipratibandhapratipakṣajñānamupādāyāśayādhimuktidānañcopādāya bodhisattvasyaivāveṇikaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2378: ata ūrdhvamasmādeva sarvadānaprabhedāttadanyaḥ sarvo duṣkarādidānaprabhedo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2380: yadbodhisattvaḥ parīttaṃ deyavastu saṃvidyamānamātmānaṃ bādhitvā duḥkhamadhivāsya pareṣāmanuprayacchati
T06bsa034_u:2382: yadbodhisattvaḥ iṣṭañca vastu prakṛtisnehādvā dīrghakāla saṃstavādvā
T06bsa034_u:2389: yadbodhisattvaḥ svakaṃ vā paraṃ vā samādāpya deyavastu svabhṛtyeṣu vā mātāpitṛputradāradāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyamitrāmātyajñātisālohiteṣvanuprayacchati pareṣu vā 'rthiṣu /
T06bsa034_u:2393: yadbodhisattvaḥ śraddhayā dānaṃ dadāti satkṛtya svahastena kālena parānanupahatya idaṃ bodhisattvasya satpuruṣasya satpuruṣadānamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:2408: iha bodhisattvo bhojanena pānena vighātiṣvarthikeṣu bhojanapānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2409: yānārthikeṣu yānaṃ vastrārthikeṣu vastramalaṅkārārthikeṣu alaṃkāraṃ vicitrabhāṇḍopaskārārthikeṣu vicitrabhāṇḍopaskāraṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2415: āmiṣadānaṃ dharmadānamabhayadānañca samāsataḥ ihāmutrasukhaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dānaṃ veditavyam
T06bsa034_u:2422: tadetatsarvamabhisamasya navākāraṃ bodhisattvasya dānaṃ sattvānābhihāmutrasukhaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2428: iha bodhisattvo yācanake samyak pratyupasthite tvaritamavilambitaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2429: na yācanakasya tathā lābhamāramya tvarā bhavati yathā bodhisattvasya dānamārabhya /
T06bsa034_u:2431: na hi bodhisattvo dṛṣṭyā evaṃ dānaṃ parāmṛśati
T06bsa034_u:2436: na khalu bodhisattvaḥ saṃbhṛtya dīrghakālikaṃ deyadharmasannicarya kṛtvā paścāt sakṛddānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2438: na hi bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyamāneṣu deyadharmeṣu samyak pratyupasthitasya yācanakasya nirākaraṇamutsahate nāpi pratirūpaṃ paśyati yena tannirākaroti /
T06bsa034_u:2440: na ca saṃbhṛtadānena bodhisattvaḥ puṇyasyāyadvāramadhikaṃ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:2441: samaṃ deyavastu tulyeṣu vyastasamasteṣu yācanakeṣu krameṇa vā sakṛdvā dīyamānaṃ kena kāraṇena puṇyaviśeṣatāṃ parigṛhṇīyāditi sampaśyannapi ca bodhisattvaḥ sāvadyameva saṃbhṛtadānaṃ paśyati niravadyaṃ paśyati yathotpannaṃ bhogadānam /
T06bsa034_u:2444: teṣāmāghātamakṣamapratyayaṃ janayitvā paścādanarthito 'pi tadekatyānāṃ saṃbhṛtadānaṃ dadāti
T06bsa034_u:2450: na ca dānaṃ dattvā tena dānena manyate ahamasmi dātā dānapatiranye ca na tatheti /
T06bsa034_u:2452: na hi bodhisattvaḥ kīrtiśabdaghoṣaślokaṃ niśritya dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2455: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvameva dānāt sumanā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2458: vipulāni ca paramodārāṇi bodhisattvānāṃ dānāni śrutvā nātmānaṃ paribhavan saṃkocamāpadyate
T06bsa034_u:2460: vicintya vicintya bodhisattvo yatnena deyadharmebhyo yānyagrāṇi pravarāṇi bhojanapānayānavastrādīni tānyanuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2462: samacitto bodhisattvaḥ apakṣapatito mitrāmitrodāsīneṣu samakāruṇyo dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2464: kāruṇyacitto 'nukampācitto bodhisattvo dānaṃ dadanna parataḥ pratyupakāraṃ pratyāśaṃsate /
T06bsa034_u:2465: sukhakāmāṃ tṛṣṇādāhena dahyamānāmapratibalāṃ prakṛtiduḥkhitāṃ janatāṃ saṃpaśyan /
T06bsa034_u:2467: na bodhisattvo dānaṃ dattvā dānasyāyatyāṃ bhogasampadaṃ vā ātmabhāvasampadaṃ vā phalavipākaṃ pratyāśaṃsate /
T06bsa034_u:2470: evaṃ hi bodhisattva etannavākāraṃ dānaṃ niśritya dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayitvā 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate
T06bsa034_u:2481: svabhāva śīlaṃ sarvaśīlaṃ duṣkaraśīlaṃ sarvatomukhaṃ śīlaṃ satpuruṣaśīlaṃ sarvākāraśīlaṃ vighātārthikaśīlaṃ ihāmutrasukhaṃ śīlaṃ viśuddhaśīlañca /
T06bsa034_u:2485: parataḥ samyaksamādānataḥ suviśuddhāśayatayā vyatikrāntaiḥ pratyāpattyā 'vyatikramāya cādarajātasyopasthitasmṛtitayā
T06bsa034_u:2486: tatra parataḥ śīlasamādānādbodhisattvasya paramupanidhāya śikṣāvyatikrame vyapatrāpyamutpadyate
T06bsa034_u:2494: tatra yacca parataḥ samādānaṃ yaśca viśuddho 'dhyāśayaḥ itīmau dvau dhamauṃ yā ca vyatikramapratyāpattiryaścādaraḥ avyatikrame 'nayordvayordharmayorāvāhakau /
T06bsa034_u:2495: tatra yacca parataḥ samādānaṃ yaśca suviśuddho 'dhyāśayaḥ yaścāvyatikramāyādarajāta ityebhistribhirdharmairavipattirbodhisattvaśīlasya veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:2498: kalyāṇaṃ veditavyamātmahitāya parahitāya bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai cārthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ samādānato
T06bsa034_u:2504: samāsato bodhisattvasya gṛhipakṣagataṃ pravrajitapakṣagatañca śīlaṃ sarvaśīlamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:2510: tatra kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlaṃ yatkiñcidbodhisattvaḥ śīlasaṃvarasamādānādūrdhvaṃ mahābodhāya kuśalamācinoti kāyena vācā manasā sarvaṃ tatsamāsataḥ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlamityucyate tatpunaḥ katamat /
T06bsa034_u:2511: iha bodhisattvaḥ śīlaṃ niśritya śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya śrute yogaṃ karoti cintāyāṃ śamathavipaśyanābhāvanāyāmekārāmatāyām
T06bsa034_u:2513: gurūṇāmabhivādana-vandana pratyutthānāñjalikarmaṇaḥ kālena kālaṃ kartā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2514: tathā kālena kālaṃ teṣāmeva gurūṇāṃ gauraveṇopasthānasya kartā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2515: glānānāṃ satkṛtya kāruṇyena glānopasthānasya kartā bhavati tathā subhāṣite sādhukārasya dātā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2517: tathā sarvasattvānāṃ daśasu dikṣu sarvapuṇyasyāśayena prasannacittamutpādya vācaṃ bhāṣāmāṇo
T06bsa034_u:2519: tathā sarvaṃ vyatikramaṃ pratisaṃkhyāya pareṣāṃ kṣamitā bhavati
T06bsa034_u:2520: / tathā sarvaṃ kāyena vācā manasā kṛtaṃ kuśalamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2521: kālena ca kālaṃ vicitrāṇāṃ samyak praṇidhānānāṃ triratnapūjāyāśca sarvākārāyā udārāyāḥ kartā (Dutt 97) bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2525: indriyaiśca guptadvāro bhojane mātrajñaḥ pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikānuyuktaḥ satpuruṣasevī kalyāṇamitrasanniśritaḥ ātmaskhalitānāñca parijñātā bhavati doṣadarśī /
T06bsa034_u:2526: parijñāya ca doṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā pratisaṃhartā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2529: evaṃbhāgīyānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmarjanarakṣaṇavivardhanāya yacchīlaṃ [tad] bodhisattvasya kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:2542: ālapanasaṃlapanapratisammodanaiḥ kālenopasaṃkramaṇatayā parato bhojanapānādi [prati]grahato laukikārthānuvyavahārataḥ āhūtasyāgamanagamanataḥ samāsataḥ
T06bsa034_u:2546: snigdhena hitādhyāśayānugatenāntargatamānasena nigrahakriyā avasādanā vā daṇḍakarmānupradānaṃ va pravāsanā vā yāvadevākuśalāsthānāt vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne sanniyojanārtham /
T06bsa034_u:2547: ṛddhibalena ca narakādigatipratyakṣaṃ sandarśanatayā 'kuśalādudvejanā buddhaśāsanāvatārāya cāvarjanā toṣaṇā
T06bsa034_u:2549: kathañca bodhisattvaḥ saṃvaraśīle sthitaḥ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhake śīle sthitaḥ sattvārthakriyāśīle ca sthitaḥ susaṃvṛtaśīlī ca bhavati susaṃgṛhītakuśalaśīlī ca (Dutt 98) sarvākārasattvārthakriyāśīlī ca /
T06bsa034_u:2550: iha bodhisattvaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaravyavasthitaḥ sa ceccakravartirājyamapyutsṛjya pravrajito bhavati sa tasmiṃścakravartirājye evaṃ nirapekṣo bhavati tadyathā tṛṇe vā 'medhye vā /
T06bsa034_u:2551: nihīnapuruṣasya jīvikābhiprāyasya pravrajitasya pratyavarān kāmānapahāya na tathā teṣu pratyavareṣu kāmeṣu nirapekṣatā bhavati yathā bodhisattvasyāśayaviśuddhatāmupādāya pravrajitasya sarvamānuṣyakakāmapravareṣu cakravartikāmeṣu /
T06bsa034_u:2552: anāgateṣvapi mārabhavanaparyāpanneṣvapi kāmeṣu bodhisattvo nābhinandī bhavati nāpi ca teṣāmarthāya praṇidhāya brahmacaryaṃ carati mahāvicitrapratibhayagahanapraveśamiva tān kāmān yathābhūtaṃ saṃpaśyan prāgeva tadanyeṣu divyeṣu /
T06bsa034_u:2553: vartamāne 'pyadhvani pravrajito bodhisattva udārebhyaḥ sattvebhya udāramapi lābhasatkāraṃ vāntāśanamiva samyak
T06bsa034_u:2556: pravivekābhirataśca bhavati ekākī saṃvamadhye vā sarvakālaṃ cittavyapakṛṣṭavihārī /
T06bsa034_u:2558: api tu śīlaṃ niśritya śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya ye te 'prameyā
T06bsa034_u:2562: pramuṣitayā ca smṛtyā tatsamudācārahetoḥ kālena kālaṃ tīvraṃ vipratisāramādīnavadarśanamutpādayati
T06bsa034_u:2568: sarvabodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni cāsya mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ śrutvā udārāṇyaprameyāṇyacintyāni dīrghakālikāni paramaduśkarāṇi na bhavati cetasa uttāso vā layaḥ saṃkoco vā nānyatrāsyaivaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2571: vayamapi manuṣyabhūtāḥ krameṇa ca śikṣamāṇāḥ asaṃśayamanuprāpsyāmastāṃ kāyavāksaṃvarasampattimiti
T06bsa034_u:2572: ātmadoṣāntaraskhalitagaveṣī ca bodhisattvo bhavati śīlasaṃvare vyavasthito na paradoṣāntaraskhalitagaveṣī
T06bsa034_u:2573: sarvaraudraduḥśīlānāñca (Dutt 99) sattvānāmantike nāghātacitto bhavati na pratighacittaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2574: dharmamahākaruṇatāmupādāyādhimātrameva teṣāmantike bodhisattvānāmanukampācittañca kartukāmatācittañca pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati
T06bsa034_u:2577: kutaḥ punaḥ pāpikāṃ vācaṃ niścārayiṣyati pratihaniṣyati vā prāgeva punaḥ ākrośaroṣaṇaparibhāṣaṇaistanukaduḥkhasparśajairapakāraiḥ
T06bsa034_u:2578: saṃvaraśīlavyavasthitaśca bodhisattvaḥ pañcāṅgaparigṛhītenāpramādena samanvāgato bhavati pūrvāntasahagatenāparāntasahagatena madhyāntasahagatena pūrvakālakaraṇīyena sahānucareṇa ca /
T06bsa034_u:2579: bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaḥ atītamadhvānamupādāya yāmāpattimāpannaḥ sā 'nena yathādharmaṃ pratikṛtā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2586: kaccidahaṃ tathā tathā careyaṃ yathā yathā caran yathā yathā viharan āpattiṃ nāpadyeyam /
T06bsa034_u:2588: sa pūrvakālakaraṇīyamevāpramādaṃ niśritya tathā tathā carati tathā tathā viharati yathā yathāsya carato viharato vā āpattirnottiṣṭhate /
T06bsa034_u:2590: saṃvaraśīla-vyavasthito bodhisattvaḥ praticchannakalyāṇo bhavati vivṛtapāpaḥ alpecchaḥ santuṣṭaḥ
T06bsa034_u:2592: ebhirdaśabhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ saṃvaraśīlavyavasthitaḥ susaṃvṛtaśīlī bhavati
T06bsa034_u:2594: pratyutpa-nneṣvanadhyavasānatayā pravivekavāsābhiratyā vāgvitarkapariśodhanatayā ātmano 'paribhavanatayā sauratyena kṣāntyā 'pramādena ācārājīvaviśuddhyā ceti /
T06bsa034_u:2595: punarbodhisattvaḥ kuśala[dharma]saṃgrāhakaśīle vyavasthitaḥ uttpannāṃ kāyabhogāpekṣāṃ svalpāmapi nādhivāsayati prāgeva prabhūtām /
T06bsa034_u:2602: kuśalahetuṃ kuśalahetuphale viparyāsamaviparyāsañca kuśalasaṃgrahāya cāntarāyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:2604: kuśalasaṃgrahāya viparyāsañcāviparyāsañca yathābhūtaṃ prajānan bodhisattvaḥ prāpya kuśalaphalaṃ nānitye nityadarśī bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2609: tasyaibhirdaśabhirākāraiḥ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaśīlavyavasthitasya kṣiprameva kuśalasaṃgraho bhavati sarvākāra[saṃgraha]śca yaduta dānopaniṣadāśīlopaniṣadā kṣāntyupaniṣadā
T06bsa034_u:2613: iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ teṣu teṣu kṛtyeṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchan kṛtyacintāyāṃ kṛtyasamarthane sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati adhvagamanāgamane samyakkarmāntaprayoge bhogānāmārakṣaṇe vibhinnānyo 'nyapratisandhāne
T06bsa034_u:2615: punarbodhisattvaḥ sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchan vyādhitān sattvān paricarati /
T06bsa034_u:2618: vyaṅgān śirasā vā yānena vā vahati /
T06bsa034_u:2622: yathākāmavitarkam evaṃ vyāpādahiṃsājñātijanapadāpara vitarkāvamanyanāpratisaṃyuktaḥ kulodaya pratisaṃyuktaśca vitarko veditavyaḥ pariparibhavaparājayaduḥkhena duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāṃ paraparibhavaparājayaduḥkhaṃ (Dutt 101) prativinodayati /
T06bsa034_u:2624: punarbodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ nyāyaṃ vyapadiśan duścaritacāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ duścaritaprahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayati yuktaiḥ padavyañjanaiḥ sahitairānulomikairānucchavikairaupayikaiḥ pratirūpaiḥ pradakṣiṇaiḥ nipakasyāṅgasaṃbhāraiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2625: upāyakauśalyaṃ vā punarvyapadiśati yathā duścaritacāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ duścaritaprahāṇāya evaṃ
T06bsa034_u:2626: [sattvānāṃ] mātsaryaprahāṇāya dṛṣṭe vā dharme samyagalpakṛcchreṇa bhogānāmarjanāya rakṣaṇāya ca śāsane 'smin pratihatānāṃ śraddhāpratilambhāya darśanapratilambhāya /
T06bsa034_u:2628: 'pāyasamatikramāya sarvasaṃyojanaparyādānāt sarvaduḥkhasamatikramāya punarbodhisattva upakāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtajñatāṃ prāviṣkurvan dṛṣṭvā
T06bsa034_u:2631: tulyādhikena cāsya pratilābhasatkāreṇa pratyupasthito bhavati na nyūnena /
T06bsa034_u:2632: sa kṛtyeṣvasyāyācito 'pi sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati prāgeva yācitaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2633: yathā kṛtyeṣu evaṃ duḥkheṣu nayopadeśe bhayaparitrāṇe vyasanasthaśokaprativinodane upakaraṇopasaṃhāre sanniśrayadāne cittānuvartane bhūtairguṇaiḥ saṃpraharṣaṇe snigdhena cāntarbhāvena vinigrahe ṛddhyā cottāsanāvarjaneneti /
T06bsa034_u:2636: kṣudramṛgabhayādapi sattvān rakṣati āvartagrāhabhayādapi rājabhayādapi corabhayādapi pratyarthikabhayādapi svāmyadhipatibhayādapi anājīvikabhayādapyaślokabhayātpariṣacchāradyabhayādapi amanuṣyavetāḍabhayādapi punarbodhisattvo vyasanasthānāṃ sattvānāṃ śokaprativinodanaṃ jñātivyasanamārabhya mātāpitṛmaraṇe 'pi śokaṃ
T06bsa034_u:2641: bhoga vyasanaṃ vā punarārabhya sa cedbhogā rājñā vā pareṣāmapahṛtā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:2645: agninā vā dagdhā udakena vā apahṛtāḥ kunihitā vā nidhayaḥ pranaṣṭā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:2650: yena te bhogā anayena vyasanamāpāditā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:2651: tannidānamapi śokamutpannaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātraṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvaḥ samyak prativinodayati
T06bsa034_u:2652: punarupakaraṇārthinām upakaraṇopasaṃhāraṃ kurvan bodhisattvo bhojanaṃ bhojanārthibhyo dadāti
T06bsa034_u:2661: punaḥ parigrahaśīlena bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ gaṇaparikarṣaṇayogena parigrahaṃ kurvan pūrvantāvat niśrayaṃ dadāti nirāmiṣeṇa cittenānukampācittenānukampācittameva [saṃ]puraṣkṛtya /
T06bsa034_u:2663: dhārmikaiśca dharmalabdhaiḥ svaiścīvarapiṇḍapātaśayānāsanaglāna pratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sādhāraṇaparibhogī ca bhavatyapratiguptabhojī
T06bsa034_u:2668: punarbodhisattvaścittānuvartanaśīlena sattvānāṃ cittamanuvartamānaḥ ādita evaṃ sattvānāṃ bhāvaṃ ca jānāti prakṛtiñca /
T06bsa034_u:2669: bhāvañca jñātvā prakṛtiñca yathā yaiḥ sattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvastavyaṃ bhavati tathā [taiḥ] saṃvasati
T06bsa034_u:2670: yathā yeṣu sattveṣu pratipattavyaṃ bhavati tathā teṣu pratipadyate /
T06bsa034_u:2671: yasya ca sattvasya bodhisattvaścittamanuvartitukāmo bhavati tasya ca cetpaśyatyevaṃrūpeṇāsya vastusamudācāreṇa kāyikavācikena duḥkhadaurmasyamutpatsyete /
T06bsa034_u:2672: taccaduḥkhadaurmanasyamasya nākuśalāt sthānād vyutthānāya kuśale ca sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya saṃvartiṣyate /
T06bsa034_u:2673: pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvastaṃ kāyikavācikaṃ vastasamudācāraṃ yatnataḥ pariharati na samudācarati
T06bsa034_u:2676: pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvaḥ paracittaṃ yaduta parānukampāmevopādāya yena ca pareṣāṃ vastusamudācāreṇa kāyikavācikenānyeṣāmutpadyate duḥkhadaurmanasyam tacca pareṣāṃ tadanyeṣāmakuśalāt sthānād vyutthānāya kuśale sthāne
T06bsa034_u:2679: sa cetpunaḥ paśyati pareṣāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ vā tadubhayorvā akuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya pratisaṃkhyāya samudācarati bodhisattvastaṃ kāyavāksamudācāram /
T06bsa034_u:2681: yena ca bodhisattva ātmano vastusamudācāreṇa kāyikavācikena pareṣāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyamutpadyamānaṃ samanupaśyati sa ca kāyavāksamudācāro na śikṣāpadaparigṛhīto bhavati na puṇyajñānasambhārānugataḥ tacca duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pareṣāṃ nākuśalāt sthānāditi pūrvavadveditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2684: yathā duḥkhadaurmanasyamevaṃ sukhasaumanasyaṃ yathāyogaṃ vistareṇa veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2685: na ca paracittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ parasya krodhaparyavasthānena paryavasthitasya sammukhamavigate krodhaparyavasthāne varṇamapi bhāṣate prāgevāvarṇam /
T06bsa034_u:2687: punaḥ paracittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ paramanālapantamapyālapati [prati]sammodayati prāgevālapantaṃ pratisammodayantam /
T06bsa034_u:2691: na ca paricittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ paramavahasati nāvaspaṇḍayati na maḍkubhāvamasyopasaṃharati nāpyasparśavihārāya kaukṛtyamupasaṃharati /
T06bsa034_u:2694: na ca paracittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāmasevī bhavati nāpyatisevī nāpyakālasevī nāpi teṣāṃ purastātpriyavigarhako bhavati nāpyapriyapraśaṃsakaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2700: (Dutt 104) punarbodhisattvo bhūtaguṇasaṃharṣaṇaśīlena sattvān saṃpraharṣayan śraddhāguṇasampannān śraddhāguṇasaṃkathayā saṃpraharṣayati śīlaguṇasampannān śīlaguṇasaṃkathayā śrutaguṇasaṃpannān śrutaguṇasaṅkathayā
T06bsa034_u:2702: punarbodhisattvaḥ nigrahaśīlena sattvānnigṛhṇan mṛdvaparādhaṃ mṛduvyatikramaṃ snigdhenāntarbhāvenāvipannena mṛdvyā 'vasādanikayā avasādayati /
T06bsa034_u:2706: mṛdumadhyāparādhaṃ mṛdumadhyavyatikramaṃ bodhisattvastāvatkālikayogena punarādānāya pravāsayati teṣāmeva cānyeṣāñca samanuśāsanārthamanukampācittatayā adhimātrāparādhaṃ [adhimātravyatikramaṃ] punarasaṃvāsāyāsaṃbhogāya yāvajjīvenāpyapunaḥpratigrahaṇāya pravāsayati teṣāmeva cānukampayā mā te bahutaramasmin śāsane 'puṇyaparigrahaṃ kariṣyantīti /
T06bsa034_u:2708: punarbodhisattvaḥ ṛddhibalena sattvānuttrāsāyitukāmaḥ āvarjayitukāmo vā duścaritacāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ duścaritavipākaphalamapāyānnarakānmahānarakān śītalanarakān pratyekanarakānupanīyopanīya darśayati /
T06bsa034_u:2712: te ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā uttrasyanti saṃvegamāpadyante duścaritātprativiramanti /
T06bsa034_u:2713: tadekatyāṃśca sattvān bodhisattvasya mahatyāṃ pariṣadi sannisannasya praśnasaṃpādenānādeyaṃ vacanaṃ kartukāmān bodhisattvo vajrapāṇiṃ vā 'nyatamaṃ vā udāravarṇamahākāyaṃ [mahābalaṃ] yakṣamabhinirmimīya bhīṣayatyuttrāsayati /
T06bsa034_u:2715: tasya ca mahājanakāyasya tena praśnavyākaraṇena vinayanārtham /
T06bsa034_u:2716: vicitreṇa vā punaḥ ṛdvyabhisaṃskāreṇa tadyathā eko bhūtvā bahudhā bhavan bahudhā bhūtvā eko bhavan tiraḥ kuḍayaṃ tiraḥ śailaṃ tiraḥ prākāramasajjamānena kāyena gacchanvistareṇa yāvadbrahmalokaṃ kāyena vaśe vartayan yamakānyapi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayastejodhātumapi samāpadyamānaḥ śrāvakāsādhāraṇaṃ vā punarṛddhimupadarśayannāvarjayan toṣayitvā saṃpraharṣya aśraddhaṃ (Dutt
T06bsa034_u:2718: duḥśīlaṃ śīlasaṃpadi alpaśrutaṃ śrutasaṃpadi matsariṇaṃ tyāgasaṃpadi duṣprajñaṃ prajñāsaṃpadi niveśayati /
T06bsa034_u:2719: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvākāreṇa sattvārthakriyāśīlena samanvāgato bhavati
T06bsa034_u:2720: ta ete bhavanti trayo bodhisattvasya śīlaskandhāḥ aprameyāḥ puṇyaskandhāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2723: tatra bodhisattvenāsmin trividhe 'pi śīlaskandhe bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena gṛhiṇā vā pravrajitena vā 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtapraṇidhānena sahadhārmikasya bodhisattvasya kṛtapraṇidhānasya vijñasya
T06bsa034_u:2724: pratibalasya vāgvijñaptyarthagrahaṇāvabodhāya ityevaṃrūpasya bodhisattvasya pūrvaṃ pādayornipatyādhyeṣaṇāṃ kṛtvā yathā tavāhaṃ kulaputrāntikādbodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānamākāṃkṣāmyādātuṃ tadarhasyanuparodhena muhūrtamasmākamanukampayā dātuṃ śrotuñca /
T06bsa034_u:2725: ityevaṃ samyagadhyeṣyaikāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ daśamu dikṣu mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāñca mahājñānaprabhāvaprāptānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā guṇāṃśca teṣāṃmāmukhīkṛtya ghanarasaṃ prasādaṃ cetasaḥ sañjanayya parīttaṃ vā yasya [vā] yācati śaktirhetubalañca /
T06bsa034_u:2727: nīcairjānu-maṇḍalanipatitena vā utkuṭu[ka]sthitena vā tathāgatapratimāṃ purataḥ sthāpayitvā saṃpūraskṛtyaivaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2728: anuprayaccha me kulaputrāyuṣman bhadanteti vā bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānam /
T06bsa034_u:2729: ityuktvā ekāgrāṃ smṛtimupasthāpya cittapraśādamevānupabṛṃhayatā na cirasyedānīṃ me
T06bsa034_u:2732: tena punarvijñena bodhisattvena sa tathā pratipanno bodhisattvaḥ avikṣiptena cetasā sthitena vā niṣaṇṇena vā āsane idaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2733: śruṇu evaṃnāman kulaputra dharmabhrātariti vā bodhisattvo 'si bodhau ca kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2737: bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni sarvañca bodhisattvaśīlaṃ saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaśīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlañca /
T06bsa034_u:2740: yāni śikṣāpadāni yacchīlametarhi daśasu dikṣu pratyutpannānāṃ sarvabodhisattvānāṃ bhavati
T06bsa034_u:2745: evaṃ dvirapi trirapi tena ca vijñena bodhisattvena vaktavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2746: tena ca mamādāyakena bodhisattvena yāvat trirapi pratijñātavyaṃ pṛṣṭena /
T06bsa034_u:2747: evaṃ hi tena vijñena bodhisattvena tasya pratigrāhakasya bodhisattvasya yāvat trirapi bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādāna dattvā pratijñāñca pratigṛhyāvyutthita eva tasmin pratigrāhake bodhisattve tasyā eva tathāgatapratimāyāḥ purato daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ pādayornipatya sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā evamārocayitavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2748: pratigṛhītamanena evanāmnā bodhisattvena mama evaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikādyāvat trirapi bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānam /
T06bsa034_u:2750: sākṣibhūtamasyaitannāmno bodhisattvasya paramāryāṇāṃ viparokṣāṇāmapi sarvatra sarvasattvāviparokṣabuddhīnāṃ daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣvārocayāmyasmin bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādanam /
T06bsa034_u:2752: evañca punaḥ śīlasaṃvarasamādānakarmaparisamāptyanantaraṃ dharmatā khalveṣā yadvā daśasu dikṣvanantāparnyateṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatānāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāñca bodhisattvānāñca tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ tadrūpaṃ nimittaṃ pradurbhāvati /
T06bsa034_u:2758: yathā evaṃnānmā bodhisattvena amuṣmin lokadhātāvevaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikāt samyagbodhisattvaśīla saṃbarasamādānaṃ gṛhītamiti /
T06bsa034_u:2759: te cāsya sarve putrasyaiva bhrāturivakalyāṇairmanobhiḥ pratyanukampante /
T06bsa034_u:2760: evaṃ kalyāṇamanaḥpratyanukampitasya [tasya] bodhisattvasya (Dutt 107) bhūyasyā mātrayā vṛddhiḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ na hāniḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2762: parisamāptau ca tasmin bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānakarmaṇyubhābhyāṃ tābhyāṃ bodhisattvābhyāṃ daśasu dikṣu teṣāmanantāparyantalokadhātugatānāṃ buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā pādayornipatyotthātavyam idaṃ tasya bodhisattvasya śīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ sarvaśīla-saṃvarasamādānaprativiśiṣṭaṃ
T06bsa034_u:2764: yasya śīlasaṃvarasamādānasya sarvaprātimokṣasaṃvarasamādānāni śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopayanti sahasratamīmapi saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapyupamāmapyupaniṣadamapi nopayanti yaduta puṇyaparigrahamupādāya /
T06bsa034_u:2765: tena punarbodhisattvenaivaṃ bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānavyavasthitena svayaṃ cābhyuhyābhyuhyedaṃ bodhisattvasya pratirūpaṃ kartum idamapratirūpaṃ kartumiti tathaiva tata ūrdhvaṃ karmaṇā saṃpādayitavyaṃ śikṣā karaṇīyā /
T06bsa034_u:2766: bodhisattvasūtrapiṭakādvā yatnataḥ śrutvā 'smābodhisattvasūtrapiṭakamātṛkānibandhāt śrutvā tathaiva śikṣā karaṇīyā /
T06bsa034_u:2769: yastatprathamata etadevaṃvidhaṃ śīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ nādhimucyeta nāvatarennāvakalpayennalubdhasya na lobhābhibhūtasya mahecchasyāsantuṣṭasya na śīlavipannasya śikṣāsvanādarakāriṇaḥ śaithilikasya na krodhanasyopanāhinaḥ akṣāntibahulasya parato vyatikramāsahiṣṇoḥ nālasasya kusīdasya yadbhūyasā rātrindivaṃ nidrāsukhaṃ
T06bsa034_u:2773: na mandasya na momuhajātīyasyātyarthaṃ saṃlīnacittasya bodhisattvasūtrapiṭakaṃ bodhisattvapiṭakamātṛkāmapavadamānasya
T06bsa034_u:2774: na ca punaretat saṃvarasamādānavidhānaṃ bodhisattvenodgṛhya paryavāpyāpi bodhisattvapiṭaka pratihatānāmaśrāddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ sahasaivārocayitavya pravedayitavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2778: yaścainamapavadate sa yāvadapramāṇena puṇyaskandhena samanvāgataḥ saṃvarasthāyī bodhisattvo bhavati tāvadapramāṇenaiva so 'puṇyaskandhenānuṣakto bhavati yāvattāṃ pāpikāṃ vācaṃ pāpikāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ pāpakān sakalpān sarveṇa sarva notsṛjati /
T06bsa034_u:2780: bodhisattvasūtrapiṭakamātṛkāyāṃ yāni bodhisattvasya śikṣāpadānyāpattisthānāni cākhyātāni tānyanuśrāvayitavyāni
T06bsa034_u:2782: na parasamādāpanikayā nāpi paraspardhayā [sa]dhīro bodhisattvo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2783: tena ca pratigṛhītavyaṃ tasya ca dātavyametena vidhinā etacchīlasaṃvarasamādānam /
T06bsa034_u:2784: evañca śīlasaṃvaravyavasthitasya bodhisattvasya catvāraḥ pārājayikasthānīyadharmā bhavanti
T06bsa034_u:2787: satsu saṃvidyamāneṣu bhogeṣu lobhaprakṛtitvāt duḥkhiteṣu kṛpaṇeṣvanātheṣvapratiśaraṇeṣvasamyagayācakeṣu pratyupasthiteṣu nairvṛṇyādāmiṣāvisargaḥ dharmamātsaryāccārthināṃ samyakpratyupasthitānāṃ dharmāṇāmasaṃvibhāgakriyā bodhisattvasya pārājayikasthānīyo dharmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2788: yadapi bodhisattvastadrūpaṃ krodhaparyavasthānamanuvṛṃhayati yena tato na vākpāruṣyaniścāraṇamātrakeṇa nivartate /
T06bsa034_u:2789: krodhābhibhūtaḥ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā daṇḍena vā śastreṇa sattvāṃstāḍayati vihiṃsayati viheṭhayati
T06bsa034_u:2790: krodhāśayameva ca tīvramantarākṛtvā pareṣāmantikādvyatikramasajñapti na pratigṛhaṇāti na kṣamate nāśayaṃ vimuñcati /
T06bsa034_u:2793: svayaṃ vā saddharmapratirūpakādhimuktasya pareṣāṃ cā 'nuvṛttyā bodhisattvasya pārājayikasthānīyo dharmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2796: bhavati dṛṣṭe dharme vipulasya bodhisattvasaṃbhārasyopacayāya parigrahāya
T06bsa034_u:2797: / abhavyo bhavati ca dṛṣṭe (Dutt 109) dharme āśayaviśuddheḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2804: yataśca bodhisattvaḥ eṣāṃ caturṇāṃ pārājayikasthānīyānāṃ dharmāṇāmabhīkṣṇa-samudācārāt
T06bsa034_u:2810: / na tu bodhisattvaḥ sakṛdeva pārājayikasthānīyadharmasamudācārāt bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ vijahāti /
T06bsa034_u:2812: parityaktasamādāno 'pi ca bodhisattvo dṛṣṭe dharme bhavyaḥ punarādānāya
T06bsa034_u:2813: bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānasya bhavati nābhavya eva tadyathā pārājayikādhyāpannaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvarastho bhikṣuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2814: samāsataśca dvābhyāmeva kāraṇābhyāṃ bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānasya tyāgo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2816: na ca parivṛttajanmāpi bodhisattvaḥ bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ vijahāti /
T06bsa034_u:2817: adha urdhvaṃ tiryaksarvatropapadyamāno yena bodhisattvena praṇidhānaṃ na tyaktaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2818: nāpi ca pārājayikasthānīyānāṃ dharmāṇāmadhimātraṃ paryavasthānaṃ samudācaritaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2819: muṣitasmṛtistu parivṛttajanmā bodhisattvaḥ kalyāṇamitrasamparkamāgamya smṛtyudbodhanārthaṃ punaḥ punarādānaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:2823: evaṃ bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasthito bodhisattvaḥ pratidivasaṃ tathāgatasya vā tathāgatamuddiśya caitye dharmasya vā dharmamuddiśya pustakagate 'pi
T06bsa034_u:2824: bodhisattvasūtrapiṭake (Dutt 110) [bodhisattvasūtrapiṭaka]mātṛkāyāṃ vā saṃghasya vā yo 'sau daśasu dikṣu mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃghaḥ kiñcidevālpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā pūjādhikārikamakṛtvā 'ntata
T06bsa034_u:2825: ekapraṇāmamapi kāyena antato guṇānārabhya buddhadharmasaṃghānāmekacatuṣpadāyā api gāthāyāḥ pravyāhāraṃ vācā antata ekaprasādamapi buddhadharmasaṃghaguṇānusmaraṇapūrvakañcetasā rātriṃdivamatināmayati sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2830: tathāhi śuddhāśayo bodhisattvaḥ tadyathā avetyaprasādalābhī bhikṣarnityakālameva dharmatayā śāstāraṃ paricarati paramayā ca pūjayā pūjayati dharmasaṃghañca /
T06bsa034_u:2831: bodhisattvo mahecchatāmasantuṣṭiṃ lābhasatkāragardhamutpannamadhivāsayati sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:2832: anāpattistatprahāṇāya cchandajātasya vīryamārabhata statpratipakṣaparigraheṇa tatpratibandhāvasthitasya prakṛtyā tīvrakleśatayābhibhūya punaḥ punaḥ samudācārāṇāt /
T06bsa034_u:2833: bodhisattvo vṛddhatarakaṃ guṇavantaṃ satkārārhaṃ sahadhārmikaṃ dṛṣṭvā mānābhinigrahītaḥ āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto vā utthāyāsanaṃ nānuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2834: paraiścālapyamānaḥ pratisammodyamānaḥ paripṛṣṭaśca na yuktarūpeṇa vāk pratyudāhāreṇa pratyupatiṣṭhate mānābhinigṛhīta eva āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto vā sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate no cenmānābhinigṛhīto nāghātacittaḥ pratighacitto vā api tvālasyakausīdyādavyākṛtacitto vā smṛtisaṃpramoṣād [vā] sāpattika eva bhavati sātisāro no tu kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:2836: anāpattiḥ [suptaḥ] syādayañca prativibuddhasaṃjñī upaśliṣyed ālapet saṃlapet pratisammodayet paripṛcchet /
T06bsa034_u:2837: anāpattiḥ pareṣāṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ prayuktasya sāṃkathyaviniścaye vā /
T06bsa034_u:2839: anāpattiḥ pareṣāṃ dharmaṃ deśayatāmavahitaśrotrasya śṛṇvataḥ sāṃkathyaṃviniścayaṃ vā /
T06bsa034_u:2841: (Dutt 111) anāpattistenopāyena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ damayato vinayataḥ akuśalātsthānādvyutthāpya kuśale sthānepratiṣṭhāpayataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2843: bodhisattvaḥ parairupanimantryamāṇo gṛhe vā vihārāntare vā gṛhāntare vā bhojanapānavastrādibhiḥ pariṣkāraiḥ mānābhinigṛhītaḥ āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto vā na gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2859: bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāmantikājajātarūpajatamaṇimuktāvaidūryādikāni ca dhanajātāni vicitrāṇi prabhūtāni pravarāṇi labhamāno 'nudadhyamānaḥ
T06bsa034_u:2863: sāpattiko bhavati sātisāro no tu kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:2870: anāpattiḥ parāhṛtamanena saṃbhāvayataḥ yato nidānamasyotpadyeta vadho vā bandho vā daṇḍo vā jyā-nirgarhaṇā vā /
T06bsa034_u:2872: bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ dharmārthināmāghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ īrṣyāviprakṛto vā dharmaṃ nānuprayacchati
T06bsa034_u:2874: ālasyakausīdyānna dadāti sāpattiko bhavati sātisāro na kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:2877: anāpattistenopāyena damayitukāmaḥ syādvinetukāmaḥ akuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2880: anāpattirmṛdvindriyasyodārayā dharmadeśanayā dharmaparyāptyā uttrāsaṃ mithyādarśanaṃ mithyābhiniveśaṃ kṣatiñcopahatiñca saṃbhāvayet /
T06bsa034_u:2881: anāpattistaddhastagatasya parebhyaḥ abhājanabhūtebhyo visāraṃ dharmasya saṃbhāvayet /
T06bsa034_u:2882: bodhisattvo raudreṣu duḥśīleṣu ca sattveṣvāghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ upekṣate viceṣṭate vā raudratāṃ duḥśīlatāmeva ca pratyayaṃ kṛtvā /
T06bsa034_u:2885: sāpattiko bhavati sātisāro no tu kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:2887: na hi bodhisattvasya śīlavataḥ śānteḥ kāyavāṅmanaskarmapracāre tathānukampācittañca kartukāmatā ca pratyupasthitā bhavati yathā raudreṣu duḥśīleṣu sattveṣu duḥkhahetau vartamāneṣu /
T06bsa034_u:2893: vyavasthāpitaṃ paracittānurakṣāmupādāyāprasannānāṃ sattvānāṃ prasādāya prasannānāñca bhūyobhāvāya
T06bsa034_u:2894: tatra tulyāṃ śrāvakaiḥ śikṣāṃ karoti nirnirākaraṇam /
T06bsa034_u:2897: te tāvanna paraniranurakṣā aprasannānāṃ prasādāya prasannānāñca bhūyobhāvāya śikṣāsu śikṣante
T06bsa034_u:2900: yatpunaḥ pratikṣepaṇasāvadyamalpārthatāmalpakṛtyatāmalpotsukavihāratāmārabhya śrāvakāṇāṃ bhagavatā vyavasthāpitāṃ tatra bodhisattvo na tulyāṃ śikṣāṃ śrāvakaiḥ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:2902: śobhate śrāvakaḥ svārthaparamaḥ parārthanirapekṣaḥ parārthamārabhyālpārthaḥ alpakṛtyaścālpotsukavihārī
T06bsa034_u:2903: / na tu bodhisattvaḥ parārthaparamaḥ śobhate parārthamārabhyālpārtho
T06bsa034_u:2904: 'lpakṛtyaścālpotsukavihārī ca tathāhi bodhisattvena pareṣāmarthe cīvaraśatāni sahastrāṇyajñātikānāṃ
T06bsa034_u:2906: teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ balābalaṃ saṃlakṣya yāvadartha pratigṛhītavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:2913: bodhisattvo bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasthaḥ sattvārthamārabhya āghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ alpārtho bhavati alpakṛtyaḥ alpotsukavihārī /
T06bsa034_u:2917: asti kiñcitprakṛtisāvadyamapi [yad] bodhisattvastadrūpeṇopāyakauśalyena samudācarati yenānāpattikaśca bhavati bahu ca puṇyaṃ prasūyate /
T06bsa034_u:2918: yathāpi tadbodhisattvaścauraṃ taskaraṃ prabhūtānāṃ prāṇiśatānāṃ mahātmanāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ vadhāyodyatamāmiṣakiñcitkahetoḥ prabhūtānantaryakarmakriyāprayuktaṃ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:2920: yadyapyahamenaṃ prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopya narakeṣūpapadyeyaṃ kāmaṃ bhavatu me narakopapattiḥ
T06bsa034_u:2921: eṣa ca sattva ānantaryakarma kṛtvā mā bhūnnarakaparāyaṇa iti /
T06bsa034_u:2922: evamāśayo bodhisattvastaṃ prāṇinaṃ kuśalacitto 'vyākṛtacitto vā viditvā ṛtīyamānaḥ (Dutt 114)
T06bsa034_u:2924: anāpattiko bhavati bahu ca puṇyaṃ prasūyate /
T06bsa034_u:2925: yathāpi tad bodhisattvo ye sattvā rājāno vā bhavanti rājamahāmātrā vā adhimātraraudrāḥ sattveṣu nirdayā ekāntaparapīḍāpravṛttāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2926: tāṃ satyāṃ śaktau tasmādrājyaiśvaryādhipatyāccyāvayati yatra sthitāste tannidānaṃ bahvapuṇyaṃ prasavanti anukampācitto hitasukhāśayaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2927: ye ca paradravyāpahāriṇaścaurāstaskarāḥ sāṃdhikaṃ staupikañca prabhūtaṃ dravyaṃ hṛtvā svīkṛtyopabhoktukāmāsteṣāmantikāttad dravyaṃ bodhisattva ācchinatti /
T06bsa034_u:2928: mā haiva teṣāṃ sa dravyaparibhogo dīrgharātramanarthāyāhitāya bhaviṣyati iti /
T06bsa034_u:2929: evameva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā ācchidya sādhikaṃ saṃdhe niryātayati staipikaṃ stūpe /
T06bsa034_u:2930: ye ca vaiyāvṛtyakarā vā ārāmikā vā sāṃdhikaṃ staupikañca prabhūtaṃ dravyaṃ vipratipādayantyanayena
T06bsa034_u:2933: tān bodhisattvaḥ pratisaṃkhyāya mā haiva tatkarma /
T06bsa034_u:2938: yathāpi tadgṛhī bodhisattvaḥ abrahmacaryeṣaṇārtaṃ tatpratibaddhacittamaparaparigṛhītaṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ maithunena dharmeṇa niṣevate /
T06bsa034_u:2944: pravrajitasya punarbodhisattvasya śrāvakaśāsanabhedamanurakṣamāṇasya sarvathā na kalpate 'brahmacaryaniṣevaṇam
T06bsa034_u:2945: yathāpi tad bodhisattvo bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ jīvita-vipramokṣārthaṃ
T06bsa034_u:2947: hastapādanāsākarṇaccheda-cakṣurvikalībhāva-paritrāṇārthaṃ yāṃ bodhisattva (Dutt 115) svajīvitahetorapi samprajānan mṛṣāvācaṃ na bhāṣeta /
T06bsa034_u:2949: iti samāsato yena yena bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāmarthameva paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:2952: kevala-sattvahitakāmatānidānaṃ ca vinidhāya saṃjñāṃ samprajānan anyathā-vācaṃ bhāṣate /
T06bsa034_u:2955: yathāpi tad bodhisattvo ye sattvā akalyāṇamitra parigṛhītā bhavanti teṣāṃ tebhyaḥ akalyāṇamitrebhyo yathāśakti yathābalaṃ byagrakaraṇīṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate /
T06bsa034_u:2957: anukampācittamevopādāya mā bhūdeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ pāpamitrasaṃsargo dīrgharātramanarthāyāhitāyeti
T06bsa034_u:2958: anena paryāyeṇa mitrabhedamapi kurvan bodhisattvo 'nāpattiko bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2960: yathāpi tad bodhisattvaḥ utpathacāriṇo 'nyāyacāriṇaḥ sattvān paruṣayā vācā
T06bsa034_u:2961: tīkṣṇayāvasādayati yāvadeva tenopāyenākuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanārtham
T06bsa034_u:2964: yathāpi tad bodhisattvo nṛttagītavāditādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ rājacaurānnapāna-veśyā-vīthī-kathādyadhimuktānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ nṛttagītavāditena vicitrābhiśca sambhinnapralāpa-pratisaṃyuktābhiḥ
T06bsa034_u:2965: saṃkathābhiranukampāśayena toṣayitvāvarjya vaśyatāṃ vidheyatāṃ copanīyākuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya kṛśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpayati /
T06bsa034_u:2968: bodhisattvaḥ utpannāṃ kuhanāṃ lapanāṃ naimittikatāṃ naiṣpeṣikatāṃ lābhena lābhaṃ niścikīrṣutāṃ mithyājīvakarāṃ dharmānadhivāsayati /
T06bsa034_u:2972: anāpattistatprativinodanāya cchandajātasya yatnamārabhamāṇasya kleśapracuratayā cittamabhibhūya samudācaraṇāt /
T06bsa034_u:2973: bodhisattvaḥ auddhatyābhinigṛhītena cetasā 'vyupaśāntaḥ avyayupaśamārāmaḥ uccaiḥ saṃñcagdhati saṃkrīḍate saṃkilikilāyate auddhatyaṃ dravaṃ prāviṣkaroti (Dutt 116) pareṣāṃ hāsayitukāmo ramayitukāmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2974: evameva ca pratyayaṃ kṛtvā sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate smṛtisaṃpramoṣādakliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate
T06bsa034_u:2978: anāpattiḥ pareṣāṃ tatprakṛtikānāṃtadārāmāṇāṃ saṃgrahāya vā praṇayānusaṃrakṣaṇāya vā tadanuvartanārtham
T06bsa034_u:2980: [yaḥ] punarbodhisattva evaṃdṛṣṭiḥ syādevaṃvādī na bodhisattvena nirvāṇārāmeṇa vihartavyam
T06bsa034_u:2982: na ca kleśopakleśebhyo bhetavyam na caikāntena tebhyaścittaṃ vivecayitavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2983: tathā hi bodhisattvena trīṇi kalpāsaṃkhyeyāni saṃsāre saṃsaratā bodhiḥ samudānetavyeti /
T06bsa034_u:2986: yathā khalu śrāvakeṇa nirvāṇābhiratirāsevitavyā kleśopakleśebhyaśca cittamudvejayitavyaṃ tataḥ śatasahasrakoṭiguṇena bodhisattvena nirvāṇābhiratirāsevitavyā kleśopakleśebhyaśca cetasa udvego bhāvayitavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2987: tathā hi śrāvako 'syātmano 'rthāya prayukto bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya prayuktaḥ
T06bsa034_u:2988: tena tathā cittāsaṃkleśābhyāsaḥ samudānetavyo yathāyamanarhannapi tatprativiśiṣṭenāsaṃkleśena samanvāgataḥ sāstrave vastuni anuvicaret /
T06bsa034_u:2999: bodhisattvo yena kaṭukaprayogeṇa tīkṣṇaprayogeṇa sattvānāmarthaṃ paśyati taṃ prayogaṃ daurmanasyārakṣayā na samudācarati /
T06bsa034_u:3001: anāpattiryat parīttamarthaṃ dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ paśyet prabhūtaśca tannidānaṃ daurmanasyam /
T06bsa034_u:3007: bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ vyatikramaṃ kṛtvā vyatikrameṇa vā sambhāvitaḥ āghātacitto mānābhinigṛhītaḥ saṃjñaptimanurūpāṃ nānuprayacchatyupekṣate /
T06bsa034_u:3011: anāpattistenopāyena damayitukāmaḥ syādvinetukāmaḥ akuśalāt sthānādvyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3014: anāpattiḥ sa cet prakṛtyā kalahakārakaḥ syādādhikaraṇikaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3016: anāpattiḥ paraṃ kṣamaṇaśīlamanā-ghātaśīlaṃ ca saṃbhāvayet parato vyatikramamārabhya saṃjñaptilābhenātyarthaṃ
T06bsa034_u:3017: bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ kasmiṃścidadhikaraṇe nisṛtānāṃ dharmeṇa samena saṃjñaptimanuprayacchatāmāghātacittaḥ paraviheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ saṃjñaptiṃ na pratigṛhṇāti /
T06bsa034_u:3019: no cedāghātacitaḥ api tvakṣamaṇaśīlatayā na pratigṛhṇāti /
T06bsa034_u:3021: anāpattistenopāyena paraṃ damayitukāmaḥ syāt pūrvavat sarvaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:3027: bodhisattva upasthānaparicaryāparigardhamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā sāmiṣeṇa cittena gaṇaṃ parikarṣati
T06bsa034_u:3030: bodhisattva utpannamālasyakausīdyaṃ nidrāsukhaṃ śayanasukhaṃ pārśvasukhañcākāle amātrayā svīkaroti
T06bsa034_u:3041: anāpattiḥ kautukajātasya paripraśnamātre pṛṣṭasya ca pratyudāhāramātre /
T06bsa034_u:3042: bodhisattvaścittasthitimārabhyaṃ citaṃ samādhātukāma āghātacitto mānabhinigṛhīto nopasaṃkramyāvavādaṃ yācate /
T06bsa034_u:3051: anāpattistatprahāṇāya cchandajātasya vyāyacchata stīvrakleśatayā cittamabhibhūya samudācaraṇāt
T06bsa034_u:3052: yathā kāmacchanda evaṃ vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhamauddhatyaṃ kaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:3058: yaḥ punarbodhisattvaḥ evaṃdṛṣṭi syādevaṃvādī na bodhisattvena śrāvakayānapratisaṃyukto dharmaḥ śrotavyo nodgrahītavyo na tatra śikṣā karaṇīyā /
T06bsa034_u:3062: tathā hi bodhisattvena tīrthikaśāstreṣvapi tāvadyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ prāgeva buddhavacane /
T06bsa034_u:3064: bodhisattvo bodhisattvapiṭake sati bodhisattvapiṭake akṛtayogyaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ bodhisattvapiṭakamadhyupekṣya śrāvakapiṭake yogyāṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:3066: bodhisattvo buddhavacane sati buddhavacane akṛtayogyastīrthikaśāstreṣu bahiḥśāstreṣu yogyāṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:3069: cireṇāpyavismaraṇa-samarthasya arthacintanāprativedhasamarthasya buddhavacane yuktyupaparīkṣāsahagatayā 'vicalayā buddhyā samanvāgatasya taddviguṇena pratyahaṃ buddhavacane yogyāṃ kurvataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3070: evamapi ca bodhisattvo vidhimanatikramya tīrthikaśāstreṣu bahiḥśāstreṣu kauśalaṃ kurvannabhiratarūpastatra karauti tena ca ramate na tu kaṭubhaiṣajyamiva niṣevamāṇaḥkaroti /
T06bsa034_u:3072: bodhisattvo bodhisattvapiṭake gambhīrāṇi sthānāni śrutvā paramagaṃbhīrāṇi tattvārthaṃ vārabhya buddhabodhisattvaprabhāvaṃ vā 'nadhimucyamāno
T06bsa034_u:3074: naite arthopasaṃhitā na dharmopasaṃhitā na tathāgatabhāṣitā na hitasukhāya sattvānāmiti /
T06bsa034_u:3077: bhavati khalu bodhisattvasya gambhīrāṇi paramagaṃbhīrāṇi sthānāni śrutvā cetaso 'nadhimokṣaḥ
T06bsa034_u:3085: bodhisattvaḥ sāmiṣacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ pareṣāmantike ātmānamutkarṣayati parān paṃsayati
T06bsa034_u:3088: anāpattistenopāyena tameva pudgalaṃ damayitukāmasya vistareṇa pūrvavat /
T06bsa034_u:3090: bodhisattvo dharmaśravaṇa-dharmasāṃkathyaviniścayaṃ vā mānābhinigṛhītaḥ āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto nopasaṃkrāmati /
T06bsa034_u:3100: anāpattiradhimātradhandhaprajñasya dhandhaṃ dharmamudgṛhṇataḥ dhandhaṃ dhārayataḥ dhandhamālambane cittaṃ samādadhataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3101: bodhisattvo dharmabhāṇakaṃ pudgalaṃ saṃcintyāvamānayatyasatkarotyavahasatyavaspaṇṅyati vyañjanapratisaraṇaśca bhavati nārthapratisaraṇaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3103: saṃvarastho bodhisattvaḥ sattvakutyeṣvāghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ sahāyībhāvaṃ na gacchati yacca tatkutyasamarthe vā adhvagamanāgamane vā samyakkarmānta prayoge vā bhogarakṣaṇe vā bhinnapratisandhāne vā utsave vā puṇyakriyāyāṃ vā /
T06bsa034_u:3108: anāpattiḥ svayaṃ kartumasamarthaḥ syāt sapratisaraṇaśca yācakaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3113: anāpattiḥ kuśalapakṣe nairantaryeṇa samyak prayuktaḥ syāt /
T06bsa034_u:3117: bodhisattvo glānaṃ vyādhitaṃ sattvamāsādya nopasthānaparicaryāṃ karoti āghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ
T06bsa034_u:3126: anāpattiradhimātradhandhaprajñasya dhandhaṃ dharmamuddiśato dhandhaṃ dhārayato dhandhamālambane cittaṃ samādadhataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3131: dṛṣṭvā āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto nyāyaṃ nayaṃ na vyapadiśati /
T06bsa034_u:3137: anāpattiḥ sa eva svayaṃ pratibalaḥ syāt /
T06bsa034_u:3140: anāpattiryasya nyāyopadeśaḥ karaṇīyaḥ sa āghātacittaḥsyāddurvaco viparītagrāhī vigatapremagauravaḥ khaṭuṅkajātīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3142: bodhisattva upakāriṇāṃ sattvānāmakṛtajño bhavatyakṛtavedī āghātacitto na pratyupakāreṇānurūpeṇa pratyupatiṣṭhate /
T06bsa034_u:3149: bodhisattvo jñātibhogavyasanasthānāṃ sattvānāmāghātacittaḥ utpannaṃśokaṃ na vinodayati /
T06bsa034_u:3154: bodhisattvo bhojanapānādinyupakaraṇajātāni bhojanapānādikārthibhyaḥ samyagyācito na prayacchatyāghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3162: bodhisattvaḥ pariṣadamupasthāpya na kālena kālaṃ sabhyagavavadati samyaksamanuśāsti /
T06bsa034_u:3163: na ca teṣāmarthavighātināṃ śrāddhānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāmantikāddharmeṇa cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsana[glāna]pratyayamaiṣajyapariṣkārān paryeṣate āghātacittaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3165: [ālasyakausīdyāt pramādādvā nāvavadati na samanuśāsti na paryeṣate
T06bsa034_u:3182: anāpattistasyābhipretaṃ pathyañca syāt pareṣāṃ prabhūtatarakāṇāmanabhipretamapathyañca syāt
T06bsa034_u:3185: bodhisattvaḥ āghātacittaḥ pareṣāṃ bhūtān guṇān nodbhāvayati bhūtaṃ varṇaṃ na bhāṣate subhāṣite sādhukāraṃ na dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:3188: ālasyāt kausīdyāt pramādādvā na bhāṣate akliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:3194: anāpattistato nidānaṃ saṃkleśaṃ madamunnatimanarthāya saṃbhāvayataḥ tasya ca parihārārtham
T06bsa034_u:3201: avasādayati vā na ca daṇḍakarmaṇā samanuśāsti /
T06bsa034_u:3205: ālasyakausīdyāt pramādādvā nāvasādāyati yāvanna pravāsayati akliṣṭāmāttimāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:3210: anāpattiste sattvā aśaṭhā bhaveyustrīvreṇa hrīvyapatrāpyena samanvāgatā laghu laghveva pratyāpadyeran
T06bsa034_u:3211: bodhisattvo vicitrarddhivikurvitaprabhāvasamanvāgataḥ uttrāsanārhāṇāṃ sattvānāmuttrāsanāya āvarjanārhāṇāñca sattvānāmāvarjanāya śraddhādeyaparihārāya [ṛddhyā] (Dutt 124) nottrāsayati nāvarjayati /
T06bsa034_u:3213: anāpattiryatra sattvā yadbhūyasā pratiniviṣṭā bhaveyustīrthikā āryāpavādikayā mithyādṛṣṭ samanvāgatāḥ
T06bsa034_u:3215: itīmānyutpannavastukāni bodhisattvānāṃ śikṣāpadāni teṣu teṣu sūtrānteṣu vyagrāṇi bhagavatā ākhyātāni saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśalasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlañcārabhya /
T06bsa034_u:3216: tānyasyāṃ bodhisattvapiṭakamātṛkāyāṃ samagrāṇyākhyātāni yeṣu bodhisattvenāradajātena paramagauravamupasthāpya śikṣā karaṇīyā /
T06bsa034_u:3217: parataḥ saṃvarasamādanaṃ kṛtvā suviśuddhena śikṣitukāmāśayena bodhyāśayena sattvārthāśayena ādita eva cāvyatikramāyādarajātena bhavitavyam /
T06bsa034_u:3220: yasya kasyacicchrāvakayānīyasya vā mahāyānīyasya vā 'ntike deśayitavyā yastāṃ vāgvijñaptiṃ pratibalaḥ syādavaboddhaṃ pratigrahītum /
T06bsa034_u:3221: sa cedbodhisattvaḥ pārājayikasthānīyaṃ dharmamadhyāpanno bhavatyadhimātreṇa paryavasthānena tena tyaktaḥ saṃvaraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3223: sa cenmadhyena paryavasthānenāpanno bhavati tena trayāṇāṃ pudgalānāmantike tato vā uttari duṣkṛtā deśayitavyā /
T06bsa034_u:3224: pūrva vastu parikīrtayitvā parato niṣadyedaṃ syādvacanīyam /
T06bsa034_u:3229: pārājayikasthānīyasya ca dharmasya mṛdunā paryavasthānena tadanyāsāñcāpattīnāmekasyaiva purato deśanā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:3230: asati cānukūle pudgale yasya purato deśyetāśayato bodhisattvena punaranadhyācārāya cittamutpādayitavyam
T06bsa034_u:3234: yadi tairguṇairyuṃktaḥ puṅgalo na sannihitaḥsyāttato bodhisattvena tathāgatapratimāyāḥ purataḥ svayameva bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ karaṇīyam /
T06bsa034_u:3237: pratiṣṭhāpya purato vā utkuṭukasthitena idaṃ syādvacanīyam /
T06bsa034_u:3238: ahamevaṃnāmā daśasu dikṣu sarvāstathāgatān mahābhūmipraviṣṭāṃśca bodhisattvān vijñāpayāmi
T06bsa034_u:3239: teṣāñca purataḥ sarvāṇi bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni sarvaṃ bodhisattvaśīlaṃ samādade saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmaṃsaṃgrāhakaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlañca yatrātītāḥ sarvabodhisattvāḥ śikṣitavantaḥ anāgatāḥ sarvabodhisattvāḥ śikṣiṣyante pratyutpannā daśasu dikṣu sarvabodhisattvā etarhi śikṣante dvirapi trirapyevaṃ vaktavyam /
T06bsa034_u:3243: yadapi coktaṃ bhagavatā yadbhūyasā bodhisattvasya dveṣasamutthitā āpattirjñātavyā na rāgasamutthiteti tatrāyamabhiprāyo draṣṭavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3244: bodhisattvaḥ sattvānunayaṃ sattvapremādhipatiṃ kṛtvā yatkiñcicceṣṭate sarvaṃ tadbodhisattvakṛtyam
T06bsa034_u:3245: nākṛtyaṃ na ca kṛtyaṃ kurvataḥ āpattiryujyate /
T06bsa034_u:3246: sattveṣu tu dviṣṭo bodhisattvo nātmano na pareṣāṃ hitamācarati /
T06bsa034_u:3251: evañca punaḥ svavinaye śikṣāprayukto bodhisattvastisṛbhiḥ saṃpattibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharati prayogasampattyā āśayasampattyā pūrvahetusampattyā ca /
T06bsa034_u:3253: yathāpi tadbodhisattvaḥ śīleṣvakhaṇḍacārī bhavati pariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥsamudācāro nābhīkṣṇāpattiko vivṛtapāpaśca bhavati /
