T06bsa034_u:3259: / sa evamarthī na kusīdo viharati [na] hīnavīryo [nāvīryo] na vyavakīrṇa pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ sāṃkleśikaiḥ paunarbhavikaiḥ
T06bsa034_u:3264: yathāpi tadbodhisattvaḥ pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu kṛtapuṇyo bhavati kṛtakuśalamūlo yenaitarhi svayañca na vihanyate covarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3267: ābhistisṛbhiḥ saṃpattibhiḥ samanvāgato vinaye śikṣāprayukto bodhisattvaḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharati
T06bsa034_u:3268: etadviparyayāttisṛbhirvipattibhiḥ samanvāgato duḥkhaṃ saṃsparśaṃ viharatīti veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:3269: idaṃ tāvadbodhisattvasya samāsavyāsataḥ sarvaśīlamityucyate gṛhipakṣagataṃ pravrajitapakṣagatañca
T06bsa034_u:3270: asyaiva ca sarvaśīlasya pravibhāgastadanyānyapi duṣkaraśīlādīni veditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:3273: mahābhogasya bodhisattvasya mahatyaiśvaryādhipatye vartamānasya prahāya bhogān prahāya mahadaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ śīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ bodhisattvasya duṣkaraśīlamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:3279: yathā yāvajjīvena [api] pratanukāmapyāpatiṃ nāpadyate na śīle ca skhalati kutaḥ punargurvīm
T06bsa034_u:3284: tatra samāttaṃ śīlaṃ yena trividhamapi bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati saṃvaraśīlasya
T06bsa034_u:3286: tatra prakṛtiśīlaṃ yadgotrasthasyaiva bodhisattvasya prakṛtibhadratayaiva santānasya pariśuddhaṃ kāyavākkarma pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:3288: tatrābhyastaṃ śīlaṃ yena bodhisattvena pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu trividhamapi yathānirdiṣṭaṃ śīlamabhyastaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3294: tatredamupāyayuktaṃ śīlaṃ yaccatvāri saṃgrahavastūni niśritya bodhisattvasya sattveṣu kuśalaṃ kāyavakkarma pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:3304: tat ṣaḍvidhaṃ saptavidhaṃ caikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya trayodaśavidhaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:3323: adattamādadyāt kāmeṣu mithyācaret mṛṣāvācaṃ bhāṣeta paiśunyaṃ pāruṣyaṃ sabhinnapralāpaṃ kuryāt pāṇiloṣṭatāḍana saṃsparśaiścāniṣṭairvihiṃsāsaṃsparśaiḥ samudācarediti /
T06bsa034_u:3324: tasya me evamarthinaḥ sa cet pare viparyayeṇa samudācareyuḥ tena me syādvidhātastanme syādamanāpam
T06bsa034_u:3325: paro 'pyarthino yathā 'smākaṃ pare na jīvitadvyaparopayeyurvistareṇa yāvanna vihiṃsāsasparśai samudācareyuriti /
T06bsa034_u:3326: (Dutt 128) teṣāmapyevamarthināṃ sa cedahaṃ viparyayeṇa samudācareyaṃ tena
T06bsa034_u:3330: iti pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvo jīvitahetorapi parānaṣṭavidhenāmanāpena na samudācarati /
T06bsa034_u:3334: iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ pratiśeddhavyāni sthānāni pratiṣedhayati /
T06bsa034_u:3343: tasya ca bodhisattvasya pareṣāñca dṛṣṭadharmasaṃparāyasukhāya saṃvartate /
T06bsa034_u:3347: ādita eva sugṛhīta bhavati śrāmaṇyasabodhikāmatayā na jīvikānimittam /
T06bsa034_u:3353: samyakpraṇihitaṃ bhavati lābhasatkāragardhavigamāt devatvāya praṇidhāya brahmacaryāvāsānābhyupagamācca
T06bsa034_u:3360: ityeṣa bodhisattvasya mahān śīlaskandho mahābodhiphalodayo yamāśritya
T06bsa034_u:3362: yāvacca nābhisabudhyate tāvadayamasminnaprameye bodhisattvaśīlaskandhe śikṣamāṇaḥ pañcānuśaṃsān pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:3365: / kāyasya ca bhedāttatropapadyate yatrāsya samānādhikaśīlā bodhisattvāḥ
T06bsa034_u:3368: dṛṣṭe dharme samparāye 'pi prakṛtiśīlatāṃ śīlatanmayatāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:3369: sarvañcaitacchīlaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ svabhāvaśīlādikaṃ navākāraṃ trividhena śīlena saṃgṛhītaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:3371: tatpunastrividhaṃ śīlaṃ samāsato bodhisattvasya trīṇi kāryāṇi karoti /
T06bsa034_u:3380: etāvat bodhisattvaśīlakāryaṃ nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3384: lokadhātuṣu śikṣante iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre yogasthāne daśamaṃ śīlapaṭalam /
T06bsa034_u:3389: yā pratisaṃkhyānabalasanniśrayeṇa vā prakṛtyā vā parāpakārasya marṣaṇā sarveṣāñca marṣaṇā sarvasya ca marṣaṇā nirāmiṣeṇa ca cittena kevalayā karuṇayā [marṣaṇā] /
T06bsa034_u:3398: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvaḥ parāpakāraṃ marṣayati kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3399: iha bodhisattvastīvre nirantare citre dīrghakālikea 'pi parāpakāraje duḥkhe sammukhībhūte idaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate /
T06bsa034_u:3401: yenāhaṃ svayaṃkṛtasyāśubhasya karmaṇo duḥkhamīdṛśaṃ phalaṃ pratyanubhavāmi /
T06bsa034_u:3409: tatpare tāvadajñāḥ ye asmākaṃ prakṛtiduḥkhitānāṃ bhūyo duḥkhamupasaṃharanti /
T06bsa034_u:3410: asmākaṃ tu vijñānāṃ satāṃ na pratirūpaṃ syādyadvayamapi pareṣāṃ prakṛtiduḥkhitānāṃ bhūyo duḥkhamupasaṃharemaḥ
T06bsa034_u:3411: bhūyo 'pi cātmārthe tāvatprayuktānāṃ śrāvakāṇāmakṣāntirna yuktarūpā syāt svapareṣāṃ duḥkhajanikā
T06bsa034_u:3414: bodhisattvaḥ pañcākārāṃ saṃjñāṃ bhāvayan mitrāmitrodāsīnebhyaḥ hīnatulyaviśiṣṭebhyaḥ sukhitaduḥkhitebhyo guṇadoṣayuktebhyaśca sattvebhyaḥ sarvāpakārāṃstitikṣate /
T06bsa034_u:3422: nāsau sattvaḥ sulabharūpo yo me na dīrghasyādhvano 'tyayāt pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu mātā vābhūt pitā vā bhrātā vā bhaginī vā ācāryo vā upādhyāyo vā gururvā gurusthānīyo vā /
T06bsa034_u:3423: tasyaivaṃ yoniśo manasikurvataḥ pratyarthikasaṃjñā apakāriṣu sattveṣu antardhīyate suhṛtsaṃjñā ca saṃtiṣṭhate /
T06bsa034_u:3424: sa tāṃ suhṛtsaṃjñāṃ niśrityāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3425: kathañca bodhisattvaḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu dharmamātrānusāriṇīṃ saṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /
T06bsa034_u:3428: nāstyatra kaścidātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā janturvāya ākrośedroṣayettāḍayed bhaṇḍayet paribhāṣeta vā yo vā punarākruśyeta vā roṣyeta vā tāḍayeta vā bhaṇḍayeta vā paribhāṣyeta vā /
T06bsa034_u:3431: sa tāṃ dharmamātrasaṃjñāniścitya pratiṣṭhāpya parataḥ sarvāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3434: ye kecit sattvā jātā bhūtāḥ sarve te anityā maraṇadharmāṇaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3435: eṣa ca paramaḥ pratyatakāro yaduta jīvitādvayaparopaṇam /
T06bsa034_u:3436: evañca prakṛttyā maraṇadharmakeṣvanityeṣu sattveṣu na pratirūpaṃ syādvijñapuruṣasya kaluṣamapi tāvaccittamutpādayituṃ prāgeva pāṇinā vā prahartuṃ loṣṭena vā daṇḍena vā prāgeva sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayitum /
T06bsa034_u:3437: tasyaivaṃ yoniśo manasi kurvataḥ nityasārasajñā ca prahīyate /
T06bsa034_u:3439: sa tāmapi anityāsārasaṃjñāṃ niśritya sarvāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3440: kathañca bodhisattvaḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /
T06bsa034_u:3441: iha bodhisattvo ye tāvat sattvā mahatyāmapi sampadi vartante tānapi tisṛbhiḥ
T06bsa034_u:3442: (Dutt 132) duḥkhatābhiranuṣaktān paśyati- saṃskāraduḥkhatayā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā duḥkhaduḥkhatayā ca prāgeva vipattisthitān /
T06bsa034_u:3444: evaṃ sadā duḥkhānugatānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpakarṣaṇāyāsmābhirvyāyacchitavyaṃ na duḥkhopasaṃhārāya
T06bsa034_u:3445: tasyaivaṃ yoniśo manasi kurvataḥ sukhasaṃjñā prahīyate duḥkhasaṃjñā cotpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:3446: sa tāṃ duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ niśritya pareṣāṃ sarvāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3449: mayā khalu sarvasattvā bodhāya cittamutpādayatā kaḍatrabhāvena parigṛhītāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3451: tanna me pratirūpaṃ syādyadahamevaṃ sarvasattvānupādāyaiṣāmarthaṃ kariṣyāmītyanarthameva kuryāmapakāramamarṣayan
T06bsa034_u:3452: tasyaiva yāniśo manasi kurvataḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu parasaṃjñā prahīyate /
T06bsa034_u:3454: sa tāṃ parigrahasajñāṃ niśritya pareṣāṃ sarvāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3461: mayā khalu pūrva kāmacaryāsu vartamānena kāmānparyeṣatā pratisaṃkhyāya duḥkhahetutayā duḥkhātmakānāṃ kāmānāmarthe prabhūtāni tīvrāṇi duḥkhāni abhyupagatāni adhivāsitānyanubhūtāni kṛṣivaṇijyā rājapauruṣyaprayuktena /
T06bsa034_u:3462: evaṃ tadvayarthaṃ duḥkhasyaivārthe mayā mahad duḥkhamabhyupagataṃ pratisaṃkhyāyājñānadoṣeṇa
T06bsa034_u:3463: sāṃprataṃ tu mama sukhāhārake kuśale prayuktasya [pratisaṃkhyāya] tataḥ koṭīśatasahasraguṇasya duḥkhasyādhivāsanābhyupagamaḥ pratirūpaḥ syāt /
T06bsa034_u:3465: evaṃ yoniśo manasi kurvan bodhāya prayukto bodhisattvaḥ sarvavastukaṃ duḥkhamadhivāsayati
T06bsa034_u:3468: sanniśrayādhiṣṭhānaṃ lokadharmādhiṣṭhānam īryāpathādhiṣṭhānaṃ dharmaparigrahādhiṣṭhāna bhikṣākavṛttādhiṣṭhānam abhiyogaklamādhiṣṭhānaṃ sattvārthakriyādhiṣṭhānam itikaraṇīyādhiṣṭhānañceti /
T06bsa034_u:3474: tairbodhisattvo lūhaiḥ stokairasatkṛtya dhandhañca labdhairnotkaṇṭhyate na paritrasyati nāpi tato nidānaṃ vīryaṃ sraṃsayati /
T06bsa034_u:3477: alābhaḥ ayaśo nindā duḥkhaṃnāśadharmakasya nāśaḥ kṣayadharmakasya kṣayaḥ jarādharmakasya jarā vyādhidharmakasya vyādhiḥ maraṇadharmakasya maraṇam /
T06bsa034_u:3478: eṣāṃ lokadharmāṇāṃ samastavyastānām āpatanāt sammukhībhāvāt yadduḥkhamutpadyate tallokadharmādhiṣṭhānamityucyate
T06bsa034_u:3479: tenāpi spṛṣṭo bodhisattvo na tannidānaṃ vīryaṃ sraṃsayati pratisaṃkhyāyodvahate adhivāsayati
T06bsa034_u:3482: tatra bodhisattvaḥ caṃkramaniṣadyābhyāṃ divārātrau vā āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayaṃstana nidānaṃ pariśramajaṃ duḥkhamadhivāsayati /
T06bsa034_u:3483: na tvakāle pārśvamanuprayacchati mañce vā pīṭhe vā tṛṇasaṃstare vā parṇasaṃstare vā /
T06bsa034_u:3485: ratnatrayapūjopasthānaṃ gurupūjopasthānaṃ dharmāṇāmudgrahaṇamudgṛhītānāṃ pareṣāṃ vistareṇa deśanā vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyakriyā ekākino rahogatasya samyak cintanā tulanā upaparīkṣaṇā yogamanasikārasaṃgṛhītā śamathavipaśyanā bhāvanā ca /
T06bsa034_u:3486: asmin saptākāre dharmaparigrahe bodhisattvasya vyāyacchamānasya yad duḥkhamutpadyate tadapyasāvadhivāsayati
T06bsa034_u:3497: / ityevaṃ rūpaṃ kṛcchrasaṃbādhaṃ bhikṣākavṛttamāgamya yadduḥkhamutpadyate tadapi bodhisattvo 'dhivāsayati /
T06bsa034_u:3499: kuśalapakṣābhiyuktasyāpi ca bodhisattvasya [ye] pariśramanidānā utpadyante kāyikāḥ klamāḥ caitasikāḥ apyupāyāsā na bodhisattvastannidānaṃ vīryaṃ saṃstrayati /
T06bsa034_u:3507: yatpunarbodhisattvaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ sannanyatamena duḥkhena prayujyata evānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
T06bsa034_u:3513: iha bodhisattvasya samyagdharmapravicayasuvicāritayā buddhyā aṣṭavidhe adhimuktyadhiṣṭhāne adhimuktiḥ susanniviṣṭā bhavati ratnaguṇeṣu tattvārthe buddhabodhisattvānāṃ mahāprabhāve hetau phale prāptavye 'rthe
T06bsa034_u:3534: iha bodhisattvaḥ ādita eva kṣāntāvanuśaṃsadarśī bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3546: sā ṣaḍvidhā saptavidhā caikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya trayodaśavidhā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:3548: sattveṣu ca dayācittaḥ kāruṇyacitta [snigdhacittaḥ] snehādapi kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3549: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tīvracchandaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayitukāmaḥ kāraṇahetorapi kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3551: tadanenāpi paryāyeṇa na yuktarūpā samāttaśīlasya pravrajitasyākṣāntiriti dharmasamādānato 'pi kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3552: gotrasampadi pūrvake ca kṣāntyabhyāse vartamāno 'vasthitaḥ prakṛtyāpi kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3557: rahasi vā mahājanasamakṣaṃ vā sarvakālañca kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3559: madhyāhne 'pi sāyāhne 'pi rātrau ca divā vā 'tī tamapyanāgatamapi pratyutpannamapi glāno 'pi svastho 'pi patito 'pyutthito 'pi /
T06bsa034_u:3571: duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpanayanāya vyāyacchataḥ dharmān paryeṣataḥ dharmasyānudharme pratipadyabhānasya tāneva dharmān pareṣāṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayataḥ sattvakṛtyeṣu
T06bsa034_u:3574: yena ca sattvā vidhātinaḥ syuḥ tasya ca kṣāntyā parivarjanāt /
T06bsa034_u:3578: / iha bodhisattvaḥ apramatto viharan kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu kṣamo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3582: saṃsārapatitajarāvyādhimaraṇādikānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ sattvānukampāmeva puraskṛtā ityevaṃ kṣamo bodhisattva ātmanā ca dṛṣṭe ca dharme sukhasaṃsparśaṃ viharatyavyavakīrṇaḥ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3585: pareṣāmapi ca dṛṣṭe dharme saṃparāya sukhāya pratipanno bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3589: iha bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāmantikādapakāraṃ vighātaṃ vyatikramaṃ labhamāno nāpi pratyapakāraṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:3592: upakārāya cābhimukho bhavati yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścānnopakārakriyayā 'pakāramupekṣate apakāriṣu ca svayameva
T06bsa034_u:3593: saṃjñaptimanuprayacchati na ca khedayitvā pareṣāmantikāt saṃjñaptiṃ pratigṛhaṇāti khedito bhavatviti /
T06bsa034_u:3594: etameva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā akṣāntimārabhya tīvreṇa [hrīvyapatrāpyena] samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3595: kṣāntimārabhya tīvreṇa śāstari premagauraveṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3596: sattvāviheṭhanatāmārabhya tīvreṇa sattveṣu karuṇāśayena sanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3597: sarveṇa vā sarvamakṣāntidharmasahāyaṃ prahāya kāmavītarāgo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3600: ityetāṃ svabhāva-[kṣāntyādikaṃ viśuddha-]kṣāntiparyavasānāṃ kṣāntiṃ vipulāmapramāṇāṃ mahābodhiphalo[dayāṃ] niśritya bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ
T06bsa034_u:3602: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre yogasthāne ekādaśamaṃ kṣāntipaṭalaṃ samāptam /
T06bsa034_u:3616: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvameva vīryārambhaprayogādevaṃ cetaso 'bhyutsāhapūrvakaṃ sannāhaṃ sannahyate
T06bsa034_u:3617: sa cedahamekasattvasyāpi duḥkhavimokṣahetormahākalpasahasratulyai rātrindivasairnaṃrakavāsenaiva nānyagativāsena yāvatā kālena bodhisattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante tenaiva koṭīniyutaśatasahasraguṇitena kālenāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimāsādayeyam
T06bsa034_u:3621: prāgeva nyūnatareṇa kālena tanutareṇa ca duḥkhena /
T06bsa034_u:3626: prāgeva yo bodhisattvaḥ īdṛśenaiva sannāhavīryeṇa samanvāgataḥ syāt na ca punastasya bodhisattvasya bodherarthe sattvānāmarthāya kiñcidasti duṣkaraṃ karaṇīyaṃ karma yatrāsya bodhisattvasya saṃkoco vā syāt cetaso duṣkaraṃ vā kartum /
T06bsa034_u:3638: ityebhiḥ saptabhirākāraiḥ kuśaladharmasaṃgrahāya vīryārambhaprayogo bodhisattvānāṃ kṣipraṃ pāramitāparipūraye 'nuttarasamyaksaṃbodhyadhigamāya
T06bsa034_u:3640: yataśca sarveṣāṃ bodhikarakāṇāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmaṇāmevaṃ samudāgamāya vīryameva pradhānaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ kāraṇaṃ na tathānyat /
T06bsa034_u:3648: yadbodhisattvo nairantaryeṇa cīvarasaṃjñāṃ piṇḍapātasaṃjñāṃ śayanāsanasaṃjñāmapi ātmasaṃjñāmakurvan kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu bhāvanāsātatyena prayukto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3653: punarbodhisattvaḥ samatāprativedhaguṇayuktena nātilīnena nātyārabdhenāviparītenārthopasaṃhitena vīryeṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3655: asya khalu bodhisattvānāṃ duṣkaravīryasya balaṃ sattveṣu karuṇā prajñā ca saṃgrahaheturveditavyaḥ
T06bsa034_u:3660: tatra śukladharmāvarjakaṃ bodhisattvasya (Dutt 140) vīryaṃ yadanutpannānāñca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmutpattaye vīryam /
T06bsa034_u:3662: tatra karmapariśodhakaṃ bodhisattvasya vīryaṃ yat trayāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ viśuddhaye saṃgrahāya kuśalasya kāyakarmaṇo vākkarmaṇo manaskarmaṇaśca /
T06bsa034_u:3664: yacchru tacintābhāvanāmayyāḥ prajñāyāḥ samudāgamāya parivṛddhaye saṃvartate /
T06bsa034_u:3680: idaṃ tāvat ṣaḍvidhaṃ sarvākāraṃ vīryaṃ yena samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ ārabdhavīryaḥ sthāmavān vīryavānutsāhī dṛḍhaparākramaḥ anikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:3681: saptavidhaṃ punaḥ chandasahagataṃ bodhisattvasya vīryaṃ punaḥ punaranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tīvracchanda praṇidhānānuvṛṃhaṇatayā sāmyayuktaṃ bodhisattvasya vīryaṃ yadanyatamena kleśopakleśenāsaṃkliṣṭacetaso 'paryavasthitasya yena vīryeṇa bodhisattvaḥ
T06bsa034_u:3686: śikṣāvīryaṃ bodhisattvasya teṣveva paryeṣiteṣu dharmeṣu yathāyogyaṃ yathārhaṃ dharmānudharmapratipattisaṃpādanatayā
T06bsa034_u:3689: 141) skhalitasya ca yathādharmapratikaraṇatāyai vīryaṃ saptamaṃ bodhisattvasya /
T06bsa034_u:3691: vighātārthikavīryaṃ cehāmutrasukhañca bodhisattvānāṃ vīryaṃ kṣāntivad draṣṭavyam /
T06bsa034_u:3693: yā tatra kṣāntiḥ seha vīryamabhyutsāho vaktavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3706: iha bodhisattvo na ādikarmika-tatprathamakarmikavīryeṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3710: na cāpi bodhisattvaḥ abhyastaprayogo bhavati avavādānuśāsanyāṃ cittasthitimārabhya /
T06bsa034_u:3711: api tvādikarmika eva sa bodhisattvastasmin prayoge
T06bsa034_u:3714: punarbodhisattvo guruṇāmantikāta svayameva vā bāhuśrutyabalādhānatayā 'viparītagrāhitayā cittasthitaye vīryamārabhate /
T06bsa034_u:3724: punarbodhisattvaḥ paramodārān paramagambhīrānacintyāprameyān bodhisattvānāṃ vīryārambhanirdeśān śrutvā nātmānaṃ paribhavati na salīnacitto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3728: punarbodhisattvaḥ kālena kālamindriyairguptadvāratāṃ bhojane mātrajñatāṃ pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikānuyuktatāṃ saprajānan vihāritāmityevaṃbhāgīyān samādhisaṃbhārān samādāya vartate /
T06bsa034_u:3733: sama yogavāhi sarveṣu cārambhakaraṇīyeṣu samaṃ satkṛtyakārī bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3735: punarbodhisattvaḥ sarvavīryārambhānabhisaṃskṛtānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇamayatīdaṃ bodhisattvasya samyak pariṇamitaṃ vīryamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:3736: ityetatsvabhāvavīryādikaṃ viśuddhavīryāvasānañca bodhisattvānāṃ vīrya mahābodhiphalaṃ yadāśritya bodhisattvā vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrya anuttarāṃ samyak saṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbhotsyante 'bhisaṃbudhyante ca /
T06bsa034_u:3737: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre yogasthāne dvādaśamaṃ vīryapaṭalaṃ samāptam /
T06bsa034_u:3742: bodhisattvapiṭakaśravaṇacintāpūrvakaṃ yallaukikaṃ lokottaraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ kuśalaṃ cittaikāgryañcittasthitiḥ śamathapakṣyā vā vipaśyanāpakṣyā vā yuganaddhavāhimārgaṃ tadubhayāpakṣyā vā /
T06bsa034_u:3748: dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya dhyānaṃ bodhisattva-samādhiguṇanirhārāya dhyāna sattvārthakriyāyai dhyānam /
T06bsa034_u:3749: tatra yadbodhisattvānāṃ sarvavikalpāpagataṃ kāyikacaittasikaprasrabdhijanakaṃ paramapraśāntaṃ manyanāpagatamanāsvāditaṃ sarvanimittāpagataṃ dhyānam /
T06bsa034_u:3753: yeṣāṃ samādhīnāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā api nāmāpi na prajānanti kutaḥ punaḥ samāpatsyante
T06bsa034_u:3758: yaddhyānaṃ niśritya bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtyeṣvarthopasaṃhiteṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:3774: yadbadhisattvā udārairvicitraiḥ suparicitairdhyānavihārairabhinirhṛtairvihṛtya svecchayā tatparamaṃ dhyānasukhaṃ vyāvartya pratisaṃkhyāya sattvānukampā prabhūtāṃ sattvārthakriyāṃ sattvārthaparipākaṃ samanupaśyantaḥ kāmadhātāvupapadyante
T06bsa034_u:3790: kuśalaṃ dhyānamavyākṛtaṃ ca nirmitanirmāṇāya dhyānaṃ śamathapakṣyaṃ vipaśyanāpakṣyaṃ svaparārthasamyagupanidhyānāya dhyānaṃ abhijñāprabhāvaguṇarnirhārāya dhyānaṃ nāmālambanaṃmarthālambanaṃ śamathanimittālambanaṃ pragrahanimittālambanamupekṣānimittālambanaṃ [dṛṣṭadharmasukha]vihārāya parārthakriyāyai ca dhyānam /
T06bsa034_u:3801: daśasu dikṣu pramattānāṃ sattvānāṃ samyaksaṃbodhanāya dhyānam /

T06bsa034_u:4158: na sarvalābhasatkāraślokeṣu nāpyantataḥ kāyajīvite 'pi niśrito bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4159: iti ya ebhirākāraiḥ prasādaprāmodyasahagataścāviṣamaśca satkṛtya cāniśritaśca dānādīnāṃ samānārthatāparyavasānānāṃ (Dutt 157) kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samudācāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4162: tatrāśaya śuddhibhūmipraviṣṭasya bodhisattvasya uttaptānyacalāni caitāni kuśalamūlāni bhavanti
T06bsa034_u:4163: tatreyamuttaptatā yadāśayaśuddhasya bodhisattvasya sarve te kuśalā dharmā apratisaṃkhyānakaraṇīyā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:4164: tatreyamacalanatā yadāśayaśuddho bodhisattvo yathā pratilabdhebhyo yathopacitebhyaśca ebhyaḥ kuśalebhyo dharmebhyo na parihīyate /
T06bsa034_u:4166: nānyatra teṣāṃ teṣāṃ rātridivānāmatyayātteṣāṃ teṣāmātmabhāvānāṃ samatikramāccandro vā śuklapakṣe pratyupasthite vardhata eva ebhiḥ kuśalairdharmairna
T06bsa034_u:4167: [pari]hīyate bodhisattvaḥ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmibyavasthitasya punarbodhisattvasyaikajātipratibaddhasya caramabhavikasya vā ete kuśalā dharmāḥ suviśuddhā veditavyā yeṣāmuttari bodhisattvabhūmau pariśuddhataratā nāsti /
T06bsa034_u:4168: evaṃ tribhiḥ kāraṇaireṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samudācāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4170: tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ suviśuddhatā veditavyā dānādīnāṃ samānarthatāvasānānām /
T06bsa034_u:4171: tatra sarvadānasya sarvaśīlasya vistareṇa yāvatsarvasamānarthatāyā āsevitāyāḥ suviśodhitāyāḥ sakalasaṃpūrṇāyā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirvajrasāraśarīratā saddharmacirasthitikatā ca phalamabhinirvartate tatra duṣkaradānena duṣkaraśīlena yāvadduṣkarasamānārthatayā āsevitayā suviśodhitayā tathāgatasyāpratisamāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgatatvaṃ phalamabhinirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:4172: tatra sarvatomukhena dānena sarvatomukhena śīlena vistareṇa yāvatsarvatomukhayā samānārthatayā tathāgatasya sarvataḥ pradhānasattvairdevamanuṣyaiḥ pūjyatvaṃ phalamabhinivartate /
T06bsa034_u:4173: tatra satpuruṣadānasya satpuruṣaśīlasya yāvatsatpuruṣasamānārthatāyāḥ tathāgatasya ye kecitsattvā apadā vā [dvipadā vā] catuṣpadā vā bahupadā vā rūpiṇo vā 'rūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vāsaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagā vā [teṣāṃ] sarveṣāṃ sattvānāmagryatvaṃ phalamabhinirvartate tatra sarvākārasya dānasya [sarvākārasya] śīlasya vistareṇa yāvatsarvākārāyāḥ
T06bsa034_u:4175: (Dutt 158) tatra vighātārthikadānasya vighātārthikaśīlasya vistareṇa yāvadvighātārthikasamānārthatāyāḥ tathāgatasya bodhimaṇḍa niṣaṇṇasya sarvamārapratyarthikavidhātāviheṭhāvikampanāpratibalanatā phalamabhinirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:4176: tatrehāmutrasukhasya dānasya ihāmutrasukhasya śīlasya vistareṇa yāvadihāmutrasukhāyāḥ samānārthatāyāstathāgatasya paramadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattisukhaṃ phalamabhinirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:4177: tatra viśuddhasya dānasya viśuddhasya śīlasya vistareṇa yāvadviśuddhāyāḥ samānārthaṃtāyā āsevitāyāḥ suviśodhitāyāḥ sakalasaṃpūrṇayāstathāgatasya sarvākārāścatasraḥ pariśuddhayaḥ āśrayapariśuddhirālambanapariśuddhiścittapariśuddhirjñānapariśuddhiḥ phalamabhinirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:4180: idamasya bodhisattvasya dānādīnāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ paryantagataṃ phalaṃ niruttaram /
T06bsa034_u:4194: tatra yadbodhisattvastathāgatamuddisya stūpaṃ vā gahaṃ vā kūṭaṃ vā purāṇacaitya vā abhinava-caityaṃ vā pūjayati /
T06bsa034_u:4196: yad bodhisattvastathāgata-kāya vā tathāgata-caityaṃ vā sammukhībhūtamadhyakṣa pūjayati /
T06bsa034_u:4198: tatra yad bodhisattvastathāgate vā tathāgate-caitye vā sammukha-pūjāṃ
T06bsa034_u:4200: yā ekasya tathāgatasya dharmatā sā sarveṣāṃ tathāgatānāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ dharmatā
T06bsa034_u:4201: yā ekasya tathāgata-caityasya dharmatā sā sarveṣāṃ tathāgata-caityānāṃ dharmatā /
T06bsa034_u:4202: ityato 'hametañca sammukhībhūtaṃ tathāgataṃ pūjayāmi sarvāṃśca tān atītānāgatapratyutpannāṃśca tathāgatān pūjayāmi /
T06bsa034_u:4204: tadanyāni ca daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvāṇi stūpāni gahāni kūṭāgārāṇi purāṇa-caityāni
T06bsa034_u:4207: vimukhā ca tathāgata-pūjā tathāgata-caitya-pūjā ca veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4208: yatpunarbodhisattvaḥ asammukhībhūte tathāgate tathāgata-caitye vā tathāgatacittamabhisaṃskṛtya (Dutt 160) pūjāṃ prayojayati sarvabuddhānuddiśya sarvatathāgatacaityāni coddiśya /
T06bsa034_u:4210: yadapi bodhisattvaḥ parinirvṛte tathāgate tathāgatamuddiśya tathāgatasya śarīraṃ stūpaṃ vā kārayati gahaṃ vā kūṭaṃ vā ekaṃ vā dvau vā sambahulāni vā yāvat koṭi-śatasahasrāṇi
T06bsa034_u:4212: iyamapi bodhisattvasya tathāgateṣu vimukhā vipulā pūjā apramāṇa-puṇya-phalā 'nekabrāhmapuṇyaparigṛhītā
T06bsa034_u:4214: na cānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ sambhāraṃ na paripūrayati tannidānam /
T06bsa034_u:4215: tatra yeyaṃ bodhisattvasya kevalaiva tathāgate tathāgatacaitye vā pūjā iyameva tāvadvipulapuṇyaphalā draṣṭavyā tato vipulatarapuṇyaphalā kevalaiva vimukhā draṣṭavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4217: tatra yad bodhisattvastathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā pūjāṃ kartukāmaḥ svayameva svahastaṃ karoti na
T06bsa034_u:4221: tatra yadbodhisattvastathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā pūjāṃ kartukāmo na kevalaṃ svayeva karotyapi tu mātāpitṛbhyāṃ kārayati putradāreṇa dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyairmitrāmātyajñātisālohitaiḥ paraiśca rājabhiḥ rājamahāmātrairbrāhmaṇaigṛhapatibhirnaigamairjānapadairdhanibhiḥ śreṣṭhabhiḥ sārthavāhairantataḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikābhiḥ kṛpaṇaiduḥkhitaira ā-caṇḍālairapi kārayati tathā 'cāryopādhyāyaiḥ
T06bsa034_u:4222: sārdhavihāryantevāsibhiḥ sabrahmacāribhiśca pravrajitairapyanyatīrthyaistathāgate [vā tathāgata-]caitye vā pūjāṃ kārayati /
T06bsa034_u:4223: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya sādhāraṇā pūjā svaparakṛtā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4224: yatpunarbodhisattvaḥ parītte pūjākaraṇīye deyavastuni saṃvidyamāne karuṇāsahagatena cetasā saṃcintya pareṣāmeva tadvastvanuprayacchatyete duḥkhitāḥ sattvā alpapuṇyāścāśaktāśca tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā kārāṃ kṛtvā sukhitā bhavantviti /
T06bsa034_u:4225: pare ca tena vastunā tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā pūjāṃ kurvanti na bodhisattvaḥ iyaṃ bodhisattvasya kevalā parakāritā pūjā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4227: tatra yā kevalā svayaṃkṛtā sā mahāpuṇyaphalā /
T06bsa034_u:4229: yā punaḥ sādhāraṇā yā mahattamapuṇyaphalā niruttarā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4230: tatra yadbodhisattvaḥ tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārairabhivādanavandanapratyutthānāñjalikarmabhiśca dhūpagandhaiścūrṇagandhairanulepanagandhairvicitraiśca mālyairvicitrairvādyai rvicitraiśchatradhvajapatākāpradīpadānairvicitraiḥ stotrābhivyāhāraiḥ pañcamaṇḍalapraṇāmaiḥ pradakṣiṇāvartaiḥ pūjāṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:4235: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā lābhasatkārapūjā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4236: tatra yadbodhisattvo dīrghakālikīñca tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā etāmeva lābhasatkārapūjāṃ karoti prabhūtavastukāñca praṇītavastukāñca sammukhavimukhāñca svayaṃkṛtaparakṛtāñca ghanarasena ca prasādena sammukhībhūtena tīvrayā cādhimuktyā pūjāṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:4239: tatra yadbodhisattvaḥ svahastaṃ tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā kārāṃ karoti na parairavajñayā kārayati pramādakausīdyādvā /
T06bsa034_u:4242: na buddhābhiprasannānāṃ rājādīnāmudārasattvānāṃ lābhasatkārahetoḥ kuhanārthaṃ pratirūpeṇa ca vastunā pūjayati /
T06bsa034_u:4246: tāṃ punaretāmudārāmasaṃkliṣṭāṃ lābhasatkārapūjāṃ bodhisattvastathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā svabāhubalopārjitairbhogaiḥ karoti parato vā paryeṣitaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4248: tatra pariṣkāravaśitāprāpto bodhisattvaḥ dvau vā (Dutt 162) trīnvā saṃbahulān vā
T06bsa034_u:4249: samucchrayān yāvat samucchryakoṭīniyutaśatasahastrāṇyanekānyabhinirmāya sarvaistaiḥ samucchrayaistathāgateṣu praṇāmaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:4250: teṣāñca samucchrayāṇāmekaikasya hastaśataṃ hastasahasraṃ vā tato vā pareṇa nirmāya sarvaistairdivyasamatikrāntaiḥ kusumaiḥ paramasugandhibhiḥ paramamanoramaiḥ tāṃstathāgatānabhyavakirati /
T06bsa034_u:4251: sarve ca te samucchrayā atyudārāṇi tathāgatabhūtaguṇopasaṃhitāni stotrāṇi bhāṣante /
T06bsa034_u:4252: sarvaireva ca taiḥ samucchrayairvicitrāṇyamātrāṇi [agrāṇi] praṇītāni keyūramaṇikuṇḍalāni chatradhvajapatākāśca tathāgateṣūtsṛjayattyāropayati /
T06bsa034_u:4255: na cāsya punarbuddhotpādaḥ pratyāśaṃsitavyaḥ prārthayitavyo vā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4258: no cāpi bodhisattvasya svabāhubalopārjitā bhogā bhavantināpi ca parataḥ paryeṣitalabdhā vā
T06bsa034_u:4260: api tu yā kācit tathāgatapūjā jambūdvīpe [vā] cāturdvīpe vā sāhasre [vā dvisāhasre vā trisāhasra-]mahāsāhasre vā yāvaddaśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu mṛdumadhyādhimātrā pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:4261: tāṃ sarvāṃ śrāddho bodhisattvaḥ prasādasahagatenodārādhimuktisahagatena cetasā spharitvābhyanumodate
T06bsa034_u:4262: iyamapi bodhisattvasyālpakṛcchreṇa mahatī apramāṇā tathāgatapūjā bodhāya mahāsaṃbhāraparigṛhītā yasyāṃ bodhisattvena satata-samitaṃ kalyāṇacittena hṛṣṭacittena yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4263: tatra yadbodhisattvaḥ stokastokaṃ muhūrtamuhūrtamantato godohamātramapi sarvasattva prāṇibhūteṣu maitracittaṃ bhāvayati /
T06bsa034_u:4265: tathā sarvasaṃskāreṣvanityasaṃjñāmanitye duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ duḥkhe 'nātmasaṃjñāṃ nirvāṇe cānuśaṃsasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /
T06bsa034_u:4267: tathā stokastokaṃ muhūrtamuhūrtaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ prādeśikena mṛdukṣāntikenāpi jñānena nirabhilāpyadharmasvabhāvatathatādhimukto nirvikalpena nirnimittena cetasā viharati /
T06bsa034_u:4274: yasyāḥ pūjāyāḥ pūrvikā lābhasatkārapūjā sarvākārāpi śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti vistareṇa yāvadupaniṣadamapi nopaiti /
T06bsa034_u:4276: yathā tathāgatapūjā evaṃ dharmapūjā saṃghapūjā yathāyogaṃ veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4277: tatra triṣu ratneṣvetāṃ daśākārāṃ pūjāṃ kurvanbodhisattvastathāgatālambanaiḥ ṣaḍmiradhyāśayaiḥ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:4278: guṇakṣetraniruttarādhyāśayatayā upakāriniruttarādhyāśayatayā 'padadvipadādisarvasattvāgryādhyāśayatayā udumbarapuṣpavat sudurlaṃbhā 'dhyāśayatayā ekākinastrisāhasrama sāhasre loka utpādātkevalādhyāśayatayā laukikalokottarasampatsarvārthaṃpratisaraṇādhyāśayatayā /
T06bsa034_u:4279: tasyaibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiradhyāśayaiḥ tathāgate tasya vā dharme tasya vā saṃghe pūjā prakalpitā parīttāpyaprameyaphalā bhavanti prāgeva prabhūtā /
T06bsa034_u:4280: tatra katibhirākāraiḥ samanvāgataṃ bodhisattvasya kalyāṇamitraṃ veditavyam
T06bsa034_u:4286: katyākārayā ca saṃjñayā kalyāṇamitrasyāntikādbodhisattvena dharmaḥ śrotavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4287: katiṣu ca sthāneṣu kalyāṇamitrasyāntikād bodhisattvena dharmaṃ śruṇvatā tasmindharmabhāṇake pudgale 'manasikāraḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4288: tatrāṣṭābhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgataṃ bodhisattvasya kalyāṇamitraṃ sarvākāraparipūrṇaṃ veditavyam
T06bsa034_u:4291: adhigamayuktaśca bhavati lābhī bhāvanāmayasyānyatamānyatamasya kuśalasya lāmī śamathavipaśyanāyāḥ
T06bsa034_u:4292: anukampakaśca bhavati kāruṇikaḥ so 'dhyupekṣya svaṃ dṛṣṭadharmaṃsukhavihāraṃ pareṣāmarthāya parayujyate /
T06bsa034_u:4293: viśārado bhavati na pareṣāmasya dharmaṃ deśayataḥ smṛtiḥ pratibhānaṃ - va śāradyabhayāt pramuṣyate /
T06bsa034_u:4296: aparikhinnamānasaśca (Dutt 164) bhavati balavān pratisaṃkhyānabahulaḥ akilāsī catasṛṇāṃ pariṣadāṃ dharmadeśanāyai /
T06bsa034_u:4298: tatra pañcabhirākāraireva sarvākāraguṇayuktasya bodhisattvasya kalyāṇamitrasyābandhyaṃ kalyāṇamitrakaraṇīyaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4299: sa hi pareṣāmādita eva hitasukhaiṣī bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4302: yena copāyena yadrupayā dharmadeśanayā yaḥ sattvaḥ śakyarūpo bhavati vinetuṃ tatra śakto bhavati pratibalaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4306: tatra pañcabhirākāraistatkalyāṇamitraṃ prasādapadasthitaṃ bhavati yenainaṃ pare 'tyarthamabhiprasīdantyanuśraveṇāpi śrutvā prāgeva sammukhaṃ nirīkṣya
T06bsa034_u:4309: niṣkuhakaśca bhavati na pareṣāṃ kuhanārthamīryāpathaṃ sthairyaṃ vā pratisaṃkhyāya kalpayati
T06bsa034_u:4310: anīrṣukaśca bhavati na pareṣāṃ dharmyaṃ kathāṃ lābhasatkāraṃ vā ārabhyāmarṣamutpādayati /
T06bsa034_u:4312: dharmakathane paraiḥ labhamāno 'pi vipulaṃ lābhasatkāraṃ paramapadiśati
T06bsa034_u:4315: yathā svena lābhasatkāreṇa tuṣṭo bhavati tathā bhṛśataraṃ paralābhena parasatkāreṇa tuṣṭo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4319: tatra pañcabhirākārairayaṃ kalyāṇamitrabhūto bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ vineyānāṃ kalyāṇamitrakāryaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:4326: tadyathā śrāvakabhūmāvavavādānuśāsanañca bhūyastata uttari veditavyaṃ tadyathā balagotrapaṭale
T06bsa034_u:4330: niśritasya ca dhārmikeṣvarthasaṃyoga-viyogeṣu vaśavartanatayā avikampanatayā yathābhūtatvāviṣkaraṇatayā
T06bsa034_u:4332: tatra kalyāṇamitrasyāntikāddharmaṃ śrotukāmena bodhisattvena pañcākārayā saṃjñayā dharmaḥ śrotavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4340: tatra bodhisattvena kalyāṇamitrasyāntikāddharmaṃ śruṇvatā tasmindharmabhāṇake pudgale pañcasthāneṣvamanasikāraṃ kṛtvā 'vahitaśrotreṇa prasannamānasena dharmaḥ śrotavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4356: naivaṃ cittamabhisaṃskartavyaṃ paruṣavākyoyaṃ krodhano na ca madhuraṃ dharmaṃ bhāṣate nāhamataḥ śroṣyāmīti /
T06bsa034_u:4357: ityevaṃ pañcasu sthāneṣvamanasikāraṃ kṛtvā bodhisattvena sādareṇa saddharmaparigrahaḥ kāryo na jātu dharmaḥ pudgaladoṣeṇa duṣṭo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4359: mandaprajño bodhisattvaḥ pudgaladoṣeṣūpahatacitto dharmaṃ necchati śrotuṃ sa ātmana evāhitāya prajñāparihāṇāya pratipanno veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4365: yadbodhisattvastriṣu rāśiṣu sarvasattvānavasthāpya sukhitān duḥkhitān aduḥkhitāsukhitān sattvān sukhakāmānadhikṛtya sukhopasaṃhārādhyāśayagatena maitreṇa cetasā daśadiśaḥ spharitvā sattvādhimokṣeṇa viharati /
T06bsa034_u:4367: yatpunaḥ dharmamātrasaṃjñī dharmamātre sattvopacāramāśayataḥ saṃpaśyaṃstāmeva maitrīṃ bhāvayati
T06bsa034_u:4371: yathā sattvālambanā dharmālambanā 'nālambanā maitrī evaṃ karuṇā muditopekṣā api veditavyā
T06bsa034_u:4372: tatra bodhisattvo duḥkhitān sattvānārabhya duḥkhāpanayanādhyāśayo daśasu dikṣu karuṇāsahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati /
T06bsa034_u:4374: sukhitānvā punaḥ sattvānārabhya sukhānumodanādhyāśayo dasaśu dikṣu muditāsahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati /
T06bsa034_u:4376: sa teṣāmeva trividhānāṃ sattvānāmaduḥkhāsukhitānā duḥkhitānāṃ sukhitānāñca yathākramaṃ mohadveṣarāgakleśavivekādhyāśayo daśasu dikṣūpekṣāsahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati /
T06bsa034_u:4378: tatra yāni bodhisattvasya maitryādīnyapramāṇāni sattvālambanāni tānyanyatīrthya sādhāraṇāni veditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:4379: yāni punardharmālambanāni tāni śrāvakapratyekabuddhasādhāraṇāni na tvanyatīrthyasādhāraṇāni veditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:4384: ekama pramāṇaṃ hitādhyāśayasaṃgṛhītaṃ veditavyaṃ yaduta upekṣā /
T06bsa034_u:4388: tatra daśottaraśatākāraṃ duḥkhaṃ sattvadhātau saṃpaśyanto bodhisattvāḥ sattveṣu karuṇāṃ bhāvayanti
T06bsa034_u:4394: sammohavipākañca duḥkhaṃ yaistīvraiḥ śārīrairveditaiḥ spṛṣṭastasminnātmabhāve ahamiti vā mameti vā sammūḍho 'tyarthaṃ śocati /
T06bsa034_u:4396: trividhaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatayā saṃskāraduḥkhatayā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā ca /
T06bsa034_u:4410: jātirduḥkhaṃ jarāvyādhirmaraṇamapriyasaṃyogaḥ priyavinābhāvaḥ yadapīcchanparyeṣamāṇo na labhate tadapi duḥkham /
T06bsa034_u:4418: bhogavipattiduḥkham] ārogyavipattiduḥkhaṃ śīlavipattiduḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭi-[vipattiduḥkhaṃ] dṛṣṭadhārmikaduḥkhaṃ sāmparāyikañca duḥkham /
T06bsa034_u:4420: bhojanakāyapariṣkāravaikalyaduḥkhaṃ pānayānavastrālaṅkārabhāṇḍopaṣkarapariṣkāravaikalyaduḥkhaṃ gandhamālyavilepanapariṣkāravaikalyaduḥkhaṃ nṛtyagītavāditrapariṣkāravaikalyaduḥkham ālokapariṣkāravaikalyaduḥkhaṃ strīpuruṣaparicaryākāyapariṣkāravaikalyaduḥkhañca daśamam punaranyaṃ navavidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ veditavyam sarvaduḥkhaṃ mahāduḥkhaṃ sarvatomukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipratipattiduḥkhaṃ pravṛttiduḥkhamakāmakāraduḥkhaṃ vighātaduḥkhamānuṣaṅgikaṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvākārañca (Dutt 168) duḥkham /
T06bsa034_u:4422: tatra mahāduḥkhaṃ yaddīrghaṃkālikaṃ pragāḍhaṃ citraṃ nirantarañca /
T06bsa034_u:4423: tatra sarvatomukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ yannārakaṃ tairyagyonikaṃ pretalaukikaṃ sugatiparyāpannañca /
T06bsa034_u:4424: tatra vipratipattiduḥkhaṃ yad dṛṣṭe vā dharme paravyatikramāt parāpakārakaraṇāllabhate samutthāpayati
T06bsa034_u:4426: anayena vātmadṛṣṭadharmaduḥkhopakramāt svayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ samutthāpayati /
T06bsa034_u:4429: tatra pravṛttiduḥkhaṃ yat ṣaḍākārādaniyamādutpadyate saṃsāre saṃsarataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4431: mātāpitraniyamāt putradārāniyamāddāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyāniyamāt mitrāmātyajñātisālohitāniyamāt mātāpitarau bhūtvā yāvadvistareṇa mitrāmātyajñātisālohito bhūtvā 'pareṇa samayena saṃsarato vadhako bhavati pratyarthikaḥ pratyamitraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4432: bhogāniyamācca saṃsāre saṃsaran mahābhogo bhūtvā punarapareṇa samayena paramadaridro bhavati
T06bsa034_u:4446: tatrānuṣaṅgikaṃ duḥkhaṃ yadaṣṭāsu lokadharmeṣu duḥkhaṃ naśana dharmake naṣṭe kṣayadharmake kṣīṇe jarādharmake jīrṇe vyādhidharmake vyādhite maraṇadharmake mṛte
T06bsa034_u:4447: 'lābhato vā punarayaśasto vā nindāto vā yaddaḥkham /
T06bsa034_u:4450: tatra sarvākāraṃ duḥkhaṃ (Dutt 169) yatpañcākāraṃ yathoddiṣṭasukhavipakṣeṇa duḥkhaṃ hetuduḥkhaṃ vedayitaduḥkhaṃ sukhābhāvamātraduḥkhaṃ veditayānupacchedaduḥkhaṃ naiṣkramyapravivekopaśamasaṃbodhisukhavipakṣeṇa
T06bsa034_u:4454: ityetat pañcavidhaṃ pūrvakaṃ caikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya daśavidhaṃ dukhaṃ sarvākāramityucyate
T06bsa034_u:4456: pañcapañcāśadākāramaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya daśottaraśatākāraṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavati bodhisattvaḥ karuṇāyā ālambanaṃ yenālambanena bodhisattvānāṃ karuṇotpadyate vivardhate bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:4459: sammohavipākaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃskāraduḥkhatāsaṃgṛhītaṃ duḥkhamātyantikaṃ duḥkhaṃ hetuduḥkhaṃ jātiduḥkhaṃ svayaṃkṛtaupakramikaṃ duḥkhaṃ śīlavipattiduḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭivipattiduḥkhaṃ pūrvahetukaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahadduḥkhaṃ nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ sugatisaṃgṛhītaṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvavipratipattijaṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvapravṛttiduḥkhamajñānaduḥkhamaupacayikaṃ duḥkhamānuṣaṅgikaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedayitaduḥkhaṃ dauṣṭhulyaduḥkhañceti /
T06bsa034_u:4460: tatra caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ karuṇā mahākaruṇetyucyate gambhīraṃ sūkṣmaṃ durvijñeyaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhamālamvyotpannā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4462: tīvreṇa cābhogenālambane pravṛttā bhavati yadrūpeṇābhogenāyaṃ karuṇāviṣṭo bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpanayanahetoḥ svajīvitaśatānyapi parityajet prāgevaikaṃ jīvitaṃ prāgeva ca kāyapariṣkāram sarvaduḥkhayātanāprakārāṃścodvahet /
T06bsa034_u:4463: suviśuddhā ca bhavati tadyathā niṣṭhāgatānāśca bodhisattvānāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiviśuddhyā tathāgatānāñca tathāgatabhūmiviśuddhyā /
T06bsa034_u:4464: anena khalu daśottareṇākāraśatena ye bodhisattvaḥ karuṇāṃ bhāvayanti sattveṣu te sarvāṃ bodhisattvakaruṇāṃ bhāvayanti /
T06bsa034_u:4466: sattveṣu cātyarthaṃ snigdhacittāśca bhavanti premacittāśca kartukāmacittāścākhinnacittāśca duḥkhodbahanacittāśca karmaṇyavaśyacittāśca /
T06bsa034_u:4467: na ca tathā duḥkhasatyamabhisamitavata āryaśrāvakasya niṣṭhāgatasya dūrībhūtā (Dutt 170) nirvit-sahagatā
T06bsa034_u:4468: cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate yathā bodhisattvasyura sattveṣu karuṇāpūrvaṅgamena cittena daśottarākāraśatapatitametaṃ mahāntaṃ duḥkhaskandhaṃ saṃpaśyataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4469: na ca bodhisattva evaṃ karuṇāparibhāvitamānasaḥ kiñcidādhyātmikabāhyaṃ vastu yanna parityajet
T06bsa034_u:4475: tasmāttathāgatāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ santaḥ-kutra pratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvasya bodhiriti-samyak vyākurvāṇā vyākurvanti karuṇāpratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvasya bodhiriti /
T06bsa034_u:4476: tatraikaikamatra yathānirdiṣṭamapramāṇa[mapramāṇayā] samṛddhyā samṛddhiṃ bodhisattvasya pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:4496: avadyasamudācāre ātmana evāpratirūpatāṃ viditvā bodhisattvasya lajjā hrīḥ
T06bsa034_u:4498: sā punarllajjā bodhisattvasya prakṛtyaiva tīvrā bhavati prāgevābhyastā /
T06bsa034_u:4507: tathā bodhisattvasya kaukṛtye samutpanne sapratisaraṇe ānuṣaṅgike yā lajjā /
T06bsa034_u:4513: kliṣṭacittasanniyacchanatā kleśavaśā[na]nuyāyitā duḥkhādhivāsanaśīlatā vicitraprabhūtodriktairapi bhayabhairavairāmukhaiḥ samyak prayogāvikampanatā prakṛtisattvayogāt pratisaṃkhyānādvā dhīratā itīyaṃ dhṛtibalādhānatā svabhāvato veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4515: asyāḥ khalu bodhisattvānāṃ dhṛtibalādhānatāyāḥ samāsataḥ pañcavidhamadhiṣṭhānaṃ veditavyam
T06bsa034_u:4522: tatra pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairaparikhinnamānasatā bodhisattvānāṃ sarvasamyak prayogeṣu veditavyā
T06bsa034_u:4523: iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā balavān bhavati yena na parikhidyate /
T06bsa034_u:4526: punarupāyaparigṛhītenavīryāṃrambheṇa prayukto bhavati yena paurvāparyeṇa viśeṣaṃ samanupaśyan na parikhidyate /
T06bsa034_u:4527: tīvreṇa ca prajñāpratisaṃkhyānabalena samanvāgato bhavati yena na parikhidyate /
T06bsa034_u:4528: tīvrañcāsya bodhisattvasya sattveṣu kāruṇyacittamanukampācittaṃ satatasamitaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati yena na parikhidyate /
T06bsa034_u:4533: tasyaiva ca dharmasyārthaḥ parato vā suśruto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4535: evamapi ca dharmajñenārthajñena bodhisattvena tasyaiva ca dharmasyārthasyāvismaraṇāya prayogo 'nirākṛto bhavatyanyasya cābhinavasyābhinavasyottarottarasya dharmārthaviśeṣasya jñānāya /
T06bsa034_u:4536: śrutacintāniṣṭhāgatenāpi cānena kālāntarakṛtaḥ paripākaḥ prasādaḥ tasmindharme cārthe ca pratilabdho bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4537: ebhirākārairbodhisattvasyāpramāṇā paripūrṇā aviparītā ca śāstrajñatā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4539: iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvalokamārabhyaivaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti-kṛcchraṃ vatāyaṃ loka āpanno
T06bsa034_u:4540: yaduta jāyate 'pi jīryate 'pi mriyate 'pi cyavatepyupapadyatepyatha ca punaramī sattvā jarāmaraṇasyottari niḥsaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ [na]
T06bsa034_u:4544: niṣkaṣāyānutsadakaṣāyakālatāñca yaduta pañcakaṣāyānārabhya āyuṣkaṣāyaṃ [sattvakaṣāyaṃ] kleśakaṣāyaṃ kalpakaṣāyam /
T06bsa034_u:4545: tadyathā etarhyalpaṃ jīvitaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ yaściraṃ jīvati sa varṣaśatam /
T06bsa034_u:4546: tadyathaitarhi sattvā yadbhūyasā [a]mātṛjñā apitṛjñā aśrāmaṇyā abrāhmaṇyā
T06bsa034_u:4547: na kulajyeṣṭhāpacāyakā nārthakarā na kṛtyakarā na iha loke na paraloke avadye bhayadarśino na dānāni dadati na puṇyāni kurvanti nopavāsamupavasanti na śīlaṃ samādāya vartante /
T06bsa034_u:4548: tadyathaitarhi yadbhūyasā 'dharmarāgāśca viṣamalobhāśca śastrādānadaṇḍādānakalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādaśāṭhyavañcananikṛtimṛṣāvādamithyādharmasaṃgṛhītā anekavidhāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ prajñāyante /
T06bsa034_u:4549: tadyathaitarhi saddharmapralopāya saddharmāntardhānāya saddharmapratirūpakāṇi prabhūtāni prādurbhūtāni mithyādharmārtha-santīraṇāpūrvikāṇi /
T06bsa034_u:4554: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sattvalokamārabhya lokajño bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4555: punarbodhisattvo bhājanalokasya saṃvartavivartaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yathā bhājanalokaḥ saṃvartate vivartate ca /
T06bsa034_u:4557: lokanirodhagāminīñca pratipadaṃ lokasyāsvādamādīnavañca niḥsaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
T06bsa034_u:4558: punarbodhisattvaḥ cakṣuryāvanmanaḥ arūpiṇaśca skandhāṃścāturmahābhautikañca puruṣasya samucchrayametāvanmanuṣyatvamityucyate
T06bsa034_u:4559: tatra yā saṃjñā ātmā vā sattvo veti saṃjñāmātramevaitat /
T06bsa034_u:4560: tatra yā pratijñā ahaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyāmi yāvanmanasā dharmāna vijānāmīti pratijñāmātrameva tat /
T06bsa034_u:4561: tatra yo vyavahāra ityapi sa āyuṣmānevaṃnāmā evaṃjātīya evaṃgotra evamāhāra evaṃ sukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evaṃ dīryāyurevaṃ cirasthitika evamāyuṣparyanta iti vyavahāramātramevaitaditi sarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:4562: iti hi sa bodhisattvaḥ sattvalokapravṛttiñca bhājanalokapravṛttiñca aṣṭākāralokopaparīkṣārthañca [lokaparamārthaṃ ca] yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:4564: punarbodhisattvo vṛddhatarakaṃ guṇaprativiśiṣṭatarakaṃ dṛṣṭvā samyak saṃbhāṣayatyutthāyāsanenopanimantrayati (Dutt 174)
T06bsa034_u:4566: tulyaṃ vā punarvayasā guṇaiśca dṛṣṭvā samyagālapati pratisamodayati ślakṣṇairmadhurairvacanapathaiḥ
T06bsa034_u:4568: hīnaṃ vā punarvayasā guṇaiśca dṛṣṭvā śaktyā guṇādhānamārabhya protsāhayati /
T06bsa034_u:4573: nāpyarthikaṃ kenaciddharmāmiṣeṇa taṃ jñātvā vimukho bhavati bhṛkuṭīkṛtaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4576: tathā sarveṣāmeva hīnatulyaviśiṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ pūrvābhibhāṣī ca bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4577: ehi svāgatavādī samyak pratiśāmakaśca samyagdharmāmiṣābhyāṃ yathāśaktyā saṃgrāhakaśca /
T06bsa034_u:4578: nāpi ca sattveṣu kuṭilagāmbhīryopeto bhavati na garvitaḥ kenacidevocchrayaviśeṣeṇa /
T06bsa034_u:4579: yathopāttaṃ sattvaṃ sarvopakaraṇairapi nādhyupekṣate glānaṃ vā svasthaṃ vā ānulomikena ca kāyavākkarmaṇā /
T06bsa034_u:4580: yathā saṃstutaṃ tathaivāsaṃstutaṃ sarvaṃ mitrasakhā ca bhavati vigatapratyarthikaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4581: sarveṣāñcānāthānāmapratisaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ cārthakriyāṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:4582: na ca kenacit paryāyeṇa pareṣāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyamupasaṃharati kaccideṣāṃ muhūrtamapyasparśavihāro bhavatviti /
T06bsa034_u:4583: etameva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā parihasannapi paraiḥ saha yuktaparihāso bhavati nāyuktaparihāsaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4584: asatyavacanāni ca na kathayatyapi niratyayaiḥ paramaviśrambhopagatairvayasyakaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4586: kroddho 'pi ca pareṣāṃ na marmāṇi kīrtayati /
T06bsa034_u:4587: paraiśca kāyena vācā vāhataḥ san pratisaṃkhyāya dharmatāṃ vā pratisarati ātmānameva vā 'parādhikaṃ
T06bsa034_u:4594: dṛṣṭadharmahitārthaṃ vā bhogapratisaṃyuktamārabhya utthānasaṃpanno bhavatyārakṣāsaṃpannaḥ samajīvī /
T06bsa034_u:4599: nikṣiptasya viśvāsena paradraviṇasya na drogdhā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4600: upāttasya parata ṛṇasya na visaṃvādayitā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4602: ratnaṃ vā ratnasammatamupādāya yāvat kārṣāpaṇe 'pi sammūḍhānāṃ na vipralambhayitā bhavati vipralobhyainām /
T06bsa034_u:4604: teṣu ca teṣvarthakaraṇīyeṣu parairāyācitaḥ san sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati na vikampate nānyenānyaṃ pratisarati /
T06bsa034_u:4606: rājyaṃ vā punaḥ kārayan dharmeṇa kārayati nāgharmeṇa /
T06bsa034_u:4610: dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditayā śrute mate vijñāte vijñātavāditayā adṛṣṭe 'dṛṣṭavāditayā aśrute 'mate
T06bsa034_u:4611: avijñātavāditayā ityebhirevaṃ bhāgīyairdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo yathā loke vijñātavyo yathā loke vartitavyaṃ tatsarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tasmāllokajña ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:4613: iha bodhisattvaḥ arthārthī parato dharmaṃ śruṇoti na vyañjanābhisaṃskārārthī /
T06bsa034_u:4614: so 'rthārthī dharmaṃ śuṇvan na vyañjanārthī prākṛtayāpi vācā dharmaṃ deśayamānamarthapratisaraṇo bodhisattvaḥ satkṛtya śṛṇoti /
T06bsa034_u:4616: prajānan yuktipratiśaraṇo bhavati na sthavireṇābhijñātena vā pudgalena tathāgatena vā [saṃghena vā] ime dharmā bhāṣitā iti pudgalapratisaraṇo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4617: sa evaṃ yuktipratisaraṇo na pudgalapratisaraṇastattvārthāt na vicalati /
T06bsa034_u:4622: tathāhi neyārthasya sūtrasya nānāmukhaprakṛtārthavibhāgo 'niścitaḥ saṃdehakaro bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4627: sa yadbhāvanāmayena jñānena jñātavyaṃ na tacchakyaṃ śrutacintāvijñānamātrakeṇa vijñātumiti (Dutt 176) viditvā paramagambhīrānapi tathāgatabhāṣitāndharmān śrutvā na pratikṣipati
T06bsa034_u:4631: tatraiṣu caturṣu pratisaraṇeṣu samāsataścaturṇāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ saṃprakāśitam /
T06bsa034_u:4636: yatsarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvaparyāyeṣu yāvadbhāvikatayā yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca bhāvanāmayamasaktamavivartyaṃ jñānam /
T06bsa034_u:4638: yatpunaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmeva sarvalakṣaṇeṣu yāvadbhāvikatayā yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca bhāvanāmayamasaktamavivartyaṃ jñānam /
T06bsa034_u:4640: yatpunaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmeva sarvanirvacaneṣu yāvadbhāvikatayā yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca bhāvanāmayamasaktamavivartyaṃ jñānam /
T06bsa034_u:4642: yatpunaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmeva sarvaprakārapadaprabhedeṣu yāvadbhāvikatayā yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca bhāvanāmayamasaktamavivartyaṃ jñānam /
T06bsa034_u:4644: etāścatasro bodhisattvapratisaṃvido niśrityo 'prameyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ pañcasthānakauśalyaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:4649: ata uttari svayamabhisaṃbodho nāsti kutaḥ punaḥ pareṣāṃ prakāśanā /
T06bsa034_u:4655: sa punaḥ puṇyajñānasaṃbhāro bodhisattvasya prathame kalpāsaṃkhyeye mṛdurveditavyo dvitīye madhyastṛtīye 'dhimātro veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4656: kathaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saptatriṃsatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu yogaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:4660: sa (Dutt 177) dvividhenāpi yānanayena tān yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti śrāvakayānanayena ca mahāyānanayena ca /
T06bsa034_u:4662: tadyathā śrāvakabhūmau sarvaṃ yathā nirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:4663: kathañca bodhisattvo mahāyānanayena saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
T06bsa034_u:4664: iha bodhisattvaḥ kāye kāyānudarśī viharan naiva kāyaṃ kāyabhāvato vikalpayati /
T06bsa034_u:4670: yathā kāye kāyānupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānaṃ evamavaśiṣṭāni smṛtyupasthānāni aviśiṣṭāśca bodhipakṣyā dharmā veditavyāḥ
T06bsa034_u:4671: / sa naiva kāyādīndharmān duḥkhato vā vikalpayati samudayato vā /
T06bsa034_u:4674: nirabhilāpyasvabhāvadharmatayā ca duḥkhadharmatāṃ samudayadharmatāṃ nirodhadharmatāṃ mārgadharmatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:4677: tatra yā bodhisattvasyaiṣā dharmāṇāmevamavikalpanā so 'sya śamatho draṣṭavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4682: sarvaprapañcasaṃjñāsu anābhogavāhanaḥ tasmiṃśca nirabhilāpye vastumātrai nirnimittatayā ca nirvikalpacittāśāntyā sarvadharmasamataikarasagāmī /
T06bsa034_u:4697: yā bodhisattvasya sarvasattveṣu karuṇāsahagatā apekṣā yacca sarvasaṃskāreṣu yathābhūtasarvaparijñānaṃ yā cānuttarasamyaksaṃbodhijñāne spṛhā /
T06bsa034_u:4698: yacca sattvāpekṣāṃ niśritya saṃsārāparityāgaḥ yā ca saṃskāreṣu yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ niśrityāsaṃkliṣṭacittasya saṃsārasaṃsṛtī /
T06bsa034_u:4708: kathañca bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ parīttāni kuśalamūlāni apramāṇaphalatāyāmupanayati /
T06bsa034_u:4709: iha bodhisattvo yat kiṃcit sattvaṃ pratyavaramapi vastvantataḥ saktuprasṛtaṃ pratyavara eva kṣetre pradāpayati antatastiryagyonigate 'pi parīttaṃ tacca prāṇibhūte dāpayitvā cānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃmbodhau pariṇāmayati /
T06bsa034_u:4712: bhavati kathaṃ ca bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāmalpakṛcchreṇa vipulānyapramāṇāni kuśalamūlāni saṃjanayati
T06bsa034_u:4719: mithyāprayuktānāmagnipraveśātaṭaprapātā 'naśanasthānādibhiḥ samyagdhyānaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya cāyatyāṃ akṛchreṇa sahaiva sukhena saha saumanasyena svargopapattaye vyapadiśati /
T06bsa034_u:4721: punargambhīrāṃstathāgatabhāṣitān śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktāndharmān tathā tathā uttānīkaroti saṃprakāśayati yathā pare śrutvā tīvrañca saṃvegamutpādayanti tīvraṃ ca prasādam /
T06bsa034_u:4724: punarbodhisattvo yāni kānicinmālyāni gandhajātāni ca loke vividhāni pravarāṇi praṇītāni taiḥ prasādasahagatenādhyāśayena buddhadharmasaṃgha[tri]ratnapūjāmadhimucyate parāṃścādhimocayati daśasu dikṣu /
T06bsa034_u:4725: punaḥ sarvā diśastenaiva prasādasahagatenādhyāśayena spharitvā sarvāṃ triratnapūjāmabhyanumodate parāṃścābhyanumodayati /
T06bsa034_u:4726: punarbuddhānusmṛtiṃ satatasamitaṃ bhāvayati pareṣāñca samādāpayati dharmānusmṛtiṃ saṃghānusmṛtiṃ yāvaddevatānusmṛtim /
T06bsa034_u:4727: punarmanojalpaistriratna-namaskriyayā abandhyaṃ kālaṃ karoti kārayati ca /
T06bsa034_u:4732: sarva-skhalitāni sarvavyatikramāṃśca kalyāṇena śikṣākāmānugatena cetasā sarvadikṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike pratideśayati /
T06bsa034_u:4734: tasyaivamabhīkṣṇaṃ skhalitaṃ pratideśayataḥ sarvakarmāvaraṇebhyo vimokṣo bhavatyalpakṛcchreṇa
T06bsa034_u:4735: punaḥ prabhūtairvicitraiśca nirmāṇaiḥ sarvadikṣu buddhadharmasaṃghādhiṣṭhānaṃ sattvādhiṣṭhānañcāprameyaṃ bodhisattvaḥ ṛddhimāṃścetovaśiprāptaḥ puṇyaparigrahaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:4746: ānulomiko vibandhasthāyī visabhāgāśayaḥ avaṣṭambhajaḥ kṛtaprakṛtikaḥ viśuddhaśca ṣaṣṭha upāyaḥ
T06bsa034_u:4748: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvameva tāvad yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayitukāmo bhavati teṣāṃ ślakṣṇairmadhuraiḥ kāyavāksamudācārairupapradānānuvṛttisamudācāraiścātmagataṃ teṣāṃ pratighātamapanayati /
T06bsa034_u:4752: tañca punardharmaṃ yathārhaṃ supraveśaṃ gamakaṃ kālenānupūrvamaviparītamarthopasaṃhitañca deśayati /
T06bsa034_u:4754: sattvavinaye paramayā ca kartukāmatayā anukampācittena samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4755: sa ṛddhyā cittādeśanayā yuktarūpayā dharmadeśanayā paraṃ vā 'dhyeṣya vicitrairvā prabhūtaiśca nirmitaiḥ sattvānvinayati /
T06bsa034_u:4756: saṃkṣiptānāñcārthopasaṃhitānāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ pravistaraṇatayā ativistṛtānāṃ cābhisaṃkṣepaṇatayā tathā uddeśadānena anusmaraṇaparipṛcchādānena dhṛtānāñcodgṛhītānāñca dharmāṇāṃ samyagarthavivaraṇatayā sarvālambanasamādhyavatāramukheṣucānulomikyā avavādānusāsanyā sattvānanugṛhṇāti sattvānāmarthamācarati ye ca sattvā gambhīrāṇāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ sūtrāntānāmābhiprāyikaṃ tathāgatānāmarthamavijñāya ye te sūtrāntāḥ niḥsvabhāvatāṃ dharmāṇāmabhivadanti nirvastukatāmanutpannāniruddhatāmā kāśasamatāṃ māyāsvapnopamatāṃ dharmāṇāmabhivadanti teṣāṃ yathāvadarthamavijñāyotrastamānasāḥ tān sūtrāntān sarveṇa sarvaṃ pratikṣipanti naite tathāgatabhāṣitā iti /
T06bsa034_u:4757: teṣāmapi sattvānāṃ sa bodhisattvaḥ ānulomikenopāyakauśalyena teṣāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ tathāgatābhiprāyikamarthaṃ yathāvadanulomayati /
T06bsa034_u:4760: yathā neme dharmāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante api tvabhilāpātmakaḥ svabhāva eṣāṃ nāsti teneme niḥsvabhāvā ityucyante /
T06bsa034_u:4761: yadyapyetavabhilāpyavastu vidyate yadāśrityābhilāpāḥ pravartante tadapi yairabhilāpairyat svabhāvamabhilapyate tadapi na tatsvabhāva paramārthataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4762: tasmānnirvastukā ityucyante evañca sati te 'bhilāpyāḥ svabhāvā dharmāṇāmādita eva sarveṇa (Dutt 181) sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante /
T06bsa034_u:4763: te kimutpatsyante vā nirotsyante vā tasmādanutpannā aniruddhā ityucyante /
T06bsa034_u:4764: tadyathā cākāśe vicitrāṇi prabhūtāni rūpāṇi rūpakarmāṇi copalabhyante /
T06bsa034_u:4765: sarveṣāñca teṣāṃ rūpāṇāṃ rūpakarmaṇāṃ cāvakāśaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:4767: yadā ca punastad rūpaṃ tāni ca rūpakarmāṇyapanītāni bhavanti tadā rūpābhāvamātrātmakameva pariśuddhamākāśaṃ khyāti /
T06bsa034_u:4768: evaṃ tasminnākāśasthānīye nirabhilāpye vastuni vividhābhilāpakṛtāḥ saṃjñā vikalpāḥ prapañcasaṃjñānugatāḥ rūpakarmasthānīyāḥ pravartante /
T06bsa034_u:4769: sarveṣāñca teṣāmabhilāpakṛtānāṃ saṃjñāvikalpānāṃ prapañcasaṃjñānugatānāṃ citrarūpakarmasthānīyānāṃ tannirabhilāpyaṃ vastvākāśa sthānīyamavakāśaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:4770: yadā ca punarbodhisattvairjñānenāryeṇa te 'bhilāpasamutthitā mithyāsaṃjñāvikalpāḥ prapañcasaṃjñānugatāḥ sarveṇa sarvamapanītā bhavanti tadā teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ paramāryāṇāṃ tenāryajñānena tannirabhilāpyaṃ vastu
T06bsa034_u:4772: na ca tasmāt paramanyaṃ svabhāvamasya mṛgayante /
T06bsa034_u:4774: tadyathā māyā na ca yathā khyāti tathāsti /
T06bsa034_u:4775: na ca punaḥ sarveṇaiva sarvaṃ nāsti tanmāyākṛtam /
T06bsa034_u:4776: evaṃ na caite dharmā yathaivābhilāpasaṃstavavaśena khyānti bālānāṃ tathaiva saṃvidyante /
T06bsa034_u:4777: na ca punaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante pāramārthika-nirabhilāpyātmanā /
T06bsa034_u:4778: te cānena nayapraveśena na santo nāsanta ityadvayā māyāvat /
T06bsa034_u:4780: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasmāddharmadhātorna kiñcidutkṣipati na ca kiñcit pratikṣipati nonī-karoti nādhikaṃ karoti na vināśayati /
T06bsa034_u:4784: tatra katamo bodhisattvasya vibandhasthāyī upāyaḥ iha bodhisattvo
T06bsa034_u:4787: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pitṛjñāḥ śrāmaṇyāḥ brāhmaṇyā vistareṇa pūrvavat yāvatsacecchīlaṃ samādāya vartadhve evamahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ bhojanapānādīn kāyapariṣkārānyāvadarthamanupradāsyāmi anyathā na dāsyāmīti /
T06bsa034_u:4790: arthikānāṃ (Dutt 182) tathā śilpakarmasthānavidyārthikānāṃ tathā tena saha sakhyārthikānāmāvāhavivāhārthikānāmābhakṣaṇasaṃbhakṣaṇārthikānāṃ kṛtyasahāyārthikānāñca sattvānāṃ kāryavipratibandhenāvatiṣṭhate /
T06bsa034_u:4791: evamahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ vistareṇa yāvatkṛtyeṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ gamiṣyāmi sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pūrvavat
T06bsa034_u:4796: sa cenmātṛjñāḥ [pitṛjñā] bhavatheti vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavato 'smādvyasanādvimocayiṣyāmīti
T06bsa034_u:4798: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pūrvavat vistareṇaivamahaṃ bhavato 'smādbhayāt paritrāsyāmīti /
T06bsa034_u:4800: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatha vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavatāṃ priyasamāgamamapriyavinābhāvaṃ copasaṃhariṣyāmīti /
T06bsa034_u:4802: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatha vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavato 'smādvyādhiduḥkhāt parimocayiṣyāmīti
T06bsa034_u:4803: te ca sattvāḥ evaṃ vibandhāvasthitasya bodhisattvasya laghuladhveva tasmin kuśalasamādāne pāpaprahāṇe ca yathākāmaṃ karaṇīyā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:4805: ye punaḥ sattvā evaṃ vibandhasthāyino bodhisattvasya yathāparikīrtiteṣu vastuṣu na laghu-laghveva yathākāmaṃ pratipadyante teṣāṃ bodhisattvo yathā parikīrtitairvastubhirarthikānāṃ tāni vastūni nānuprayacchati hitakāmatayā /
T06bsa034_u:4807: vyasanasthān bhītānpriyāpriyasaṃyogavisaṃyogakāmān vyādhiduḥkhena ārtān sattvān kañcitkālamadhyupekṣate hitakāmatayā /
T06bsa034_u:4809: te ca sattvā evaṃ niṣṭhurakarmaṇā pratipadyamānasya bodhisattvasya na tvāśayataḥ apareṇa samayena yathākāmakaraṇīyā bhavanti pāpaprahāṇāya kuśalasamādānāya ca /
T06bsa034_u:4811: bodhisattvasya nāpi ca vyasanasthā nāpi vistareṇa yāvadvyādhitāste cāsya saṃstutāḥ sapraṇayāḥ
T06bsa034_u:4814: ta evaṃ bodhisattvena samādāpyamānāḥ sa cedvikampanena [na]
T06bsa034_u:4823: tena ca tānsattvāṃstasmin pāpaprahāṇe kuśalasamādāne ca sanniyojayati /
T06bsa034_u:4826: iha bodhisattvaḥ svāmibhūto vā rājabhūto vā ādhipatyaprāptaḥ svaṃ vā parijanaṃ sva vā vijitamevaṃ samyak samanuśāsti /
T06bsa034_u:4827: yo me kaścitparijane vā vijite vā
T06bsa034_u:4828: 'mātṛjño bhaviṣyati vistareṇa yāvaddauśīlyaṃ samādāya vartiṣyate tasyāhamucitaṃ vā bhaktācchādanaṃ samucchetsyāmi vārayiṣyāmi vā
T06bsa034_u:4829: tāḍayiṣyāmi vā sarvasvena vā viyojayiṣyāmi sarveṇa vā sarva vijitāt pravāsayiṣyāmīti /
T06bsa034_u:4830: tatra ca karmaṇi kuśalān dakṣān pauruṣeyānviniyojayati
T06bsa034_u:4831: / te ca sattvāstasmānmahato daṇḍakarmaṇo bhītāḥ pāpañca prajahati kuśalañca samādāya vartante
T06bsa034_u:4832: akāmakā api tena balāvaṣṭambhena kuśale sanniyojyante te sattvā anenopāyena /
T06bsa034_u:4835: saha bodhisattvena yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ pūrvamevopakāraḥ parīttaḥ prabhūto vā kṛto bhavati dānena vā vyasanaparitrāṇatayā (Dutt 184) vā bhayaparitrāṇatayā vā
T06bsa034_u:4836: priyāpriyasaṃyogavisayogopasaṃharaṇatayā vā vyādhisaśamanatayā vā teṣāṃ kṛtajñānāṃ kṛtavedināṃ
T06bsa034_u:4841: sa cedyūyameva mātṛjñā bhavatha pitṛjñā vistareṇa yāvacchīlaṃ samādāya vartadhve kṛtasya pratikṛtaṃ kuśalasamādānaṃ parataḥ pratyāsaṃśate tena copāyena parāṃstatra kuśale samādāpayati /
T06bsa034_u:4847: sa na cirasyedānīṃ jambūdvīpe anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate /
T06bsa034_u:4851: / punarbodhisattvastuṣitāddevanikāyāccyutvā ucce vā sammate vā kule
T06bsa034_u:4852: upapadyate yaduta rājakule vā purohitakule vā /
T06bsa034_u:4860: nāvaramātrakametaddharmākhyānaṃ bhavati yatredānīṃ brahmā [svayaṃ] dharmadeśanāyai bhagavantamadhyeṣata iti /
T06bsa034_u:4863: paravyāpāritena na tu svena sattveṣu kāruṇyacittena nātmana eva pratirupatāṃ viditveti /
T06bsa034_u:4869: yasmādupāyādanya upāya uttari atikrāntataraśca praṇītataraśca nāsti /
T06bsa034_u:4871: itīdaṃ ṣaḍvidhamupāyakauśalyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ samāsavyāsanirdeśataḥ pratihatānāṃ sattvānāṃ pratighātāya nayanāya madhyasthānāmavatārāyāvatīrṇānāṃ paripākāya paripakkānāṃ vimocanāya iti nāstyata uttari nāstyato bhūyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4880: iha bodhisattvastadrūpāṃ smṛtiprajñābalādhānatāṃ pratilabhate yathā śrutamātrakeṇaivānāmnātān vacasā 'paricitān
T06bsa034_u:4887: iha bodhisattvastadrūpaṃ samādhivaśitāṃ pratilabhate yathā yāni mantrapadānīti saṃśamanāya
T06bsa034_u:4892: iha bodhisattvaḥ svayaṃ pragāḍhahetucaritaḥ prajñāvān praviviktavihārī vācamapyanudīrayan darśanapathamapyanāgacchan kenacit saha tathā mātrābhojī asaṃkīrṇabhojī ekaprakārāśanabhojī pradhyānaparataḥ alpaṃ rātrau svapan bahu jāgran yānīmāni tathāgatabhāṣitāni
T06bsa034_u:4893: bodhisattvakṣāntilābhāya mantrapadāni tadyathā iṭi miṭi kiṭibhiḥ kṣāntipadāni svāhā /
T06bsa034_u:4895: sa teṣāṃ mantrapadānāmevaṃ samyak pratipanna evamarthaṃ svayamevāśrutvā kutaścit pratividhyati
T06bsa034_u:4896: tad yathā nāstyeṣāṃ mantrapadānāṃ kācidarthapariniṣpattiḥ nirarthā evaite /
T06bsa034_u:4899: iyatā tena teṣāṃ mantrapadānāmarthaḥ supratividdho bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4900: sa (Dutt 186) teṣāṃ mantrapadānāmarthaṃ samyak pratividhya tenaivārthānusāreṇa sarvadharmāṇāmatyarthaṃ samyak pratividhyati svayamevāśrutvā parataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4904: sa evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvārthaṃ samyak pratividhya tasmātparamarthaṃ na samanveṣate /
T06bsa034_u:4906: tena bodhisattvena pratilabdhā tāni dhāraṇīpadānyadhiṣṭhāya bodhisattvakṣāntirvaktavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4907: tasyāśca lābhāt sa bodhisattvo na cirasyedānīmadhyāśayaviśuddhiṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:4910: tatra dharmadhāraṇīmarthadhāraṇīñca bodhisattvaḥ prathamasya kalpāsaṃkhyeyasyātyayācchuddhādhyāśayabhūmipraviṣṭo labhate niyatāṃ sthirāmudārāñca /
T06bsa034_u:4911: tataḥ punararvāg labhate praṇidhānavaśena vā dhyānasanniśrayeṇa vā natu niyatāṃ na sthirāṃ nodārām /
T06bsa034_u:4913: bodhisattvakṣāntilābhāya tu dhāraṇī yathaiva vyākhyātā tathaiva labhyate /
T06bsa034_u:4914: etāḥ punaḥ sarvā dhāraṇīrbodhisattvaścaturbhiguṇairyukto labhate nānyatamavikalaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4919: dharmārāmaśca bhavati dharmarato bodhisattvapiṭakamārabhya piṭakamātṛkāṃ vā tatra katamadbodhisattvasya bodhisattvapraṇidhānam /
T06bsa034_u:4927: āyatyāṃ sarvabodhisattvakuśalasaṃgrahāya sarvaguṇasaṃgrahāya ca samāsato vyāsato vā praṇidhānaṃ bodhisattvasya samyak praṇidhānamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:4943: iha bodhisattvasya sarvābhilāṣātmakena svabhāvena virahitaṃ nirabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ vastu paśyataḥ yā cittasya sthitiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4946: iha bodhisattvasya tadeva nirabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ vastu mithyāvikalpasamutthāpitena kleśena duḥkhena ca parigṛhītatvādanekadoṣaduṣṭaṃ samanupaśyato yā āyatyāṃ tatrāpraṇidhānapūrvikā cittasthitiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4949: iha bodhisattvasya tadeva nirabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ vastu sarvavikalpaprapañca nimittānyapanīya yathābhūtaṃ śāntato manasi kurvato yā cittasthitiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4952: nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ dvayamidaṃ saccāsacca /
T06bsa034_u:4953: tatra saṃskṛtamasaskṛtañca sat asadātmā vātmīyaṃ vā /
T06bsa034_u:4956: yat punaretadasadeva vastu tatra bodhisattvena na praṇidhānaṃ nāpraṇidhānaṃ karaṇīyam /
T06bsa034_u:4959: evaṃ hi bodhisattva eṣu triṣu samādhiṣu yogaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:4962: bhāvanā-nayapraveśena ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yeṣu śrāvakāḥ śikṣante
T06bsa034_u:4964: catvārīmāni dharmoddānāni yāni buddhāśca bodhisattvāśca sattvānāṃ viśuddhaye deśayanti /
T06bsa034_u:4970: etat pratisaṃyuktārtha yadbhūyasā dharmamudīrayanti buddhabodhisattvāḥ sattvānām /
T06bsa034_u:4975: iha bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārāṇāmabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ nityakālameva nāstītyupalabhyānityataḥ sarvasaṃskārān paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:4976: punaravijñātasya bhūtatastasyaiva nirabhilāpyasya vastunaḥ aparijñānahetukamudayavyayamupalabhyatān nirabhilāpyasvabhāvān sarvasaṃskārānanityataḥ samanupaśyati /
T06bsa034_u:4980: tasmātteṣāṃ naiva hetuto naiva svabhāvato vidyamānatāṃ samanupaśyati /
T06bsa034_u:4984: tasmātteṣāṃ svabhāvato vidyamānatāṃ samanupaśyati no tu hetutaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4988: tasmātteṣāṃ bodhisattvo hetuto vidyamānatāṃ (Dutt 189) paśyati no tu svabhāvataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4989: sa eva triṣvadhvasvavyavacchinnāṃ saṃskāra-santatiṃ pravartamānāṃ dṛṣṭvā ekaikasmin saṃskārakṣaṇe trīṇi saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:4994: taṃ pūrvaniruddhaṃ saṃskārajñaṇasvabhāvamapekṣya tasyotpannasya yadanyatvamanyathātvaṃ vā sā jareti paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:4995: tasmājjātikṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ tasyaivotpannasya saṃskārakṣaṇasya yaḥ svabhāvavināśaḥ sa vyaya iti paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:4997: tatsvabhāvāneva tasya jātiṃ sthitiṃ jarāṃ ca /
T06bsa034_u:4999: tasmācca kṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ ca eva tasya saṃskārakṣaṇa[svabhāva]syāpagamaḥ sa eva teṣāṃ jātyādīnāmiti yathābhūtaṃ paśyati tānyetāni catvāryaṣi saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānyabhisamasya saṃskārāṇāṃ samāsato dvayāvasthā-prabhāvitāni
T06bsa034_u:5001: tatra bhagavatā yo bhāvastadekaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
T06bsa034_u:5003: sa ca bhāvasteṣāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ sthityanyathātvaprabhāvita iti kṛtvā tṛtīyaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
T06bsa034_u:5004: tatra bodhisattvaḥ saṃskāramātraṃ sthāpayitvā na tasya jātiṃ na sthitiṃ na jarāṃ nānityatāṃ sarvakālaṃ dravyasvabhāvapariniṣpattitaḥ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:5007: nāsyānyāṃ jātiṃ na sthitiṃ na jarāṃ nānityatām /
T06bsa034_u:5008: saṃskāramātrameva ca jāyamānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ jīryamāṇaṃ vinaśyamānamupalabhate /
T06bsa034_u:5010: yuktyāpi bodhisattvo vimṛśannetān jātyādīn dravyato nopalabhate /
T06bsa034_u:5012: sa cedrūpādisaṃskāravinirmuktaḥ anyo jātidharmaḥ syāt sa yathaiva rūpādikaḥ saṃskāraḥ svātmanotpadyate
T06bsa034_u:5014: evaṃ sati dve janmanī syātām yacca saṃskāra-janma yacca
T06bsa034_u:5015: jāti-janma tatra tatsaṃskārajanma tasmājjātijanmanaḥ ananyadeva vā syāt /
T06bsa034_u:5021: yathā jātirevaṃ sthitirjarā vināśaśca vistareṇa veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5022: sa cedvināśo nāma svabhāvato dharmaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ syāt so 'pyutpadyeta nirudhyeta vā /
T06bsa034_u:5023: yadā ca vināśa utpannaḥ syāttadā sarvasaṃskārairniruddhairbhavitavyaṃ syāt
T06bsa034_u:5024: / evaṃ satyalpakṛcchreṇa nirodhasamāpannasyeva cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāmapravṛttiḥ syāt
T06bsa034_u:5025: tasya ca punarvināśasya nirodhāt niruddhairapi taiḥ saṃskāraiḥ punareva bhavitavyaṃ syāt vināśa eṣāṃ nāstīti kṛtvā /
T06bsa034_u:5026: ato vināśa utpadyate nirudhyate ceti na yujyate /
T06bsa034_u:5027: na ca punaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā sarvakālāstitāñca dravyasatāṃ svabhāvapariniṣpatiñca prajñapti satāṃ paśyato nirvidvirāgo vimuktiśca yujyate /
T06bsa034_u:5029: ityebhirākārairbodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārā anityā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:5030: tān punareva anityān saṃskārān prabandhena vartamānādbodhisattvaḥ triḥprakārāyā duḥkhatāyāḥ sanniśrayabhāvena paśyati saṃskāraduḥkhatāyāḥ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāyāḥ duḥkhaduḥkhatāyāśca /
T06bsa034_u:5031: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārā duḥkhā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:5032: punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dvividhaṃ nairātmyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
T06bsa034_u:5038: yatsarveṣvabhilāpyeṣu vastuṣu sarvābhilāpasvabhāvo dharmo na saṃvidyate /
T06bsa034_u:5039: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvadharmā anātmāna iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:5043: evaṃ ca tāvadanadhyāśayaśuddho bodhisattvaḥ adṛṣṭasatyo vā śrāvakāyānīyo nirvāṇamadhimukto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5045: na cāsya tasminnirvāṇe yathābhūtāvagamo yathāvajjñānadarśanaṃ (Dutt 191) pravartate
T06bsa034_u:5047: tadyathā rājaputro vā gṛhapatiputro vā rājñā gṛhapatinā vā 'ntargṛhe saṃvardhitaḥ syāt tasya ca daharasyaiva kumārabhūtasya tena rājñā gṛhapatinā vā kṛtrimakā mṛgarathakā vā go-aśvarathakā vā hastirathakā vā upasaṃhṛtā bhaveyuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5048: sa ca rājaputro vā gṛhapatiputro vā taiḥ krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ paricārayaṃsteṣveva kṛtrimeṣu mṛgeṣu mṛgasaṃjñī syāt kṛtrimeṣu go 'śveṣu hastiṣu hastisaṃjñī syāt /
T06bsa034_u:5049: athaikadā sa rājā vā gṛhapatirvā svasya putrasya vṛddheranvayādindriyāṇāṃ paripākādbhūtānāṃ mṛgāṇāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣeta /
T06bsa034_u:5051: tasya punā rājaputrasya [vā] gṛhapatiputrasya vā ta varṇavādaṃ śrutvā evaṃ syāt /
T06bsa034_u:5052: eṣāmayaṃ rājā gṛhapatirvā asmākaṃ mṛgarathakānāṃ yāvaddhastirathakānāṃ vā varṇaṃ bhāṣata iti
T06bsa034_u:5053: athāpareṇa samayena sa rājā gahapatirvā svaṃ putraṃ bahirāgārānnivīṣya bhūtāneva mṛgāṃstasmai upadarśayedbhūtāneva yāvaddhastina upadarśayet /
T06bsa034_u:5054: tasya tān dṛṣṭvā tasminsamaye pratyātmaṃ pratyavagamo yathābhūta utpadyeta /
T06bsa034_u:5055: ime te bhūtārthikā mṛgarathakā vistareṇa yāvaddhastirathakā yeṣāmasmākaṃ pitā dīrgharātraṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣitavānasmākameva tvayathābhūte arthe tat pratirūpamātrake tatpratibimbapratibhāsamātrake adhimokṣaḥ pravṛtta iti /
T06bsa034_u:5057: evameva saṃsārāntargṛhasaṃvṛddhānāmaśuddhāśayānāṃ bodhisattvānāmadṛṣṭasatyānāñca śrāvakāṇāṃ putrasthānīyānāṃ pitṛkalpairbuddhairbodhisattvaiśca mahābhūmipraviṣṭairnirvāṇapratyakṣadarśibhisteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakāṇāñca purastānnirvāṇasya yathādṛṣṭasya varṇo bhāṣitaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5058: taiśca tannirvāṇaṃ guṇato ghoṣamātrānusariṇyā buddhyā dīrgharātramadhimuktam /
T06bsa034_u:5059: yadā punasteṣāṃ saṃbhāraparipākavṛddheranvayāt śraddhāśayānāñca bodhisattvānāṃ dṛṣṭasatyānāñca śrāvakāṇāṃ nirvāṇe pratyakṣaṃ jñānadarśanamutpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:5061: idaṃ tannirvāṇaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ yasya buddhabodhisattvairvarṇā bhāṣitaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5065: te tena pūrvakeṇādhimokṣeṇa (Dutt 192) ritīyante paścimakaṃ yathābhūtādhimokṣaṃ niśritya /
T06bsa034_u:5066: tadyathā kiñcidvyādhitaṃ puruṣaṃ kaścinmahāvaidyastasya prapyupasthitasya vyādheḥ praśamāyānulomikairbhaiṣajyairūpatiṣṭhet
T06bsa034_u:5067: sa ca vyādhitapuruṣo dīrghakālapratiniṣevaṇātteṣāṃ bhaiṣajyānāṃ tadadhimukta eva bhavet tadārāmaḥ
T06bsa034_u:5069: atha tasyaiva vyādhitapuruṣasya sa ca pūrvako vyādhistayā bhaiṣajyāsevayā vyupaśāmyedanyaścāpūrvo vyādhiranyabhaiṣajyasādhyaḥ prādurbhavet /
T06bsa034_u:5070: atha sa mahāvaidyaḥ pūrvakasya ca vyādheḥ praśamaṃ paścimakasya cotpādamanyabhaiṣajyasādhyaṃ viditvā tañca pūrvakaṃ bhaiṣajyaprayogaṃ pratikṣipedanyaṃ cānulomikaṃ vyapadiśed bhaiṣajyam sa bālo vyādhita puruṣaḥ pūrvabhaiṣajyādhimuktasteṣveva pathyasaṃjñī yenaiva mahāvaidyena tāni pūrvapaścimāni bhaiṣajyāni vyapadiṣṭāni /
T06bsa034_u:5071: evamapyucyamānastena saṃmukhamapathyānyetāni pūrvakāṇi bhaiṣajyāni paścime vyādhāviti saṃpratyayena na gacchannāṣya vacanamabhiśraddhavyādevameva tadupamāste bālā bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakāśca veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5072: ye vyādhitapuruṣā eva kleśagrastā mahāvaidyasya tathāgatasyottarāduttaratarāmuttamatamāmuttānāduttānatarāṃ gambhīrād gambhīratarāṃ gambhīratamāṃ hīnādudārāmudāratarāmudāratamāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ samyagvyapadeśamavavādānuśāsanīṃ nāvataranti nādhimucyante na pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmam /
T06bsa034_u:5073: tatra śrāddho bodhisattvaḥ śrāvako vā na kasmiṃścittathāgatabhāṣite vimatisandehamutpādayati
T06bsa034_u:5074: sa punaḥ sarvāṅgapariṣkārasusamāyuktamivājanyarathaṃ taṃ tathāgatabhāṣitaṃ dharmarathamabhirūhya kuśala iva sārathiryāvatī tena bhūmirgantavyā bhavatyanuprāptavyā tāṃ laghuladhveva gantā bhavatyadhandhāyamānaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5081: pañceme bodhisattvāsyāścaryādbhūtā dharmā anuttare samyaksaṃbodhiyāne śikṣamāṇasya veditavyāḥ
T06bsa034_u:5088: ime pañca bodhisattvānāmāścaryādbhutā dharmā asādhāraṇastadanyaiḥ sarvasattvaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5089: pañcemāni bodhisattvasyānāścaryāṇi yaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5091: yad bodhisattvaḥ parahitahetukena duḥkhena sukhātmaka eva san kṛtsnaṃ parahitahetukaṃ duḥkhamabhyupagacchati
T06bsa034_u:5092: idaṃ bodhisattvasya prathamamanāścaryaṃ yena samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5093: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ saṃsāradoṣajño nirvāṇaguṇajña eva ca san sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaḥ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā saṃsāramabhyupagacchati /
T06bsa034_u:5095: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvastūṣṇīṃbhāva-sukharasajña eva san sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva
T06bsa034_u:5096: ca sukhātmakaṃ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā sattvānāṃ dharmedeśanāyai prayujyate /
T06bsa034_u:5098: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ [ṣaṭ] pāramitopacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaḥ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvānāmāśayataḥ samutsṛjati /
T06bsa034_u:5099: na ca punastasya samutsargasya vipākenārthī bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5101: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ parakāryasvakārya iva sarvaparakāryārthakriyāsu saṃdṛśyate /
T06bsa034_u:5102: idaṃ bodhisattvasya pañcamamanāścaryaṃ yena samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5107: tathā hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthe samaṃ taccittamutpādayati /
T06bsa034_u:5109: bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu ekaputraka iva premasahagatena cittena samacitto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5110: bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu ekaputraka eva premasahagatena cittena samacitto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5112: sattvasaṃjñeti viditvā bodhisattvo yā ekasya sattvasya dharmatā sā sarveṣāmiti dharmasamatānugatena cetasā sarvasattveṣu samacitto viharati /
T06bsa034_u:5114: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvārthakriyāsahagatena cetasā sarvasattveṣu smacitto viharati /
T06bsa034_u:5122: pañcabhirākāraiḥ sattvā upakāriṇo bodhisattvasya pratyupakāreṇa pratyupasthito bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:5124: ātmānaṃ guṇaiḥ saṃyojayanti paraguṇādhānāya prayuktāro bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:5125: anātheṣu duḥkhiteṣu kṛpaṇeṣvapratiśaraṇeṣu sattveṣu sānāthyaṃ kurvanti /
T06bsa034_u:5127: tathāgatābhāṣitañca dharmamukhena vā lekhayitvā vā dhārayanti tañca pūjayanti /
T06bsa034_u:5140: iha bodhisattva ādita eva sattveṣu hitasukhaiṣī bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5143: iti sarvaṃ pūrvavad veditavyaṃ yadyathā pūjāsevā 'pramāṇapaṭale /
T06bsa034_u:5147: pañcabhiḥ prayogairbodhisattvasya sarvasamyaksaṃprayoga saṃgraho veditavyaḥ katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ
T06bsa034_u:5152: tatra bodhisattvo 'nurakṣaṇā prayogeṇa medhāṃ rakṣati yena sahajena jñānena dharmān laghuladhvevodgṛhṇāti
T06bsa034_u:5153: smṛtiṃ rakṣati yayā smṛtyā udgṛhītān dharmān dhārayati /
T06bsa034_u:5158: tatra bodhisattvasyānavadyaprayogo yaḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvaviparītaścottaptaścāpramāṇaśca satataśca bodhipariṇāmitaśca /
T06bsa034_u:5162: niyatipatitaprayogo niyatāyāṃ bhūmau niṣṭhāgamanabhūmau ca draṣṭavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5171: tadanyaiśca bodhisattvaiḥ saha paritulanābhimānatā dharmaviparyāsābhimānatā ca /
T06bsa034_u:5174: te punareṣāmeva pañcānāṃ kṛṣṇapakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yathākramaṃ viparyayeṇa veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5190: saddharmasya ca prakāśanā saddharmapratirūpakāṇāṃ ca pratikṣepaṇatā /
T06bsa034_u:5191: daśasu sthāneṣu samāsato bodhisattvā vineyān sattvān samyageva vinayanti /
T06bsa034_u:5211: aparimitakālaṃ vyākurvanti na tu kālaniyama kurvanti /
T06bsa034_u:5219: punarekatyo bodhisattvo niyataṃ cittamutpādayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na punastāvatpratyudāvartayati yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
T06bsa034_u:5220: punarbodhisattvo vaśitāprāptaḥ sarvāṃ sattvārthacaryāṃ yathecchati yathārabhate tathaivābandhyāṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:5225: tatra paścimaṃ niyatipātamārabhya tathāgatā niyatipatitaṃ bodhisattvaṃ vyākurvāṇā vyākurvanti
T06bsa034_u:5226: pañcemāni sthānāni bodhisattvasyāvaśyakaraṇīyāni bhavanti yānyakṛtvā bodhisattvaḥ abhavyo bhavatyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
T06bsa034_u:5240: daśeme dharmā bodhisattvānāṃ pradhānasammatā yān bodhisattvā agrato dhārayantyagryaprajñaptiṣu ca prajñapayanti /
T06bsa034_u:5244: vīryaṃ ca prajñā ca sarvapāramitānāṃ pradhānam /
T06bsa034_u:5248: caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ [sarvadhyānānāṃ pradhānam /] trayāṇāṃ samādhīnāṃ śūnyatāsamādhiḥ
T06bsa034_u:5257: catvārīmāni bodhisattvānāṃ prajñaptivyavasthānāni yāniṃ bodhisattvā eva samyak prajñapayanti vyavasthāpayanti tathāgatā vā /
T06bsa034_u:5258: na tvanyaḥ kaściddevabhūto vā manuṣyabhūto vā śramaṇabrāhmaṇabhūto vānyatraitebhya evaṃ śrutvā
T06bsa034_u:5261: tatra yā dvādaśāṅgasya sūtrādikasya vacogatasyānupūrvaracanā anupūrvavyavasthānasamāyogaḥ
T06bsa034_u:5271: /] hetusatyaṃ phalasatyaṃ jñānasatyaṃ jñeyasatyaṃ agryasatyaṃ ca /
T06bsa034_u:5273: satyasatyaṃ mṛṣāsatyaṃ parijñeyasatyaṃ prahātavyasatyaṃ sākṣātkartavyasatyaṃ bhāvayitavyasatyaṃ ca /
T06bsa034_u:5275: āsvādasatyaṃ ādīnavasatyaṃ niḥsaraṇasatyaṃ dharmatāsatyaṃ adhimuktisatyaṃ āryāṇāṃ satyaṃ anāryāṇāṃ satyaṃ ca /
T06bsa034_u:5277: saṃskāraduḥkhatāsatyaṃ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāsatyaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatāsatyaṃ pravṛttisatyaṃ nivṛtisatyaṃ saṃkleśasatyaṃ vyavadānasatyaṃ samyakprayogasatyaṃ ca /
T06bsa034_u:5282: aupakramikaduḥkhasatyaṃ bhogavaikalyaduḥkhasatyaṃ dhāturvaiṣamyaduḥkhasatyaṃ priyavipariṇāmaduḥkhasatyaṃ dauṣṭhulyaduḥkhasatyaṃ karmasatyaṃ kleśasatyaṃ tathā śravaṇayoniśomanaskārasatyaṃ samyakdṛṣṭisatyaṃ samyagdṛṣṭiphalasatyaṃ ceti /
T06bsa034_u:5289: caturṣvāryasatyeṣu yā prajñā tasyā eva ca prajñāyā ya āśrayaḥ ālambanaṃ sahāyaḥ karma saṃbhārastasyā eva ca prajñāyā yat phalam ebhiḥ saptabhirākāraiḥ śrāvakayānaprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ sākalyena veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:5291: nirabhilāpyaṃ vastvālambanīkṛtya sarvadharmeṣu yā tathatā nirvikalpasamatā niryāṇatā prajñā tasyā eva ca prajñāyā ya āśraya ālambanaṃ sahāyaḥ karma sambhārastasyā eva ca prajñāyā yatphalam ityebhiḥ saptabhirākārairmahāyānaprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:5292: atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvaṣu ye kecidbodhisattvāḥ samyakprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ kṛtavantaḥ kariṣyanti kurvanti vā punaḥ sarve ta ebhiścatubhirvastubhiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5300: eṣāṃ ca vibhāgaḥ pūrvavadveditavyaḥ tadyathā tattvārthapaṭale /
T06bsa034_u:5303: nāmaparyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastuparyeṣaṇāgataṃ svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇāgataṃ viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānam /
T06bsa034_u:5312: daśasu dikṣuprameyā aprameyanāmalokadhātavastadyathā iyaṃ sahā nāma lokadhāturyasya nāmnā brahmā sahāṃpatirityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5314: syādekavidho vineyaḥ sarvasattvā vineyā iti kṛtvā /
T06bsa034_u:5326: pratihato madhyasthaḥ vipañcitajñaḥ uddhaṭitajñaḥ tadātvavineyaḥ āpattivineyaḥ pratyayahāryaścavineyo yādṛśān pratyayān labhate tathā tathā pariṇamati /
T06bsa034_u:5332: [akṛcchrasādhyaḥ] ślakṣṇasādhyaḥ avasādanā-sādhyaḥ dūre vineyaḥ antike ca vineyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5334: nārakaḥ tairyakyonikaḥ yāmalaukikaḥ kāmāvacaro divyamānuṣyakaḥ āntarābhavikaḥ rūpī arūpī sajñī asaṃjñī naivasajñīnāsaṃjñī ca /
T06bsa034_u:5337: tatra (Dutt 201) sattvadhātu vineyadhātvoḥ kiṃ nānākaraṇam sattvadhāturaviśeṣeṇa sarvasattvā gotrasthāścāgotrasthāśca /
T06bsa034_u:5338: ye purnagotrasthā eva tāsu tāṣvavasthāsu vartante /
T06bsa034_u:5344: iha bodhisattvo yeṣāṃ sattvānāmarthe prayujyate sa prathamo 'prameyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5346: sa dvitīyo 'prameyaḥ tānpunaḥ sattvāṃsteṣu teṣu lokadhātuṣu yairdharmaiḥ saṃkliśyamānāṃśca
T06bsa034_u:5349: tebhyaśca sattvebhyo yānsattvān bhavyān śakyarupānatyantaduḥkhavimokṣāya paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:5353: pañceme buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sattveṣu dharmadeśanāyā vipulāḥ phalānuśaṃsā veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5355: tadekatyāḥ sattvāḥ tasminneva saddharme deśyamāne virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurūtpādayanti
T06bsa034_u:5356: tadekatyāḥ sattvā deśyamāna eva saddharmataḥ āsravakṣayamanuprāpnuvanti /
T06bsa034_u:5359: śrutamātra eva tasminsaddharme deśitaśca saddharmo buddhairbodhisattvaiśca uddeśasvādhyāyasaṃpratipattipāraṃparyayogena saddharmanetryāścirasthitikatāyai saṃvartate /
T06bsa034_u:5360: itīme pañca deśanāyā vipulāḥ phalānuśaṃsā veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5361: saptemāni mahattvāni yairyuktaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yānaṃ mahāyānamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5380: tatra yacca dharmamahattvaṃ yacca cittotpādamahattvaṃ yaccādhimuktimahattvaṃ yaccādhyāśayamahattvaṃ yacca sambhāramahattvaṃ yacca kālamahattvamitīmāni ṣaṭmahattvāni hetubhūmāni samudāgama-mahattvasya tatpunarekaṃ samudāgama-mahattvaṃ
T06bsa034_u:5382: aṣṭāvime dharmāḥ sarvasya mahāyānasya saṃgrahāya saṃvartante /
T06bsa034_u:5384: tasminneva ca bodhisattvapiṭake ya sarvadharmāṇāṃ tattvārthaprakāśanā /
T06bsa034_u:5385: tasminneva bodhisattvapiṭake yā sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāmacintyā paramodārā prabhāvasaṃprakāśanā
T06bsa034_u:5391: evaṃ hi bodhisattvāḥ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhthante /
T06bsa034_u:5392: ke punaste bodhisattvā ya evaṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
T06bsa034_u:5407: sa eva punaravatīrṇo yāvat śuddhāśayabhūmimapraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaśuddhāśaya ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5409: sa eva punaḥ śuddhāśayo yāvanniṣṭhāgamanabhūmimapraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaparipakva ityucyate
T06bsa034_u:5411: sa punaraparipakvo yāvanniyataniyatācaryābhūmau (Dutt 203) vā nānupraviṣṭo bhavati
T06bsa034_u:5418: tatra te gotramupādāya yāvadanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdaśa bodhisattvā nirdiṣṭāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5419: ye bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣante teṣāṃ nāta uttari śikṣā vidyate /
T06bsa034_u:5420: yatra śikṣeran yathā ca śikṣeran na ca ebhyo yathā nirdiṣṭebhyo bodhisattvebhya uttari bodhisattvo vidyate yo bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣate /
T06bsa034_u:5421: teṣāṃ punaḥ sarveṣāṃ eva bodhisattvānāmabhedenimānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni gauṇāni nāmāni veditavyāni
T06bsa034_u:5422: tadyathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dhīmānuttamadyutiḥ jinaputro jinādhāraḥ vijetā jināṅkuraḥ vikrāntaḥ paramāryaḥ sārthavāho mahāyaśaḥ kṛpālurmahāpuṇyaḥ īśvaro dhārmikaśceti /
T06bsa034_u:5423: teṣāṃ punardaśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣvanantānāṃ bodhisattvānāmaprameyāḥ prayātmagatāḥ saṃjñāprāptayo veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5424: tatra ye bodhisattvāḥ sma iti pratijñāyāṃ bodhisattvā vartante na ca bodhisattvaśikṣāsu samyak pratipadyante te bodhisattvapratirūpakā veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5426: bodhisattvāḥ sma iti pratijñāyāṃ vartante samyak [ca ye]
T06bsa034_u:5427: bodhisattvaśikṣāṣu śikṣante te bhūtā bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5435: pañcemāni bhūtasya bodhisattvasya bodhisattvaliṅgāni yaiḥ samanvāgato
T06bsa034_u:5438: anukampā priyavāditā vairyaṃ muktahastatā gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatā ca
T06bsa034_u:5439: / ime punaḥ pañca dharmāḥ pañca parivartena veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5446: yadāśayo bhavati bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu tadeva yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ kāyena vācā upasaṃharati
T06bsa034_u:5447: tatra priyavāditāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ pūrvavadāmodanī saṃmodanī upakarā ca vāgveditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:5449: tatra sattvaṃ dhṛtiralīnatvaṃ ca yadbalaṃ bodhisattvasya ayaṃ vairyaṃsvabhāva ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5452: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidastāsāmeva cābhinirhārāya yatsamyak prāyogikaṃ jñānamayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatāyāḥ svabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5455: duḥkhitāḥ sattvā duścaritacāriṇaḥ pramattā mithyāpratipannāḥ kleśānuśayitāśca /
T06bsa034_u:5456: nārakānsattvānupādāya śeṣāṃ keṣāṃcitsattvānāṃ duḥkhā vedanā prābandhikī santatisamārūḍhā vartate
T06bsa034_u:5458: / ye punarnāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitāapi tu bahulaṃ kāyaduścaritamadhyācaranti
T06bsa034_u:5462: ye punarnāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitā na duścaritacāriṇo 'pi tvadhyavasitāḥ kāmānupabhuñjate naṭanartakahāsakalāsakaprekṣaṇaparā viharanti ātmopalāḍanaparāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5463: ime sattvāḥ pramattā ityucyante tadyathā tadekatyāḥ kāmopabhoginaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5464: ye punarnāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitā na duścaritacāriṇo na vāpi pramattāḥ api tu dṛṣṭivipattimāśritya duḥkhavimokṣāya pratipannāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5465: ime sattvā mithyāpratipannā ityucyante tadyathā kāmānutsṛjya durākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitāḥ
T06bsa034_u:5466: ye punaḥ sattvā nāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitā vistareṇa yāvan na mithyāpratipannāḥ api tu sakalabandhanāśca vikalabandhanāśca kleśaiḥ ime sattvāḥ kleśānuśayitā ityucyante tadyathā ye ca samyak prayuktāḥ pṛthagjanā kalyāṇakā ye ca śaikṣāḥ etāvadanukampādhiṣṭhānaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yenādhiṣṭhānena yenālambanenānukampā pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:5477: yaireva pañcabhirākārairbodhipakṣapaṭale dhṛtibalādhānatā bodhisattvānāmuktā tānyeva bodhisattvasya vairyādhiṣṭhānāni ve ditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:5483: abhīkṣṇadānatā pramuditadānatā satkṛtyadānatā asaṃkliṣṭadānatā aniśrityadānatā ca /
T06bsa034_u:5490: ye te tathāgatabhāṣitāḥ sūtrāntāḥ gambhīrāgambhīrāvabhāṣāḥ śūnyatā-pratisaṃyuktā idaṃpratyayatā
T06bsa034_u:5503: anukampā bodhisattvasya sattveṣvādita eva tāvadvairaprahāṇāya saṃvartate /
T06bsa034_u:5508: ye ca bhagavatā maitryā anuśaṃsā uktānāsya kāye viṣaṃ krāmati na śasramityevamādayaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5511: priyavādī bodhisattvo dṛṣṭe dharme caturvidhaṃ vāgdoṣaṃ vijahāti mṛṣāvādaṃ paiśūnyaṃ ṣāruṣyaṃ sambhinnapralāpañca /
T06bsa034_u:5512: sā cāsya bāgātmānugrahāya parānugrahāya ca pravṛttā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5513: dṛṣṭa eva ca dharme āyatyāṃ ca priyavādī bodhisattvaḥ ādeyavacano bhavati grāhyavacanaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5515: dhīro bodhisattvo dṛṣṭe [tāvata] dharme sarveṇa sarvamālasyakausīdyāpagato
T06bsa034_u:5520: āyatyāṃ ca sarvabodhisattvakṛtyasamārambheṣu prakṛtyā dṛḍhasamāraṃbho bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5527: pūrvaṃ tāvadbodhisattvo 'nukampayā sattvānanugṛhṇāti teṣu ca sāpekṣo bhavatyarthakāmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5528: tataścākuśalātsthānādvyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya yuktiṃ bhāṣate grāhayati vyapadiśati
