T06bsa034_u:5532: sa evaṃ dhīraḥ ekatyānsattvānāmiṣasaṃgraheṇa paripācayati ekatyāndharmasaṃgraheṇa tadekatyāṃstadubhābhyāṃ dharmābhiṣasaṃgrahābhyām /
T06bsa034_u:5535: āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ katamayā pāramitayā katamadbodhisattvaliṅgaṃ saṃgṛhītam /
T06bsa034_u:5538: vairyaṃ vīryapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā prajñāpāramitayā ca saṃgṛhītam /
T06bsa034_u:5540: gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatā dhyānapāramitayā prajñāpāramitayā ca saṃgṛhītā evamimāni [pañca bodhi]sattvaliṅgāni pañcaparivartena veditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:5547: sukṛtakarmāntatā kauśalyaṃ parānugrahaḥ pariṇāmanaṃ ca paścimam /
T06bsa034_u:5548: gṛhipakṣe vā pravrajitapakṣe vā vartamānasya bodhisattvasya samāsataścatvāro dharmā veditavyāḥ
T06bsa034_u:5549: yeṣu gṛhī pravrajito va bodhisattvaḥ śikṣamāṇaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante
T06bsa034_u:5553: yā pāramitāsu niyatakāritā nipuṇakāritā nityakāritā anavadyakāritā ca /
T06bsa034_u:5554: kathañca bodhisattvo niyatakārī bhavati yaduta dāne /
T06bsa034_u:5555: iha bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyamāne deyadharme yācanake samyak prapyupasthite apakāriṇyupakāriṇi vā guṇavati doṣavati vā
T06bsa034_u:5557: nāsya dānacittaṃ kaścidvikampayituṃ samartho bhavati manuṣyo vā 'manuṣyo vā śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā kaścidvā punarloke sahadharmeṇa /
T06bsa034_u:5558: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvo nipuṇakārī bhavati yadut dāne /
T06bsa034_u:5559: iha bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyamāne deyadharme samyak pratyupasthite yācanake sarvaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:5560: nāstyasya kiñcidyadaparityājyaṃ bhavati sattvebhyaḥ ādhyātmikamapi vastu prāgeva bāhyam /
T06bsa034_u:5561: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvo nityakārī bhavati yaduta dāne /
T06bsa034_u:5562: iha bodhisattvo aparikhidyamāno dānena satatasamitameva sarvakālaṃ yathotpannaṃ dānaṃ dadāti
T06bsa034_u:5563: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvaḥ anavadyakārī bhavati yaduta dāne /
T06bsa034_u:5564: iha bodhisattvo yattatsaṃkliṣṭaṃ dānaṃ varṇitaṃ dānapaṭale tatsaṃkliṣṭaṃ varjayitvā asaṃkliṣṭaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:5565: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sukṛtakārī bhavati yaduta dāne /
T06bsa034_u:5568: eta eva catvāra ākārā niyatakāritā nipuṇakāritā nityakāritā anavadyakāritā ca /
T06bsa034_u:5570: tatsamāsato daśavidhaṃ veditavyam pratihatānāṃ sattvānāṃ pratighātāpanayāyopāyakauśalyam /
T06bsa034_u:5576: eṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva kauśalyānāṃ pūrvavadyathāyogaṃ tatra tatrāsyāmeva bodhisattvabhūmau pravibhāgo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5577: etāni punarbodhisattvasya daśa kauśalyāni pañcakṛtyāni kurvanti /
T06bsa034_u:5584: tribhinnaṃ kauśalyairbodhisattvo yathā gotrendriyādhimuktānāṃ tadupamaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
T06bsa034_u:5590: iha bodhisattvaścatvāri saṃgrahavastūni niśritya dānaṃ priyavāditāmarthacaryāṃ samānārthatāñca tadekatyānāṃ sattvānāṃ hitamapyupasaṃharati /
T06bsa034_u:5597: iha bodhisattvo yatkiñcidebhistribhirmukhairupacitopacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sukṛtakarmāntatayā kauśalyena parānugraheṇa ca tatsarvamatītānāgatapratyutpannamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau ghanarasena prasādena pariṇāmayati /
T06bsa034_u:5598: na tasya kuśalamūlasyānyaṃ phalavipākaṃ pratikāṃkṣati nānya[trā]nuttarāmeva
T06bsa034_u:5600: ye ca kecidbhagavatā gṛhiṇāṃ vā pravrajitānāṃ vā bodhisattvānāṃ śikṣādharmā vyapadiṣṭāḥ sarveṣāṃ teṣāmeṣveva caturṣu saṃgraho veditavyaḥ sukṛtakarmāntatāyāṃ kauśalye parānugrahe pariṇāmanāyāṃ ca /
T06bsa034_u:5601: tasmādevaṃ sukṛtakarmāntasya bodhisattvasya kuśalasya parānugrahapravṛttasya pariṇāmakasya evaṃ duṣprāpā duradhigamā ca bodhirāsannā samāsannā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:5602: atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasu ye kecidbodhisattvā gṛhi-pravrajita pakṣeṣu śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ
T06bsa034_u:5603: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhavanto 'bhisaṃbhotsyante 'bhisaṃbudhyante ca sarve te ebhireva caturbhirdharmaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5605: evamapi caturṣu dharmeṣu samyakprayukto gṛhī pravrajito vā bodhisattvo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5606: api tu gṛhiṇo bodhisattvasyāntikātpravrajitasya bodhisattvasya sumahān viśeṣaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5608: tathāhi pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ parimukto bhavatyādita eva tāvanmātāpitṛputtadārādikalatraparigrahadoṣāt
T06bsa034_u:5610: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ parimukto bhavati tasyaiva parigrahasyārthe kṛṣivaṇijyā-rājapauruṣyādi-parikleśe
T06bsa034_u:5613: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattva ekāntasaṅkalīkṛtaṃ brahmacaryaṃ śaknoti carituṃ [na tu] gṛhī bodhisattvaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5614: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ sarveṣu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu kṣiprābhijño bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5615: yadyadeva kuśalamārabhate tatra tatraiva laghuladhveva niṣṭhāṃ gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:5617: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ vrataniyame sthitatvād ādeyavacano bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5626: saptākāraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sattveṣu vātsalyaṃ pravartate yena vātsalyenopetā bodhisattvāḥ kalyāṇāśayāḥ paramakalyāṇāśayā ityucyante /
T06bsa034_u:5630: ānulomikena kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇā samudācarati manāpena hitasukhena ca /
T06bsa034_u:5631: na ca punarbodhisattvasya sattveṣu yogarahitaṃ vātsalyaṃ pravartate tadyathā adharme 'vinaye 'satyasamudācāre asthāne samādāpanatāyai /
T06bsa034_u:5632: tathā ca bodhisattvo vatsalo bhavati sattveṣu yathā teṣāmarthe sarvārambhairna parikhidyate
T06bsa034_u:5633: ayācita eva ca bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu vatsalo bhavati na tu kenacidyācitaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5634: nirāmiṣeṇa ca cittena vatsalo [bhavati] na parataḥ pratyupakāraṃ pratikāṃkṣamāṇaḥ paratra ca vipākamiṣṭaṃ pratyāśaṃsamāna iti niṣkāraṇavatsalo bhavati sattveṣu bodhisattvaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5635: vipulañca tadbodhisattvasya vātsalyaṃ bhavati sattveṣu na parīttam /
T06bsa034_u:5636: tathā ca vipulaṃ bhavati yathaiṣāṃ sattvānāmantikādbodhisattvaḥ sarvākāramapyapakāraṃ labhamāno notsṛjati ātmānaṃ kāmamapriyaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:5638: tatpunarevaṃ lakṣaṇameva guṇayuktaṃ vātsalyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvasattveṣveva samamāsamanta sattvadhātuprādeśikaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5639: evamanena saptākāreṇaiva vātsalyena yuktā bodhisattvāḥ kalyāṇāśayāḥ paramakalyāṇāśayā ityucyante
T06bsa034_u:5643: te punaradhyāśayā bodhisattvasya samāsataḥ pañcadaśa veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5645: agryāśayo vṛttāśayaḥ pāramitāśayaḥ tattvārthāśayaḥ prabhāvāśayaḥ hitāśayaḥ sukhāśayo vinirmuktāśayaḥ dṛḍhāśayaḥ avisaṃvādanāśayaḥ aśuddhāśayaḥ śuddhāśayaḥ suśuddhāśayaḥ nigṛhītāśayaḥ sahajaścāśayaḥ tatra yo buddhadharmasaṃgharatneṣu bodhisattvasyādhyāśayaḥ so 'gryāśaya ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5648: dharmapugdalanairātmye paramārthe ca dharmatathatāyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ yo 'dhyāśayo 'yaṃ tattvārthāśaya ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5653: sattveṣveva nirāmiṣacittatā iṣṭe ca vipāke niṣpratibaddhacittatā vinirmuktāśaya ityucyate
T06bsa034_u:5654: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yā citaikāntikatāyaṃ dṛḍhāśaya ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5660: tatra yo hi [a]śuddhāśayaḥ sa eva nigṛhī[tāśaya] ityucyate pratisaṃkhyānakaraṇīyatayā /
T06bsa034_u:5661: yaḥ punaḥ śuddhaḥ suśuddhaścādhyāśayaḥ sa sahajo 'dhyāśaya ityucyate prakṛtyā tanmayatayā
T06bsa034_u:5663: ityebhirbodhisattvāḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ kalyāṇairadhyāśayaiḥ sarvabhūmigataiḥ samāsato daśakṛtyāni kurvanti /
T06bsa034_u:5673: prabhāvādhyāśayena ghanarasaṃ ca śāsane prasādaṃ pravedayanti /
T06bsa034_u:5674: bhāvanāyāṃ ca sārasaṃjñinaḥ spṛhājātā bahulaṃ viharanti /
T06bsa034_u:5676: hitāśayena sukhāśayena vinirmuktāśayena ca sarvākarāsu sattvārthakriyāsu prayujyante /
T06bsa034_u:5681: avisaṃvādanādhyāśayena kṣiprābhijñā bhavanti teṣu teṣu kuśaladharmābhinirhāreṣu /
T06bsa034_u:5684: sahajena punaradhyāśayena kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇām /
T06bsa034_u:5685: tatra ye kecidbhagavatā bodhisattvānāmadhyāśayā ākhyātāḥ prajñaptāḥ prakāśitāsteṣu teṣvadhikaraṇeṣu teṣāṃ sarveṣāmebhireva pañcadaśabhiradhyāśayaiḥ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5686: tasmādatītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasu ye bodhisattvāḥ kalyāṇairadhyāśayairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhavanto 'bhisaṃbhotsyante 'bhisaṃbudhyante ca sarve ta ebhireva pañcadaśabhiradhyāśayaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5697: evaṃ gotrasaṃpadamupādāya yathoktāyāṃ bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇānāṃ yathokteṣu ca bodhisattvaliṅgeṣu saṃdṛśyamānānāṃ bodhisattvapakṣyaprayogeṣu ca samyak prayuktānāṃ bodhisattvādhyāśayāñca yathoktāṃ viśodhayatāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ samāsato dvādaśabodhisattvavihārā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:5711: iti yena [ca] bodhisattvastattvaṃ paśyati yañca tattvaṃ paśyati tasya ca tattvasyājñānād yathā pravṛttirduḥkhasya jñānācca punarapravṛttirduḥkhasya
T06bsa034_u:5713: tadetadbodhisattvasya tribhirmukhaiḥ prajñayā vyavacārayataḥ trayoradhiprajñavihārā bhavanti
T06bsa034_u:5722: tāthāgataḥ (Dutt 218) punarvihāro yaḥ sarvabodhisattvavihārasamatikrāntasyābhisaṃbuddhabodhervihāraḥ tatra tathāgatasya paścimasya vihārasya pratiṣṭhāyogasthāne paścime sākalyena nirdeśo bhaviṣyati dvādaśānāṃ punarbodhisattvavihārāṇāṃ yathā vyavasthānaṃ bhavati tathā nirdekṣāmi /
T06bsa034_u:5725: iha bodhisattvo gotravihārī prakṛtibhadrasantānatayā prakṛtyā bodhisattvaguṇairbodhisattvārhaiḥ kuśalairdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5727: prakṛtibhadratayaiva na haṭhayogena tasmin kuśale pravarttate /
T06bsa034_u:5728: api tu pratisaṃkhyānataḥ sāvagrahaḥ sambhṛto bhavati
T06bsa034_u:5729: / sarveṣāṃ ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ gotravihārī bodhisattvo bījadharo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5739: iha bodhisattvasya prathamaṃ cittotpādamupādāya aśuddhādhyāśayasya yā kācidbodhisattvacaryā ayamasyādhimukticaryāvihāra ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5740: tatra gotravihārī bodhisattvastadanyeṣāṃ [sarveṣāṃ] bodhisattvavihārāṇāmekādaśānāṃ tāthāgatasya ca vihārasya hetumātre vartate hetu parigraheṇa /
T06bsa034_u:5741: no tu tena kaścitu tadanyo bodhisattvavihāra ārabdho bhavati na pratilabdho na viśodhitaḥ
T06bsa034_u:5743: adhimukticaryāvihāriṇā punarbodhisattvena sarve bodhisattvavihārāstāthāgataśca vihāra ārabdhā bhavanti (Dutt 219) no tu pratilabdhā na viśodhitāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5750: evaṃ vistareṇa yāvatparamaḥ paraniṣpanno bodhisattvavihāro veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5751: parame pariniṣpanne bodhisattvavihāre pariśuddhe 'nantaraṃ pūrvārabdhasya tātathāgatasya vihārasya sakṛtpratilambho viśuddhiśca veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:5762: yo laukikaṃ jñānaviśuddhisanniśrayabhūtaṃ samādhiṃ niśrṛtya satyāvabodhāya samyak smṛtyupasthānādīnāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravicayavihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5768: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ sābhisaṃskāraḥ sābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5771: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ anabhisaṃskāro 'nābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5775: yastameva supariśuddhaṃ niścalaṃ prajñāsamādhiṃ niśritya mahāmativaipulyamanuprāptasya pareṣāṃ dharmasamākhyānānuttaryamārabhya dharmāṇāṃ paryāyārtha-nirvacanaprabhedapravicayavihāraḥ tatra katamo bodhisattvasya paramo vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5776: yatra sthito bodhisattvo bodhisattvamārganiṣṭhāgato 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau mahādharmābhiṣekaprāpta ekajātipratibaddho vā bhavati caramabhaviko vā /
T06bsa034_u:5777: yasya vihārasyānantaraṃ saṃhitamevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvabuddhakāryaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:5779: bodhisattvabhāvanāyāṃ parīttakārī bhavati cchidrakārī aniyatakārī punarlābhaparihāṇitaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5780: pramuditavihāre bodhisattvastasyāmeva bodhisattvabhāvanāyāṃ vipulakārī bhavatyacchidrakārī niyatakārī yathāpratilabdhāparihāṇitaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5782: pratharma nirnimittaṃ vihāramupādāya yāvatparamādbodhisattvavihārādbodhisattvo bodhisattvabhāvanāyāṃ apramāṇakārī bhavatyacchidrakārī niyatakārī ca /
T06bsa034_u:5790: pratisaṃvidvihāre parame ca vihāre tasyā eva bodhisattva-nirnimitta-bhāvanāyāḥ
T06bsa034_u:5792: adhimukticaryāvihāre vartamānasya bodhisattvasya ke ākārāḥ kāni liṃgāni kāni nimittāni bhavanti
T06bsa034_u:5796: dṛḍhāyāḥ sthirāyāḥ avivartayā bodhisattvabhāvanāyāḥ alābhī bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5800: pratisaṃkhyāya ca sattvārtheṣu prayujyate na prakṛtyanukampā-prematayā /
T06bsa034_u:5801: ekadā ca sattveṣu mithyāpi pratipadyate kāyena vācā manasā /
T06bsa034_u:5806: no tu pratyātmaṃ tattvajño bhavati yaduta tathāgataṃ vā ārabhya dharmaṃ vā saṃghaṃ vā tattvārthaṃ vā buddhabodhisattvaprabhāvaṃ vā hetuṃ vā phalaṃ vā prāptavyaṃ vā 'rthaṃ
T06bsa034_u:5808: parīttena ca śrutamayacintāmayena jñānena samanvāgato bhavati nāpramāṇena /
T06bsa034_u:5828: sā cāsya haṭhena pravartitā na yathābhūtamājñāya /
T06bsa034_u:5832: ekadā ca bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānān nivartate notsahate vā /
T06bsa034_u:5833: ekadā sattvārthakriyāprayukto 'pi khedamantarā kṛtvā tasmātsattvārthakriyāprayogāt pratinivartate
T06bsa034_u:5834: āśayataścātmanaḥ sukhakāmo bhavati pratisaṃkhyāya ca parasukhakāmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5836: no tu parijñāya parijñāyāśeṣa-prahāṇavān punaḥ punaḥ skhalitādhyācāratayā /
T06bsa034_u:5839: bhavati cāsya cetaso vikampitatvaṃ vimatiḥ sandehaśca /
T06bsa034_u:5840: sarveṇa ca sarvaṃ mahākaruṇāsamudācāravivarjito bhavati sattveṣu /
T06bsa034_u:5841: alpena ca hitasukhopasaṃhāreṇa sattveṣu pratyupasthito bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5842: na vipulena nāprameyeṇa ca sarvāsu paripūrṇāsu yathānirdiṣṭāsu bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣate
T06bsa034_u:5844: na ca sarveṣu yathānirdiṣṭeṣu bodhipakṣaprayogeṣu paripūrṇeṣu saṃdṛśyate /
T06bsa034_u:5846: / na ca tathā nirvāṇe 'syādhyāśayaḥ sanniviṣṭo bhavati yathā
T06bsa034_u:5849: itīmānyevaṃbhāgīyāni liṅgāni nimittānīme ākārā adhimukticaryāvihāre vartamānasya bodhisattvasya veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5850: adhimukticaryāvihāre mṛddhyāṃ kṣāntyāṃ vartamānasya bodhisattvasyaiṣāṃ yathā nirdiṣṭānāmākāraliṅga-nimittānāmadhimātratā
T06bsa034_u:5853: adhimātrāyāṃ kṣāntau vartamānasya bodhisattvasyaiṣāmākāraliṅganimittānāṃ mṛdutā tanutvaṃ veditavyam
T06bsa034_u:5854: adhimātrāyāmeva kṣāntau vartamānasyaiṣāmākāraliṅganimittānāmaśeṣaprahāṇāmanantarañca pramuditavihārapraveśo bodhisattvasya veditavyaḥ pratilambhayogena /
T06bsa034_u:5855: tasyāsya pramuditavihāravihāriṇa ete [sarva]dharmāḥ sarvena sarvaṃ na
T06bsa034_u:5857: etadviparyayeṇa ca sarve śuklapakṣyā dharmāḥ saṃvidyante /
T06bsa034_u:5864: pramuditavihārasthitasya tu bodhisattvasya sarveṣāmeṣāmadhimokṣopakleśānāṃ prahāṇānnirūpakleśaḥ śuddho 'dhimokṣaḥ pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:5865: tatrapramuditavihāre vartamānasya bodhisattvasya ke ākārāḥ kāni liṅgāni kāni nimittāni veditavyāni
T06bsa034_u:5867: pramuditavihāramanupraveśana-pūrvakañca bodhisattvapraṇidhānamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau asupratividdhabodhya supratividdhabodhyupāyaṃ yadbhūyasā parapratyayagāsuniścitaṃ (Dutt 223) prahāyānyadabhinavaṃ ṣaḍbhirākāraiḥ su[vi]niścitaṃ pratyātmaṃ bhāvānāmayaṃ bodhisattvapraṇidhānamutpādayati sarvaṃ tadanyaśulkapraṇidhāna-samatikrāntamatulyamasādhāraṇaphalam /
T06bsa034_u:5870: ekakṣaṇa[mātraṃ] samutpanne api tasmin praṇidhāne dharmaprakṛtiḥ sā
T06bsa034_u:5873: nāsya pratilabdhasya kenacitparyāyeṇa parihāṇiranyathābhāvo vā upalabhyate /
T06bsa034_u:5884: tatrādhimukticaryāvihāriṇāṃ sarvākārasūpacitakuśalamūlānāṃ samāsataḥ samyagbodhisattvacaryāniryātānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ taccittamutpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:5887: sarvākāra-sarvabuddhadharmaparipūriṃ buddhakāryakriyāparipūriṃ ca samāsataḥ ālambanīkṛtya tadbodhisattvānāñcittamutpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:5897: asaṃrambhāvihiṃsākrodhabahulaḥ (Dutt 224) pareṣāṃ sarvākārāṃ bodhisattva-sattvārthakriyāṃ sarvākārāṃ bodhisaṃbhāraparipūriṃ sarvākārāṃ
T06bsa034_u:5898: bodhiṃ buddhadharmāṃśca buddhakṛtyānuṣṭhānaṃ ca śuddhenādhyāśayenālambanīkurvan adhimucyamāno
T06bsa034_u:5900: kuśalenodāreṇa naiṣkramyopasaṃhitena nirāmiṣeṇāpratisamena kāyacittānugrāhakeṇa prāmodyena uttaptairacalairasmi kuśalairdharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5905: tathā hyasya [suvi]niścitotpāditacittasya bodhisattvasya pañca bhayāni prahīṇāni bhavanti
T06bsa034_u:5907: kutaḥ punarasya ātma[sneho] vā upakaraṇasneho vā bhaviṣyati /
T06bsa034_u:5917: maraṇāt me ūrdhvamāyatyāṃ niyataṃ buddhabodhisattvaiḥ samavadhānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti evaṃ niścito bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5923: sa evaṃ sarva bhayāpagataḥ sarvagambhīṃranirdeśatrāsāpagataḥ sarvocchrayamānastaṃbhāpagataḥ sarvaparāpakāravipratipattiṣu dveṣāpagataḥ sarvalokāmiṣa harṣāpagataḥ akliṣṭatvādanupahatena uttaptatvādaprakṛtenāśayena sarvakuśaladharmasamudāgamāya dṛṣṭe ca dharme sarvākāraṃ bodhisattvavīryamārabhate śraddhādhipateyaṃ pūrvaṅgamāṃ kṛtvā /
T06bsa034_u:5924: āyatyāñca yāni tāni pūrvanirdiṣṭāni bodhipakṣyapaṭale daśamahāpraṇidhānāni tānyasmin pramuditavihāre
T06bsa034_u:5925: agrayasattvadakṣiṇīyaśāstṛdharmasvāmipūjāyai mahāpraṇidhānaṃ tatpraṇīta-[sad]-dharmasandhāraṇāya dvitīyamanupūrvasaddharmapravartanāya tṛtīyaṃ tadanukūla-bodhisattvacaryācaraṇatāyai caturthaṃ tadbhājanasattvaparipācanatāyai (Dutt 225) pañcamaṃ buddhakṣetreṣūpasaṃkramya tathāgatadarśanaparyupāsanasaddharmaśravaṇatāyai
T06bsa034_u:5926: ṣaṣṭhaṃ svabuddhakṣetra-pariśodhanatāyai saptamaṃ sarvajātiṣu buddhabodhisattvāvirahitatāyai bodhisattvaiśca sahaikāśayaprayogitāyai
T06bsa034_u:5927: aṣṭamaṃ sarvasattvārthakriyāmoghatāyai navamamanuttarasamyaksambodhyabhisaṃbudhyanatāyai buddhakṛtyakaraṇatāyai ca daśamaṃ mahāpraṇidhānabhinirharati pāramparyeṇa ca sattvadhātvanupacchedavallokadharmānupacchedavadeṣāmeva [me]
T06bsa034_u:5928: mahāpraṇidhānānāṃ janmani janmani yavadbodhiparyantagamanādavigamaścāsaṃpramoṣaścāvisayogaśca syāditi samyak cittaṃ praṇidadhāti /
T06bsa034_u:5929: pūrvakaṃ praṇidhātavye 'rthe praṇidhānaṃ paścimakaṃ praṇidhānaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:5930: etānyeva ca mahāpraṇidhānāni pramukhāni kṛtvā tasya bodhisattvasya daśapraṇidhānāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇyutpadyante samyak praṇidhānānām /
T06bsa034_u:5931: tasyaivamāyatyāñca praṇidhānavataḥ dṛṣṭe ca dharme ārabdhavīryasya daśavihārapariśodhanā dharmāḥ pramuditavihārapariśuddhaye saṃvartante /
T06bsa034_u:5933: pratītyasamutpādayogena kevalaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaskandhasamudāgamaṃ paśyataḥ karuṇā /
T06bsa034_u:5934: mayaite sattvā asmātkevalād duḥkhaskandhādvimocayitavyā iti saṃpaśyato maitrī /
T06bsa034_u:5945: yaduta śraddhā karuṇāmaitrītyāgaḥ akhedaḥ śāstrajñatā lokajñatā hrīvyapatrāpyatā dhṛtibalādhānatā tathāgatapūjopasthānatā ca /
T06bsa034_u:5947: sa ca bodhisattva etāṃśca dharmāṃ samādāya vartate bahalīkaroti /
T06bsa034_u:5948: tadanyeṣāñca navānāmadhiśīlādīnāṃ bodhisattvavihārāṇāṃ sarvākāramārgaguṇadoṣān paryeṣate buddhabodhisattvānāmantikāt
T06bsa034_u:5951: / yairākāraiḥ praveśati ta ākārāḥ yaḥ praveśaḥ sa pratilambhaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5954: tasyāsminvihāre vyavasthitasya dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bahavo buddhā ābhāsamāgacchanti audārikadarśanasya
T06bsa034_u:5955: ye ca tena śrutā bhavanti bodhisattvapaṭike /
T06bsa034_u:5965: sa evamaudārikaprasādadarśanatayā praṇidhānabalādhānatayā ca tāṃstathāgatān dṛṣṭvā sarvākārāṃ pūjāṃ sukhopadhānatāmupasaṃharati yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ saṃghasammānanāṃ ca karoti /
T06bsa034_u:5966: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāmantikāddharmaṃ śṛṇoti udgṛhaṇāti dhārayati /
T06bsa034_u:5968: tāni ca sarvāṇi kuśalamūlāni mahābodhau pariṇāmayati /
T06bsa034_u:5970: tasyaibhistribhirviśuddhikāraṇaistāni kuśalamūlāni [yad] bhūyasyā mātrāyā viśudhyanti tathāgatadharmasaṃghapūjā-parigraha[ṇa]tayā saṃgrahavastubhiḥ sattvaparipācanatayā kuśalamūlānāṃ bodhipariṇamanatayā ca yāvadanekāni
T06bsa034_u:5972: tadyathā suvarṇaṃ prakṛtisthitaṃ yathā yathāgnau prakṣipyate dakṣeṇa karmāreṇa tathā tathā viśuddhataratāṃ gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:5973: evamevāsyāśayaśuddhasya bodhisattvasya tāni kuśalamūlāni taiviṃśuddhikāraṇairviśuddhitaratāṃ gacchanti /
T06bsa034_u:5974: tatrasthaścāsāvupapattito yadbhūyasā cakravartī bhavati janmani (Dutt 227) janmani jambudvīpeśvaraḥ sarvamātsaryamalāpagataḥ prabhuḥ sattvānāṃ mātsaryavinayanatāyai /
T06bsa034_u:5975: yacca kiñciccaturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ karmārabhyate tatsarvamavirahitaṃ ratnasarvākārabodhisamudāgama-manaskāraiḥ
T06bsa034_u:5977: ākāṃkṣamāṇaśca tadrūpaṃ vīryamārabhate yatsarvagṛhakalatrabhogānutsṛjya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitvā ekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtena śataṃ bodhisattvasamādhīnāṃ samāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:5988: kāyañca kāyaṃ bodhisattvaśataparivāramādarśayati ataḥparaṃ praṇidhānabalenāpramāṇā prabhāvavikurvaṇā bodhisattvānāṃ veditavyā asmin pramuditavihāre sthitānām
T06bsa034_u:5990: teṣāṃ samyak praṇidhānāṃ na sukarāṃ saṃkhyā kartu yāvatkalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrairapi
T06bsa034_u:5991: / evamayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ pramuditavihāraḥ suviniścita[taḥ] caturākāraḥ cittotpādataḥ samyak praṇidhānavīryārambhābhinirhārataḥ vihārapariśodhanatastadanyavihāravyutpattitaḥ kuśalamūlapariśodhanataḥ
T06bsa034_u:5995: yāśca daśabhūmike sūtre daśa bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ ta iha bodhisattvapiṭake mātṛkānirdeśa-daśa-bodhisattvavihārā yathākramaṃ pramuditavihāramupādāya yāvatparamavihārādveditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5998: tatra katame bodhisattvānāmadhiśīlavihārasya ākārāḥ kāni liṅgāni kāni nimittani veditavyāni
T06bsa034_u:5999: iha bodhisattvena pūrvameva pramuditavihāre daśākāreṇa (Dutt 228) cittāśayenāśayaśuddhiḥ pratilabdhā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6017: sa evaṃ prakṛtiśīlī prajñayā kliṣṭākliṣṭānāṃ karmapathānāṃ durgatisugatiyāneṣu karmasamudācāre hetuphalasamudāgamavyavasthānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:6020: parāṃśca tatraiva samādāpayitukāmo bhavati samādāpayati ca viṣamakarmasamācāradoṣaduṣṭañca sattvadhātuṃ sarvamaviśeṣeṇa sampattivipattigataṃ paramārthato duḥkhitaṃ vyasanasthaṃ vicitrairvyasanākārairanukampamāno 'nukampāvaipulyamanuprāptaḥ pratyavekṣate /
T06bsa034_u:6021: tasyāsmin adhiśīlavihāre vyavasthitasya buddhadarśanaṃ kuśalamūlaviśuddhiḥ pūrvavadveditavyā
T06bsa034_u:6023: tadyathā tadeva suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa kāsīsaṃ grakṣiptaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā viśuddhataraṃ bhavatyagnau prakṣipyamāṇam /
T06bsa034_u:6027: yadbhūyasā bāhulyena ca dauḥśīlyādakuśalebhyaḥ karmapathebhyaḥ sattvān vyāvartayati /
T06bsa034_u:6034: vistaranirdeśataḥ punaryathā sūtrameva yathā daśabhūmike vimalāyāṃ bhūmau dauḥśīlyamalāpagatatvāt vimalā bhūmirityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:6036: yā tatra vimalā bhūmiḥ sehādhiśīlavihāro veditavyaḥ
T06bsa034_u:6037: tatra katame bodhisattvānāmākārāḥ kāni liṅgāni kāni nimittāni adhicittavihārasya /
T06bsa034_u:6038: iha bodhisattvena pūrvamevādhiśīlavihāre te daśa śuddhāśayā manasikṛtā bhavanti juṣṭāḥ pratividdhāḥ
T06bsa034_u:6042: sarvāsravasāsraveṣu me dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandati pratikūlatāyāṃ ca santiṣṭhata iti manasikāreṇa /
T06bsa034_u:6043: tatpratipakṣabhāvanāyāṃ ca me vijñānaṃ saṃsthitamiti manasikāreṇa /
T06bsa034_u:6046: asaṃlīnaṃ ca me mānasaṃ pravartate sarvabuddhadharmeṣviti manasikāreṇa /
T06bsa034_u:6047: sarvaduṣkaracaryāsu ca me nāsti vyatheti manasikāreṇa /
T06bsa034_u:6048: adhimuktaṃ ca me mahāyāne cittamekāntena na tadanyahīnayāneṣviti manasikāreṇa /
T06bsa034_u:6054: tatra ca spṛhājāto bhavati ghanarasena cchandena
T06bsa034_u:6064: tasya ca jñānālokasya niṣpattaye samyaksaṃbodhiṃ paśyati
T06bsa034_u:6068: saddharmaśravaṇahetornāsti taddraviṇaṃ pariṣkāramādhyātmika-vāhyaṃ vastu yanna parityajati
T06bsa034_u:6072: sa prītataro bhavatyeka catuṣpadagāthāśravaṇena na tvevaṃ trisāhasrapūrṇapratimena mahāratnarāśinā prītataro bhavatyekadharmapadaśravaṇena samyaksaṃbuddhopanītena bodhisattvacaryāpariśodhakena na sarvaśakratva[-māratva-]brahmatva-lokapālatva-cakravartitva-samucchrayapratilambhaiḥ
T06bsa034_u:6076: 'nuśrāvayiṣyāmi sa cenmahatyāmagnikhadāyāmātmānaṃ prakṣipasi mahāntañca duḥkhopakramaṃ saṃpratīcchasīti
T06bsa034_u:6078: utsahāmyahamasya dharmapadasyārthe pūrvavat trisāhasramahāsāhasrapratimāyāmāpyagnikhadāyāṃ brahmalokādātmānamutsraṣṭuṃ prāgeva pratyavarāyām /
T06bsa034_u:6080: evaṃrūpeṇa vīryārambheṇa dharmān paryeṣyaivaṃ yoniśo manasikaroti /
T06bsa034_u:6081: yathā dharmānnudharmapratipattiṃ buddhadharmānugatāṃ na vyañjanasvaramātraviśaddhimiti viditvā tadeva śrutaṃ niśritya dharmanimittāni samyagālambanīkurvan viviktaṃ kāmairvistareṇa prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthañca dhyānaṃ laukikaṃ catasra ārūpyasamāpattīrlaukikīścatvāryapramāṇāni pañca cābhijñā upasaṃpadya viharati /
T06bsa034_u:6082: sa tairbahulaṃ vihṛtya tāni dhyānāni samādhīn samāpattīḥ vyāvartayitvā praṇidhānavaśena kāmadhātau yatra sattvārthaṃ bodhipakṣadharmaparipūriṃ ca paśyati tatropapadyate /
T06bsa034_u:6084: tasya kāmavītarāgatvātkāmabandhanāni prahīṇāni bhavanti dhyānasamādhisamāpattivyāvartanatvād (Dutt 231) bhavabandhanāni /
T06bsa034_u:6085: adhimukticaryā-bhūmāvevāsya pūrvameva dharmatathatādhimokṣād dṛṣṭikṛtabandhanāni prahīṇāni bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6089: tadyathā tadeva suvarṇakuśalasya karmārasya hastagataṃ prakṣīṇamalakaṣāyamapi samadharaṇamavatiṣṭhate tulyamānam /
T06bsa034_u:6101: tadvyāvartanaṃ praṇidhāya yatra kāmopapattitaśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhitaścopapattitaśca prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6102: vistaranirdeśaḥ punaryathāsūtraṃ tadyathā daśabhūmike prabhākaryāṃ bhūmau /
T06bsa034_u:6104: adhyātmaṃ cittaviśuddhimupādāya sā prabhā saṃbhavati tasmātsa vihāraḥ adhicitta ityucyate
T06bsa034_u:6107: iha bodhisattvena pūrvamevādhicittavihāre daśa dharmālokapraveśāḥ śrutaparyeṣṭimadhipattiṃ kṛtvā pratilabdhā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6109: [te] punardaśa dharmālokapraveśā granthato yathā sūtrameva veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6110: ye ca prajñapyante yatra ca prajñapyante yena ca prajñapyante te ca yatsamāḥ paramārthaḥ yasya
T06bsa034_u:6111: saṃkleśa-vyavadānaśca saṃkliśyante viśuddhante ca yatpratiyusaṃktena saṃkleśena saṃkliśyante yayā cānuttarayā viśuddhyā (Dutt 232) viśudhyante
T06bsa034_u:6114: abhedyāśayatā pūrvaṅgamairyathāsūtrameva daśākāreṇa jñānaparipākena [jñāna-]paripācakairdharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati
T06bsa034_u:6116: sarvākārāṃ bodhisattvāpekṣāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā smṛtyupasthānapramukhān saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayanti yathāsūtrameva /
T06bsa034_u:6117: tasya tāndharmānupāyaparigraheṇa bhāvayataḥ satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ susūkṣmāpyasya skandhadhātvāyatanānyabhiniveśaḥ sarveñjitāni cātyantāsamudācārataḥ prahīyante /
T06bsa034_u:6118: teṣāṃ prahāṇād yāni tathāgata-vivarṇitāni karmāṇi tāni sarveṇa sarvaṃ nādhyācarati /
T06bsa034_u:6120: tathābhūtaśca bhūyasā mātrayā snigdhamṛdukarmaṇyacittaśca bhavati tathā citrākārasuviśuddhacittaśca
T06bsa034_u:6123: uttari ca bhūmipariśodhakāni karmāṇi samanveṣamāṇo mahāvīryārambhaprāpto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6136: prabhāve ca yatra pūrvavihāre śatasahasraguṇaṃ samākhyātaṃ tatrāsmin koṭisamākhyātaṃ veditavyam
T06bsa034_u:6149: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvake 'dhiprajñavihāre [yā] daśa viśuddhāśayasamatāḥ pratilabdhāḥ tāsāmadhimātrātvāt paripūrṇatvāt dvitīyamadhiprajñavihāraṃ praviśati /
T06bsa034_u:6156: bhūyo jñānavaiśeṣikatāṃ prārthayamānaḥ catvāryasatyāni daśabhirākārairyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
T06bsa034_u:6165: sa evaṃ satyakuśalaḥ sarvañca saṃskāragataṃ prajñayā samyag vidūṣayati /
T06bsa034_u:6173: yāni ca sattvānugrāhakāni laukikāni lipiśāstramudrāgaṇanādīni yathāsūtrameva śilpakarmaṃsthānāni tāni sarvāṇyābhinirharati sattvakaruṇa[ta]yā /
T06bsa034_u:6178: ityayaṃ teṣāṃ sattvānugrāhakānāṃ śilpakarmasthānānāṃ samāsārtho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6181: tadyathā tadeva svarṇakuśalena karmakāreṇa musāragalva-mṛṣṭaṃ pratyarpitamatulyatayā 'saṃhāryaṃ bhavati tadanyaiḥ suvarṇaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6182: evamayaṃ bodhisattvo 'saṃhāryo bhavati sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ tadanyabhūmisthitaiśca bodhisattvaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6183: tadyathā candrasūryanakṣatrāṇāmābhā asaṃhāryā ca bhavati sarva vātamaṇḍalaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6185: evamevāsya bodhisattvasya sā prajñā asaṃhāryā bhavati sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6196: vistaranirdeśataḥ punastadyathā daśabhūmike sudurjayāyāṃ bhūmau sattveṣu niścayajñānaṃ sudurjayam
T06bsa034_u:6202: iha bodhisattvena pūrvameva satyapratisaṃyukte adhiprajñavihāre daśa dharmasamatāḥ pratilabdhaḥ (Dutt 235) bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6205: sarvadharmeṣu pāramārthikasya sataḥ svabhāvasya nirnimittasamatayā abhilāpābhisaṃskārapratibhāsasyālakṣaṇasamatayā tasyaivālakṣaṇatvāt svayamajātasamatayā hetuto 'nutpannasamatā svayaṃ
T06bsa034_u:6207: vastugrāhakasya jñānasya niṣprapañcasamatayā ādānatyāgābhisaṃskāravigamasamatayā ca tasyaiva
T06bsa034_u:6211: so 'sminvihāre sthitaḥ sattveṣu saṃvṛddhakaruṇo bodhau tīvracchandābhilāṣajātaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6216: sa evaṃ paramārthakuśalaḥ sattvasāpekṣaḥ yoniśaḥ pratividhyati kleśasaṃyogāt /
T06bsa034_u:6217: pratyayasāmagryācca saṃskṛtaṃ prakṛtidurbalamātmātmīyavirahitamanekadoṣaduṣṭaṃ pravartate na vinā kleśasaṃyogapratyayasāmagrīm /
T06bsa034_u:6218: tena mayā kleśasaṃyogapratyayasāmagrīṃ ca vikalīkartavyā cātmarakṣārtham /
T06bsa034_u:6219: na ca sarveṇa sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ vyupaśamayitavyaṃ sattvānugrahārtham /
T06bsa034_u:6220: tasyaivaṃ jñānakārūṇyānugatasyāsmin vihāre 'saṅgajñānābhimukho nāma prajñāpāramitāvihāraḥ abhisaṃmukhī bhavati
T06bsa034_u:6222: sa ca vihāro yā tīkṣṇā saptamyāṃ bhūmau prāyogikacaryāparyantagatā bodhisattvakṣāntiḥ tayānulomikyā kṣāntyā saṃgṛhīto veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6234: tadyathā tadeva suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa vaidūryamaṇiratnamuṣṭaṃ pratyarpitamasaṃhāryaṃ bhavati tadanyaiḥ sarvajātarūpaiḥ evamasya bodhisattvasya tāni kuśalamūlāni viśuddhatarāṇi bhavantyasaṃhāryāṇi pūrvavat /
T06bsa034_u:6235: tadyathā candraprabhā sattvāśrayāṃśca prahalādayatyanācchedyaprabhā ca bhavati catasṛbhirvātamaṇḍalikābhiḥ
T06bsa034_u:6236: evamasya bodhisattvasya sā prajñābhā sarvasattvakleśaparidāhañca praśamayati /
T06bsa034_u:6245: apramāṇa-samādhipratilambhataśca abhedyāśayapratilambhataśca śāsanādāsaṃhāryataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhita upapattitaḥ prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6250: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ sābhisaṃskāraḥ sābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6251: iha bodhisattvenānantare 'dhiprajñavihāre daśopāyena prajñayā cābhinirhṛtāḥ sarvasattvāsādhāraṇā laukikāḥ sarvalokāsādhāraṇāśca mārgāntarārambhaviśeṣāḥ pratilabdhā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6254: laukikasampattisaṃvartakaṃ puṇyaparigraha mārabhya sattveṣu hitasukhāśayamārabhya bodhāya
T06bsa034_u:6263: tasya cittakṣaṇe daśapāramitāḥ pramukhāḥ sarve bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ paripūryante viśeṣeṇa /
T06bsa034_u:6265: prathame pramuditavihāre praṇidhānādhyālambanatayā dvitīye cittadauḥśīlyamalāpakarṣaṇatayā tṛtīye praṇidhānavivardhanadharmālokapratilābhatayā caturthe mārgāvatāraṇatayā pañcabhe laukikakriyāvatāraṇa yā ṣaṣṭhe gambhīrapraveśanatayā /
T06bsa034_u:6266: āsmin punaḥ saptame vihāre sarvabuddhadharmasamutthāpanatayā bodhaṅgāni paripūryante bodhisattvaprāyogikacaryāparipūrisaṃgrahādasya vihārasya jñānābhijñācaryāviśuddhāṣṭamavihārākramaṇācca /
T06bsa034_u:6273: tasmādasmin vihāre sarve rāgādipramukhāḥ kleśāḥ prahīyante /
T06bsa034_u:6274: sa ca na saṃkleśo na niḥkleśo veditavyaḥ asamudācārād buddhajñānābhilāṣācca /
T06bsa034_u:6276: sa yāni tathāgatavivarṇitāni karmāṇi pūrvavat tasya pañcamavihārābhinihṛtāni laukikāni śilpajñānānīha paripūryante ācāryasammataśca bhavati trisāhasramahāsāhasre sthāpayitvā ūrdhvavihārasthān bodhisattvāṃstathāgatāṃśca /
T06bsa034_u:6278: sarve ca dhyānādayo bodhipakṣyā dharmā āmukhī bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6283: sa tathā prayuktaḥ suniścitaviṣayasamādhipramukhāni daśa samādhiśatasahasrāṇyabhinirharati bodhisattvasamādhīnām /
T06bsa034_u:6285: sa evaṃ sarvakleśaviviktena durvijñeyena sarvavikalpapracārāpagatena kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇā viharati
T06bsa034_u:6289: asminvihāre svabuddhiviṣayatayā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaviṣayasamatikrāntāstadanyeṣu tu ṣaṭṣu buddhadharmādhyālambanatayā ṣaṣṭhe ca vihāre bodhisattvo nirodhaṃ samāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:6292: yad bhūtakoṭivihāreṇa ca viharati na ca nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti /
T06bsa034_u:6293: sa tamevopāyajñānābhinihāramadhipatiṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvāsādhāraṇāṃ bodhisattvacaryāñcarati laukikapratibhāsāñcātanmayīṃ ca yathāsūtrameva /
T06bsa034_u:6297: vimokṣatrayavihāratāṃ hīnayānādhimuktopāyavinayanatāṃ kāmaparibhogaṃ kāmaviśeṣaprārthanāṃ tīrthikavyāvartanatāṃ paracittānuvartanatāṃ mahājanakāyānuvartanatāṃ cārabhya śeṣaṃ pūrvavat tatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6298: tadyathā tadeva suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa sarvamaṇiratnamṛṣṭuṃ pratyarpitamatyarthaṃ bhrājate
T06bsa034_u:6301: tadyathā sūryābhā jambūdvīpe yadbhūyasā snehaśca pariśoṣayati /
T06bsa034_u:6302: asaṃhāryā ca bhavati sa ca tadanyaprabhābhiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6303: evamasya bodhisattvasya prajñābhā sattvānāṃ sarvakleśaviṣāṇi ca śoṣayati /
T06bsa034_u:6308: ayaṃ sābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ upāyaprajñābhinihṛtamārgāntarārambhaviśeṣaniṣpattipraveśataśca tathāgataviṣayasamutthāna-prativedha-nirantaraprayogataśca pratikṣaṇaṃ sarvabodhipakṣyadharmasamudāgamataśca kliṣṭākliṣṭa-vyavasthānataśca
T06bsa034_u:6312: pratikṣaṇanirodhasamāpattitaśca sarvasattvāsādhāraṇalokacaryācaraṇataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhitaśca upapattitaḥ prabhāvataśca samāsa-nirdeśato
T06bsa034_u:6318: tatra katamo bodhisattvānām anābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6319: iha bodhisattvena prathame 'nantare vihāre daśākāraṃ sarvadharmaparamārthāvatārajñānaṃ pratilabdhaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6320: triṣu adhveṣu yathāyogam ādyanutpannatāmajanmatāmalakṣaṇatām ārabhya tadanyahetubhāvāsambhavāvināśatāñcārabhya paramārthato nirabhilāpyasvabhāve vastunyabhilāpābhisaṃskārapratibhāsasya svabhāvasya lakṣaṇena hetubhāvena cāvidyamānasya tasyaiva saṃkleśātmanāpravṛttitāñcānivṛttitāñcārabhya tadajñānamithyābhiniveśahetukāñca tasminvidyamāne vastuni nirabhilāpye ādau madhye paryavasāne sarvakālasaṃkleśasamatāṃ cārabhya
T06bsa034_u:6323: ihasthaścānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu paramāṃ bodhisattvakṣāntiṃ suviśuddhāṃ labhate /
T06bsa034_u:6325: catasṛbhiḥ paryeṣaṇābhirayaṃ bodhisattvaḥ sarvadhamān paryeṣya yadā caturbhireva yathābhūtaparijñānaiḥ parijānāti /
T06bsa034_u:6326: tadā sarvamithyāvikalpābhiniveśeṣvapanīteṣu sarvadharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭe ca dharme sarvasaṃlkeśānutpattyanukūlatāṃ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:6327: samparāye ca sarveṇa sarvaṃ niravaśeṣato 'nutpatiṃ paśyati teṣāmeva pūrvamithyāvikalpābhiniveśahetusamutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām /
T06bsa034_u:6328: tāḥ punaḥ catasraḥ paryeṣaṇā yathāpūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭāstattvārthapaṭale /
T06bsa034_u:6329: catvāri ca yathābhūtaparijñānāni tānyadhimukticaryāvihāramupādāya yāvatsābhoganirnirmittādvihārān na suviśuddhāni bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6331: tasmāt sa bodhisattvaḥ anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣānti-pratilabdha ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:6332: sa tasyāḥ kṣānterlābhād gambhīraṃ bodhisattvavihāramanuprāpto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6333: tasya ye pūrvake nirnimitte vihāre catvāro 'pakṣālāste prahīṇā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6335: uttari ca viśuddhavihāre autsukyaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6339: tasya ca tasmin gambhīre vihāre 'bhiratasya tasmin dharmamukhasrotasi tathāgata-saṃcodanā-samādāpanā-abhinirhāramukha-jñānābhijñā-karmopasaṃhāro
T06bsa034_u:6348: sarvopapattisaṃvartanīyeṣu ca karmasu sarvopapattyāyataneṣu cāsya kāmakāmopapattitā bhavati
T06bsa034_u:6351: yad yadeva vastu yathādhimucyate tattathaiva bhavati nānyathā /
T06bsa034_u:6352: yañca jñeyaṃ jñātukāmo bhavati tadapi jānīte yathāvat /
T06bsa034_u:6355: evaṃ vaśitāprāptasya bodhisattvasyātaḥ pareṇa vaśitāprāptakṛto 'nuśaṃso vistareṇa yathāsūtrameva veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6356: audārikañca buddhadarśanaṃ vihāya satatasamitamavirahito bhavati buddhadarśanena /
T06bsa034_u:6363: dharmamukhasrotasi buddhairaprameyābhinirhāramukhajñānābhijñākarmopasaṃhārataśca apramāṇakāyavibhaktijñānapraveśataśca vaśitāprāptitaśca vaśitānuśaṃsapratyanubhavanataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhita upapattiḥ
T06bsa034_u:6371: iha bodhisattvastenāpi vihāreṇa gambhīreṇāsaṃtuṣṭa uttarijñānaviśeṣatāmanugacchan yaiśca dharmajñānābhisaṃskāraiḥ pareṣāṃ dharmaḥ sarvākāro bodhisattvena deśayitavyo yacca dharmākhyānakṛtyaṃ tatsarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tatredaṃ dharmasamākhyānakṛtyam /
T06bsa034_u:6372: gahanopavicāreṣu ye ca saṃkliśyante viśudhyante ca /
T06bsa034_u:6373: yena ca saṃkliśyante yena ca viśudhyante /
T06bsa034_u:6385: yatra yeṣu ca dharma deśayataḥ yāvadbhirmukhaiḥ yayā sattva-vijñāpana
T06bsa034_u:6389: ayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ pratisaṃvidvihāraḥ śāntavimokṣasantuṣṭipraveśataśca dharmasamākhyānābhisaṃskārajñānataśca tatkṛtyajñānataśca acintyamahādharmabhāṇakatvapratilambhataścakaśalamūlaviśuddhita upapattitaḥ prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6392: sarvasattvānāṃ hitasukhāśayapariśuddhyā bodhisattvapratisaṃvinmatyā dharmasamākhyānādhikāratvāt sā bhūmiḥ sādhumatītyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:6395: iha bodhisattvasya pratisaṃvid-vihāre sarvākārapariśuddhe dharmarājatvārhasya dharmābhiṣekasamāsannasya
T06bsa034_u:6403: paripūrṇabodhisattvamārgaḥ suparipūrṇa-bodhisambhāraśca sa bodhisattvaḥ tathāgatā nāmantikāt dharmamedhabhūmyāmatyudārāṃ duḥsahāḥ tadanyaiḥ sarvasattvaiḥ saddharmaṃvṛṣṭi sampratīcchati mahāmedhabhūtaśca
T06bsa034_u:6406: vicitrāṇi ca kuśalamulaśasyāni virohayati vivardhayatī pācayatī tasyāṃ bhūmāvavasthitaḥ
T06bsa034_u:6409: na ca yānyuttarottareṣu vihāreṣvaṅgāni nirniṣṭāni tāni pūrvakeṣu vihāreṣu sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante /
T06bsa034_u:6410: api tu mṛdutvān na saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti /
T06bsa034_u:6413: ekaikaścātra vihāro 'nekairmahākalpakoṭīśatasahasraistato vā prabhūtataraiḥ pratilabhyate niṣpadyate ca /
T06bsa034_u:6414: te tu sarve vihārāstribhirmahākalpāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ samudāgacchanti mahākalpāsaṃkhyeyenādhimukticaryā-vihāraṃ samatikramya pramuditavihāro labhyate /
T06bsa034_u:6416: dvitīyena mahākalpāsaṃkhyeyena pramuditavihāraṃ yāvatsābhogaṃ nirnimittaṃ vihāramatikramyānābhogaṃ nirnimittaṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:6418: tathā hi sa śuddhāśayo bodhisattvo niyataṃ vyāyacchate /
T06bsa034_u:6419: tṛtīyena mahākalpāsaṃkhyeyenānābhogañca nirnimittaṃ pratisaṃvidvihārañca samatikramya paramaṃ bodhisattvavihāraṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:6423: yāpi (Dutt 243) teṣāmeva mahākalpānāṃ gaṇanāyogena sarvagaṇanā samatikrāntā saṃkhyā so 'pyasaṃkhyeyaḥ
T06bsa034_u:6426: yastvadhimātrādhimātreṇa vīryārambheṇa prayujyate tataḥ kaścidantarakalpān prabhūtān vyāvartayati kaścit yāvanmahākalpān /
T06bsa034_u:6429: tatra triṣu vihāreṣu kleśāvaraṇapakṣyadauṣṭhulyasya prahāṇaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:6431: samudācāratastvadhimātramamyasya sarvakleśapakṣyasya anābhoge nirnimitte vihāre 'nutpattikadharmakṣānti-viśuddhivibandhakleśa pakṣyasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ dauṣṭhulyasya prahāṇaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:6434: tacca tathāgataṃ vihāramanupraviśataḥ jñeyāvaraṇapakṣyamapi dauṣṭhulyaṃ trividhaṃ veditavyam
T06bsa034_u:6437: phalgugatasyānābhoge nirnimitte sāragatasya tathāgate vihāre prahāṇaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6438: sarvāvaraṇaviśuddhijñānatā ca teṣu triṣu vihāreṣu tasya
T06bsa034_u:6439: kleśa-jñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇasya tadanye vihārā yathānukramaṃ saṃbhārabhūtā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6440: eṣu trayodaśasu vihāreṣu samāsata ekādaśavidhā viśuddhirveditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:6450: daśame tattvajñānābhinirhāraviśuddhiḥ ekādaśe tadarthasamyak parasamākhyānāya pratirsavidviśuddhiḥ
T06bsa034_u:6458: tataścordhvaṃ triṣu bodhisattvavihāreṣu pariśuddhacaryā saṃgṛhīteṣu bhāvanāphalaniṣpattiḥ
T06bsa034_u:6460: śrāvakavihāre sādharmyeṇa caiṣāṃ dvādaśānāṃ bodhisattvavihārāṇāmanukramo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6463: yathā tasya nyāmāvakrāntivihāraḥ tathāsya tṛtīyo vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6464: yathā tasyāvetyaprasādalābhinaḥ āryakāntādhiśīlavihāra uttari āsravakṣayāya tathāsya caturtho vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6465: yathā tasyādhiśīlaṃ niśrityādhicittaśikṣānirhāravihāraḥ tathāsya pañcamo vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6466: yathā tasya yathā pratilabdhasatyajñānādhipraśikṣāvihāraḥ tathāsya ṣaṣṭha saptamāṣṭamā vihārā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:6467: yathā tasya suvicārita jñeyasyānimittasamādhiprayogavihāraḥ tathāsyanavamo vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6468: yathā tasya pariniṣpanno nirnimitto vihāraḥ tathāsya daśamo vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6469: yathā tasya vyutthitasya vimuktyāyatanavihāraḥ tathāsyaikādaśo vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6470: yathā tasya sarvākāro 'rhatvavihāraḥ tathāsya dvādaśo vihāro veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6476: samāsato bodhisattvānāṃ pañcavidhā upapattiḥ sarvatraṃ sarvavihāreṣu ca sarveṣāñca bodhisattvānāmanavadyā parvasattvahitasukhāya /
T06bsa034_u:6480: iha bodhisattvo durbhikṣeṣu kṛcchreṣu mahākāntāreṣu kāleṣu praṇidhāya sattvānāmalpakṛcchreṇa yātrānimittaṃ mahāmatsyādiyoniṣūpapadyate /
T06bsa034_u:6484: / bhṛśa-paracakropadraveṣu ca sattveṣu balavān bhūmipatirbhavati dharmeṇa śamenopāyakauśalyena paracakropadravapraśamanārthaṃ paraspara-viruddheṣu
T06bsa034_u:6485: ca sattveṣvādeyavacano bhavati sandhikriyāyai vairāśayaprahāṇāya ca /
T06bsa034_u:6486: daṇḍabandhanacitrapīḍāpravṛtteṣu ca prajānāṃ rājasu teṣāmeva sattvopadravāṇāṃ prahāṇāya tadrūpeṣu rājakuleṣūpapadyate /
T06bsa034_u:6488: ye ca sattvā mithyādṛṣṭayaśca pāpakāriṇaśca kasmiṃściddevāyatane 'dhimuktāḥ teṣāmanukampayā mithyādṛṣṭiduściritaprahāṇāya tasmindevāyatane upapadyate /
T06bsa034_u:6489: praṇidhānavaśitābalābhyāñca iyamupapattiranukampā-pūrvikā aprameyā veditavyā vistaranirdeśatastāsu tāsu vicitrāsu yoniṣu tiryagyonyupapanneṣu sattveṣu samāsa-nirdeśastvayamāśayaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6491: iha bodhisattvaḥ praṇidhāya vā vaśitāprāptito vā vicitreṣu tiryagyonyupapanneṣu sattveṣu devanāgayakṣāsurādiṣu cānyonyadrugdha viruddheṣu tathā mithyādṛṣṭikeṣu brāhmaṇeṣu tathā duścaritacāriṣu tat (Dutt 248) ājīveṣu tadabhirateṣu tathākāmeṣvatyarthādhyavasiteṣu kāmādhimukteṣu [sattveṣu] teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sabhā[gatā]yāmupapadyate prāmukhyena tasya doṣasya vinivartanārtham /
T06bsa034_u:6492: sa pramukho bhūtvā yatte sattvāḥ samudācaranti tadasā na samudācaranti /
T06bsa034_u:6493: yatte na samudācaranti kuśalaṃ tadasau samudācarati /
T06bsa034_u:6495: te tayā [ca] dharmadeśanayā [tayā] ca visabhāgasamudācāratayā tebhyo doṣebhyastenopāyakauśalyena vinivartante /
T06bsa034_u:6500: tena ca vipākena yathoktaṃ svaparārthapaṭale karma karoti /
T06bsa034_u:6503: yā bodhisattvasya prathamaṃ pramuditavihāramupādāya yāvaddaśamādvihārādupapattirvarṇitā sā
T06bsa034_u:6505: jambūdvīpeśvaratvamupādāya yāvanmaheśvaratvādakaniṣṭhānatikramya sarvopapattyāyatanapraviṣṭaṃ yatra paramavihāraprāptā eva bodhisattvā upapadyante /
T06bsa034_u:6508: yasyāmupapattau paripūrṇabodhisambhārī bodhisattvaḥ purohitakule vā rājakule vā upapadyānuttarāñca samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
T06bsa034_u:6511: ye kecid bodhisattvā atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasu śubhāsu bhadrāsu kalyāṇāsu upapattiṣūpapannā upapatsyante upapadyante ca sarve te āsveva pañcasu /
T06bsa034_u:6512: nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ sthāpayitvā bālabhūmyupapattīḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6513: tathā hi vijñairbodhisattvaiḥ upapattaya etāḥ pañcābhipretāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6519: tatra sarvāsu vihāragatāsu bodhisattvacaryāsu bodhisattvānāṃ samāsataḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ samyaktvaparigraho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6526: prathama eva cittotpāde bodhisattvena sarvaḥ sattvadhātuḥ kalatrabhāvena parigṛhītaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6527: eṣāṃ mayā yathāśakti yathābalaṃ sarvākārahitasukhopasaṃhāraḥ karaṇīya iti /
T06bsa034_u:6531: sa ca tasminparigrahe parigrahānurūpayā kriyayā bodhisattvānurūpayā pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:6542: kālena ca kālaṃ vaiśeṣikeṇa lābhena priyavāditayā copavatsayati na caiṣu dāsadāsīsaṃjñāṃ karoti
T06bsa034_u:6544: rājyajane punā rājabhūto bodhisattvaḥ adaṇḍenāśastreṇa rājyaṃ kārayati /
T06bsa034_u:6555: sa dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ samyak pariṣadaṃ parigṛhṇāti /
T06bsa034_u:6559: sarvasmiṃśca parigrahe samacitto bhavati na pakṣapatitaḥ
T06bsa034_u:6560: / na ca teṣāmantike dharmamātsaryaṃ karoti na cācāryamuṣṭim /
T06bsa034_u:6562: kuśalakāmatayā tu svayaṃ kurvatāṃ na nivārayati teṣāmeva-puṇyasambhāropacayanimittam kālaṃ ca prāpya svayamevateṣāmupasthānaparicaryākartā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6567: gambhīraṃ cārthapadaṃ prajñayā pratividhya kālena kālaṃ saṃprakāśayati /
T06bsa034_u:6569: ātmanaścāntikāt teṣāmarthe āmiṣahetoradhikena vyāpāreṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6572: vyādhitāṃścaitāṃ vimanaskaṃ vā sarvathā nābhyupekṣate vyādhipraśamāya daurmanasyāpagamāya
T06bsa034_u:6574: / kālena ca kālaṃ teṣāṃ khedamanupraviśya yuktarūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
T06bsa034_u:6577: taiśca saha tulyavṛttasamācāro bhavatyadhiko vā [na] nyūnaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6581: uttānamukhavarṇaśca [bhavati /] vigatabhṛkuṭiḥ peśalo madhurabhāṇī pūrvābhilāpī smitapūrvaṅgamaḥ
T06bsa034_u:6587: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sarvaṃ kālaṃ pariṣadupādānaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:6590: tatra ye mṛduke paripāke vyavasthitāḥ sattvāste bodhisattvasya dīrghakālikamupādānamityucyante cireṇa kālena viśuiddhibhavyatayā /
T06bsa034_u:6592: ye punarmadhye paripāke vyavasthitāste 'dīrghakālikamupādānamityucyante na cireṇa viśuddhibhavyatayā
T06bsa034_u:6593: ye punaḥ sattvā adhimātre paripāke vyavasthitāste bodhisattvasya caramamupādānamityucyante tasminneva janmani viśuddhibhavyatayā /
T06bsa034_u:6595: yena parigraheṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvāḥ sattvān parigṛhītavantaḥ parigrahīṣyanti parigṛhṇanti vā /
T06bsa034_u:6599: vyatikramavyavasthiteṣu sattveṣu yudi vā bādhanaṃ yadi vā 'dhyupekṣaṇā bodhisattvasya saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ kaṭukena ca prayogeṇa sattve samudācāraḥ svasya cāśayasya kleśārakṣāsambādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ alpake ca deyadharme saṃvidyamāne bahūnāṃ yācakānāṃ sammukhībhāvo yācanāya saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ
T06bsa034_u:6600: ekātmakasya cāsya bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyeṣu vicitreṣūtpanneṣu sahāyībhāvayācanā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ
T06bsa034_u:6603: mūḍhaśaṭhakhaṭhuṃkeṣu sattveṣu dharmasya deśanā vādhyupekṣaṇā vā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6604: saṃsāre ca nityakālaṃ doṣadarśanaṃ saṃsārāparityāgaśca saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6607: aviśuddhe cādhyāṣaye parairagrasya parama-priyasya vastuno yācanā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ nānādhibhinnamatānāṃ nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃjñaptikā adhyupekṣaṇā vā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ ātyantikaścāpramādaḥ karaṇīyaḥ kleśāśca sarveṇa sarvaṃ na prahātavya iti saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ
T06bsa034_u:6608: / evaṃ saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptena bodhisattve kvacidgurulāghavaṃ lakṣayitvā tathaiva prayoktavyam kvacitpudgalapravicayaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6617: evaṃ samyak pratipakṣakuśalo bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptisammukhībhāve 'pi na viṣīdati samyakcātmānaṃ pariharati /
T06bsa034_u:6618: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne parigrahapaṭalaṃ dvitīyam /
T06bsa034_u:6621: eṣu yathāvarṇiteṣu trayodaśasu vihāreṣvanugatāḥ sapta bhūmayo veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6638: tāthāgatasya punarvihārasya bhūmeśca paścānnirdeśo bhaviṣyati buddhadharmapratiṣṭhā paṭale
T06bsa034_u:6639: tatra bodhisattvaḥ adhimukticaryābhūmeḥ śuddhādhyāśayabhūmimanupraviśan katham apāyānsamatikrāmati
T06bsa034_u:6640: iha bodhisattvo laukikaṃ pariśuddhaṃ dhyānaṃ niśrityādhimukticaryābhūmau susambhṛtabodhi sambhāro daśottareṇa pūrvanirdiṣṭenākāraśatena sattveṣvanukampāṃ bhāvayapyananyamanasikāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6641: sa bhāvanānvayāt tadrūpaṃ sattveṣvanukampāśayaṃ karuṇāśayaṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:6643: yadi me eṣveva sannivasato 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudāgacchati tathāpyahamutsahāmīti
T06bsa034_u:6647: tasya tathā paribhāvitaṃ tallaukikaṃ pariśuddhaṃ dhyānam /
T06bsa034_u:6656: ye ca te daśadharmā vihārapaṭale nirdiṣṭā /
T06bsa034_u:6657: śraddhādayo vihārapariśodhanāḥ ta ihāpi bhūmiviśodhanā veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6661: eṣāṃ daśānāṃ bhūmiviśodhanānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vipakṣabhūtā dharmāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6664: sarveṇa sarvamanārambhacittotpādanā bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāsamādānam ayaṃ śraddhāvipakṣo dharmaḥ
T06bsa034_u:6684: śāstari kāṃkṣā vimatirvicikitsā tathāgatapūjopa sthānatāyāḥ vipakṣaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6701: dhṛtibalādhānaprāptaśca samyak prayogādaparihīyamānaḥ kuśalaiśca dharmairvivardhamānaḥ pratipattipūjayā lābhasatkārapūjayā ca tathāgatapūjopasthānaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:6704: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne tṛtīyaṃ bhūmipaṭalam /
T06bsa034_u:6707: adhimukticaryābhūmimupādāya sarvāsu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu bodhisattvānāṃ samāsataścatasraścaryā veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6710: upāyakauśalyapāramitā ca praṇidhānapāramitā ca balapāramitā ca jñānapāramitā ca /
T06bsa034_u:6725: smṛtyupasthānānyupādāya sarve saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāścatasraśca paryeṣaṇāścatvāri ca yathābhūtaparijñānāni yathāpūrvanirdiṣṭānyabhisamasya bodhisattvānāṃ bodhipakṣyacaryetyucyate yathā saṃvarṇitāśca ṣaḍbhijñāḥ prabhāvapaṭale bodhisattvānāmabhijñācaryetyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:6731: kālena samudāgatāḥ paramayā svabhāvaviśuddhyā viśuddhāḥ paramañca phalamanuprayacchanti /
T06bsa034_u:6736: tatra mātsaryaṃ duścaritaṃ sattveṣu vairotpīḍanatā kausīdyaṃ vikṣepo mandamomuhatā ca /
T06bsa034_u:6739: dharmāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ṣaṭ pāramitā yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6743: ihādita eva bhoganirapekṣo bodhisattvaḥ tyaktvā āgārikān kāmān śīlasamādānaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:6746: samādānataśca kṣāntitaśca viśuddhiśīlo niścalena nirantareṇa kuśalapakṣaprayogeṇa prayujyate
T06bsa034_u:6748: sa tathā samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ jñeyaṃ jānāti dṛśyaṃ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:6751: iha bodhisattvasya dṛṣṭe dharme etān dānādīn kuśalāndharmān samādāya vartamānasya tannidānamāyatyāṃ bāhyataśca bhogasampatpratilambho bhavati dānakṛtaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6756: sahajā cakuśalamūlaprayoge akhedatā paravyatikramasahiṣṇutā ca paropatāpapriyatā /
T06bsa034_u:6760: sahajā ca mandarajaskasya svacittavaśitā cittakarmaṇyatā sarvārtheṣu kṣiprābhijñatāyai /
T06bsa034_u:6762: sahajañca mativaipulyaṃ pāṇḍityaṃ (Dutt 258) vicakṣaṇatā ca sarvārtheṣu /
T06bsa034_u:6763: iyaṃ pañcamī sampat itīdaṃ phalavipākakṛtamanyadanukramavyavasthānaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ veditavyam
T06bsa034_u:6764: tatra catasṛbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ [saha]sambhāreṇa svabhāvena parivāreṇa rakṣayā ca paripūrṇā bodhisattvānāmadhiśīlaṃ śikṣā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:6775: etāni ca catvāri kṛtyāni bodhisattvāḥ ābhiścatasṛbhiścaryābhiryathākramaṃ kurvantyanutiṣṭhanti
T06bsa034_u:6777: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne caturthaṃ caryāpaṭalam /
T06bsa034_u:6780: tatra tathāgatavihāramārabhya tāthāgatīñca niṣṭhāgamanabhūmiṃ bhagavatāṃ catvāriṃśaduttaramāveṇikaṃ buddhadharmaśataṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6781: dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni aśītyunuvyañjanāni catasraḥ sarvākārāḥ pariśuddhayaḥ daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni trīṇyarakṣāṇi mahāṃkaruṇā 'sammoṣadharmatā
T06bsa034_u:6786: adhasthātpādatalayoścakre jāte sahasrāre sanābhike sanemike sarvākāraparipūrṇe /
T06bsa034_u:6799: ekaikamasya romakūpe jātaṃ nīlaṃ kuṇḍalakajātaṃ pradakṣiṇāvartam /
T06bsa034_u:6802: / ślakṣṇatvāt tvace rajo malasya kāye nāvatiṣṭhate /
T06bsa034_u:6815: prabhūtatvāj jihvāyāḥ mukhājjihavāṃ nirṇāmya sarvamukhamaṇḍalamavacchādayati yāvantakaṃ kleśaparyantam
T06bsa034_u:6824: ūrṇā cāsya bhrūvormadhye jātā śvetā śaṃkhanibhā pradakṣiṇāvartā /
T06bsa034_u:6843: dve pārśve dve kakṣe dvau stanauabhisamasya ṣaḍanuvyañjane bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6845: ityetyāni adhaḥ kāyagatāni grīvāyāma ūrdhvaṃ sthāpayitvā ṣaṣṭiranuvyañjanāni bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6858: ityetāni grīvāyāḥ ūrdhvaṃ kāye viṃśatiranuvyañjanāni bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6859: pūrvakāni ca ṣaṣṭiḥ paścimakāni ca viṃśatirekadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya aśītiranuvyañjanāni bhavanti ityetāni lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāni [bhadrāṇi] śuddhāśayabhūmipraviṣṭo bodhisattvo vipākataḥ pratilabhate
T06bsa034_u:6863: hīnaistu taiḥ pūrvamapi bodhisattvabhūtaḥ samanvāgato bhavati śuddhādhyāśayabhūmimupādāya
T06bsa034_u:6864: sarvaścāviśeṣeṇa bodhisambhāraḥ sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanānāṃ nirvartako bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6877: apyeva te tasya pāpakasya karmaṇo vipakṣabhūtasya vicitrasya yatprātipakṣikaṃ vicitraṃ kuśalaṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjananirvartakaṃ karma tasyedaṃ vicitraphalānuśaṃsaṃ śrutvā tasya mahataḥ phalānuśaṃsasya spṛhyamānarūpāratasmācca pāpādvirameyuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6881: mātāpitrorupasthānena vicitreṇa vicitrayā ca sattvopadravārakṣayā āgamana-gamanādiparispandamupādāya cakrāṅkapādatāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:6885: yaiśca tribhiḥ karmabhiretāni trīṇi mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni nirdiṣṭāni taireva sarvaiḥ samastairāyatapādapārṣṇitvaṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:6886: tatra trayāṇāmapi lakṣaṇānāṃ saṃniśrayatvāt caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhirgurūn saṃgṛhya jālapāṇipādatāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:6888: kuśaladharmāsaṃtuṣṭyā uttarottarān kuśalāndharmānvardha yitvā ucchaṅgacaraṇatāṃ pratilabhate
T06bsa034_u:6889: yathāvaddharmānudgṛhya paryavāpya pareṣāṃ ca deśayitvā dautyañca samyak pareṣāṃ kṛtvā aiṇeyajaṅghatāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:6891: tatrānavanataḥ glāneṣu ca glānopasthānaṃ kṛtvā bhaiṣajyañca dattvā vyādhyanavanatocchrayaṇān mātrāśī ca kāmeṣvanavanataḥ anavanatakāyatāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:6892: parairnirvāsitān sattvān dharmeṇa samena saṃhṛtya hrīmānapatrāpī vastrapradaśca koṣagatavastiguhyatāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:6893: kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ saṃvṛtātmā pratigraha-bhojane ca mātrajñaḥ glāneṣu
T06bsa034_u:6896: yenaiva ca karmaṇā utsaṅgacaraṇatāṃ pratilabhate tenaivordhvaṅgaromatām /
T06bsa034_u:6901: yenaiva ca karmaṇā ekaikaromatoktā tenaiva sūkṣmaślakṣṇatvacatā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:6902: prabhūtenotsadena viśadenānnapānena mahājanakāyaṃ saṃtarpayitvā saptotsadakāyatāṃ pratilabhate
T06bsa034_u:6905: ahitāñca sattvānā nivārayitā tāḍitā hitāhite ca sanniyojayitā siṃhapūrvārdhakāyatāṃ pratilabhate siṃhavatsattvārtheṣu parākramaśīlatvāt /
T06bsa034_u:6906: anenaiva ca karmaṇā susaṃvṛttaskandhatā citāntarāṃśatā ca veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:6907: yenaiva ca karmaṇā dīrghāṅgulitvaṃ pratilabhate tenaiva bṛhadṛjugātratāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:6908: mitrabhedakarīṃ piśunāṃ vācaṃ prahāya bhinnānāñca sattvānāṃ sāmagrīṃ kṛtvā catvāriṃśad dantatāṃ samāviraladantatāñca pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:6909: kāmāvacarīṃ maitrīṃ bhāvayitvā dharmārthacintakaḥ suśukladantatāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:6910: arthimyaḥ sattvebhyo yathābhipretaṃ dhanaṃ samyagvisṛjya siṃhahanutāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:6911: svasutavat-sattvānsaṃrakṣya śrāddhaścānukampakaśca bhaiṣajyapradaśca [prasannaśca] rasarasāgratāṃ pratilabhate dharmarasānupradānāddharmarasāsvādanāt pranaṣṭarasaviśodhanācca /
T06bsa034_u:6912: pañca śikṣāpadāni prāṇātipātaviratyādīni svayañca samādāya saṃrakṣya parāṃśca teṣveva samādāpayitvā karuṇācittatāmupādāya mahatī dharmasamādāne pratipannatvāduṣṇīṣaśiraskatāñca prabhūta-tanujihvatāṃ ca pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:6913: satyavāditayā priyavāditayā kāladharmavāditayā ca brahmasvaratāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:6916: guṇavatāṃ tu bhūtasya varṇasya hartāṃ varṇavādī bhruvormadhye ūrṇāṃ pratilabhate śvetāṃ śaṃkhanibhāṃ pradakṣiṇāvartām /
T06bsa034_u:6920: na hi śīlavipanno bodhisattvo manuṣyatvameva tāvadāsādayet kutaḥ punarmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam /
T06bsa034_u:6921: tatroṣṇīṣaśiraskatā anava lokitamūrdhatā caikaṃ mahāpuruṣakṣaṇaṃ veditavye tadvyatirekeṇānupalambhāt idaṃ tāvadvistareṇa lakṣaṇābhinivṛttyānurūpyeṇa vicitrakarmavyavasthānam
T06bsa034_u:6924: nipuṇakāritayā cakracaraṇatā ucchaṅgacaraṇatā jālapāṇipādatā sūkṣmatvacatā citāntarāṃśatā susaṃvṛttaskandhatā vṛhadṛjugātratā prabhūtatanujihvatā ca nirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:6925: nityakāritayā dīrghāṅga litvaṃ āyatapādapārṣṇitā anavanatakāyatā nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalatā aviraladantatā ca nirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:6930: vyāma-prabhatā ca kāñcanasannibhatvacatā śukladantatā ūrṇā ca śvetā
T06bsa034_u:6935: kuśalamūlapariṇamanādūrdhvāṅga-romatā catvāriṃśatsamadantatā rasarasāgratā uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā ca nirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:6936: kuśale atṛptālīnaprayogāt siṃhapūrvārdhakāyatā siṃhahanutā ca nirvartaṃte /
T06bsa034_u:6937: sattveṣu hitacittatayā samadarśanāt samadantatā abhinīlanetratā gopakṣmamā ca nirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:6944: tadanyāsu taduttarottarāsu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu viśuddhireṣāṃ (Dutt 264) veditavyā tāthāgatyāṃ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmau suviśuddhataiṣāṃ niruttaratā ca veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:6945: tatra rūpitvādeṣāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ hīnamadhyottamaiśca sattvaiḥ sūpalakṣyatvāt satsu sarveṣveva buddhadharmeṣu mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇeṣvetānyeva mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni vyavasthāpitāni /
T06bsa034_u:6947: tatra samāsataḥ sarvasattveṣu puṇyasadṛśena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasyaikaiko romakūpo nirvartate
T06bsa034_u:6951: tataḥ śataguṇena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasyaikaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:6955: puṇyaskandhaḥ tataḥ śatasahasraguṇena puṇyaskandhena uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā anavalokitamūrdhatā ca nirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:6957: tataḥ koṭīśatasahasraguṇena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasya lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāsaṃgṛhīto 'nyo dharmaśaṃkhyo nāma nirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:6958: yena tathāgata ākāṃkṣamāṇaḥ anantāparyantān lokadhātūn svareṇa vijñāpayati /
T06bsa034_u:6961: teṣāṃ punarlakṣaṇānuvyañjananirvartakānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmaṇāṃ samāsatastribhiḥ kāraṇeprameyatā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:6967: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne pañcamaṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanapaṭalam /
T06bsa034_u:6975: savāsanānāṃ sarvakleśapakṣyāṇāṃ dauṣṭhulyānāmāśrayān niravaśeṣato 'tyantaparamaḥ sve cātmabhāve yathākāmādānasthānacyutivaśavartitā sarvākārā āśrayaśuddhistyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:6977: nirvāṇe pariṇāme saṃprakhyāne ca sarvālambaneṣu yā vaśavartitā /
T06bsa034_u:6982: pūrvavatsarvāvidyāpakṣyadauṣṭhulyāpagamātsarvatra ca jñeye jñānasyānāvaraṇāt jñānavaśavartitā sarvākārā jñānaviśuddhirityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:6984: sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ karmasvakajñānabalaṃ dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalam indriyaparāparajñānabalaṃ nānā dhātujñānabalaṃ nānādhimuktijñānabalaṃ sarvatragāminīpratipajjñānabalaṃ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānabalaṃ cyutyupapattijñānabalam āsravakṣayajñānabalañca /
T06bsa034_u:6985: ityetāni daśa tathāgatabalāni yuthā daśabalasūtre nirdeśato vistareṇa veditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:6986: [tatra] yatkiñcidanena bhāṣitaṃ lapitamudāhṛtaṃ sarvaṃ tattathā avitatheti
T06bsa034_u:6988: tatra phalasya śubhāśabhasya yo bhūtapravṛttaḥ aviṣamo hetuḥ tadasya sthānaṃ pratiṣṭhā niśrayo 'bhinirvartakaṃ ityucyate
T06bsa034_u:6993: eṣāñca sarvajñānādīnāṃ padānāṃ pūrvavadvyākaraṇaṃ veditavyaṃ tadyathā paramabodhipaṭale /
T06bsa034_u:7001: svayamadhigamya pareṣāmapyanukampayā vistareṇa prakāśanād brāhmacakraṃ pravartayatītyucyate
T06bsa034_u:7003: tathāgatasyaitadadhivacanaṃ yaduta brahmā ityapi śāntaḥ śītībhūta ityapi /
T06bsa034_u:7005: evaṃ pāraṃparyeṇa brahmā preritaṃ sarvasattvanikāye bhramati /
T06bsa034_u:7007: agraprajñaptipatitasya niruttaraśāstṛsaṃpatparigṛhītasya cātmano vikhyāpanāt tanmārgadeśanayā ca sarvatadanyapāṣaṇḍapratikṣepaṇāt tanmārgavipratyanīkavādiṣu ca pratyupasthiteṣu asaṃkocātsarvaparavādābhibhavāya codāraniruttaravāgabhyudoraṇātpariṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ nadatītyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7010: teṣām uttānā vivṛtā prajñaptā prakāśitā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:7014: kaścidākāṃkṣati devabhūto vā [manuṣyabhūto vā] sarveṇa tena mamaivāntikāllabhya eṣo 'bhyupāya iti /
T06bsa034_u:7017: sarva[ku]vaidyapratijñā pratikṣepaṇavat svayaṃ ca niyataṃ vyādhipraśamanapratijñānavatpariṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ naditaṃ draṣṭavyam
T06bsa034_u:7019: yāni naiva kṛtāni na niruddhāni nāpi karoti api tu kariṣyatyāyatyāṃ /
T06bsa034_u:7022: yāni punaḥ karmāṇi naiva kṛtāni na niruddhānyapi tu kartumeva praṇihito vyavasitaḥ tāni pratyutpannānītyucyante
T06bsa034_u:7023: tāni punaḥprakārabhedena trīṇi kāyakarma vākkarma manaskarma /
T06bsa034_u:7028: yacca sattvasaṃkhyātamasattvasaṃkhyātaṃ vā vastvādhiṣṭhāya kriyante tatteṣāṃ vastu ityucyate
T06bsa034_u:7032: tadetadabhisamasya sarvakālaṃ sarvaprakāraṃ sarvāvasthāprayogaṃ sarvadeśaṃ sarvādhiṣṭhānaṃ sarvanidānaṃ sarvādīnavānuśaṃsañca sarvākāraṃ tathāgatānāṃ karmajñānaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:7036: dhyānavimokṣaiḥ karmaṇyacetasaścetovaśiprāptasya yathepsitasyārthasya samṛddhaye yā tasya tadanurūpasya samādheḥ samāpadyanatā tā samādhisamāpattirityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7038: yathā samāhite citte sarvo brahmalokaudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭo babhūva /
T06bsa034_u:7041: evaṃ hi tathāgato yaṃ yamevārthaṃ prasādhayitukāmo lokasādhāraṇaṃ [asādhāraṇaṃ vā] sa tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadya laghuladhveva prasādhayati /
T06bsa034_u:7052: teṣāmeva ca dhyānādīnāṃ vicitrāṇāmabhinirhṛtānāṃ nāmasaṃketena anurūpeṇa yathāyogaṃ vyavasthitirvyavasthānāmityucyate
T06bsa034_u:7053: eṣāmeva ca dhyānādīnāṃ pratilabdhānāmuttari yā bhāvanā-paripūrirnikāmalābhitā
T06bsa034_u:7055: tatra yathā caiṣāmaprāptiryathā ca prāptiḥ teṣu ca yā ca hīnatā yā ca praṇītatā yaccaiṣāṃ nāma yā cotkarṣaparyantatā tat sarvaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:7057: yathā paripākasamudāgamataḥ śraddhādīnāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātratā indriya-parāparatetyucyate
T06bsa034_u:7061: śrāvakapratyekabuddha-tathāgatagotrāṇāṃ rāgādicaritaprabhedanayena ca yāvadaśīti sattvacaritasahasrāṇi nānādhātukatetyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7062: teṣāmevāvatāra-mukhānurūpā pratipat tadyathā rāgacaritānāmaśubhā vistareṇa tadyathā śrāvakabhūmau sarvatragāminī pratipadityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7068: vicitreṣu sattvanikāyeṣu tadyathā pūrveṣu dakṣiṇeṣu uttareṣu paścimeṣu nānā nāmasaṃketavyavasthānabhinneṣu aṣṭāsu vyavahārapadeṣvanugataṃ pūrvakeṣvabhyatītevātmabhāveṣu ṣaḍvidhaṃ samāsataścaritamanusmaratyanekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāse samanusmaran /
T06bsa034_u:7080: āhvānāya saṃketaḥ kṣatriyādayo varṇā mātāpitaraṃ bhojanapānavidhiḥ sampattivipattiḥ āryurvaicitryañca
T06bsa034_u:7081: tathā hi loke etānyaṣṭau vyavahārapadāni upaniśritya ṣaṭ caritāni pareṣāmātmano vyapadiśanto vyapadiśanti /
T06bsa034_u:7085: brāhmaṇo vaiśyaḥ śūdro 'hamayaṃ vā ayaṃ me pitā 'sya va /
T06bsa034_u:7088: manthān vā apūpān vā odānakulmāṣān vā pare vā /
T06bsa034_u:7089: evaṃ rūpe 'haṃ vyasane sampadi vā varte 'yaṃ vā
T06bsa034_u:7090: / evaṃrūpe 'haṃ vayasi vyavasthito nave vā madhye vā vṛddhe vā /
T06bsa034_u:7109: tadyathā kṛṣṇasyakutapasya nirbhāsaḥ andhakāratamisrāyā vā rātryāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7111: ye punardvābhyāmākārābhyāṃ jyotiḥ parāyaṇāsteṣāmayamevaṃrūpo manomayo 'ntarābhavo nirvartate
T06bsa034_u:7112: tadyathā jyotsnayā rātryā vārāṇaseyakasya vā sampannasya vastrasya /
T06bsa034_u:7118: sa samutthānayā śīlavipattyā kāyavāṅma noduścaritena samanvāgatā ityucyante /
T06bsa034_u:7119: dvividhayā mithyādarśanadṛṣṭivipattyā samanvāgamāt (Dutt 270) sarvāpavādikayā tanmatavipakṣāvasthitāryapavādikayā ca mithyādṛṣṭayaḥ āryāṇāmapavādakā ityucyante /
T06bsa034_u:7132: adharmacaryā viṣamacaryā ca tayā tatra yānaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:7137: iti yena copapadyante upapannāśca yadupabhuñjate tadupabhogācca punaryadanyat svayaṃkṛtaṃ duḥkhāntaramabhinirvartayanti tadetadābhiḥ saṃjñābhiḥ paridīpitam /
T06bsa034_u:7142: sarvāsravāṇāmaśeṣānuśayaprahāṇādyattat prātipakṣikamanāsravaṃ cittamanāśravā prajñāparamādhiprajñasaṃgṛhītā āsravāṇāṃ kṣayādanāsravā cetovimuktiḥ prajñāvimuktirityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7143: tāṃ punaścetovimuktiṃ [prajñāvimukti] tasminneva carame bhave pratyātmaṃ ṣaṣṭhābhijñayā darśanamārgasanniśrayeṇa bhāvanāmārga-sanniśrayeṇa cādhigamya svañcādhigamaṃ yathāvatprajānanti pareṣāṃ cākāṃkṣamāṇānāmārocayanti /
T06bsa034_u:7144: tasmād dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayamabhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya (Dutt 271)
T06bsa034_u:7146: kṣīṇāṃ me jātirityevamādīnāṃ padānāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:7158: ityebhiḥ saptabhirākāraiḥ samāsato daśa tathāgatabalāni veditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:7163: sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ na tu śraddhābalaṃ vā tadanyadvā balamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7177: iyameṣāṃ samatā vihāraviśeṣastu tathāgatānāmanyonyaṃ bhavedanyena balavihāreṇa anyastathāgatastadvahulavihārī bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:7179: eṣāṃ daśānāṃ balānāṃ tathāgataḥ kena kiṃ karmaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:7180: sthānāsthānajñānabalena tathāgataḥ hetuñca hetutaḥ phalañca phalato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
T06bsa034_u:7183: karmasvakatājñānabalena tathāgataḥ svayaṃkṛta-phalopabhogatāñca karmaṇāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
T06bsa034_u:7187: indriyaparāparajñānabalena tathāgataḥ sattvānāmindriyamṛdumadhyādhimātratāñca vibhajya yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:7193: nānādhātujñānabalena tathāgato hīnamadhyepraṇotadhātukatāśca vibhajya yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
T06bsa034_u:7194: yathendriyān yathāṣayān yathānuśayāṃśca sattvāṃsteṣu teṣvavatāramukheṣvavavādakriyayā samyagyathāyogaṃ saṃniyojayati /
T06bsa034_u:7195: tatra yathā tathāgatāḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ teṣu teṣvavatāramukheṣvavavādamanuprayacchanti tathāśrāvakabhūmau sarveṇa sarvaṃ nirantaramākhyātamuttānaṃ vivṛtaṃ prajñaptaṃ prakāśitam /
T06bsa034_u:7196: kathañca punastathāgatā bodhisattvamādikarmikaṃ tatprathamakarmikaṃ samādhisambhāraparigrahe 'vasthitañcittasthitikāmaṃ cittasthitaye
T06bsa034_u:7198: iha tathāgato bodhisattvāsataṃ samādhisambhāragurukamādikarmikaṃ tatprathamakarmikaṃ tatprathamataḥ evamavavadati /
T06bsa034_u:7199: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra praviviktaśayanāsanagata ekākī advitīyo yatte mātāpitṛbhyāṃ nāma vyavasthāpitamācāryopādhyāyābhyāṃ vā tadeva nāmādhyātmaṃ manasikuru /
T06bsa034_u:7201: kaścitṣaḍāyatanavinirmukto dharmaḥ svabhāvena pariniṣpannaḥ adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā ubhayamantareṇa vā vidyate /
T06bsa034_u:7202: yatredaṃ nāma (Dutt 273) saṃjñā prajñaptiḥ upacāraḥ pravartate sa tvamevaṃ yoniśo manasikurvaṃstaṃ
T06bsa034_u:7206: yadā ca te kulaputra tasmin svanāmni āgantukasaṃjñā utpānna bhavati pratilabdhā sa tvaṃ yā te cakṣuṣi cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñā cakṣuḥ-prajñaptistāmadhyātmaṃ yoniśomanasikuru /
T06bsa034_u:7213: tatra yaccakṣuṣi nāma saṃjñā prajñaptistattāvanna cakṣuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7214: yadapi tadvastu yatra cakṣuḥsaṃjñā tadapi svabhāvato na cakṣuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7216: na hi tatra cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñāṃ cakṣuḥprajñaptiṃ vinā kasyacit cakṣurbuddhiḥ pravartate
T06bsa034_u:7218: yena nāmnā 'bhilapyate na tatra punastadapekṣā cakṣurityevaṃ buddhiḥ pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:7221: na ca punaḥ pravartamānā upalabhyate tasmādidamapi cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñā cakṣuḥprajñaptiḥ āgantuke dharme saṃjñā āgantukī /
T06bsa034_u:7224: yathā cakṣuṣyevaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyeṣu vistareṇa yāvaddṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñāteṣu prāpteṣu paryeṣiteṣu manasā 'nuvitarkiteṣvanuvicāriteṣu samāsataḥ sarvadharmasaṃjñāsvāgantukasaṃjñā utpannā bhaviṣyati pratilabdhā /
T06bsa034_u:7226: tasyā vibhavāya prayogamārgaḥ samyak parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati /
T06bsa034_u:7227: vistareṇa yāvatsarvadharmeṣu yā saṃjñā tasyā vibhavāya prayogamārgaḥ samyak parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati
T06bsa034_u:7228: sa tvamevaṃ sarvajñeya-suvicāritayā buddhyā evaṃ te sarvadharmasaṃjñāsvāgantukasaṃjñayā
T06bsa034_u:7229: sarvaprapañcasaṃjñāmapanīyāpanīya nirvikāreṇa cetasā nirnimittenārthamātragrahaṇapravṛttenāsmin vastuni bahalaṃ vihara /
T06bsa034_u:7232: sa tvaṃ sacedaśubhāṃ manasikaroṣi enaṃ manasikāraṃ mā riñciṣyasi /
T06bsa034_u:7233: sa cenmaitrī midaṃpratyayatā pratītyasamutpādaṃ dhātuprabhedamānāpānasmṛtiṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ vistareṇa yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyanamapramāṇa-bodhisattva
T06bsa034_u:7244: śrāvako 'pi cānena manaskāreṇa prayujyamānaḥ kṣiprābhijñataraḥ syād dharmābhisamayāya yadi śaknuyādetaṃ manasikāraṃ yathāvatprativeddhum /
T06bsa034_u:7248: pūrve nivāsānusmṛtijñānabalena tathāgataḥ pūrvānte itivṛttakāṃśca jātakāṃśca smṛtvā cittasaṃvegāya cittaprasādāya vineyānāṃ deśayati /
T06bsa034_u:7252: āsravakṣayajñānabalena tathāgataḥ sve ca vimokṣe niṣkāṃkṣo bhavati nirvicikitsaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7256: sahābhisaṃbodhādanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhestathāgataḥ sarvāṇyeva daśa balāni sakṛtpratilabhate
T06bsa034_u:7258: abhisaṃbuddhamātra eva tathāgato dharmāṇāṃ samyageva hetuphalavyavasthānaṃ sthānāsthānajñāgabalena vyavalokayati /
T06bsa034_u:7270: tata evaṃ samyak prayuktaḥ śamathopastabdho aprahīṇakleśasamudācārayogākṛte kṛtābhimānināmabhimānaṃ tyājayati āsravakṣayajñānabalena /
T06bsa034_u:7273: iha tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksambodhibhisaṃbudhya tatprathamataḥ sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ sammukhīkṛtya pratītyasamutpanneṣu dharmeṣu paramaṃ dharmasthitijñānaṃ vyavacārayati /
T06bsa034_u:7274: tacca dharmasthitijñānaṃ niḥśritya karmasvakatājñānabalena gṛhipakṣaṃ vyavalokayati yena yena karmaṇā vicitreṇa teṣāṃ gṛhipakṣāśritānāṃ samudāgamo 'bhūdbhaviṣyati vidyate [ca] /
T06bsa034_u:7276: kimastyasmin kaścid pravrajitapakṣe duḥkhānniḥsṛto duḥkhān niḥsaraṇāya ca mārgasya deśayitā
T06bsa034_u:7278: sa nāstīti avagamya nisrāṇamaśaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ lokamavekṣya mahākaruṇāmupādāya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati /
T06bsa034_u:7280: santi sattvā loke jātā [loke] vṛddhā mṛdvindriyā api madhyendriyā api tīkṣṇendriyā apīti
T06bsa034_u:7282: tataḥ pūrvavatsarvānukramo nānādhimuktyādikānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ balānāṃ veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7285: pūrvaṃ tāvattathāgato 'bhisaṃbudhyamātra eva sthānāsthānajñānabalena pratītyasamutpannaṃ dharmadhātuṃ vicārayati /
T06bsa034_u:7286: tataḥ karmasvakajñānabalena yeṣu pratītatyasamutpanneṣu dharmeṣu sattvasaṃjñātaṃ sattvadhātuṃ vicārayati /
T06bsa034_u:7287: amī sattvā evaṃ rūpasya svayaṃkṛtasya karmaṇa evaṃ rūpaṃ phalaṃ pratyanubhavantīti /
T06bsa034_u:7289: [sattvadhātuṃ] ca yathāvadvyavacārayitvā dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalena tāneva sattvān duḥkhavimokṣāya samyak tribhiḥ prātihāryairavavadati /
T06bsa034_u:7290: avavadan pūrvaṃvadananukrameṇāvaśiṣṭairvalairindriyādīni jñātvā mārge cāvatārayitvā tān sattvān duḥkhādvimocayati /
T06bsa034_u:7293: tatra sthānāsthānajñānavalasya karmasvakajñānabalasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7294: yatkuśalākuśalasya karmaṇa iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ nirvartate idaṃ sthānāsthānajñānabalāt /
T06bsa034_u:7295: yatpunarya eva kuśalākuśalaṃ karma karoti sa eva tadiṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ pratyanubhavati /
T06bsa034_u:7297: yattāvadya eva dhyānavimokṣādīnāṃ samāpattyā tasyaiva te bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:7329: prakṛtisthaṃ bījaṃ pūrvābhyāsasamutthitaṃ bījaṃ viśodhyaṃ bījam /
T06bsa034_u:7341: yatpunaḥ pravibhajya vyavahārapadānugataṃ pūrvavat ṣaḍvidhaṃ caritaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:7353: tatra catvāryetāni sthānāni tathāgataiḥ pariṣadi pratijñātavyāni bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:7358: vimokṣakāmānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ duḥkhasamatikramāya nairyāṇiko mārgaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7360: tasyaiva ca mārgasya prāptivibandhabhūtā ye āntarāyikā dharmāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7363: ataḥ pratijñāviguṇāṃ dvayoḥ pūrvayoḥ sthānayoḥ kāyavāṅmanaśceṣṭāṃ pratijñāviguṇāṃ ca dvayoḥ paścimayoḥ sthānayoḥ pūrvāparavirodhatāmayuktipatitāñcāpareṣāṃ divyadṛśāṃ cādivyadṛśāñca paracittavidāmaparicittavidāṃ ca pratijñānasthānapratipakṣeṇa saṃcodanāyāṃ nimittabhūtāmasamanupaśyan yenaitāni sthānāni viśārado 'līnacitto
T06bsa034_u:7365: etāvacca śāstrā pratijñātavyam yaduta paripūrṇā svahitapratipattiḥ parahitapratipattiśca /
T06bsa034_u:7366: tatra pūrvakābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ sthānābhyāṃ paripūrṇā svahitapratipattiḥ pratijñātā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:7373: yo vā me bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakāṇāñca nairyāṇiko mārgo deśita iti vistaraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7377: dīrgharātraṃ tathāgata evaṃ kāmaḥ kaccinmayā sudeśite dharme vineyāḥ pratipattau yathāvadavatiṣṭeranniti
T06bsa034_u:7378: tasya ca dīrgharātraṃ tatkāmasya dharmasvāmino gaṇaparikarṣakasya tasyāḥ prārthitāyāḥ sampattibhyāmasaṃkleśasribhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ samāsataḥ prabhāvyate /
T06bsa034_u:7385: tṛtīyā punaḥ pariṣadyāsyāṃ tadekatyāḥ samyak pratipadyante tadekatyā mithyā pratipadyante
T06bsa034_u:7389: etattathāgatasya tribhirarakṣyaiḥ paridīpitam yadapi tadarthato 'pi kiñcidavyākṛtaṃ kukṛtamātrakaṃ bhavati kadācitkarhicitsmṛtipramoṣāt /
T06bsa034_u:7395: api tu niṣṭhuraṃ pratipadyate nāsya teṣvanurakṣā utpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:7401: tatra tathāgatānāṃ mahākaruṇā sarvākārā yathā pūrvanirdiṣṭā pūjāsevāpramāṇapaṭale veditavyā
T06bsa034_u:7403: tatra tathāgatasyānuṣṭeyaṃ yacca bhavati [yatra ca bhavati]
T06bsa034_u:7404: yathā ca bhavati yadā ca bhavati tatra tasya tathā tadā samyaganuṣṭhānādiyaṃ tathāgatasyāsammoṣadharmatetyucyate
T06bsa034_u:7405: iti yā ca tatra tathāgatasya sarvakṛtyeṣu sarvadeśeṣu sarvakṛtyopāyeṣu sarvakāleṣu smṛtyasaṃpramoṣatā sadopasthitasmṛtitā /
T06bsa034_u:7408: tatra yā tathāgatasya spandite vā prekṣite vā kathite vā vihāre vā kleśasadbhāvasadṛśaṃ ceṣṭā 'samudācāra-pracāratā /
T06bsa034_u:7410: arhatāṃ punaḥ prahīṇakleśānāmapi kleśasadbhāvasadṛśī ceṣṭā spandita-prekṣita-kathita-vihṛteṣu bhavatyeva /
T06bsa034_u:7418: tatra yacca sarvākāraṃ jñānaṃ yacca varajñānaṃ tadaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya sarvākāravarajñānamityucyate
T06bsa034_u:7420: tatra lakṣaṇānuvyañjanānyanena bodhisattvabhūtena carame bhave supariśuddhāni pratilabdhāni bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:7423: tadāsāvanācāryakaṃ saptatriṃśataṃ bodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayannekakṣaṇānāvaraṇajñānadaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate śaikṣyabhūtasya bodhisattvasya vajropamasamādhi-saṃgṛhītam /
T06bsa034_u:7424: tasyānantaraṃ dvitīye kṣaṇe pariśiṣṭānāṃ daśabalādīnāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
T06bsa034_u:7431: sāragatasya ca jñeyāvaraṇapakṣyasya dauṣṭhulyasya niravaśeṣaṃ prahāṇādasyāśrayaḥ parivṛtto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:7433: anyāḥ sarvāḥ paramavihārāvasānā bodhisattvānāmāśrayaparivṛttayaḥ sottarā eva veditavyāḥ tatra niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya ca bodhisattvasya [tathāgatasya ca kathaṃ jñānaviśeṣo 'vagantavyo jñānāntaram /
T06bsa034_u:7436: evaṃ tasya sarvasmin jñeye jñānaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:7439: tadyathā sarvākāraraṃga-paripūrṇaṃ citrakarma paścimayā suviśuddhayā raṃgalekhayā 'pariśodhitam
T06bsa034_u:7445: tadyathā cakṣuṣmata ārādrūpadarśanam evaṃ evaṃ bodhisattvasya pūrvavat yathā āsanne evaṃ tathāgatasya pūrvavat /
T06bsa034_u:7446: yathā mṛdutaimirikasya rūpadarśanam evaṃ bodhisattvasya pūrvavat yathā
T06bsa034_u:7448: yathā garbhagatasyātmabhāva evaṃ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmisthito bodhisattvo draṣṭavyaḥ
T06bsa034_u:7452: yathā tasyaiva prativibuddhasya cittapracāra evaṃ tathāgatasya draṣṭavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7455: yathā suviśuddhasya pradīpasya svabhāvaḥ evaṃ tathāgatasya jñānasvabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7458: evamabhisaṃbuddho bodhistathāgato daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetre sarvabuddhakāryaṃ karoti
T06bsa034_u:7469: yattathāgato daśabhirtāthāgatabalaiḥ sampādayati tathā hi tathāgato daśabhiḥ pūrvanirdiṣṭairvalaiḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvārthasampādanaṃ prati samartho bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:7470: ye cainaṃ tathāgatabalānyārabhya praśnaṃ pṛcchanti yathā yāni tathāgatena jñātāni dṛṣṭāni viditāni vijñātāni tathā tāni tathāgatasteṣāṃ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākaroti /
T06bsa034_u:7472: yattathāgato vaiśāradyaiḥ sampādayati tathāgatājñāyāṃ sthiteṣvasyiteṣu ca vineyeṣvasaṃkliṣṭacittatā pañcamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
T06bsa034_u:7473: yattathāgataḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ sampādayati yathāvādi tathākāritā ṣaṣṭhaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
T06bsa034_u:7474: yattathāgataḥ arakṣyaiḥ sampādayati buddhacakṣuṣā rātrindivaṃ sarvalokavyavalokanā saptamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
T06bsa034_u:7477: yattathāgato 'sammoṣadharmatayā sampādayati tathāgatasyācāravihārasya yathāvadanuvartanā adhitiṣṭhanā navamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
T06bsa034_u:7478: yattathāgato vāsanāsamuddhātena sampādayati ye dharmā anarthopasaṃhitā ye ca naivārthopasaṃhitānānārthopasaṃhitāstānabhinirvarjya ye ca dharmā arthopasaṃhitāsteṣāṃ samākhyānaṃ vivaraṇā uttānīkarme daśamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam yattathāgataḥ sarvākāravarajñānena sampādayati evaṃ hi tathāgato 'nenāveṇikena catvāriṃśaduttareṇa buddhadharmaśatena daśatathāgata kṛtyāni kurvan sarvabuddhakāryaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:7479: vistaravibhāgataḥ punarasyaiva buddhakāryasya na sukarāsaṃkhyāṃ kartuṃ yāvatkalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrairapi
T06bsa034_u:7480: ayaṃ sa tathāgato vihārastathāgatī bhūmiḥ pratiṣṭhetyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7482: etāmāśrityaitāṃ pratiṣṭhāya yasyāḥ spṛhayamāṇarūpā bodhisattvā bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣante adhigamyāpi ca tāṃ pratiṣṭhāmetāmevāśrityaitāṃ pratiṣṭhāya sarvasattvānāṃ sarvārthān sāmpādayati tasmātpratiṣṭhetyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7484: sarve caite buddhadharmā atyarthaṃ parārthakriyānukūlāḥ parārthakriyāprabhāvitāśca tathāgatānām
T06bsa034_u:7487: santi ca te buddhadharmā ye sarveṇa sarvaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddheṣu nopalabhyante /
T06bsa034_u:7490: tathāgatasya tu sarve copalabhyante sarvākāraparipūrṇāścātikrāntatarāśca praṇītatarāśca /
T06bsa034_u:7495: sarvabodhisattva-śikṣāmārgasya śikṣāmārgaphalasya ca tarvākārasya nirdeśāya adhiṣṭhānabhūtam sā khalviyaṃ bodhisattvabhūmirbodhisattvapiṭakamātṛketyapyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7499: yaḥ kaścit sadevamānuṣā[surā]llokāddevabhūto vā [manuṣyabhūto vā] śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo
T06bsa034_u:7500: vāsyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau dṛḍhāmadhimuktimutpādyemāṃ śroṣyatyudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati bhāvanākāreṇa vā prayokṣyate pareṣāṃ vā vistareṇa prakāśayiṣyatyantato lekhayitvā dhārayiṣyati pūjāsatkārañca prayokṣyate /
T06bsa034_u:7501: tasya samāsato yāvān puṇyaskandho bhagavatā sarvabodhisattvapiṭake saṃgṛhītasya sūtrāntasya śravaṇādikarmaṇa ākhyāta uttāno vivṛtaḥ prajñaptaḥ prakāśitaḥ tāvānasya puṇyaskandhaḥ pratyāśaṃsitavyaḥ tatkasya hetoḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7502: tathā hyasyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sarvasya bodhisattvapiṭakasyoddeśanirdeśamukhāni saṃgṛhītānyākhyātāni
T06bsa034_u:7504: [bodhisattva]bhūmau yo dharmavinayo vistareṇa prakāśitaḥ sa bahulamuddeśasvādhyāya-dharmānudharmapratipattitaḥ sthāsyati pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāñca gamiṣyati na tāvatsaddharmapratirūpakāḥ pracurā
T06bsa034_u:7506: yataśca punaḥ saddharmapratirūpakāḥ pracurā bhaviṣyanti tataścāyaṃ saddharmo bhūtārthopasaṃhito tasya tadantardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T06bsa034_u:7507: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne ṣaṣṭhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpaṭalam /
T06bsa034_u:7510: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāntathāgato hyavadat /
T06bsa034_u:7511: teṣāñca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
